story:
Now available on Indiegogo Marketplace

 

Ockel Computers are beautiful PC’s that are as small as your smartphone or your external hard drive, but just as powerful as a desktop PC. All you need to use an Ockel Sirius B or an Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry is an HDMI-screen and a mouse and/or keyboard. Work, play a game, turn your television into a smart media center, it’s up to you. And best of all, they are now ready for immediate shipment!


 

  1.  Because Ockel computers have the size of a smartphone and weigh less than a baseball.
  2. Because the Ockel computer turns any tv into a smart media center. It has never been easier to enjoy your favorite Netflix series, to stream with Kodi or to listen to Groove Music.
  3. Because you can use our mini PC’s to get rid of your bulky PC tower at work, at home, or in your dorm room.
  4. Because Ockel computers have a beautiful and unique design.
  5. Because you can connect your mouse, keyboard, external hard drive or any other peripheral within the blink of an eye. Either wireless through Bluetooth or WiFi, or using one of the USB-ports.
  6. Because these mini PC’s come with a pre-installed version of Windows 10, or, in case you prefer Linux, without any operating system installed.
  7. Because our white and black dwarf are ready for immediate shipment and will be delivered within three business days. Worldwide.
  8. Because by buying an Ockel computer you are contributing to a company that has a lot of ideas about doing things differently.
     


 

The Ockel team is supported by a large network of talented people. Two of our official partners are Microsoft and Intel. We work closely with their global teams and benefit from their support and knowledge when it comes to software development, licensing or any other question.


 

Whether it’s Netflix, Twitter, Flipboard or Dropbox: Ockel Sirius B and Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry handle it all. The millions of applications at the Windows 10 Appstore will give you the control (or fun) you are looking for.


 


 

 
  Sirius B Original Sirius B Black Cherry
Color White Black
Material Aluminium Aluminium
Operating System Windows 10 Home (32-bit) / No OS Windows 10 Home (64-bit) / No OS
Processor Intel Atom Z3735F Intel Atom x5-Z8300

Memory 2GB 4GB
4K Support No Yes

WiFi 802.11 a/b/g/n 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac
Bluetooth 4.0 4.0

(4.8 x 3.1 x 0.4 inches)		 124 x 80 x 13mm
(4.8 x 3.1 x 0.5 inches)
Weight 120g (4.2 ounces) 153g (5.4 ounces)
Other Interfaces 1x MIC input 3.5mm jack, 1x L/R stereo 3.5mm jack, 1x DC in jack 1x MIC input 3.5mm jack, 1x L/R stereo 3.5mm jack, 1x DC in jack

USD + SHIPPING		 SOLD OUT

 

Ockel Sirius B easily fits into your pocket or bag. With a size close to smartphones such as the iPhone 7 and Samsung Galaxy S7 you hardly realize you’re carrying a complete computer with you. Use the Ockel Sirius B  wherever and whenever you want. Connect an HDMI screen, the power adapter and optionally a mouse and/or keyboard and you are ready to go!


 

We know that no one likes to carry around heavy stuff. That’s why the Ockel Sirius B weighs only 120 grams (or 4.23 ounces) and the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry 153 grams (or 5.40 ounces). This is less than the iPhone 7 Plus!


 

The Ockel Sirius B is equipped with two USB ports, an HDMI port, a Micro SD-card slot and a 3.5 mm audio and microphone jack. That means you can connect a keyboard, mouse, speaker or any other external device within the blink of an eye. 
 


 

We designed the Ockel Sirius B in such a way that ventilation fans are no longer required. This unique feature combined with flash storage means you can enjoy working in silence and benefit from ultra-low power consumption.
As the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry has more powerful hardware components, the device also generates more heat. A regular passive heat sink isn’t able to cool this extra heat. As the Ockel brand is built around everything that can be found in space we decided to create an eye-catching heat sink with the pattern of the Canis Major star constellation. This is the star constellation where the Sirius B star can be found, the most well-known white dwarf star in our universe.


 



We understand everyone is different. That's why we try to be as flexible as possible. We offer perks with the operating system Windows 10 pre-installed (OS perks), but also without (NO OS perks), for those who prefer to install Windows 10 or a different operating system themselves. Please note that the Ockel Sirius B (white) only supports a 32-bit OS. The Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry also supports 64-bit OS.

Please take into account that if you choose a perk without an operating system and you choose to install for example Linux, support will be limited. As Linux is an open source operating system, support will be limited to the drivers provided by the Linux community.
Anyone who needs some extra storage space is invited to choose a perk with a 64GB Micro SD-card.
Sirius B Original
Windows 10		 $249
USD + SHIPPING

Sirius B Black Cherry

Micro SD-card		 SOLD OUT

 


 

All orders placed on Indiegogo will be fulfilled within 24-hours on business days. Every order will be shipped with the DHL Express service, meaning your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry arrives within 3-4 business days, where ever you live.
 


 

In November 2015, we launched the Ockel Sirius B crowdfunding campaign, here on Indiegogo. Within 24 hours our funding goal was reached and so far, we raised more than 520.000 dollars with the Ockel Sirius B and Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. The funds raised with this campaign have been used for the production, development and order fulfillment of the Ockel Sirius B and the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. 
If you decide to join us now, you will benefit from the Indiegogo InDemand stage, meaning your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry order will be fulfilled and shipped within 24-hours (on business days).
 

Ockel Computers is part of the same group of companies as Avanca, the first company founded by our team member Tim Haaksma and currently the fastest growing hardware company in the EMEA-region. 

Ockel Computers was raised with the same spirit as Avanca. In the past nine years we gained the experience and skills needed to launch Ockel and we have access to many of the essential resources needed to successfully bring this project to life: a warehouse, customer service and a network of top engineers and suppliers. At the same time, we have a great amount of freedom to innovate. 

If you decide to buy an Ockel computer, you will contribute to a company that has many more ideas about doing things differently. If you, just like Ockel, are passionate about true innovation, join us!

If you want to stay in touch and know more about the Ockel adventures and (upcoming) products, follow us on one of our social channels!

   

 

You can’t accomplish the best results on your own. That’s why our team is made up of  technology addicts, geeks, marketeers and design wizards. We're Ockel, it's great to meet you!



 

We wanted to express our Dutch roots and we have several team members who are fascinated by everything that can be found in space. That is why the different Ockel products carry names related to space. Sirius B is a well-known white dwarf star.
 

All available perks are ready for immediate shipment. Your funding will be used to produce, fulfill and ship your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. But, more important perhaps, is that you will contribute to a company that has many more ideas about doing things differently. If you, just like Ockel, are passionate about true innovation, join us!
 

HARDWARE QUESTIONS

What Windows license is included?

If you select a perk with OS included, your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry will ship with a fully activated license for Windows 10. The Ockel Sirius B model includes Windows 10 Home 32-bit while the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry includes Windows 10 home 64-bit.  

Can I install another operating system on the Ockel Sirius A?

The BIOS will be unlocked so theoretically any OS that runs on a x86 platform could be installed, including older version of Windows or Linux. However, alternative operating systems will need driver support, which may or may not exist, for all the hardware to fully function. Currently only Windows 10 will be supported via Ockel. Please note that Windows 7 is not a supported OS for the Ockel Sirius B & Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry.

Can I reinstall Windows 10 if something goes wrong?

Yes, using an HDMI display and USB media you can perform a Windows installation. At the Online Support Center you can find guides and assistance. Also, our technical suppor team is available for assistance, you can reach out to them at: support@ockelcomputers.com.

Is the storage capacity limited to 32GB or 64GB?

No. The Micro SD card slot is perfect for extending your memory. (SD cards up to 128GB's) And when 128GB isn’t enough, you have two USB ports to hook up an USB stick or USB external hard drive.  

Can I expand the RAM?

If you are interested in moving from 2GB to 4GB of RAM, please consider upgrading to the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. Adding or changing memory separately is not an option.

How speedy is this computer?

The performance of the Ockel Sirius B is excellent for normal day to day use. That means you can browse, email, edit documents, stream your favorite media and many other day to day tasks without any problem. We don’t like selling something as different from what it really is, so that’s why we tell you not to expect to play heavy 3D games with the Ockel Sirius B. 

What’s in the box?

Every Ockel Sirius B comes with an HDMI cable, power cable and an AC-adapter compatible with the power outlets in your country. (Depending on shipping address).
The Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry is shipped with an HDMI cable, power cable and universal AC-adapter, including an UK, USA and EU adapter plug. 

Is there a support website available?

Yes, we have set-up a support section on our website. Please visit: www.ockelproducts.com/support for drivers, downloads, solutions and more.

How do I install Linux on my NO-OS Ockel Sirius B version?

Please visit: www.ockelproducts.com/support for the Linux Ubuntu installation guide and related files.

ORDERING QUESTIONS

When will the Ockel Sirius B be ready for shipment?

All available perks are ready for immediate shipment!

Shipping and tracking information

All Indiegogo orders for the Ockel Sirius B and Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry will be processed and shipped within one business day. Please note: it can take another business day before you receive your DHL tracking information, please make sure to check your spam-folder as well.

Please note: A signature is required and PO-box addresses won't be accepted.

Shipping duration

All available perks are ready for immediate shipping and will be delivered at your doorstep within 3-4 business days after your order has been confirmed! We use DHL as our carrier, please note that a signature is required and PO-boxes cannot be accepted. 

How can I order more than one Ockel Sirius A?

You're loving the Ockel computers as much as we do! Unfortunately, currently the only way to order more than one Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry is by placing separate orders. For orders of 10 units or more, please reach out to our Product Manager Jesper Baumgarten (jesper@ockelcomputers.com).

Why is a different country showing when I am from the Netherlands?

You probably filled-in 'Nederland', 'Holland' or 'The Netherlands' as your shipping country in the ordering process. Due to a small error in the ordering systems of Indiegogo the synonyms for 'Netherlands' are not recognized. Please reach out to us at support@ockelcomputers.com to resolve this issue

Will there be any import duties or costs?

For EU backers, no import duties apply. For all other backers, the answer will vary based on your country. Even if there is no import tariff, the shipper may charge you a documentation fee which is typically small ($10 or less). Any standard internal taxes (VAT, state/county sales taxes, etc.) will apply to all backers based on your local laws.

Your campaign is over, can I still order a Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry?

Although the official campaign time is finished, it’s far from over! We feel the ‘real’ part is just about to start.
Our Indiegogo campaign is now in it’s ‘InDemand’ stage. This means you’re still able to order the Ockel Sirius B (original) and the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry through Indiegogo.

PRESS QUESTIONS

I’m from the press, who do I have to contact?

You can reach out to our Marketing Director Nathalie van Wijkvliet (Nathalie@ockelcomputers.com) for all your press related questions or inquiries.

$250USD + SHIPPING



Sirius B Black CherryWindows 10

$349USD + SHIPPING


Sirius B Black CherryWindows 10Micro SD-card

$374USD + SHIPPING


Sirius B Black CherryNo OS

SOLD OUT


Sirius B Black CherryNo OSMicro SD-card

SOLD OUT



 

 



All orders placed on Indiegogo will be fulfilled within 24-hours on business days. Every order will be shipped with the DHL Express service, meaning your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry arrives within 3-4 business days, where ever you live. 
 

In November 2015, we launched the Ockel Sirius B crowdfunding campaign, here on Indiegogo. Within 24 hours our funding goal was reached and so far, we raised more than 520.000 dollars with the Ockel Sirius B and Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. The funds raised with this campaign have been used for the production, development and order fulfillment of the Ockel Sirius B and the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. If you decide to join us now, you will benefit from the Indiegogo InDemand stage, meaning your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry order will be fulfilled and shipped within 24-hours (on business days). 

Ockel Computers is part of the same group of companies as Avanca, the first company founded by our team member Tim Haaksma and currently the fastest growing hardware company in the EMEA-region. 

Ockel Computers was raised with the same spirit as Avanca. In the past nine years we gained the experience and skills needed to launch Ockel and we have access to many of the essential resources needed to successfully bring this project to life: a warehouse, customer service and a network of top engineers and suppliers. At the same time, we have a great amount of freedom to innovate. 
If you decide to buy an Ockel computer, you will contribute to a company that has many more ideas about doing things differently. If you, just like Ockel, are passionate about true innovation, join us!
If you want to stay in touch and know more about the Ockel adventures and (upcoming) products, follow us on one of our social channels!
   
 

You can’t accomplish the best results on your own. That’s why our team is made up of  technology addicts, geeks, marketeers and design wizards. We're Ockel, it's great to meet you!






 


We wanted to express our Dutch roots and we have several team members who are fascinated by everything that can be found in space. That is why the different Ockel products carry names related to space. Sirius B is a well-known white dwarf star. 

All available perks are ready for immediate shipment. Your funding will be used to produce, fulfill and ship your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. But, more important perhaps, is that you will contribute to a company that has many more ideas about doing things differently. If you, just like Ockel, are passionate about true innovation, join us! 

HARDWARE QUESTIONS
What Windows license is included?
If you select a perk with OS included, your Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry will ship with a fully activated license for Windows 10. The Ockel Sirius B model includes Windows 10 Home 32-bit while the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry includes Windows 10 home 64-bit.  
Can I install another operating system on the Ockel Sirius A?
The BIOS will be unlocked so theoretically any OS that runs on a x86 platform could be installed, including older version of Windows or Linux. However, alternative operating systems will need driver support, which may or may not exist, for all the hardware to fully function. Currently only Windows 10 will be supported via Ockel. Please note that Windows 7 is not a supported OS for the Ockel Sirius B & Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry.
Can I reinstall Windows 10 if something goes wrong?
Yes, using an HDMI display and USB media you can perform a Windows installation. At the Online Support Center you can find guides and assistance. Also, our technical suppor team is available for assistance, you can reach out to them at: support@ockelcomputers.com.
Is the storage capacity limited to 32GB or 64GB?
No. The Micro SD card slot is perfect for extending your memory. (SD cards up to 128GB's) And when 128GB isn’t enough, you have two USB ports to hook up an USB stick or USB external hard drive.  
Can I expand the RAM?
If you are interested in moving from 2GB to 4GB of RAM, please consider upgrading to the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry. Adding or changing memory separately is not an option.
How speedy is this computer?
The performance of the Ockel Sirius B is excellent for normal day to day use. That means you can browse, email, edit documents, stream your favorite media and many other day to day tasks without any problem. We don’t like selling something as different from what it really is, so that’s why we tell you not to expect to play heavy 3D games with the Ockel Sirius B. 
What’s in the box?
Every Ockel Sirius B comes with an HDMI cable, power cable and an AC-adapter compatible with the power outlets in your country. (Depending on shipping address).The Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry is shipped with an HDMI cable, power cable and universal AC-adapter, including an UK, USA and EU adapter plug. 
Is there a support website available? 
Yes, we have set-up a support section on our website. Please visit: www.ockelproducts.com/support for drivers, downloads, solutions and more.
How do I install Linux on my NO-OS Ockel Sirius B version?
Please visit: www.ockelproducts.com/support for the Linux Ubuntu installation guide and related files.
ORDERING QUESTIONS
When will the Ockel Sirius B be ready for shipment?
All available perks are ready for immediate shipment!
Shipping and tracking information
All Indiegogo orders for the Ockel Sirius B and Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry will be processed and shipped within one business day. Please note: it can take another business day before you receive your DHL tracking information, please make sure to check your spam-folder as well.
Please note: A signature is required and PO-box addresses won't be accepted.
Shipping duration
All available perks are ready for immediate shipping and will be delivered at your doorstep within 3-4 business days after your order has been confirmed! We use DHL as our carrier, please note that a signature is required and PO-boxes cannot be accepted. 
How can I order more than one Ockel Sirius A?
You're loving the Ockel computers as much as we do! Unfortunately, currently the only way to order more than one Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry is by placing separate orders. For orders of 10 units or more, please reach out to our Product Manager Jesper Baumgarten (jesper@ockelcomputers.com).
Why is a different country showing when I am from the Netherlands?
You probably filled-in 'Nederland', 'Holland' or 'The Netherlands' as your shipping country in the ordering process. Due to a small error in the ordering systems of Indiegogo the synonyms for 'Netherlands' are not recognized. Please reach out to us at support@ockelcomputers.com to resolve this issue
Will there be any import duties or costs?
For EU backers, no import duties apply. For all other backers, the answer will vary based on your country. Even if there is no import tariff, the shipper may charge you a documentation fee which is typically small ($10 or less). Any standard internal taxes (VAT, state/county sales taxes, etc.) will apply to all backers based on your local laws.
Your campaign is over, can I still order a Ockel Sirius B or Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry?
Although the official campaign time is finished, it’s far from over! We feel the ‘real’ part is just about to start.Our Indiegogo campaign is now in it’s ‘InDemand’ stage. This means you’re still able to order the Ockel Sirius B (original) and the Ockel Sirius B Black Cherry through Indiegogo.
PRESS QUESTIONS
I’m from the press, who do I have to contact?
You can reach out to our Marketing Director Nathalie van Wijkvliet (Nathalie@ockelcomputers.com) for all your press related questions or inquiries.

story:
Specifications and Summary

Materials

  •  Lower casing: Zinc alloy
  •  Upper lid: Zinc alloy
  •  Swing bracket: Stainless Steel
  •  Hinge needle: Stainless Steel 
  •  Coil casing: ABS plastic

Colours

Stainless Steel

  •  Silver: Glossy finish

Zinc Alloy

  •  Black: Matte finish
  •  Gold: Matte finish

Dimensions

  •  Length: 40mm
  •  Height: 60mm
  •  Depth: 17mm
  •  Lower shell height: 38mm
  •  Lid shell height: 22mm
  •  Coil casing height: 19mm
  •  Coil casing width bottom: 16mm
  •  Coil casing width top: 14mm

Weight

  •  Total Weight: 87g

Charge

  •  Total charge: 1250mAh

Features

  •  Flameless Coil 
  • 8 Second smart timer
  • 360 degree coil ignition
  • Windproof up to 100mph
  • Satisfying clink
  • Compact Power
  • USB/USBC charging ports
  • Charge two devices simultaneously
  • Super portable ergonomic design
  • Micro USB input 

Certifications

The DualFuel has been approved to carry the following marks:

  •  ROHS 
  • Restriction of Hazardous Substances.
  • Directive 2002/95/EC
  • CE Mark
  •  Conformité Européenne
     
  • Required in the EEA
  • C UL US (1642)
  • Underwriters Laboratories
     
  • Approved to perform safety testing by the US Federal Agency OSHA 
  • (Occupational Safety and Health Administration)

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Q: Are these the only colours offered?
  • A: Yes, the Zinc Alloy(s) are the base level colours we offer. The Stainless Steel is the stretch goal option.
  • Q: What are the dimensions? How big is this feature?
  • A: Please see the specifications above for a detailed breakdown of the features and dimensions.
  • Q: How much does shipping cost to my country?
  • A: We offer free shipping to all countries in the world.
  • Q: Will I be able to track my package?
  • A: Yes, shortly after shipping you will receive an email with a direct tracking link to your specific package. The link will become active after 3 working days.
  • Q: I have another question that isn't answered here, how can I contact you?
  • A: You may contact us via the following channels and we will do our best to reply to you within the hour:
  • The Indiegogo messaging system
  • Through the Indiegogo comments - if you’re a backer
  • By email at: Help (at) Risolves (dot) com

story:
Let's face it - lots of quilters avoid math if they can.  We're not saying quilters have a deep set hatred of all math, just the pesky math - stuff needed for calculating bias binding and set in triangles.   Sure, you might remember how to use the Pythagorean Theorem, but the likelihood of signing up for a hypotenuse calculating weekend retreat is pretty low.  


About the app


Our app is a smart phone tool for quilters that takes the math out of quilting. It'll do lots of the pesky math used in quilting while managing projects and materials. Need to calculate binding?  It does that.  Set in triangles?  Yep.  Diagonally pieced backing?  Uh huh. The air speed velocity of an unladen swallow?  Sorry, not the app for you. You can also store the calculations and manage  your materials for more than one project at a time - bonus!  And when you have your whole quilt planned out, the app even creates a shopping list for you.  Basically, if you have ever had to put aside a quilting project because the idea of shifting from "creative" mode to "calculation" mode squashed your mojo, this app is for you.

 
Making It Happen


Sounds too good to be true right?  Well, really , it is.  Ya see, we don't actually have the app ready yet. These things take time you know, but more importantly they take money. So far time has been on our side, so now we need to raise the money needed to move the application from design to development. We've got most of the math and GUI worked out, but we need help getting that into a useable application. Funding from this IndieGoGo campaign would get the dream app to both iTunes and the Android Market before the end of 2011.  


So here's how you can help make this happen.  Check out the nifty incentives and donate to our indiegogo.com campaign at www.indiegogo.com/quiltingapp. Tell your friends and family about our indiegogo.com campaign - send them our campaign link.

story:
Andobil bike phone mount offers a combination of protection, stability, and convenience so you can rest easy on your future rides. Not just its sturdy cradle securely grips your phone over speed bumps while still allowing for one-hand adjustability and accessibility, but also absorbs vibrations and protects your phone’s stabilizers from causing problems for the camera. Andobil is definitely the one and only bike phone mount that you don’t want to miss.

 

 

 

 

Y-shape-designed cradle clamp ensures the phone’s stability. There are corrugated silicone cushions on every corner for shock absorption and protection for your phone. With a high level of protection and stability, Andobil guarantees a wonderful experience and good mood on your journey.

 

 

The Y-shaped design also allows one-hand operation. Just pull and lock, then you are ready to go.

Andobil gives you the convenience to take your phone out in a second and take photos or videos anytime you want.

Andobil is spacious enough to fit phones with a bulky case. No need to remove the phone case particularly. The design is so considerable. At the bottom, there is a port cutout for charging your device. The front camera will not be blocked during the journey. The security lock at the back ensures stability and phone protection during the ride.

 

 

360° rotation is available that you can turn your phone vertically, horizontally, or at any angle in between when you ride.

 

Andobil is compatible with any model and any size of smart phones from 4.7” to 6.8”.

 

 

 

 

Lanhe is a company dedicated to serving global consumers.

An Internet technology company that creates products with a high sense of experience. Adhering to the five principles of "benefit", "useful", "basic", "simple" and "natural", it advocates the product design concept of "simplification.

story:
What is y!kes Security?

y!kes is all about the "U" in "Security". y!kes is built around what is unique to you, making your phone almost impossible to break into. Like your fingerprint and signature your swipe is unique to you.

Are you still using a PIN number? Password? Why are we still using security techniques that were developed 50 years ago? Use your gestures to unlock your device. In the digital age users swipe, tap, and draw to unlock their phones.

The possibilities are endless. y!kes allows you to personalize your lock screen, which makes it more secure than ever. The less common your password is with everyone else in the world, the safer you are. y!kes swipe, tap, and draw technology ensures that your password is totally unique to you, no doubts about it.

y!kes Security app is a revolutionary mobile security application that will change the dynamics for smart phone users through the fusion of personalization, entertainment, and security. y!kes eliminates traditional, limited, predetermined, alphanumeric passwords and introduces innovative, personal, creatively based “free form gestures” making the passcode possibilities virtually limitless. y!kes also protects all of the user communication features in the cyber arena, giving the power of privacy back to the people. Today, the word "privacy" has lost its meaning. The mission of y!kes is to protect every smart phone and allow everyone to keep their personal information private and secure.


Is your mobile device really secure?

Can entering your passcode be interactive and fun? y!kes Security is a mobile security lock screen ingeniously merging mobile security and entertainment. Simply put, standard lock screens today are not secure, yield a low memorization rate, and are not entertaining. We solve this problem by intertwining your pictures and videos with the ability to unlock your phone screen. This innovative solution allows your brain to memorize at a higher rate. y!kes Security lock screen features high quality protection, with millions of passcode sequences. Do you have a habit of leaving your smart phone unattended? Well, you never have to worry about someone accessing your personal information, as long as you have y!kes Security.

How does it work (entertainment)?

Think of a memorable moment in your life in which you have a picture or video on your smart phone. What if you could transfer that memory on to your lock screen? With y!kes Security you can do just that. Our Security lock screen allows the user to take pictures or videos from their photo or video gallery and use them as a passcode on their phone.

Video:

With our video concept users can to upload a short video that can be broken up into four sections. In each section you'll create a free gesture password. As the user inputs their password the video plays. This allows users to have their most memorable moments as their lock screen.


Gallery:
With our galley concept users will upload 10 gallery photos to their lock screen. Each time you unlock your phone the gallery screen randomizes. This feature protects users from anyone pinpointing the area in which they are typing their pass code from a distance.

Picture:

The picture concept allows users to upload a gallery photo to their lock screen, which after they engage the unlock button ask the user to draw their free form password on the screen. The possibilities are endless as the user can draw anything to unlock their smart phone.

Psychological studies have shown it is easier to remember something you are interested in. Our patent pending solution to mobile security allows your brain to memorize on a higher scale. Individualization of lock screens are unheard of...until now. We provide high security and ease of access exclusively for the user.

Exclusive:

Our lock screen allows the use of multiple swipes and taps in order to unlock your smart phone:

·  Use multiple fingers to swipe and unlock phone in any direction

·  Use multiple finger to tap and unlock phone

Why should you support the development of this project?

Your smart phone is not secure. The sooner you have y!kes Security is the sooner your mobile device will be secure. Our team is focused to get this to the masses as soon as possible, but we can't do it without you. Imagine a world where you never have to worry about the unauthorized use of your phone if it's misplaced. Just how important is your own peace of mind? Support this project, for privacy's sake!

Items needed:

· User Interface Designer

· Android development fees

· Focus Groups

· Marketing Fees

· Maintenance of Application

We have the plan and the people in place to make this dream a reality for users everywhere. Every little bit helps!

Risks and Challenges:

Other than not being able to raise enough money, the only real risk we face is limited developer access to IOS 8. Due to how the y!kes app works, if we are not allowed to access parts of the IOS operating system, we may have to wait until Apple releases an IOS that does. At this time, Android already allows us access to the Operating System Core.

Conclusion

Personalization means everything. Individual security for all smart phone users is our ultimate goal. y!kes security is the best mobile phone innovation and with your support, we plan to prove it to you. As a company we are taking a deep dive into the consumer’s brain to bring personality to your smart phone. We are excited to give rewards for pledging your support. Every little bit helps! Our motto “as long as the user is first it’s worth the work.”

About us:

Elliot Dean is a native of Mansfield, Texas and a Magna Cum Laude graduate of Tuskegee University with a major in Finance. Mr. Dean enjoys helping others succeed, playing basketball, the challenge of everyday business, watching documentaries on successful entrepreneurs, inventing, and inspiring others to chase after their dreams. He has always taken pleasure in spending a little time every day writing down innovative ideas. Elliot Dean describes being successful as being able to live comfortably with the ones he holds dear, helping others, and achieving your life long dreams.

David Alexander IV is a native of Pensacola, Florida  and will be graduating from Tuskegee University in the spring of 2015, majoring in Mechanical Engineering. He enjoys basketball, helping others, and learning anything new to expand his horizon. He’s an all-around guy and loves to be in company of family and friends. David has always been a big dreamer and always knew that he would have a life built upon uplifting others just like his dad. The only thing he didn’t know is how he would accomplish it… and now he does.

William Burgess is a native of Pensacola, Florida and has a very extensive background in technology. With over 17 years in web design, development and online marketing. William brings to the table a level of expertise to head up the design and development of y!kes app. Also having background in Information Warfare working for the US Government through 2004 to 2008. His understanding of security risk, and risk assesments makes him the perfect team member for the y!kes app. 

Stretch Goals:

250,000 - With 250k We can pay our development team to develop y!kes for IOS 8 when it comes out later this year.

500,000 - With 500k We can build y!kes to allow remote access to your device to lock it, turn it off, even wipe it. Also we can build the required infrastructure needed to host this type of service.

750,000 - With 750k we can build our "All In One Encryption" that will protect all of your communications, encrypted phone calls, emails, sms messages. If the person your communicating with is a y!kes user, its secure.

1,000,000 - With 1million, we can design and develop our one of a kind AI system, that will only improve upon our free form swipe, the app will be able to learn your swipes, just like your signature, or finger print this is 100% unique to you, with our AI system, even if the person who isn't suppose to have your phone, may know your password, our AI system can see that this swipe isn't consistent with your normal margin of error. This prevents people from unlocking your phone.

Special Thanks:

Special thanks to all our family, friends, backers, and mentors who have supported us over the last year as we reached great heights with this project.  We couldn't have done it without you guys.

Q&A:

When will the application be available considering you get the funding?
y!kes App will be available in November 2014 for android users.
If I have questions how can I reach your team?
You can reach us via our social media profiles, commenting on this project, or by email at info@yikesapp.co
Other than contributing, how can I help?

You can spread the word about y!kes Security to your friends and on social media. 

How much money do you actually need?

$150,000 is the minimum that we need in order to establish a years worth of maintenance. However, if we have $1,000,000, we would be able to easily accomplish all of the objectives we have listed above.

Are there any limits to what you can draw on your lock screen?

Yes, you can draw whatever you want.  The user has full access to a limitless amount of passwords with our free form gestures.

Is this app like any other lock screen you can download off of the app stores?

No, y!kes app is fully integrated within the smart phone infrastructure as if it were a factory setting lock screen. 

Is this the only mobile application you guys have in the works?

No, there is more to come stay tuned!

which you have a picture or video on your smart phone. What if you could
transfer that memory on to your lock screen? With y!kes Security you can do
just that. Our Security lock screen allows the user to take pictures or videos
from their photo or video gallery and use them as a passcode on their phone.
Video: 
With our video concept users can to upload a short video that can be broken up into four sections. In each section you'll create a free gesture password. As the user inputs their password the video plays. This allows users to have their most memorable moments as their lock screen.Gallery:With our galley concept users will upload 10 gallery photos to their lock screen. Each time you unlock your phone the gallery screen randomizes. This feature protects users from anyone pinpointing the area in which they are typing their pass code from a distance.
Picture: 
The picture concept allows users to upload a gallery photo to their lock screen, which after they engage the unlock button ask the user to draw their free form password on the screen. The possibilities are endless as the user can draw anything to unlock their smart phone.
Psychological studies have shown it is easier to remember something
you are interested in. Our patent pending solution to mobile security allows your
brain to memorize on a higher scale. Individualization of lock screens are
unheard of...until now. We provide high security and ease of access exclusively
for the user. 
Exclusive:
Our lock screen allows the use of multiple swipes and taps
in order to unlock your smart phone:
· 
Use multiple fingers to swipe and unlock phone
in any direction
· 
Use multiple finger to tap and unlock phone
Why should you
support the development of this project?
Your smart phone is not secure. The sooner you have y!kes Security is the sooner your mobile device will be secure. Our team is focused to get this to the masses as soon as possible, but we can't do it without you. Imagine a world where you never have to worry about the unauthorized use of your phone if it's misplaced. Just how important is your own peace of mind? Support
this project, for privacy's sake!
Items needed:
· User Interface Designer· Android development fees· Focus Groups· Marketing Fees
· Maintenance of Application
We have the plan and the people in place to make this dream
a reality for users everywhere. Every little bit helps!
Risks and Challenges:Other than not being able to raise enough money, the only real risk we face is limited developer access to IOS 8. Due to how the y!kes app works, if we are not allowed to access parts of the IOS operating system, we may have to wait until Apple releases an IOS that does. At this time, Android already allows us access to the Operating System Core.
Conclusion
Personalization means everything. Individual security for
all smart phone users is our ultimate goal. y!kes security is the best mobile
phone innovation and with your support, we plan to prove it to you. As a company
we are taking a deep dive into the consumer’s brain to bring personality to
your smart phone. We are excited to give rewards for pledging your support.
Every little bit helps! Our motto “as long as the user is first it’s worth the
work.”
About us:
Elliot Dean is a native of Mansfield, Texas and a Magna Cum
Laude graduate of Tuskegee University with a major in Finance. Mr. Dean enjoys
helping others succeed, playing basketball, the challenge of everyday business,
watching documentaries on successful entrepreneurs, inventing, and inspiring
others to chase after their dreams. He has always taken pleasure in spending a
little time every day writing down innovative ideas. Elliot Dean describes
being successful as being able to live comfortably with the ones he holds dear,
helping others, and achieving your life long dreams.

David Alexander IV is a native of Pensacola, Florida  and will be graduating from Tuskegee
University in the spring of 2015, majoring in Mechanical Engineering. He enjoys
basketball, helping others, and learning anything new to expand his horizon.
He’s an all-around guy and loves to be in company of family and friends. David
has always been a big dreamer and always knew that he would have a life built
upon uplifting others just like his dad. The only thing he didn’t know is how
he would accomplish it… and now he does.William Burgess is a native of Pensacola, Florida and has a very extensive background in technology. With over 17 years in web design, development and online marketing. William brings to the table a level of expertise to head up the design and development of y!kes app. Also having background in Information Warfare working for the US Government through 2004 to 2008. His understanding of security risk, and risk assesments makes him the perfect team member for the y!kes app. 

Stretch Goals:
250,000 - With 250k We can pay our development team to develop y!kes for IOS 8 when it comes out later this year.
500,000 - With 500k We can build y!kes to allow remote access to your device to lock it, turn it off, even wipe it. Also we can build the required infrastructure needed to host this type of service.
750,000 - With 750k we can build our "All In One Encryption" that will protect all of your communications, encrypted phone calls, emails, sms messages. If the person your communicating with is a y!kes user, its secure.
1,000,000 - With 1million, we can design and develop our one of a kind AI system, that will only improve upon our free form swipe, the app will be able to learn your swipes, just like your signature, or finger print this is 100% unique to you, with our AI system, even if the person who isn't suppose to have your phone, may know your password, our AI system can see that this swipe isn't consistent with your normal margin of error. This prevents people from unlocking your phone.
Special Thanks:
Special thanks to all our family, friends, backers, and mentors who
have supported us over the last year as we reached great heights with this
project.  We couldn't have done it
without you guys.
Q&A:
When will the application be available considering you get the funding?y!kes App will be available in November 2014 for android users.
If I have questions how can I reach your team?
You can reach us via our social media profiles, commenting on this project, or by email at info@yikesapp.co
Other than contributing, how can I help?

You can spread the word about y!kes Security to your friends and on social media. 

How much money do you actually need?
$150,000 is the minimum that we need in order to establish a years worth of maintenance. However, if we have $1,000,000, we would be able to easily accomplish all of the objectives we have listed above.
Are there any limits to what you can draw on your lock screen?
Yes, you can draw whatever you want.  The user has full access to a limitless amount of passwords with our free form gestures.
Is this app like any other lock screen you can download off of the app stores?
No, y!kes app is fully integrated within the smart phone infrastructure as if it were a factory setting lock screen. 
Is this the only mobile application you guys have in the works?
No, there is more to come stay tuned!

story:
What do we have?

The anoDyne microneedle an ingenious little gizmo, the size of your thumb, that can help keep people alive. This small device, once it comes to market, will bring medications like insulin, preloaded and pre-measured, to millions of people suffering from chronic conditions like diabetes.

It’s a break-through in the world of healthcare delivery, and it’s protected by patents in over 33 countries, with more on the wa

The anoDyne microneedle puts medications into your body with a tiny needle that goes only as far as the gap between your skin layers. That’s really, really tiny. About 1 mm or .04 of an inch. No nerve endings live here, but there’s lots of fluid that circulating through your body. It’s this fluid that carries the insulin rapidly into your bloodstream, faster and better than any traditional needle can.


And, it doesn’t hurt. That right. It’s virtually painless!

To learn more or to stay informed please visit: http://anodyne.life/join




How does it work?

After your doctor prescribes it, you pick up a package of the anoDyne microneedle devices at the pharmacy, all pre-loaded for you (or your child), measured with your meds and ready to go. They’re disposable, and each one can be used only once. The tiny needle retracts after you’ve pushed it into your skin, and locks into place so it can’t be used again. By anybody.








Where do you use it?

Just about anywhere you have skin. You can use it on a diabetic child who, once they see it doesn’t hurt and takes seconds, will be happy to come to you for their anoDyne microneedle medicine. So easy to use, a senior can use it with comfort.

Did you know that fully 27 percent of people who rely on daily needles – children, seniors, and everyone in between - has a phobia about them? They cringe at the thought and this can affect their willingness to take their life-saving meds.

The anoDyne microneedle takes care of that. It’s wonderfully simple to use, and can be hidden in a pocket or purse because it’s so small. You’ll be able to use it sitting in class, and in one smooth move simply inject yourself by placing it against your thigh, for example, and depressing the tiny plunger. 

You will be able to use it at an office, discretely and quietly, under your desk. You can even use it during a meeting, and no-one will know! 

Then, you simply pop it in the wastebasket. No-one else can ever use it, so it’s safe for you, and safe for anybody who might accidentally pick it up after you’ve used it. 


So, why isn’t it on the market, you ask?

How can I get it?


We’re nearly there.

This is where you come in, and together, with your donation, we can bring this life-changing device to the world. Your contribution will help us reach our $100,000 goal so we can pay for clinical trials at Mount Sinai Services in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

If the clinical trials are successful, we will be one step closer to making the product available for everyone.


But we do need your help.


We’ve already done lots of trials (http://www.pkasofttouch.com/index) and have patents all over the world, with more to come. Patents are really important, because it means no-one else can copy the anoDyne microneedle secret technology.

Here are some of the perks we have to thank you for helping us bring this revolutionary device into the hands of people who need it:



Okay, so far it all sounds great, but who is behind it?

We want to assure you that we are not just some fly-by-night outfit with a great idea.  We’ve done our homework. We’ve been working on this device since 2005 – it’s already been through four generations of development. The final, perfected device is the one we’ll be testing. We’re headed by an engineer/entrepreneur (Dick Crawford) with a proven track record in designing manufacturing plants for pharmaceutical companies, and by a well-known doctor/scientist with a long list of accomplishments and inventions to his name.

That guy is Pankaj Modi. This world-renowned inventor, scientist and doctor (yes, he’s all three) created anoDyne microneedle after years of suffering through needles himself – he’s a Type 1 diabetic, diagnosed at 16.

When he got his own diagnosis of Type 1 diabetes, Dr. Modi promised himself that one day he would find another way, and in the process help other parents who have to give their child needles every day.


And that’s exactly what he did.


Dick and Dr. Modi – a fantastic partnership

As we’ve said, it didn’t happen overnight. In 2005, equipped with his first prototype, Dr. Modi searched for an entrepreneur to help him bring the device to market. He found that person in Dick Crawford, an engineer and owner of a design and construction company in Peterborough, Ontario that specialized in pharmaceutical manufacturing plants.

Modi liked the fact that Dick’s design for a new pharmaceutical plant, constructed to produce another of the doctor’s inventions – an insulin puffer – passed the uber-strict U.S. FDA regulations with flying colors.

So Modi and Dick met at an Ancaster, Ontario restaurant, and over dinner

Dr.Modi said, “I have a project for you and you can’t say no.”

“I knew he was a diabetic,” says Dick today. “And I knew he wanted to get this product on the market where it belongs – into the hands of parents of children with diabetes, into the hands of teenagers like JJ, and into the hands of caregivers of elderly diabetics.”

The two, with other partners in design and testing and patent preparation, have burned the midnight oil developing the anoDyne microneedle for over nine years.

Dick’s given over 80 presentations on the device in four countries – Canada, the U.S. the U.K. and Germany. He’s landed 31 patents, with more coming. Tons of testing has been done. http://www.pkasofttouch.com/index


Who Has Helped So Far

So while we worked away diligently to perfect the device, a combination of investors and government grants helped us to raise funds to bring us to where we are today. Our investors, many of them local to our home in Peterborough, Ontario, put money into the company because they believe in our vision.

And here’s that vision, in three parts:

  1. Design and develop a cost-effective, non-invasive medical device technology for the treatment of chronic diseases such as diabetes.
  2. Develop the product for entry into the worldwide insulin market based on PKA SoftTouch experience with insulin. (That’s now, and you get to be part of it) and
  3. Improve the quality of life and enhanced value for patients by painless injections of life saving drugs.

Diabetes affects over 380 million people worldwide and by 2035 that number will climb by 55 percent. International Diabetes Federation.


Please, take a moment now and think of someone in your life who is affected by a chronic disease like diabetes. Think about how the anoDyne microneedle could make their lives so much easier. Pick a donation level, get your reward, and smile, knowing that today you’ve done a very good thing.

We promise to keep you updated on our progress. These trials you are helping to fund will measure the effectiveness of the delivery of the meds, and the patient’s pain tolerance compared to a traditional syringe (which really, really hurts).

Help us make the anoDyne microneedle shine

Thank You.



T

story:
What is Smart Phone Records(SPR)?

SPR is the first App that allows you to distribute and sell your music straight 
from your smartphone without the use of a compact disk or a personal computer.

In a time where technology rules the world, smartphones help give us the ability to do things we only dreamed about doing not too long ago. Making music, for example, once consisted of renting studio time, and required funding for the project itself. But now, thanks to a major shift in technology, the possibilities are endless, and available right on your hand-held device. 

From production to mixing, sequencing to vocal compression, you name it-- there is most likely an app for it. As an independent artist, how do you get the music you've created from your Smart Phone or tablet to millions of listeners without relying on On-Line Distributors that we currently use to complete the process?

FEATURES:

Below is a list of features that will be available in the initial SPR App.  However, with your comments, suggestions and feedback we will continue to release updates and strive to make SmartPhoneRecords the new way to distribute music:

  • all genres (r&b, jazz, rap/hip-hop, instrumentals, dubstep, poetry, lectures, spoken word, freestyle, house, acoustic, alternative & much more)
  • free app (automatically exsposes you to millions of users)
  • create artist/group profile
  • include content/lyrics
  • album cover
  • release date and time
  • create barcode
  • set price for album or single
  • direct deposit to your bank account
  • no cd ripping
  • support and socialize with musicians from around the world
  • all digital studio quality sound on every recording
  • no mailing or shipping fee
  • release new music at anytime from anywhere
  • connect and sell music directly to your fans
  • load music straight to app from your smartphone
  • browse and preview artist 
  • "Facebook meets iTunes"

The traditional way of releasing music is rapidly evolving, widely due to the advancement in technology. Read on...

CONSIDER THIS:

On December 2, 2009 Jacob Ganz of NPR MUSIC.com writes "For the past 10
years, the record industry has struggled to control how we listen to music. But the shift from CD to MP3 is just the latest iteration in the evolution of formats. Think of how the move from the 78 to the vinyl record let people listen longer, and how the cassette tape made music portable. During the past decade, the MP3 file has yanked music free from physical formats entirely, and the number of ways fans can experience music has exploded."

"Technology has spoken; the people have spoken; there's kind of no putting the genie back in the bottle," says Justin Ouellette, creator of the music Web site Muxtape. December 2009

"CDs, and the stores that sold them, have all but been replaced by digital music that can be downloaded online, one track at a time." -Huffington Post Oct 2010

THE FUTURE IS NOW!

Look familiar?  If so, you're one of millions of music lovers who rely on such a device to broaden their music-listening experience while on-the-go.  But, if your car stereo (or home system) only has a cassette player and doesn't have modern facilities to play digital music (via USB Flash drive, MP3 CD, etc.), you may feel limited to the music you wish to listen to.  By using a cassette adapter you can interface devices such as an iPod, iPhone, MP3 player, as well as your  smartphone, at a fraction of what it would cost to invest in a high-tech stereo upgrade. Inexpensive car accessories, such as these, now make it possible to incorporate your digital music, while eliminating CD expenses and storage.   

smartphone $tats

Recent sales stats (global):

  • Statistical company IDC reports 153.9 million smartphones were sold worldwide in Q2 2012. Total 2011 sales were 491.4 million units.

  • Gartner estimates sales of smartphones in the same period at some 153.8 million. Estimated total sales across 2011 were 472 million or 31% of mobile communication device sales. This compares with figures for 2010 from the same company of 297 million smartphones or 19% of the 1.6 billion mobile phones sold that year. So year-on-year smartphone sales increased by 58%.

Recent sales stats (US and Canada):

  • Nielsen reports that 54.9% of US mobile phone owners have a smartphone as of Q2 2012.

  • comScore estimates that smartphone ownership in the US reached 110 million users by May 2012 (3-month average).

  • They also estimate average smartphone ownership in Canada reached 45.3% of mobile subscribers at the end of 2011 or just over 9 million smartphone users.

  • A Pew Internet Project survey from February 2012 found 46% of US adults owned a smartphone. The figure was 71% among 25-34 year-olds.

Recent sales stats (UK and mainland Europe):

  • IDC reports 27.4 million smartphones sold in Western Europe in Q2 2012. Samsung's share is 43.6%, followed by Apple at 19%.

  • A May 2012 YouGov survey found 47% of UK mobile phone users now have a smartphone. They expect that number to hit over 55% by the same time next year.

  • comScore estimates there were just over 28 million UK smartphone users by May 2012 (3-month average), a year-on-year increase of 38%.

  • The same company put combined smartphone ownership for France, Germany, Italy, Spain and the UK at 44% of mobile users as of December 2011 (104 million users).

Sales predictions:

  • The Financial Times cites a JPMorgan prediction that 657 million smartphones will leave stores in 2012.

  • IDC expects 2012 smartphone sales to reach 686 million, and predicts they will rise to 982 million in 2015.

  • IMS Research expects smartphones to reach 1 billion in annual sales in 2016 (half the mobile device market).

  • Morgan Stanley Research estimates sales of smartphones will exceed those of PCs in 2012.

WE NEED YOUR HELP! "TEAM WORK MAKES THE DREAM WORK"

The concept behind SmartPhone Records isn't focused around one artist, fad, or a genre but more about an idea. That idea is INDEPENDENCE. You now have the technology and the resources to expose your talent and present it the way its intended, without waiting for a record label to show the world you exist. 

We want to employ the best app developers to ensure SmartPhoneRecords is a user-friendly and professional platform, enabling every artist to be represented in their best light and to distrubute their music to the masses in a way like never before.  Fans are increasingly demanding a personal connection with their favorite artist and SPR will provide that connection. More importantly, SPR will be guided by you, the innovative artist, without the interference of large corporations. To accomplish this goal we have enlisted the help of The Konrad Group, based out of New York City:

The Konrad Group is a leader in cutting edge mobile, web, and social application development. As an integrated team of specialists, they provide strategy, architecture, design, and development for some of the greatest brands and agencies out there.  With additional offices located in, Toronto and Chicago, they have a strong presence in the largest cities across North America. http://www.konradgroup.com/

OUR GOAL OF 50K WILL HELP DEVELOP THE SPR APP. THIS PROJECT WILL TAKE APPROXIMATELY 8 WEEKS FOR COMPLETION IN WHICH WE WILL PROVIDE WEEKLY UPDATES ON OUR PROGRESS VIA OUR WEBSITE. EVERY CONTRIBUTION COUNTS; "PENNIES MAKE DOLLARS." OUR GOAL WILL ALLOW US TO MAKE THE SmartPhoneRecords App AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC BY EARLY JAN 2013.

Unable to contribute? You can still help!

  • Spread the word by mouth, email, text messaging, as well as the many social media outlets available on the internet, including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and Instagram

     

  • And that’s all there is to it

"Be the change you want to see in the world." 
-Ghandi

"CDs, and the stores that sold them, have all but been replaced by digital music that can be downloaded online, one track at a time." -Huffington Post Oct 2010

THE FUTURE IS NOW!
Look familiar?  If so, you're one of millions of music lovers who rely on such a device to broaden their music-listening experience while on-the-go.  But, if your car stereo (or home system) only has a cassette player and doesn't have modern facilities to play digital music (via USB Flash drive, MP3 CD, etc.), you may feel limited to the music you wish to listen to.  By using a cassette adapter you can interface devices such as an iPod, iPhone, MP3 player, as well as your  smartphone, at a fraction of what it would cost to invest in a high-tech stereo upgrade. Inexpensive car accessories, such as these, now make it possible to incorporate your digital music, while eliminating CD expenses and storage.   

smartphone $tats
Recent sales stats (global):


Statistical company IDC reports 153.9 million smartphones were sold worldwide in Q2 2012. Total 2011 sales were 491.4 million units.


Gartner estimates sales of smartphones in the same period at some 153.8 million. Estimated total sales across 2011 were 472 million or 31% of mobile communication device sales. This compares with figures for 2010 from the same company of 297 million smartphones or 19% of the 1.6 billion mobile phones sold that year. So year-on-year smartphone sales increased by 58%.

Recent sales stats (US and Canada):


Nielsen reports that 54.9% of US mobile phone owners have a smartphone as of Q2 2012.


comScore estimates that smartphone ownership in the US reached 110 million users by May 2012 (3-month average).


They also estimate average smartphone ownership in Canada reached 45.3% of mobile subscribers at the end of 2011 or just over 9 million smartphone users.


A Pew Internet Project survey from February 2012 found 46% of US adults owned a smartphone. The figure was 71% among 25-34 year-olds.

Recent sales stats (UK and mainland Europe):


IDC reports 27.4 million smartphones sold in Western Europe in Q2 2012. Samsung's share is 43.6%, followed by Apple at 19%.


A May 2012 YouGov survey found 47% of UK mobile phone users now have a smartphone. They expect that number to hit over 55% by the same time next year.


comScore estimates there were just over 28 million UK smartphone users by May 2012 (3-month average), a year-on-year increase of 38%.


The same company put combined smartphone ownership for France, Germany, Italy, Spain and the UK at 44% of mobile users as of December 2011 (104 million users).

Sales predictions:


The Financial Times cites a JPMorgan prediction that 657 million smartphones will leave stores in 2012.


IDC expects 2012 smartphone sales to reach 686 million, and predicts they will rise to 982 million in 2015.


IMS Research expects smartphones to reach 1 billion in annual sales in 2016 (half the mobile device market).


Morgan Stanley Research estimates sales of smartphones will exceed those of PCs in 2012.



WE NEED YOUR HELP! "TEAM WORK MAKES THE DREAM WORK"


The concept behind SmartPhone Records isn't focused around one artist, fad, or a genre but more about an idea. That idea is INDEPENDENCE. You now have the technology and the resources to expose your talent and present it the way its intended, without waiting for a record label to show the world you exist. 
We want to employ the best app developers to ensure SmartPhoneRecords is a user-friendly and professional platform, enabling every artist to be represented in their best light and to distrubute their music to the masses in a way like never before.  Fans are increasingly demanding a personal connection with their favorite artist and SPR will provide that connection. More importantly, SPR will be guided by you, the innovative artist, without the interference of large corporations. To accomplish this goal we have enlisted the help of The Konrad Group, based out of New York City:


The Konrad Group is a leader in cutting edge mobile, web, and social application development. As an integrated team of specialists, they provide strategy, architecture, design, and development for some of the greatest brands and agencies out there.  With additional offices located in, Toronto and Chicago, they have a strong presence in the largest cities across North America. http://www.konradgroup.com/

OUR GOAL OF 50K WILL HELP DEVELOP THE SPR APP. THIS PROJECT WILL TAKE APPROXIMATELY 8 WEEKS FOR COMPLETION IN WHICH WE WILL PROVIDE WEEKLY UPDATES ON OUR PROGRESS VIA OUR WEBSITE. EVERY CONTRIBUTION COUNTS; "PENNIES MAKE DOLLARS." OUR GOAL WILL ALLOW US TO MAKE THE SmartPhoneRecords App AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC BY EARLY JAN 2013.
Unable to contribute? You can still help!


Spread the word by mouth, email, text messaging, as well as the many social media outlets available on the internet, including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and Instagram


     


And that’s all there is to it







"Be the change you want to see in the world." -Ghandi

story:
SKIIOT  revolutionizes cross-country skiing


SKIIOT powered by Coach4Pro

SKIIOT  powered by Coach4Pro is designed to meet the requirements of top skiing athletes - to be the ultimate tool for world class skiing.  It's the only system which captures and combines crucial elements of cross-country skiing; technique, physics, track condition, weather information and terrain profile of the track. Exercises are summarized and graphically illustrated for easy understanding. 

SKIIOT has been designed with world's top cross-country skiers and skiing professionals. It's everything the cross-country skiing community has dared to dream of.

Whether you're a full-on professional, a competitive skier or just eager and enthusiastic about skiing - with SKIIOT, you can analyse & challenge everything - and win!

Pic. SKIIOT is a device that connects to the heel of any skiing boot.


Benefits


Usage - Mobile Application

      

You can freely select parameters of your interest from the comprehensive list (Air Pressure, Altitude, Humidity, Snow Temperature, Air Temperature, Current Heart Rate, Max Heart Rate, Duration, Current Velocity, Max Velocity, Distance, SKIIOT Battery) to be displayed either in numerical manner, or alternatively in graphical manner - you choose. At any point you can also switch to map view.

Usage - Analyzer

User can choose number of parameters from the list (snow temperature, air temperature, relative altitude/terrain profile, air humidity, kicking frequency, kick angle, number of kicks, heart rate, velocity) which will be displayed on the screen. Chosen parameters are amazingly timely synchronized with the map. Analysis can be done either in realtime or offline mode.
User can select any segment of your own choice from the track for detailed analysis.


Below is an example video of a realtime analysis.


Features

Features in the sales package:


Technical details of SKIIOT


Feedback from the field

SKIIOT Powered by Coach4Pro service has been tested by three large Finnish ski clubs (Oulu, Ounasvaara and Espoo) and well known athletes in several different races, including Finnish Cups and World Cups. Service staff and equipment maintenance personnel and equipment manufacturers have played a significant role in our R&D.

Jussi Kärkkäinen - 30 years of ski service

"I have used SKIIOT  already since autumn 2015 and its accurate measurement of weather and track conditions helps me to choose the right waxes and real time analysis does accelerate the whole waxing process significantly.  It's amazing what new IoT technology can bring to cross-country skiing. SKIIOT  has already revolutionized my work".

Joonas Sarkkinen - One of the most promising Finnish young skiers

"SKIIOT powered by Coach4Pro is the only system which captures and combines crucial elements of cross-country skiing; technique, physics, track conditions, weather information and terrain profile of the track. Exercises are summarized and graphically illustrated for easy understanding. Finally, I can comprehensively, systematically and easily analyze my skiing".

Company Executives

Marko Höynälä CEO of SKIIOT/Exiops 

I've worked 20+ years in telecommunication industry in various management positions and demonstrated on continuous basis abilities to deliver and work effectively within large, complex and diverse multisite organizations. I'm known as as a manager who drives initiatives and projects always into a completion - always. Below my last 2 positions:

  • Director of Operations, Nov 2013 - Feb 2015 (Broadcom Communications, Oulu Finland)
  • Director of Operations, Dec 2010 - Oct 2013 (Renesas Mobile Europe, Oulu Finland)

Mikko Koskela CEO of Coach4Pro

I've over 20+ years experience in telecommunication industry leadership and management experience across Europe, Asia and Americas regions,

Below my last 2 positions:

  • Global Care Service Management Team, Aug 2008 - Jun 2010 (Nokia Siemens Network)
  • Head of Care Services LAT Mar 2006 - Jul 2008 (Nokia Siemens Network)

Timeline 



Why we need you ?

SKIIOT powered by Coach4Pro is a product and associated service that will forever change the way we ski - but not without YOU backing us on IndieGoGo.

Right now, SKIIOT is fully functional and it has been tested widely by professional skiers, coaches and service staff. It’s endured the 50 km king race of Norway’s Holmenkollen and sprinted with the best at FIS World Cup venues.

The endless hours of R&D and prototype testing are now over and we’re very clear on production technology needed to bring our sportstech to market.

Nevertheless, we are not a big company and therefore we rely on you to back us up  and to help us financially to complete remaining steps towards mass production of SKIIOT– and to be the first to receive the product straight out of production!

Possible Risks & Challenges

The product's functional performance has already been widely tested by professional skiers, service staff and coaches. Through countless rounds of testing iterations, we, with our distinguished R&D partners, have eliminated every variable that would have interfered with the production of the ultimate skiing tool. It works everywhere, even in seemingly impossible arctic conditions and circumstances. 

Our partner Coach4Pro has done years of research and development in professional sports performance analytics software, together we, SKIIOT and Coach4Pro, have made sure that the analytics software is free of bugs and it functions like clockwork with SKIIOT. Wonderful user experience feedback, great survey results, investors' belief, interest of stakeholders and already received public and private funding all add to our strong belief that SKIIOT production will continue to progress according to plan.

We consider the component sourcing to be the only predominant risk. We’ve benchmarked a wide range of sensors and carefully selected only the ones that can deliver A) very tight accuracy and B) robust functioning in arctic circumstances. Therefore it is a moderately relevant risk that the suppliers run out of stock of these high accuracy components. However, as a mitigation plan, we’ve started the search and negotiations for alternate suppliers and, for SKIIOT’s most critical component, we are even going to establish a stock of our own. 

If a SW issue should arise, we already have implemented and tested an updating mechanism that will ensure quick and fully automatic updating mechanism of both mobile application and SKIIOT software.

 

Other partners

  

FAQ

Q: Do I need Coach4Pro service in order to use SKIIOT ? Where to find more information about Coach4Pro service ? 

A: Yes you need. Coach4Pro service for 1 year is included in the campaign price.  More information about Coach4Pro is available on www.coach4pro.com

Q: If I buy SKIIOT powered by Coach4Pro now and you release new features/functionalities later this year, do I need to buy them separately ?

A: No. If you have a valid service contract in place, then you will get all new software features/functionalities free of charge.

Q: What do I need to do in order to get those new software features ?

A: Mobile application gets automatically updated if there is a new feature/functionality  available. In case there is a new SKIIOT software available, then application will request you to turn on the SKIIOT device and you just press 'start' button to get it updated. 

Q: How many hours of skiing I can do with fully charged battery ?

A: You can go upto 35 hours with one charge. 

Q: How big is the SKIIOT's internal memory ? How much skiing data in can hold ?

A: SKIIOT has 256MB of memory which can store about 8 hours of skiing data.

Q: In case I'm in the competition and do not want to carry a mobile phone with me, how to operate  SKIIOT in that case ?  

A:  Conduct following steps:

  1. Turn on the SKIIOT device -> Skiing data will be stored in the internal memory of SKIIOT device.
  2. Perform the competition.
  3. Turn off the SKIIOT device.
  4. Next time when you open your Coach4Pro application on the mobile and power-up SKIIOT you will get a notification "There is unsynchronized data in the SKIIOT's memory, would you like to synchronize it now" ? You can synchronize it or postpone to next time.
Q: Which mobile models are compliant with Coach4Pro mobile application ?
A: You will need to have either:
- Android based mobile, version number 4.3 and up (does require BLE support)
- iPhone 4s and up
Q: Can my coach/training mates/service staff monitor and analyze my performance while I'm skiing ?
A: Yes. If you have a mobile with you and Coach4Pro application is running, then data can be streamed from your personal cloud service with a latency typically less than 30 seconds, depending on network conditions.

Q: Who sees my personal performance data?
A: In  your personal privacy settings you can define who you want to share your information with. If you have granted access e.g. to your coach, then yes he/she can monitor and analyze your performance.

Q: Can SKIIOT be used in other sports, other than cross-country skiing?

A: With the feature set in the sales package (please see the chart above) you get similar benefits for biathlon, nordic combined, speed skating, roller skiing and inline skating. Feel free to suggest what modifications are needed to satisfy your needs in your desired winter sport. Send your suggestion to info@exiops.com.

Q: Am I able to use SKIIOT and its accurate measurements capabilities also for other purpose than sports e.g. on my vacation to monitor weather conditions, water temperature etc

A: Yes of course :-) Check the picture below  https://www.facebook.com/SKIIOT/photos/a.828864...
