story:
OUR CAMPAIGN IS FINISHED - CLICK HERE TO ORDER FUZE

Fuze is an innovative case for the iPhone 7 and 7 Plus that restores the phone’s 3.5mm audio jack. It delivers a doubled battery life as well as scratch and shock protection, all while maintaining the iPhone’s compact profile. No dongles, no adapters, no problem. 

Buy a Fuze case for your iPhone 7 or 7 Plus and bring back the jack. Don’t get tangled up in a mess of adapters. You should be able to listen to music with your favorite headphones whenever you want. When you purchase Fuze, you’re purchasing the freedom of choice -- something that itself should be free.

 

Fuze’s differentiating factor is an industry standard 3.5mm audio out jack, just like the one every previous iPhone included. You bring your favorite earbuds, and you’re ready to rock.

Our smartphones are important parts of our work and personal lives. We all know the anxiety that goes along with a battery that’s dangerously low. Don't get stuck in a situation where you can't send that business email, or you miss an important call from a family member. Fuze offers a built-in battery that can double your iPhone 7’s daily lifespan, making those anxiety-inducing moments disappear. 

Fuze uses advanced Sync-Through technology that allows you to sync or charge your iPhone 7 or 7 Plus without removing the battery case. That means you can charge both your iPhone and battery case at the same time, all while listening to music.

No additional micro-USB cables or adapters like other cases force you to use. Fuze uses the Lightning cable that comes with your iPhone.

The battery size for Fuze is rated at 2,400 mAh (iPhone 7), or 3,600 mAh (iPhone 7 Plus).

The Fuze case is made of durable TPU and ABS plastics, the same plastics used in Apple’s own battery cases. Fuze not only allows you to use your headphones again, but also protects your phone from drops and scratches -- something Tim Cook, Apple’s CEO, said was very important when buying a new iPhone 7.

While most cases extend your phone on the bottom with a “chin” -- sometimes up to 15mm (.6 inches) -- Fuze keeps the slim design the iPhone is known for. Our case only adds volume where it’s necessary. Fuze has an incredibly thin profile, adding only 5mm (.2 inches) to the overall thickness of the phone. Additional weight isn’t much of an issue either as Fuze weighs only 70 grams (2.5 ounces) -- less than a deck of playing cards.

 

 

The iPhone 7 and 7 Plus are right around the corner. And while we’re as excited as everyone else for the glossy surface, brighter screen, and the amazing cameras, we were also saddened to hear that Apple has decided to kill the standard 3.5mm headphone jack.

This isn’t just about headphones: Most of us use audio devices besides earbuds -- in our homes, work, and on the go.  

Many tech-experts recommend using a case with the iPhone 7, so why not one that restores the one thing most people think the iPhone 7 is missing?

Apple wants you to buy their new AirPod wireless earbuds. Remember how bad it was a few years back when we were first trying Bluetooth earpieces? This is twice as bad. Plus, they’re expensive, and you know that you’ll end up losing one. On top of that, you need to recharge them after just five hours of use -- curfews are not good for anyone. Regular earbuds don’t have curfews. Regular earbuds are ready to party as long as you are.  

And sure, Apple is packaging the iPhone 7 with a 3.5mm to lightning adapter, but what if you want to charge your phone and listen to music at the same time? If you want to -- and most people do -- then it looks like this:

Ridiculous, right? That’s why you want a Fuze case. You want your standard audio jack, and we’re here to give it to you.

 

 

 

 

Diego Prince

Entrepreneur and hardware developer with a high level of expertise in material sciences. Prince has knowledge in practical design and efficient manufacturing. He focuses on designing sleek products that are functional, and last for a long time. He has assisted in the production of several hardware projects ranging from bathroom accessories to smart storage containers. His passion is to make awesome products.

Contact Diego:

Email

 

Troy Osinoff 

Serial entrepreneur who has been featured on CNN, Dr. Phil, Forbes, and other media outlets. Osinoff attended Ithaca College before diving head first into the world of entrepreneurship. To date, Osinoff's large network of entertainment websites and social channels reach millions of users every month. 

Contact Troy:

Twitter

Email

The final design of Fuze didn’t come easy -- we went through and rejected many revisions of our design until we got something that we’re proud to offer here. We used lean hardware development that kept the costs down in both the prototyping phase as well as production. We used the latest rapid prototyping techniques in order to hit the market as close to the iPhone 7 launch as possible -- and to make sure it’s available to be delivered by the holidays. 

The unit you see in the video -- and in some of the other pictures -- is a design prototype that was used to display Fuze's functions. Our original case was designed to have an extended base where the 3.5mm audio jack would be stored. After prototyping and testing, we came to the conclusion that the extended base is too bulky and unattractive. So, our video displays one case and our pictures display another. The case that our backers will be receiving is the case displayed here on this page. 

Fuze is built on an existing case design that has been revered for its positive attributes. We chose the case design due to it's slimness, durability, and great looks. In doing this, we are able to have a beautiful design that compliments the iPhone 7's gorgeous silhouette, advanced technology that you can trust, and a great manufacturer with experience in Apple MFi (Made For iPhone) products. We also have greatly sped up the process for manufacturing, and ultimately delivery. Three months is a very short time but we feel we will be able to deliver your Fuze case in that time.

Initial Design Sketches

The Messy Workstation

Testing Female Audio Jacks

Getting measurements for the case from 3d files

 

Sample Unit

 

Developing phone hardware is a lot like developing software: You plan, you experiment, you build, and you ship it. Unlike software, though, hardware needs to be physically built, which is something of a large obstacle.   

To do this, a product requires hardware designers, engineers, and a team with thorough knowledge of product manufacturing standards and practices. Thankfully, Fuze has all of this and more behind it. The downside is that even with our experience and knowledge there are still minimum orders for production runs due to tooling, logistics, and other hurdles that must be overcome before a product can be brought to market.  

We can address many of these in the pre-order stage, and that’s where you come in. We’ve made our goal as low as possible to cover these costs to make sure Fuze is available in a timely fashion. But’s it’s not just about being quick -- our manufacturing partner is MFi certified, something Apple asks of all of its hardware partners. That means the Fuze will be of the same quality as it would be had Apple made it itself.

Our Planned Schedule:

September 12 - 25: Prototype and Early Testing Stage

September 28 - October 28: Crowdfunding Campaign 

October 5 - October 25: Product Development (Tooling and Final Unit)

October 15 - October 31: Final Testing

November 1 - December 25: Production 

December 29: Fulfillment (Units should arrive before January 15)

Don't get stuck in a situation where you can't send that business email, or you miss an important call from a family member. Fuze offers a built-in battery that can double your iPhone 7’s daily lifespan, making those anxiety-inducing moments disappear. Fuze uses advanced Sync-Through technology that allows you to sync or charge your iPhone 7 or 7 Plus without removing the battery case. That means you can charge both your iPhone and battery case at the same time, all while listening to music.No additional micro-USB cables or adapters like other cases force you to use. Fuze uses the Lightning cable that comes with your iPhone.The battery size for Fuze is rated at 2,400 mAh (iPhone 7), or 3,600 mAh (iPhone 7 Plus).The Fuze case is made of durable TPU and ABS plastics, the same plastics used in Apple’s own battery cases. Fuze not only allows you to use your headphones again, but also protects your phone from drops and scratches -- something Tim Cook, Apple’s CEO, said was very important when buying a new iPhone 7.While most cases extend your phone on the bottom with a “chin” -- sometimes up to 15mm (.6 inches) -- Fuze keeps the slim design the iPhone is known for. Our case only adds volume where it’s necessary. Fuze has an incredibly thin profile, adding only 5mm (.2 inches) to the overall thickness of the phone. Additional weight isn’t much of an issue either as Fuze weighs only 70 grams (2.5 ounces) -- less than a deck of playing cards.  The iPhone 7 and 7 Plus are right around the corner. And while we’re as excited as everyone else for the glossy surface, brighter screen, and the amazing cameras, we were also saddened to hear that Apple has decided to kill the standard 3.5mm headphone jack.This isn’t just about headphones: Most of us use audio devices besides earbuds -- in our homes, work, and on the go.  Many tech-experts recommend using a case with the iPhone 7, so why not one that restores the one thing most people think the iPhone 7 is missing?Apple wants you to buy their new AirPod wireless earbuds. Remember how bad it was a few years back when we were first trying Bluetooth earpieces? This is twice as bad. Plus, they’re expensive, and you know that you’ll end up losing one. On top of that, you need to recharge them after just five hours of use -- curfews are not good for anyone. Regular earbuds don’t have curfews. Regular earbuds are ready to party as long as you are.  And sure, Apple is packaging the iPhone 7 with a 3.5mm to lightning adapter, but what if you want to charge your phone and listen to music at the same time? If you want to -- and most people do -- then it looks like this:Ridiculous, right? That’s why you want a Fuze case. You want your standard audio jack, and we’re here to give it to you.    Diego PrinceEntrepreneur and hardware developer with a high level of expertise in material sciences. Prince has knowledge in practical design and efficient manufacturing. He focuses on designing sleek products that are functional, and last for a long time. He has assisted in the production of several hardware projects ranging from bathroom accessories to smart storage containers. His passion is to make awesome products.Contact Diego:Email 
Troy Osinoff Serial entrepreneur who has been featured on CNN, Dr. Phil, Forbes, and other media outlets. Osinoff attended Ithaca College before diving head first into the world of entrepreneurship. To date, Osinoff's large network of entertainment websites and social channels reach millions of users every month. Contact Troy:TwitterEmailThe final design of Fuze didn’t come easy -- we went through and rejected many revisions of our design until we got something that we’re proud to offer here. We used lean hardware development that kept the costs down in both the prototyping phase as well as production. We used the latest rapid prototyping techniques in order to hit the market as close to the iPhone 7 launch as possible -- and to make sure it’s available to be delivered by the holidays. The unit you see in the video -- and in some of the other pictures -- is a design prototype that was used to display Fuze's functions. Our original case was designed to have an extended base where the 3.5mm audio jack would be stored. After prototyping and testing, we came to the conclusion that the extended base is too bulky and unattractive. So, our video displays one case and our pictures display another. The case that our backers will be receiving is the case displayed here on this page. Fuze is built on an existing case design that has been revered for its positive attributes. We chose the case design due to it's slimness, durability, and great looks. In doing this, we are able to have a beautiful design that compliments the iPhone 7's gorgeous silhouette, advanced technology that you can trust, and a great manufacturer with experience in Apple MFi (Made For iPhone) products. We also have greatly sped up the process for manufacturing, and ultimately delivery. Three months is a very short time but we feel we will be able to deliver your Fuze case in that time.Initial Design SketchesThe Messy WorkstationTesting Female Audio JacksGetting measurements for the case from 3d files Sample Unit Developing phone hardware is a lot like developing software: You plan, you experiment, you build, and you ship it. Unlike software, though, hardware needs to be physically built, which is something of a large obstacle.   To do this, a product requires hardware designers, engineers, and a team with thorough knowledge of product manufacturing standards and practices. Thankfully, Fuze has all of this and more behind it. The downside is that even with our experience and knowledge there are still minimum orders for production runs due to tooling, logistics, and other hurdles that must be overcome before a product can be brought to market.  We can address many of these in the pre-order stage, and that’s where you come in. We’ve made our goal as low as possible to cover these costs to make sure Fuze is available in a timely fashion. But’s it’s not just about being quick -- our manufacturing partner is MFi certified, something Apple asks of all of its hardware partners. That means the Fuze will be of the same quality as it would be had Apple made it itself.Our Planned Schedule:September 12 - 25: Prototype and Early Testing StageSeptember 28 - October 28: Crowdfunding Campaign October 5 - October 25: Product Development (Tooling and Final Unit)October 15 - October 31: Final TestingNovember 1 - December 25: Production December 29: Fulfillment (Units should arrive before January 15)

story:
FIRST, WE LEVEL THE PLAYING FIELD 

My name is Jason Guille and I'm a social entrepreneur and community organizer in Victoria, BC. This campaign will finally bring to life a project that I have been envisioning for quite a long time, that is now manifesting through an inspiring collaborative effort. 

Over the years I've worked with hundreds of organizations to create events & community spaces. I have collaborated with exceptional groups committed to making the world a better place: Living the New Economy, the Victoria Public Market, Earthdance Festival and OUR Ecovillage, among so many visionary projects in this region. And they all share two common obstacles: their ideas only reach a handful of people at a time, and very little of their important work is archived.

Those currently having the greatest impact on the world, especially the media world, are those with virtually limitless resources. We are here to level the playing field and change the game by putting the best-quality, leading-edge engagement and media tools in the hands of the many leading thought leaders right here in our community. Stream Of Consciousness is about giving a big voice to people and organizations with big vision - a voice that can be heard above the din. 

With your help, we can do this. We can create a broadcasting and media gathering platform to amplify the impact of inspiring and paradigm shifting ideas. Please look over the perk packages we've created - we’ve priced them to be huge value for your contribution, and then I invite youto please support this campaign in every way you can. Thank you!

My best wishes

Jason


 

Great ideas deserve a platform to reach the world.

But chances are you, or the creator you want to hear from...
won’t be speaking at TED this year.

We know that earth-shattering moments happen everywhere, all the time.  And we’re bummed that we don’t get to experience it, Aren't you?

While live talks and speakers are fantastic, we’re missing out if we can’t get there in person. It’s the future. We don’t NEED to be there in person, and often, we just can’t. So let’s take the next step in the evolution of idea sharing together.  

The Stream of Consciousness Project

A video broadcasting platform that will allow authors, speakers, facilitators, coaches, inspiring thinkers and/or the people that host them to collaborate with local AND global audiences in real-time.

We're community organizers in Victoria, British Columbia who create events and spaces that connect people to their communities. We want to expand these connections through 'streaming', which is broadcasting live to the internet.

What we’ve done so far

Bare Bones and still Awesome

In order to determine interest and test our approach, over recent weeks we have scrounged together some equipment and partnered up to deliver basic streams of an array of amazing events:

  • RE-BECOMING VILLAGERS: A Day with Mark Lakeman
  • SOCIAL ENTERPRISE CATALYST: featuring speaker Joel Solomon
  • MARKETING FOR HIPPIES: Green Your Business with Tad Hargrave
  • NETSQUARED VICTORIA: Crowdfunding For Causes 
  • IAN MACKENZIE: The Art of Crowdfunding
  • NETSQUARED VICTORIA: Technology Upgrade 101
  • STARHAWK: Creating Collaboration in Groups

And next up on our calendar:

  • LNE EDUCATION IN ACTION: Indigenomics
  • RANDY JONES: A Wildish Evening of Storytelling & Healing
  • PERMANOMICS: Practical Steps for a Kick-ass Life That Pays

And guess what?  These events have shown us that people are hungry to engage with great ideas and speakers.  Who can blame them?  Look at that lineup of fantastic content. Many of these speakers are out to change the world - and Stream of Consciousness will be a serious amplifier. 

Want to present?  What to participate?  Want to just help? 
Great! We need your help, that’s why we're here.

How can I help?

Jump in the stream, in the way that suits you best. 


We realize that everyone will look at this project through different lenses, so we’re made it a bit easier to see how you can help (and of course, how we thank you). Take a look and see if you fall into one of these 3 realms:


1) You're Passionate About Big Ideas

You're someone who believes that knowledge is power. Your social media feeds are full of inspiring teachers whose ideas you love to share with your friends. You believe that your life is an opportunity to learn more about yourself and others, and that Big Ideas have the power to change the world.

Three Ways We Invite You To Participate:

1. Digitally Curious ($50)

  • ALL the perks from the 'Making Waves' contribution level
  • a VIP invitation to the Stream of Consciousness debut launch event
  • discounted stream time for the workshop from the teacher of your choice. 

2. Preferred Student ($100) 

  • ALL the perks from the previous contribution level
  • a VIP invitation to the 2014 Stream of Consciousness event of your choice; during which we will recognize your contribution! 
  • discounted stream time for the workshop from the teacher of your choice. 

3. Digital VIP($250)  

  • ALL the perks from the previous contribution level
  • 3 live audience or VIP live livestream tickets to the 2014 Stream of Consciousness events of your choosing - during which we will recognize your contribution!
  • exclusive additional content from the workshop facilitator


2) You're A Creative Thought Leader Telling Important Stories 

You're someone who has seen the light and are passionate about leading others to where you've been.   You're dreaming about your first keynote speech -- or your five hundredth. You've been cultivating a social media following that is building rapidly, and you're excited about bringing your ideas to scale. You're ready to take your real-life workshops online, to explore how live-streaming can be an important influence and economic driver that supports your mission.

Three Ways We Invite You To Participate

1. Creatives: Basic Production ($500)

  • hosting and production assistance for a 3 hour broadcast event at the Sunset Room in Victoria
  • Production includes: venue, broadcast production staff, and a video archive of your event.

2. Creatives: Scale Your Message Quickly ($2500)

  • hosting and production assistance for ONE full day or TWO half-day broadcast events at the Sunset Room in Victoria
  • Production includes: venue, broadcast production staff, and an audio and video archive of your event.
  • Strategic consulting includes: Interactive Design best practices, one hour digital speaker coaching

3. Creatives: Content Leaders ($5000)

  • hosting and production assistance for a TWO day multi-camera broadcast events at the Sunset Room in Victoria
  • Production includes: venue, broadcast production staff, social media staff, and an audio and video archive of your event.
  • Strategic consulting includes: Interactive Design best practices, two hours digital speaker coaching


3) You're a Supporter of Big Ideas & Social Change

You're dedicated to seeding community growth through the contribution of your time and capital.  Your involvement in business, non-profits, and community organizations has convinced you that linking together technology and social change mavens can have a transformational impact on the direction of the future.  You've always got your ear to the ground for important, innovative ideas emerging from unlikely sources.  And you believe the most effective way to spend your time is by encouraging, supporting, and promoting others. 

Stream it Forward!
There have been a number of community elders and philanthropists that have approached us to find the fit for their contribution. For you we have created the 'Stream it Forward' option, where you can purchase any producer package in the perks list - and let us know the kind of content you would like to see happen. We will ensure that some up & coming creator, who wouldn't otherwise get the opportunity, gets a serious lift through your contribution. Think of it as a sponsorship for some amazing future content creator. 

Why this is an Indiegogo Campaign

We’re a community, and we want you involved.

Sure, we’ve gone the bare bones route - and it works.  We’ve had a bunch of success and a unanimously great response. But in order to take our project to the next level, we are asking you to contribute towards our “all or nothing” goal of $50,000.

And, we’re happy to say thank you by including you.
Seriously, look at those perks - we want you INvolved.

Where does it all go?

To help us drop the slapstick equipment, of course.  We'll use that money to do some serious upgrades to our existing equipment and infrastructure.  And at a stretch, we’re looking at putting all of it online for you to discover everything your community has to offer - whenever you want.

We’re talking HD streaming, multiple cameras, all coming together to make your ideas, or the person presenting ideas you want to learn about really matter. This gear will be installed at the Sunset Room,an event venue located on the Inner Harbour in downtown Victoria.


Why we’re doing this

The benefits of Livestreaming

  • deeper collaboration between audience and presenters
  • immediate access to an immense store of global knowledge and teachers
  • more intimate connection than can be offered with existing social media
  • an insider perspective at cutting edge conferences and meetings

Using the Stream of Consciousness platform, anyone in our community will be able to share their content with the world in real-time.

Why Does This Matter?



We believe that empowering collaboration at all levels can change the world.

and finally... 


Thank you for your support!

story:
Becuzz is not just a free app, it's an enterprise level, cloud-based social sharing and financial transaction management system.  Fund from $10-$599 - fast! The app is just the front-end! 

HELP BEAR!

(PLEASE WATCH OUR VIDEOS IN HD - FULL SCREEN)

Mobile Social-Giving Network Explainer:  Explains how to use it once it's built!

Campaign Explainer: Short video overview with timeline.  Check it out in HD.
Perks Explainer Video: Check out followers-for-funding in HD.

For perks, we thought outside of the box.  Yeah we looked at Becuzz coffee mugs and tee-shirts, but what really has the most value for our early adopters... is followers.  So, we have chosen New Followers as Perks, becuzz when this takes off...you'll be glad you jumped in now! 



  1. Becuzz is a mobile, social-community for photo & video sharing much like Instagram or Vine, except for one big difference; when people click the heart-icon on a post, they are actually gifting a micro (financial) transaction. These transactions happen between one member's virtual wallet to another.  Each "like" is a micro-transaction that the sender chooses to gift from 1 penny to 5 dollars. That amount is then applied to your Becuzz quick-fund campaigns. Fund from $10-$599 - fast!
  2. Don't want to setup a CAM-PAIN? Then simply build your profile, leave your wallet OPEN and post your best shots.  You can even post your photos and videos to a private group.  Setup a private group of friends and share photos 'n vids that you only want them to see.  Ya never know what you could get!
  3. Becuzz comes with a FREE, pre-paid Visa Card (available regardless of your credit history).  NO INTEREST CHARGES!  Your card  auto-links to your Becuzz account for instant access to funds and can be used where ever Visa is accepted. Imagine a credit card where MONEY GOES IN - NOT JUST OUT!
The app gets you financial gifts and the credit card lets you spend them, instantly!

    Innovation at it's best. The idea of an instant micro-crowdfunding mobile application is cool enough, but to link it directly to a credit card is genius.   You could potentially raise money and spend it within just a few minutes!

A NEW FINANCIAL PRODUCT.  A pre-paid Becuzz Visa Card with no interest, no "negative" balance and it's yours regardless of your credit history ABSOLUTELY FREE?  BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE!  You can actually TRANSFER money TO THE CARD (instantly) from the app!  After it clears, use your card where ever Visa is accepted.  Wow, a credit card linked to a quick-fund raising app, now that's cool! 

But wait, there's more, more...Tired of Brad's Gangsta Selfies or Shots of Keisha's new Jimmy Choos shoes?  Don't shoot the boot here... those pics will actually hurt your funding at Becuzz. This social network, has a positive "giving" message, so dust off your best shots, share your life and see what you get. Think about how much better EVERYONE'S posts will be when there is a possibility to get some coin! 


And the last, more... with Becuzz, you can create as many campaigns as you like.  Set quick-funding goals from $10 up to $599. Publish your campaigns in Pink or Blue.  Give your campaigns catchy titles and then share your life!  Campain "over-funding" goes into your Main Wallet and we suggest using over-funding to give back to your followers. It will only encourage them to continue to give back to YOU. The more you give, the more you'll receive.


WE NEED TO FUND THE APP (front-end)!  Think of Becuzz as the "Twitter" of crowdfunding - for mobile only.  We fund tiny amounts for the people (and groups), not businesses. The Becuzz platform has a positive message and is cool, but its' gonna take a bazillion dollars to play with the big guys.  The good news is we've already done a lot of the back-end work!  If this campaign gets traction and we fund our STRETCH GOALS... then we'll spend a huge chunk on marketing to get more followers for YOU. 


  1. Receive as many followers as your chosen Perk allows (followers are key to success).  Adopt early, grow with us and become a global influencer.
  2. A FREE Becuzz pre-paid credit card in your name regardless of your credit history.  No bank account needed. Parents must authorize ages 13-17. 
  3. Full Version of the Becuzz Social Sharing App (Android or iOS) that links to your Card - FREE.
  4. Your name will be listed in the Becuzz Digital Hall of Fame for all to see.
  5. 25 Top Spots LOCKED IN for Visionary Partners.

IMPORTANT QUESTION!! HOW DO I RECEIVE FOLLOWERS??!!

ANSWER: AFTER WE LAUNCH, SIMPLY CONFIRM YOUR INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTION EMAIL UPON SIGNUP @ BECUZZ, AND YOU'LL AUTOMATICALLY RECEIVE THE CORRESPONDING AMOUNT OF NEW FOLLOWERS FOR THE PERK YOU PICKED.  YOU'LL GET THEM AS THEY JOIN - UNTIL YOU REACH YOUR CAP.

The more you share this campaign the faster you get to your cap of followers. 


"So what if I don't want to save the world - how would I use Becuzz?"  Example?

EXAMPLE: CABO SAN LUCAS BIRTHDAY WISH

Imagine you're celebrating your birthday at a bar in Cabo and some of your friends couldn't make the trip, but they still want to party with you! Sure you could send them birthday selfies on Snap Chat, Instagram or Twitter, but so what? They aren't contributing to YOUR b-day fun!  Well... what if they could? 

LET'S DO IT:  Open the BECUZZ MOBILE APP & set a quick campaign goal;  A BIRTHDAY ROUND OF DRINKS... $20 (small $ goals = FAST funding).

Now, take birthday pics or vids of you in real-time... and post on Becuzz.  Make your posts available to the main feed, just your followers or to a private group. Becuzz members get those posts (wherever they are) and if they likey... they'll click on the "give icon" and toss you some coin.  Members can give from 1 penny up to 5 dollars per post -gifted in their name or anonymously.  Once you've reached your $ goal, you can move the cash over to your pre-paid Becuzz Visa Card instantly. Instantly!  Use it anywhere in the world Visa is accepted.  No bank account is required. 

10 MIN LATER - ROUND OF BIRTHDAY DRINKS... FUNDED!

Transfer the $20 instantly from the app to your pre-paid credit card even in Mexico!  Then Post the fun!  Don't want to setup any campaigns or goals - then just leave your Main Wallet "open" and start posting. People will toss you coin for cool pics and videos.

"Finally a social sharing app that makes cents!" -Pretend Statement Guy

BONUS OPPORTUNITY: Pick a Perk, help fund our campaign and stretch goals.  Use your indiegogo share tools to refer as many new contributors as you can.  We'll give you additional followers  for each contributor you refer with your indiegogo share tools (view perks levels for the corresponding amount of followers). 




ANNOUNCEMENT:  YouTube is working on developing a "tip-jar" that would allow YouTubers to get tips for their videos. YouTube claims they want to compete with Indiegogo.   NOT A CHANCE.  People go to YouTube for videos of kittens and epic fails.  People go to Indiegogo to crowd fund.  That's like asking for tips at your prom.  Wrong place.   I guess a tip-jar is good for those who have tons of YouTube subscribers, but most of us don't... so how are we getting tips?  Have you ever tried to get your videos to go viral on YouTube?  Unless you pay to advertise it's next to impossible.  The good news is that YouTube's tip-jar illustrates a need for non-business related micro-funding.  That's us!  So, jump in and reserve your Becuzz Seat. Choose the Perk with as many followers as you want and hang on for the ride.  The Becuzz team is ready, in fact we've already been handling millions of mico-transactions for over 10 years... 

Hard to believe, but that's not the cast of the Bachelorette, those are our real faces... well, except for Ben.  We're a small, yet well established online loyalty  rewards company.  We currently handle millions of micro-transactions and have spent years building our B2B infrastructure... but we're sick of being the guys behind websites and apps!  We want to build a consumer brand of our own (waah)!


$1,000,000... why not?  It's just a target, but if we raise $1,000,000 we will create a massive MARKETING CAMPAIGN and recruit new members (for you)! 

Make some noise, share or tweet and if we reach this goal... your choice of Perk may be worth some coin!

This is an estimated timeline. Actual vacation time may vary.  Also, if we don't fund at least our app goal, it may take us a little longer.  If we fund our stretch goals... enjoy the ride!


Lets get this party going!  Use the Indiegogo share tools... help us reach our funding, you may win $1,000.  We will keep track of your referrals and will notify you at the end of the campaign how many more followers you will be receiving.

IF YOU CAN'T HELP FUND OUR GOALS... THEN JUST SHARE. GIVING IS FUN AND RECEIVING DOESN'T SUCK EITHER!
story_txt:
Becuzz is not just a free app, it's an enterprise level, 
cloud-based social sharing and financial transaction management system.  Fund from $10-$599 - fast!
The app is just the front-end!  HELP BEAR!


(PLEASE WATCH OUR VIDEOS IN HD - FULL SCREEN)
Mobile Social-Giving Network Explainer:  Explains how to use it once it's built! Campaign Explainer: Short video overview with timeline.  Check it out in HD.Perks Explainer Video: Check out followers-for-funding in HD.

For perks, we thought outside of the box.  Yeah we looked at Becuzz coffee mugs and tee-shirts, but what 
really has the most value for our early adopters... is followers.  So, we have chosen New Followers 
as Perks, becuzz when this takes off...you'll be glad you jumped in now!  





 Becuzz is a mobile, social-community for photo & video sharing much like 
Instagram or Vine,
except for one big difference; when people click the heart-icon on a post, they 
are actually gifting a micro (financial) transaction. These transactions happen between one member's virtual wallet to another.  Each "like" is a micro-transaction that the sender chooses to gift from 1 penny to 5 
dollars. That amount is then applied to your Becuzz quick-fund campaigns. Fund from $10-$599 - fast! 
Don't want to setup a CAM-PAIN? Then simply build your profile, leave 
your wallet OPEN and post your best shots.  You can even post your photos and videos to a 
private group.  Setup a private group of friends and share photos 'n vids that you only want them to see.  Ya never know what you could
get! 

Becuzz comes with a FREE, pre-paid Visa Card (available regardless of 
your credit history).  NO INTEREST CHARGES!  Your card  auto-links to 
your Becuzz account for instant access to funds and can be used where 
ever Visa is accepted. Imagine a credit card where MONEY GOES IN - NOT 
JUST OUT!

The app gets you financial gifts and the credit card lets you spend them, instantly!
    Innovation at it's best. The idea of an instant micro-crowdfunding mobile application is cool enough, but to link it directly to a credit card is genius.   You could potentially raise money and spend it within just a few minutes! A NEW FINANCIAL PRODUCT.  A pre-paid Becuzz Visa Card with no interest, no "negative" balance and it's yours regardless of your credit history ABSOLUTELY FREE?  BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE!  You can actually TRANSFER money TO THE CARD (instantly) from the app!  After it clears, use your card where ever Visa is accepted.  Wow, a credit card linked to a quick-fund raising app, now that's cool!  But wait, there's more, more...Tired
 of Brad's Gangsta Selfies or Shots of Keisha's new Jimmy Choos shoes?  Don't 
shoot the boot here... those pics will actually hurt your funding at 
Becuzz. This social network, has a positive "giving" message, so dust off your best shots, share your life and see what
 you get. Think about how much better EVERYONE'S posts will be when there 
is a possibility to get some coin!  And the last, more... with Becuzz, you 
can create as many campaigns as you like.  Set 
quick-funding goals from $10 up to $599. Publish your campaigns in Pink or 
Blue.  Give your campaigns catchy titles
and then share your life!  Campain "over-funding" goes into your Main 
Wallet and we suggest using over-funding to give back to your followers. 
It will only encourage them to continue to give back to YOU. The more you give, the 
more you'll receive. WE NEED TO FUND THE APP (front-end)!  Think of Becuzz as the "Twitter" of crowdfunding - for mobile only.  We fund tiny amounts for the people (and groups), not businesses. The Becuzz 
platform has a positive message and is cool, but its' gonna 
take a bazillion dollars to play with the big guys.  The good news 
is we've already done a lot of the back-end 
work!  If this campaign gets traction and we fund our STRETCH GOALS... then we'll spend a huge chunk on marketing to get more followers for YOU.  
Receive as many followers as your chosen Perk allows (followers are key 
to success).  Adopt early, grow with us and become a global influencer. 

A FREE Becuzz pre-paid credit card in your name regardless of your 
credit history.  No bank account needed. Parents must authorize ages 
13-17. 
Full Version of the Becuzz Social Sharing App (Android or iOS) that 
links to your Card - FREE. 

Your name will be listed in the Becuzz Digital Hall of Fame for all to see.
25 Top Spots LOCKED IN for Visionary Partners.

IMPORTANT QUESTION!! HOW DO I RECEIVE FOLLOWERS??!!ANSWER: AFTER 
WE LAUNCH, SIMPLY CONFIRM YOUR INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTION 
EMAIL UPON SIGNUP @ BECUZZ, AND YOU'LL AUTOMATICALLY RECEIVE THE 
CORRESPONDING AMOUNT OF NEW FOLLOWERS FOR THE PERK YOU PICKED.  YOU'LL 
GET THEM AS THEY JOIN - UNTIL YOU REACH YOUR CAP.The more you share this campaign the faster you get to your cap of followers.  "So what if I don't want to save the world - how would I use Becuzz?"  Example?EXAMPLE: CABO SAN LUCAS BIRTHDAY WISHImagine you're celebrating your birthday at a bar in Cabo and 
some of your friends couldn't make the trip, but they still want 
to party with you! Sure you could send them birthday selfies on Snap 
Chat, Instagram or Twitter, but so what? They aren't contributing to 
YOUR b-day fun!  Well... what if they could?  LET'S DO IT:  Open the BECUZZ MOBILE APP & set a quick campaign goal;  A BIRTHDAY ROUND OF DRINKS... $20 (small $ goals = FAST funding). Now,
 take birthday pics or vids of you in real-time... and post on Becuzz.  
Make your posts available to the main feed, just your followers or to a 
private group. Becuzz members get those posts (wherever they are) and if
 they likey... they'll click on the "give icon" and toss you some coin. 
 Members can give from 1 penny up to 5 dollars per post -gifted in their name or anonymously. 
 Once you've reached your $ goal, you can move the cash over to your 
pre-paid Becuzz Visa Card instantly. Instantly!  Use it anywhere in the 
world Visa is accepted.  No bank account is required.  10 MIN LATER - ROUND OF BIRTHDAY DRINKS... FUNDED!Transfer the $20 instantly from the app to your pre-paid credit card even in Mexico!  Then Post the fun!  Don't want to setup any campaigns or
 goals - then just leave your Main 
Wallet "open" and start posting. People will toss you coin for
 cool pics and videos."Finally a social sharing app that makes cents!" -Pretend Statement Guy BONUS

and stretch goals.  Use your indiegogo share tools to refer as many new

Choose the Perk with as many followers as

story:
Add Android support to the PhoneGap/Cordova In-App Purchase Plugin for iOS. Turn it into a multi-platform In-App-Purchase solution for Cordova.

This will save many developers a lot time, making the Cordova platform much more beneficial to everyone.

The idea would be to provide as much platform abstraction as possible, allowing (ideally) identical IAP code to be written for both platforms, yet let the developer access platform specific APIs.

I'm raising funds so I can afford dedicating a week of development for this. I'll sponsor myself half of the cost (with my own time), the remaining $1,000 from you will be enough for the initial support.

All funds above $1k will be used to cleanup, test the code and write documentation. If the campaign crosses the $2k milestone, I'll use the extra time to add a full featured, well commented example project.

Major contributors can ask to be listed as such in the plugin's documentation.

story:
THE PROBLEM

Life Without Power

Known locally as "Slum Island" and crammed from end to end with shanty structures, Remba Island is a treeless strip of land on the Kenya-Uganda border of Lake Victoria.

Remba’s isolation means power, clean water and health services are poorly developed, scarcely distributed and extremely expensive. As a result, disease prevalence is high and daily activities are a great challenge.


Remba supports a population of 5,000+ fishermen who sail in search of the large fish catches no longer available nearer the mainland. Locals say the island can only support its population because inhabitants fish (and sleep) in shifts.


THE SOLUTION

Mobile Enabled Micro Grid

access:energy’s micro grid will convert the abundant sun and wind on the island into life-changing electricity to power lights, refrigerators, mobile phones and other appliances.

The installation will be remotely controlled and monitored through cloud software and smart meters developed by access:energy. No cash changes hands - connected 

customers use their mobile phones to top up pre-paid units of energy on individual lines.


WHERE WILL THE MONEY GO? 

The more we raise, the more we build!

  • $10,000

    • 1 x 3.5kW energy hub = 50 x homes connected

  • $20,000

    • 2 x 3.5kW energy hubs = 100 x homes connected

  • $30,000 (target)

    • 2 x 3.5kW energy hubs = 100 x homes connected

    • 1 x ice making plant =  ice for chilling fish

  • $50,000

    • 2 x 7kW energy hubs = 400 x homes with power

    • 1 x ice making plant = ice for chilling fish


ACCESS:ENERGY IN THE NEWS

Fast Company

inhabitat

Al Jazeera


OUR PARTNERS

One of the most exciting aspects of this project is the technology which enables us to bring a mobile energy payment system to one of the most remote corners of Kenya. We are partnering with companies such as Africa's Talking, a mobile communications specialist based in Kenya, to make this possible.

story:
If you'd still like to save 50% on the app or sign up for Beta Testing, click the link below:

TornadoGPS.com/Paypal 

Thank you so much everyone!! :D

- Adam




Tornado GPS™ is the first app that can estimate the time and distance between you and any severe weather warning.

Some apps only notify you when you're directly inside of a warning. We feel that's way too late. Especially if you're travelling. 

With Tornado GPS™, you'll be automatically notified when you're 30 minutes away, 15 minutes away and directly inside of a warning.


This information is displayed at the bottom of the app in miles, minutes and kilometers.


This is also important if you're at home. In some cases, a Tornado warning might actually miss you by only a few houses but with Tornado GPS™, you'll receive a notification with the estimated distance and time.


In the United States, Tornado warnings are small and focused directly around the Tornado. In Canada, Tornado warnings are up to 70% larger because they're still warned by the county. 


Because of this, Tornado GPS™ will also compare your location to any Tornado activity! Such as funnel cloud reports, damage reports and advanced technologies like Tornado Markers or Rotation Markers. 


These technologies have been available for years but unless you're a Meteorologist or a Storm Chaser, they can be quite confusing.

Tornado GPS™ changes this by doing all of the hard work for you. 


3D Radar:

We've also included the first ever, mobile 3D Radar! 


Now you'll be able to fly right into the eye of a Tornado or Hurricane in real-time and see the areas that the storm is impacting.


Accurate Forecasts:

We've included the incredibly accurate Tornado and severe weather forecasts from the Storm Prediction Center in Norman, Oklahoma.

Their brilliant Meteorologists have proven time and time again that they're very accurate at forecasting Tornadoes and severe weather.


For example, they gave 5 days notice to Ontario before the Damaging Wind Outbreak and multiple Tornado event that happened on July 19th, 2013. 


And 5 days notice to Oklahoma before the City of Moore was tragically destroyed on May 20th, 2013.


Tornado GPS™ is now the first app that will compare your GPS location to these amazingly accurate forecasts and in some cases, you'll be notified up to eight days in advance of a potential Tornado Outbreak.


For Canadian users and those who are close to the Canadian border, we'll also notify you of any severe forecasts from Environment Canada.

Facebook Community:

And last but not least, we've included instant access to our 79 community 'Tornado Watch' and 'Blizzard Watch' Facebook pages. 


Even if you're not on Facebook, you'll still be able to receive updates about reported funnel clouds or damage from anyone in your area by using Tornado GPS™!

Facebook tells us we've connected with 3.8 million people in Canada over the past year and we've just launched a page for every State in America. 


Why not join the severe weather discussion and help keep your community safe? 

For links to all of our community pages, please visit:

https://www.TornadoGPS.com/Facebook

So, that's Tornado GPS™! 

Personal distance and time estimations from any severe weather warnings or detectable activity, incredibly accurate severe weather forecasts from the Storm Prediction Center, an active online community of storm reporting and the first ever mobile 3D Radar! 

We have a working prototype but we need your help to raise the remaining $5,000 to complete the app, upgrade our servers and update the app for new devices.

Here's the breakdown of our $5,000 goal:

- $2,500 to get the prototype completed and ready for the public.

Our world class developers from:

and

are projected to finish the app by May 2014 for those who sign up for Beta testing, and July 2014 to those who pre-order the app.

- $2,500 to host multiple, reliable servers.

This will allow us to support users from all over North America and hopefully one day, the world!

If we're fortunate enough to reach our goal of $5,000, we plan on adding a stretch goal of $17,000 in order to add one year of Northern Canada 3D Radar. The US Radar network covers much of Southern Canada (especially Ontario) but this would allow us to have 3D Radar for regions further North of the border.

Why not pre-order a copy of Tornado GPS™ today and help us continue to raise awareness about Tornadoes and severe weather?

Thank you!

Sincerely, 

- Adam


Adam Skinner

Founder of Tornado GPS, Inc.

Adam@TornadoGPS.com

https://www.TornadoGPS.com

https://www.Facebook.com/TornadoGPS

https://www.YouTube.com/TornadoGPS

@TornadoGPS

story:
My name is Admir Rebronja, I am 30 years old and I live in Podgorica, Montenegro (South of Europe, former Yugoslavia). I graduated from Faculty of Economics in Podgorica 7 years ago and since then I've been working mostly in marketing departments in companies in Montenegro, but also in an insurance company for a little over two years. I majored in Marketing and I spent last year of my college in Atlanta, GA. I was an exchange student at Georgia State University, Robinson College of Business. I loved my time in USA and I can't wait to get a chance to come back for a visit. I also played basketball actively for 7 years in Montenegrin leagues, and I am a teacher at a dance school here in Podgorica.

I am trying to raise the money to start developing a smartphone application which will help you find Free WiFi anywhere in the world with 100% reliability. Here's the summary of how app will work: Let's assume you already have it on your phone and you travel abroad and don't want to use roaming cause it's usually way too expensive. You turn the GPS on, you open the app, it shows you location and pinpoints all the places around you where you have Free WiFi. You click on one of the places and it shows you the route to the place, the app will be integrated with google maps. The promise of the app is that no matter what city you're in, you will have a place that offers free WiFi within 15 minutes walk. 100% reliable, 100% ad free and completely free of charge, this app will be a must have on your smartphone. TO BE CLEAR, THE APP WILL BE COMPLETELY FREE FOR ALL USERS UNTIL THE END OF TIME!!! There will be additional benefits in the app as well but I cannot go into more details without discovering the main framework behind the app and that would be exposing it too much, if you want to know more please contact me via social networks (I left links to my Facebook and twitter at profile page) or via email admir.rebronja@gmail.com.

As we all know, pretty much everything starts with a need or a desire, and so did this. A couple of months ago I traveled with a group of friends to a Cuban salsa festival (yes, I dance salsa) and the festival was abroad. There was nine of us, and as soon as we reached our destination, and after a taxi took us from the bus station to the main square (apartments we rented were near the square), a sort of strange thing happened. At least strange to me at the moment. While we were dragging our stuff to the apartments, literally everyone took their smartphones out and started browsing for an open and free WiFi. Even myself, even though I made fun of everyone. The reason I found it strange and that I was making fun of everyone is that I thought is it possible that we're so addicted to the WiFi, to the internet? Rhetorical question obviously, cause we were 5 minutes walk away from our apartments where we had WiFi but we couldn't wait and we had to look for a connection while walking towards our accommodation. 

But I wrapped up the application idea after another thought, and not only this particular situation I previously described. A month ago or so I was having a coffee with a friend and started talking to him about a business trip I had while I was working for an insurance company. And among the things I remembered was how difficult it was to find a Free WiFi spot while I was there, and then we started talking about how ridiculous the price of data roaming usually is and how WiFi is always a better option then your data plan which usually has limited high speed data and so on and so on and that's when it hit me.

This is where previous two events connected in my head and I started thinking about it, and trying to find a way around it, and thinking of  a way to make Free WiFi more accessible to everyone. And I got it, I came up with an idea for an application which will be free and a hundred percent reliable. I checked the market and there are only a few similar apps but none so focused and reliable because none of them had my point of view and was not developed on the basis that I am developing my application on. And then I decided to go for it. I started making more detailed plans, did some research, made a business plan and it all somehow fit together perfectly, almost as if it was meant to be.

And then came the money issue, like always right? And that money issue brought me here, with a little help from my friend from US who directed me here cause I shared my idea and plans with her. She couldn't help me personally so she suggested I try with crowd sourcing websites which I knew very little about, but with which I was so impressed after I looked into it with more details. And here I am now with big hopes and tons of optimism that this is gonna work out after all. 

Before you read the rest of the story, I'd like to make one important notion. This is pretty much my last resort. I tried everything I could before this, even borrowing the money (and still trying) from family and friends but not that easy when you live in a developing country where average yearly salary is 5000 Euros.

This money will be used for taking care of all expenses until the end of year when the first version of application should be developed. In order to have this app developed the way I planned it and in order to have a 100% reliability at all times, it will take a full commitment until the March of 2016  just to this project. This means no additional income or job or activity, just this. This also means that I need funds to cover expenses in this period of time. These expenses mean life expenses for myself and a friend (rent, food, phone, transport) who's a programmer and in charge of the software development part (which is approx. 8000$), + the cost of hiring a freelance designer a couple of times (approx. 1000$) , and a hardware + software acquiring, a new adequate laptop for the programmer friend who currently owns a slightly outdated one (approx. 1000$). This will enable me to have the app ready to download with first network of cities covered in March of 2016. I put 30$ as a reward sum but please feel free to donate whatever you can spare, any help is more than welcome, no matter how big it is. And yes, believe it or not, sums larger than 30$ are welcome too. :)

One more thing, this is a big project. To have everything ready to go I'm gonna need 8-10 months of intensive work and commitment to nothing but this (ok, maybe a little dancing too along the way), and this is what these funds I'm trying to raise are for. To cover all of my expenses in next 8 months so that I can devote all of my time to making it happen. To have the app up and running I'll need more than 50,000 according to my plans and estimates, but I already have a plan on how to get the other 40,000 - the first 10,000 are crucial to get me going, and I am hoping you will find this idea interesting enough to support it. Just imagine a situation that no matter where you go, you just turn the app on and it leads you straight into Free WiFi. The goal is to cover the whole world, and start with Europe and USA. Imagine if we cover the whole world in 3-5 years? Nothing short of history making.

P.S. I am sorry I didn't go more into details about how specifically I'm going to pull this of, but since there are some similar apps out there already and it's an original and unique idea, I kinda don't want to just lay it out there so that someone with more resources can take the idea and run me over. Thank you for your understanding and a hopeful leap of faith.
story_txt:
My name is Admir Rebronja, I am 30 years old and I live in Podgorica, Montenegro (South of Europe, former Yugoslavia). I graduated from Faculty of Economics in Podgorica 7 years ago and since then I've been working mostly in marketing departments in companies in Montenegro, but also in an insurance company for a little over two years. I majored in Marketing and I spent last year of my college in Atlanta, GA. I was an exchange student at Georgia State University, Robinson College of Business. I loved my time in USA and I can't wait to get a chance to come back for a visit. I also played basketball actively for 7 years in Montenegrin leagues, and I am a teacher at a dance school here in Podgorica. I am trying to raise the money to start developing a smartphone application which will help you find Free WiFi anywhere in the world with 100% reliability. Here's the summary of how app will work: Let's assume you already have it on your phone and you travel abroad and don't want to use roaming cause it's usually way too expensive. You turn the GPS on, you open the app, it shows you location and pinpoints all the places around you where you have Free WiFi. You click on one of the places and it shows you the route to the place, the app will be integrated with google maps. The promise of the app is that no matter what city you're in, you will have a place that offers free WiFi within 15 minutes walk. 100% reliable, 100% ad free and completely free of charge, this app will be a must have on your smartphone. TO BE CLEAR, THE APP WILL BE COMPLETELY FREE FOR ALL USERS UNTIL THE END OF TIME!!! There will be additional benefits in the app as well but I cannot go into more details without discovering the main framework behind the app and that would be exposing it too much, if you want to know more please contact me via social networks (I left links to my Facebook and twitter at profile page) or via email admir.rebronja@gmail.com.As we all know, pretty much everything starts with a need or a desire, and so 
did this. A couple of months ago I traveled with a group of friends to a
 Cuban salsa festival (yes, I dance salsa) and the festival was abroad. 
There was nine of us, and as soon as we reached our destination, and 
after a taxi took us from the bus station to the main square (apartments
 we rented were near the square), a sort of strange thing happened. At 
least strange to me at the moment. While we were dragging our stuff to 
the apartments, literally everyone took their smartphones out and 
started browsing for an open and free WiFi. Even myself, even though I 
made fun of everyone. The reason I found it strange and that I was 
making fun of everyone is that I thought is it possible that we're so 
addicted to the WiFi, to the internet? Rhetorical question obviously, 
cause we were 5 minutes walk away from our apartments where we had WiFi but 
we couldn't wait and we had to look for a connection while walking 
towards our accommodation. But I wrapped up the application idea 
after another thought, and not only this particular situation I previously described. A month ago or
 so I was having a coffee with a friend and started talking to him about
 a business trip I had while I was working for an insurance company. And
 among the things I remembered was how difficult it was to find a Free 
WiFi spot while I was there, and then we started talking about how 
ridiculous the price of data roaming usually is and how WiFi is always a
 better option then your data plan which usually has limited high speed 
data and so on and so on and that's when it hit me. This is where
 previous two events connected in my head and I started thinking about 
it, and trying to find a way around it, and thinking of  a way to make Free 
WiFi more accessible to everyone. And I got it, I came up with an idea 
for an application which will be free and a hundred percent reliable. I 
checked the market and there are only a few similar apps but none so 
focused and reliable because none of them had my point of view and was not developed on the basis that I am developing my application on. And then
 I decided to go for it. I started making more detailed plans, did some 
research, made a business plan and it all somehow fit together 
perfectly, almost as if it was meant to be.And then came the 
money issue, like always right? And that money issue brought me here, 
with a little help from my friend from US who directed me here cause I 
shared my idea and plans with her. She couldn't help me personally so she 
suggested I try with crowd sourcing websites which I knew very little about, but with 
which I was so impressed after I looked into it with more details. And 
here I am now with big hopes and tons of optimism that this is gonna 
work out after all. Before you read the rest of the story, I'd like to make one important
 notion. This is pretty much my last resort. I tried everything I could 
before this, even borrowing the money (and still trying) from family and
 friends but not that easy when you live in a developing country where 
average yearly salary is 5000 Euros. This
 money will be used for taking care of all expenses until the end of 
year when the first version of application should be developed. In order
 to have this app developed the way I planned it and in order to have a 
100% reliability at all times, it will take a full commitment until the 
March of 2016  just to this project. This means no additional income or 
job or activity, just this. This also means that I need funds to cover 
expenses in this period of time. These expenses mean life expenses for 
myself and a friend (rent, food, phone, transport) who's a programmer 
and in charge of the software development part (which is approx. 8000$),
 + the cost of hiring a freelance designer a couple of times (approx. 
1000$) , and a hardware + software acquiring, a new adequate laptop for 
the programmer friend who currently owns a slightly outdated one 
(approx. 1000$). This will enable me to have the app ready to download 
with first network of cities covered in March of 2016. I put 30$ as a 
reward sum but please feel free to donate whatever you can spare, any 
help is more than welcome, no matter how big it is. And yes, believe it 
or not, sums larger than 30$ are welcome too. :) One more thing, this is a big project. To have 
everything ready to go I'm gonna need 8-10 months of intensive work and 
commitment to nothing but this (ok, maybe a little dancing too along the
 way), and this is what these funds I'm trying to raise are for. To 
cover all of my expenses in next 8 months so that I can devote all of my
 time to making it happen. To have the app up and running I'll need more
 than 50,000 according to my plans and estimates, but I already have a 
plan on how to get the other 40,000 - the first 10,000 are crucial to 
get me going, and I am hoping you will find this idea interesting enough
 to support it. Just imagine a situation that no matter where you go, 
you just turn the app on and it leads you straight into Free WiFi. The 
goal is to cover the whole world, and start with Europe and USA. Imagine
 if we cover the whole world in 3-5 years? Nothing short of history 
making.P.S. I am sorry I didn't go more into details about how 
specifically I'm going to pull this of, but since there are some similar
 apps out there already and it's an original and unique idea, I kinda 
don't want to just lay it out there so that someone with more resources 
can take the idea and run me over. Thank you for your understanding and a
 hopeful leap of faith.

story:
Help raise $100,000 to build, mass produce and develop our Media device with Open Source software. This will change the way we enjoy entertainment, Movies, TV, Applications and open a new opportunity for the next generation broadcasters and game developers. We have placed rewards for your support to the right. 

Goal is to PreSell a minimum of 1000 devices @ $99 each.  Select the $99 Reward. This will give you an iPoint Smart Stick delivered to your home shortly after our program ends.  Refer us to your friends. We only need 1,000 Smart Sticks PreSold to meet our goal.  Here's how our device works...

Here is a Link to see it in Action--->  https://vimeo.com/47974929

 

Making Your TV Smart 

The iPoint Smart Stick will be a thumb-size, Open Source micro-computer which connects directly to the HDMI port of any TV.  The device recognizes and connects with your in home WIFI.  Instantly your TV is an Android Smart device. It's like having a huge Tablet in the middle of your living room.  

Need More Info? Here goes...

Everyone's TV is about to get an education. What can be done:

Internet Cable TV:  iPoint TV will be available on EVERY Smart Stick. Cable Television delivered via an App to your TV set.  You will watch your favorite LIVE cable networks from around the world over our private lable app. (You could even develop your own TV network and broadcast over our device.

Listen to music: Pandora, Tune-In, iHeart Radio and more apps be played on the iPoint Smart Stick.  

Gaming: Wow! Angry Birds, Racing, Strategy, Word w/Friends, Wheel Of Fortune games and more can now be played over your Large Flat Screen TV in the living room. Our Open Source codes or the entire Android market games are at your service.  Hundreds of thousands of games await.  

Social Media: Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and more, feeds are all available. Never miss another post, email or comment. Multi Tasking and special tones announcing every post.  

App Development for Games, Media, Art, Entertainment and more. We will challenge developers to develop new types of games right on their device. 

Apps: Get CNN, BBC, ESPN on demand. The story you want, when you want it, right on your big screen TV. Google Currents, Pulse, Flipboard and similar apps all are available. 

Work: Edit documents, read PDFs, review PowerPoint, send and receive emails and video conferences.  Remotes use a 2.4g radio frequency providing an ease of optional Gaming Controller, basic mouse control or a full QWERTY Mini Full keyboard remote.  Get this, you no longer have to point the remote at the TV. Control it from across the room or in a crowd.  Our RF remotes make life easy and your gaming a blast!

The iPoint Smart Stick runs Google's Android and our open source software. We would welcome building an app with you. If you're a developer and want to develop Apps, Games, MODs or even ROMs for the iPoint Smart Stick, we want to work with you. Drop us a message and we can work together on your idea or project. Who knows, maybe we can even bundle your app into the device on time for our October shipping.  Yes, we are that fast....

We need your help?  

We need your support to help us fund this new project. The world is full of independent producers of Games, TV or radio shows and TV or Film projects.  The biggest issue is "How do they get on the BIG TV controlled by Corporations. Our open source and team of developer/consultants will work with every future Spilberg, Lucas or Mark Bernett.

Plus, we need your help to spread the word about the The iPoint Smart Stick. We have worked on this project for over a year. We've kept the information close to our chest, developing our iPoint TV application to run on every stick.  Now we need the help to take it to the next level

Ready for Christmas! 

We will have it ready before Christmas.   

Here is our plan for the next few months:

September: Order our first units - Awesome!

October: Begin Shipping - Fantastic!!

November: Open Mall Kiosk - Excellent!!!

2013: Global Distribution of the iPoint Smart Stick.

More About Us iPoint Television, LLC is a 3 year old company focusing on developing new platforms for Cable Television distribution.  We began with our own Set Top box in the United States and United Kingdom.  Throughout these 3 years we have developed new software and applications which make TV broadcasting easier and more affordable.  

Our US office is in Grapevine, Texas.  Websites of our company information:

www.iPoint.tv

www.iPointApps.com

www.Facebook.com/ClarkOrtiz

www.linkedin.com/in/ClarkOrtiz

story:
Story

Everyone got very excited about new VR possibilities after Oculus Rift was first introduced. but for me it was more than obvious that this meant new possibility for shooting 3D documentaries(with two gopro cameras u can make amazing airsoft videos in 3D), for 3D photos... and for 3D skype conversations...

after a while I found out that there are virtually no devices for 3D webcam chat(and almost no software). there are couple fixed "two cameras pared" - that have some sophisticated software to provide u with "red/cyan", analygraph 3D.

so being a software developer my self and an enthusiast engineer - I decided to build one my self.


The Device

and this is what I ended up with - two web cameras, placed roughly as our eyes are, three servo motors (which. luckily, I've had bought for my other robot project and had available right a way) and a Arduino controller

it took some time connecting everything together, developing software, getting into oculus API... and some experimenting with different web cameras to get nice 3D view and good frame rate for two simultaneously working web cameras.

but the result is what u see - You move your head around, wearing oculus - the device repeats ur head movement

jerking movement is the result of experimenting with different values of precision.

as it turned out - "smooth" movement of "head" causes it to make really small corrections all the time, since a person wearing oculus can't really keep his/her head really still this gets annoying really fast. so this "roughing out" of movement (every 5 degrees)  allows u to maintain a stable viewpoint in real life environment.

after that the camera data is constantly uploaded to a server and can be viewed both in a web browser(with any number of clients viewing it) or with a client software (which same time can remotely control the device).

anyone can check out live video on web (or last two images, if the cameras are offline) at: http://design.ge/video/ - and of course it becomes whole another story if use oculus to check it out.



what this device needs - is a "market" shape(both of the device and the app), we're planing to make it look like a "cat", cartoon cat. and I'm also trying to reach Microsoft, anyone, plz

also there is a plan of developing a wheeled platform, so that one on the other side of the internet cable could not only turn the head around - but also move around freely.


Applications

1. this is absolutely amazing for online conversations, especially when communicating on conferences with a round, or a big table - device allows u to look at anyone, they know u are looking at them and u have very realistic feel of presence

also this is really gr8 device to chat with your loved ones(say family), for example for military personnel serving in far away locations - as said above, it allows u to look around, kinda have a feeling of being there with them, and also the fact that it actually turns around - let's u sensation that u are having a conversation with a live person.

2. wheeled and tracked devices - like military robots, it's 100 times easier operating a robotic hand when u have 3D vision.

3. manipulating different devices - remotely (with notebook connected)

4. porn business - obviously...

Love and Support

yeap, looking for it.

anyone can participate, any ideas, enthusiasts or just warm hugs - are welcomed.
