story:
RealMax Qian is a standalone AR headset with a field of view surpassing 100 degrees, the design of which allows users to experience the immersive power of AR. Qian glasses contain compelling features: It offers an ultra-wide-angle display, performs 6DoF tracking, and enables users to enjoy full mobility while wearing the headset. The smart glasses have been evolved from a captivating prototype at CES 2018 to actual production hardware at CES 2019 and returned to Las Vegas as a mature product, which has been well-received at CES 2020.

  • Check Out the video on CES 2020 By MRTV - MIXED REALITY TV

"Realmax has officially taken its AR/VR ambitions from dream to reality."Qian actually contains some compelling differentiators: It’s lightweight, tetherless, and offers a very wide-angle video display by augmented reality headset standards."

  "The goggles use stereoscopic 1080p display to deliver a dramatically more powerful AR experience than Microsoft’s HoloLens. It runs on Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 system on chip."

 "At a fraction of the price of a HoloLens or Magic Leap One, RealMax Qian may represent an enticing option for early adopters who are looking for a living room AR experience on a budget."

 "We're still waiting for the day when augmented-reality glasses will make the leap from development hell to true consumer tech. RealMax is pushing the market one step closer to fruition with its Qian headset."

 "RealMax Qian Review & Features: #1 Mixed Reality Glasses? | The RealMax Qian is an AR and VR headset rolled into one package. In this guide, we take a look at the Qian and how it performs for augmented and virtual reality gaming and day-to-day tasks."

 RealMax Qian features a wider field of view than any other currently on the market. When wearing Qian, you will be feeling that you are surrounded by the virtual content, but still able to see the real world. In other words, you are part of what you are watching as opposed to just the feeling that you are looking at a small screen that has been placed in a headset.

With the 119.5 degrees field of view, RealMax Qian can fill enough of your eye space, offering a much more immersive AR experience. The picture you see through our glasses is almost double the width of other AR glasses who have a relatively small FoV of about 40 to 50 degrees. Peripheral view is also maintained through the windowed side panels, completing an intensively immersive viewing experience that will be exciting for all wearers.

RealMax Qian is paired with binocular 6 Degree-of-Freedom tracking and a 9-axis IMU sensor so that wearers can move around in a 3D space and see virtual objects that appear to be real.

 

With all its sensors and two ultra-wide-angle cameras, Qian can track your position smoothly and knows well your position as well as the rotation of your head. What’s more, the 6DoF tracking enables the glasses to keep 3D content solid. If you place a 3D model in your room, walk all way around your home and then come back, the module will be still staying there.

 RealMax Qian does not require tethering to an external device or computer. It is self-contained. The glasses can also be used in large-multi-user environment. By connecting multiple headsets on the same wireless network, wearers can interact with one another using digital objects within an actual physical space. Feel free to go anywhere with Qian!

 

With the technology of 6DoF tracking and positioning technique, an immersive and intuitive interaction with virtual objects using only bare hands is available on RealMax Qian. By connecting a Leap Motion sensor to the headset USB port or using Fingo hardware*, wearers can interact with the digital and real-world content with their hands and fingers being accurately localized. A basic controller is also provided for supporting such interactions. Apps are stored within the headset and you can find more AR/VR games that support gesture interaction in RealMax AppStore. 

The Qian does not only empower you to see the real world mixed with virtual content, but also provide you with a fully immersive VR viewing experience. The headset can be easily converted to VR mode with a magnetic VR cover. By snapping on the cover, you can enjoy VR at any time. Buy one RealMax Qian today and enjoy two kinds of immersive experience at home.

 

 The optics of RealMax Qian features a two-layer lens design which allows you to clearly see the outside world. At the meantime, others will not able to see contents shown in the Qian glasses from the outside and your privacy is perfectly protected. If you use Qian on the road during a business trip, there is no need to worry about revealing business secrets. If wearing Qian at home, you will feel like owning a private cinema. What an amazing experience enjoying digital contents while not losing scenes in the real world.

 

 

RealMax Qian is user-oriented that it works on top of most prescription eyewear. There is no need to take off your own glasses before having Qian on. This smart headset enables you to wear your eyeglasses underneath itself and to see everything clearly.

 The RealMax Qian was designed with consumers in mind. It is lightweight, untethered, and user-friendly. Qian’s fit system fully considered face and head shapes for extended use. Its two side windows also enable wearers to see the real world while they are surrounded by digital contents, delivering a much more immersive viewing experience.

The glasses place us in the middle of action coming from a variety of apps. Users can explore multiuser sporting challengers, engage in immersive adventure games and play in interactive music systems.

 Snap on a magnetic VR cover to switch to VR mode. Play VR games using Steam© Valve, wireless streaming or a NOLO module*.

 

* Peripheral devices supported: Gaming experiences will be enhanced through the use of plug-in USB 3.1C modules such as Nolo wireless devices, Leap Motion hand tracking, and Fingo hardware. Please note that these devices are not included with the glasses.

 The Qian has its own application store. The device is supported by a constantly growing number of apps including everything from cooking guides to interior design measuring tools. We will provide more applications in the future to expand your AR experience.

 

RealMax Qian uses Qualcomm Snapdragon 835, the same CPU you would find in a top-end smart phone.

 

Qian has exceptional battery life with a 6000mAH removable, fast-charging battery. It can support 5-hour use and 100-hour standby.

The structure of Qian glasses is sophisticated and comprehensive. In order to achieve a perfect fit for both the optical module circuit and face shape difference, engineers have tried and tested hundreds of brackets, and finally chose the one that you can experience today. When it comes to the assembly of the optics and bracket, the dust-free assembly robots have been iterated for three times to meet the high requirements in quality and user experience. The RealMax AR team has also been very strict with the optical calibration. Only after passing three optical inspections, one automatic robot correction, and 90 tests, the optical lenses can be considered as "qualified". Our engineers have devoted years of hard work to make RealMax Qian a high-quality AR headset.

RealMax Qian offers an App on Cloud XR that users can connect the headset to Steam© without using cables. System requirement (Minimum): A 64-bit processor and an operating system, OS: Windows 10 64bit only, Processor: Intel Core i7 9th Gen or AMD equivalent, Memory: 16 GB RAM, Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070, Network: Broadband Internet connection.

 How to connect to Steam©:

 

 

RealMax is providing an open source platform enabling the creation of almost any kind of application. We are open in four key ways:

  • Open Unity interfaces that even allow access to low level android functions.
  •  Open hardware interfaces to support a growing array of devices.
  • Open XML support to allow anyone to create AR interactive scenes
  • Open Web support to allow 3d through a browser.

Please note some of the third party plugins are not included.  Developers need to purchase the plugins themselves using the information provided by RealMax.

 

The Qian is in wide use today for employee training, remote support, K-12 education, and advanced research. The glasses can also be applied to medical and industrial scenarios, along with customized applications for different uses.

 

You may have visited a VR Experience Hall, but have you heard of AR Experience Hall? RealMax has innovatively proposed a scheme called AR Science Wonderland: an immersive and holographic AR Theme Experience Hall. The scheme employs a comprehensive package of self-developed hardware, game software and solutions of venue design. In addition to products and built-in games, we will provide you with free game updates and comprehensive venue design solutions, including game introduction, poster design, venue fence design, display rack design, visit coupon design and staff clothing design.

We always try our best to provide our clients with the most comprehensives services and help them to establish their own business at a lower cost in a more convenient way. Come and join us today! Start a business at a low cost.

     

    119.5°FOV

    We have the capability of mass production of RealMax Qian. You can rest assured that we guarantee the quality of our prodcut and the shipment date. We will send you the Qian as scheduled!

    ·  STRETCH GOAL # 1: $5,000--Disposable Eye Mask X10

    When multiple users will wear one pair of RealMax Qian, you can use the disposable eye mask before wearing the headset to protect your eyes from bacteria and viruses.

    ·  STRETCH GOAL # 2: $100,000--Eye-area Sponge

    Eye-area Sponge can be attached to the headset to enhance wearing comfort.

    ·  STRETCH GOAL # 3: $250,000--Light-Reducing Sunglasses

    Sunglasses can reduce light and the impact of excessive light on AR glasses, allowing wearers to enjoy our glasses outdoors or under strong light.

    It is not an easy task to achieve an ultra-wide field of view of over 100 degrees and produce an all-in-one standalone AR headset. The difficulties we have encountered are global technological challenges that companies in AR industry and advanced manufacturing face. From designing headset components to manufacturing high-precision molds and large-area free-form optical lenses, we dealt with each challenge step by step. We cooperated with Goertek Inc, the world-renowned OEM/ODM manufacturer of AR/VR devices. From trial to trial, we made every attempt to improve the technological process. More than 3000 lenses and hundreds of complete machines were scrapped during this stage. After a year of working day and night as well as testing and researching, we finally overcame the problem of low yield and shape change of large-area free-form surface optical lenses and molds. Our achievements have greatly improved the yield and production efficiency, thereby reducing the cost of the AR headsets. With great sincerity, RealMax will devote ourselves to developing the core technology and push the entire industry to move forward.

     

    About RealMax

    RealMax is an international enterprise focusing on the area of Augmented Reality with its headquarter in Shanghai. Since its establishment in 2003, RealMax has developed and expanded into a multinational corporation with offices in Seattle and Hong Kong, and more than 150 employees worldwide.

    RealMax has more than ten years of experience in hardware development and software engineering. It has been actively developed the core technology of independent intellectual property rights and formed a well-rounded capability of developing hardware, software, and content. RealMax’s advantages are reflected in its complete business ecosystem and comprehensive industrial chain in the area of Augmented Reality, as well as the width and depth in global business undertakings.

    RealMax Mission

    To deepen understanding by making AR accessible to everyone.

    Goertek Inc. is a global leading high-tech company that was established in 2001. It is a giant in the electro-acoustic industry. The company focuses on the R&D, manufacturing, and marketing of high-precision components (Acoustics, Sensor, Optoelectronic, and 3D Packaging Module) and smart hardware (VR/AR, Wearable, Hearable, AI, Home and etc.). Currently, it is considered as the world’s top VR/AR headset OEM factory. Smart headsets such as PSVR from Sony, and smart devices from Microsoft, Oculus, and Qualcomm are all manufactured by Goertek Inc.

    The lab for manufacturing RealMax Qian is specially tailored and it is much more advanced.

    How to contact RealMax AR Team:

    100.contact@realmax.com
story_txt:
RealMax Qian is a standalone AR headset with a field of view surpassing 100 degrees, the design of which allows users to experience the immersive power of AR. Qian glasses contain compelling features: It offers an ultra-wide-angle display, performs 6DoF tracking, and enables users to enjoy full mobility while wearing the headset. The smart glasses have been evolved from a captivating prototype at CES 2018 to actual production hardware at CES 2019 and returned to Las Vegas as a mature product, which has been well-received at CES 2020.Check Out the video on CES 2020 By MRTV - MIXED REALITY TV"Realmax has officially taken its AR/VR ambitions from dream to reality."Qian actually contains some compelling differentiators: It’s lightweight, tetherless, and offers a very wide-angle video display by augmented reality headset standards."  "The goggles use stereoscopic 1080p display to deliver a dramatically more powerful AR experience than Microsoft’s HoloLens. It runs on Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 system on chip." "At a fraction of the price of a HoloLens or Magic Leap One, RealMax Qian may represent an enticing option for early adopters who are looking for a living room AR experience on a budget." "We're still waiting for the day when augmented-reality glasses will make the leap from development hell to true consumer tech. RealMax is pushing the market one step closer to fruition with its Qian headset." "RealMax Qian Review & Features: #1 Mixed Reality Glasses? | The RealMax Qian is an AR and VR headset rolled into one package. In this guide, we take a look at the Qian and how it performs for augmented and virtual reality gaming and day-to-day tasks." RealMax Qian features a wider field of view than any other currently on the market. When wearing Qian, you will be feeling that you are surrounded by the virtual content, but still able to see the real world. In other words, you are part of what you are watching as opposed to just the feeling that you are looking at a small screen that has been placed in a headset.With the 119.5 degrees field of view, RealMax Qian can fill enough of your eye space, offering a much more immersive AR experience. The picture you see through our glasses is almost double the width of other AR glasses who have a relatively small FoV of about 40 to 50 degrees. Peripheral view is also maintained through the windowed side panels, completing an intensively immersive viewing experience that will be exciting for all wearers.RealMax Qian is paired with binocular 6 Degree-of-Freedom tracking and a 9-axis IMU sensor so that wearers can move around in a 3D space and see virtual objects that appear to be real. With all its sensors and two ultra-wide-angle cameras, Qian can track your position smoothly and knows well your position as well as the rotation of your head. What’s more, the 6DoF tracking enables the glasses to keep 3D content solid. If you place a 3D model in your room, walk all way around your home and then come back, the module will be still staying there. RealMax Qian does not require tethering to an external device or computer. It is self-contained. The glasses can also be used in large-multi-user environment. By connecting multiple headsets on the same wireless network, wearers can interact with one another using digital objects within an actual physical space. Feel free to go anywhere with Qian! With the technology of 6DoF tracking and positioning technique, an immersive and intuitive interaction with virtual objects using only bare hands is available on RealMax Qian. By connecting a Leap Motion sensor to the headset USB port or using Fingo hardware*, wearers can interact with the digital and real-world content with their hands and fingers being accurately localized. A basic controller is also provided for supporting such interactions. Apps are stored within the headset and you can find more AR/VR games that support gesture interaction in RealMax AppStore. The Qian does not only empower you to see the real world mixed with virtual content, but also provide you with a fully immersive VR viewing experience. The headset can be easily converted to VR mode with a magnetic VR cover. By snapping on the cover, you can enjoy VR at any time. Buy one RealMax Qian today and enjoy two kinds of immersive experience at home.  The optics of RealMax Qian features a two-layer lens design which allows you to clearly see the outside world. At the meantime, others will not able to see contents shown in the Qian glasses from the outside and your privacy is perfectly protected. If you use Qian on the road during a business trip, there is no need to worry about revealing business secrets. If wearing Qian at home, you will feel like owning a private cinema. What an amazing experience enjoying digital contents while not losing scenes in the real world.  RealMax Qian is user-oriented that it works on top of most prescription eyewear. There is no need to take off your own glasses before having Qian on. This smart headset enables you to wear your eyeglasses underneath itself and to see everything clearly. The RealMax Qian was designed with consumers in mind. It is lightweight, untethered, and user-friendly. Qian’s fit system fully considered face and head shapes for extended use. Its two side windows also enable wearers to see the real world while they are surrounded by digital contents, delivering a much more immersive viewing experience.The glasses place us in the middle of action coming from a variety of apps. Users can explore multiuser sporting challengers, engage in immersive adventure games and play in interactive music systems. Snap on a magnetic VR cover to switch to VR mode. Play VR games using Steam© Valve, wireless streaming or a NOLO module*. * Peripheral devices supported: Gaming experiences will be enhanced through the use of plug-in USB 3.1C modules such as Nolo wireless devices, Leap Motion hand tracking, and Fingo hardware. Please note that these devices are not included with the glasses. The Qian has its own application store. The device is supported by a constantly growing number of apps including everything from cooking guides to interior design measuring tools. We will provide more applications in the future to expand your AR experience. RealMax Qian uses Qualcomm Snapdragon 835, the same CPU you would find in a top-end smart phone. Qian has exceptional battery life with a 6000mAH removable, fast-charging battery. It can support 5-hour use and 100-hour standby.The structure of Qian glasses is sophisticated and comprehensive. In order to achieve a perfect fit for both the optical module circuit and face shape difference, engineers have tried and tested hundreds of brackets, and finally chose the one that you can experience today. When it comes to the assembly of the optics and bracket, the dust-free assembly robots have been iterated for three times to meet the high requirements in quality and user experience. The RealMax AR team has also been very strict with the optical calibration. Only after passing three optical inspections, one automatic robot correction, and 90 tests, the optical lenses can be considered as "qualified". Our engineers have devoted years of hard work to make RealMax Qian a high-quality AR headset.RealMax Qian offers an App on Cloud XR that users can connect the headset to Steam© without using cables. System requirement (Minimum): A 64-bit processor and an operating system, OS: Windows 10 64bit only, Processor: Intel Core i7 9th Gen or AMD equivalent, Memory: 16 GB RAM, Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070, Network: Broadband Internet connection. How to connect to Steam©:


  RealMax is providing an open source platform enabling the creation of almost any kind of application. We are open in four key ways:
Open Unity interfaces that even allow access to low level android functions.
 Open hardware interfaces to support a growing array of devices.
Open XML support to allow anyone to create AR interactive scenes
Open Web support to allow 3d through a browser.
Please note some of the third party plugins are not included.  Developers need to purchase the plugins themselves using the information provided by RealMax. The Qian is in wide use today for employee training, remote support, K-12 education, and advanced research. The glasses can also be applied to medical and industrial scenarios, along with customized applications for different uses. You may have visited a VR Experience Hall, but have you heard of AR Experience Hall? RealMax has innovatively proposed a scheme called AR Science Wonderland: an immersive and holographic AR Theme Experience Hall. The scheme employs a comprehensive package of self-developed hardware, game software and solutions of venue design. In addition to products and built-in games, we will provide you with free game updates and comprehensive venue design solutions, including game introduction, poster design, venue fence design, display rack design, visit coupon design and staff clothing design.We always try our best to provide our clients with the most comprehensives services and help them to establish their own business at a lower cost in a more convenient way. Come and join us today! Start a business at a low cost. 

119.5°FOV

story:
Breathtakie! is Your 100% Confidence.

We are always concerned about how we look and are perceived by others, which is natural - the better impression we make, the more successful we are in life.

By looking in the mirror or simply asking a friend we can easily make sure we look fine. But this is not the same easy with bad breath, a trifle which can ruin the whole impression of even the most immaculate appearance.

We are a 3-member team of the Kyiv-based startup who approached this trivial problem in the most serious way. Our team has invented an iOS/ Android device – the first clear breath analyzer.

It Takes Less Than One Minute To Analyze Your Breath.

Simply attach the Breathtakie! device to the headset connector of your telephone.

Wait for a couple of seconds for the program to be uploaded and then press a button “Analyze”.


Breathe on the device.

And that’s it! …in just a few seconds view the result on your screen.


The Simplest Test but the Most Serious Results.

Quick Breath Test.

Solution Provider.

Health Diagnostics.

  • The result of the breath test presented on the screen states the overall quality of your breath. 

  • It also prompts the best solution for each particular case. 

  • Bad breath is sometimes a symptom. With Breathtakie! you will be timely (!) informed of the serious health issues probability.

What is Actually Analyzed.

Breathtakie! is created to analyze the elements contained in the air we breathe out such as volatile sulphur, methylmercaptan, etc. The results are given based on the present elements and their proportions.

We are Coming Soon…

We are planning the full launch of our priceless for whose working with clients and customers gadget for February 2015 and we hope so much for your help and support!

A lot has already been done, but we still need to make some professional compact design for the device as well as to launch the production line. The estimate cost of the mentioned is around 65 thousand USD.


Future Prospects.

What we further plan is to equip the gadget with an alcohol tester function which will enable the users of our device to any moment measure the threshold of alcohol presence in their blood. This will help you to be the most objective about the level of your intoxication and will prevent you from dangerous driving.

The second thing we are going to do with extra funds is equipping the device with a mini-battery and the function of breath analyzer independently from the telephone.

We Do it for You.

We highly appreciate the Indiegogo audience and would be really grateful if you could participate in choosing the future design for the Breathtakie! device.

The 9 most active users will be offered to choose from 18 variants of the device design. The chosen by you variant will be the final one to be launched in the mass production.

But, wait…. this is not all! The 9 most active users will also receive from us the firsts devices in the packaging exclusive designed for each of them along with the warmest thanks and the possibility to get any sign engraved on their devices.


Thank you! We appreciate.

Thank you all so much for your time and attention to our Breathtakie! project. We are looking forward to hearing any of your recommendations and comments.

Also please feel free to contact us at: info@breathtakie.com

We would also appreciate if you could share the info about our device with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and in YouTube using the Indiegogo share tools below.

story:
With HD Clear Pro Glass Applicator we now bring you an easier and more accurate way to install screen shield than ever before. With our innovative Pro Applicator you can install the glass screen shield hassle-free, fast and with perfect alignment every time in 3 easy steps. 

Step 1: Frame In: Place the template over the phone, note that the template is designed specifically to hold your phone and fits perfectly.

Step 2: Clean Screen: Clean the screen with wet wipe, use the microfiber cloth to wipe dry, use the dust remover sticker to pick up any dust particles on the screen.

Step 3: Peel Off: Peel off the label from the glass, flip over and slide your finger on the glass, remove the sticker and clean the screen with the micro fiber cloth for a smooth finish.

    Its that easy. Position accurately with no bubbles. 

Currently available phone models are iPhone 6/6s, iPhone 6 plus/6s plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 plus.  

Back our campaign to bring this innovative Pro Applicator to life. Thank You!

story:
NutriCrystal

The World's First Bluetooth Smart Ready Food Scale. We have built it and now we need your financial support to further develop the software to achieve the scale's full potential.


Product History

We launched our first version of wireless scale - NutriScale - for Android devices in September 2012 and NutriCrystal in February 2013 for Android, iOS and Desktop applications. The original concept was to offer a nutrition tracking solution better than the current nutrition scales. The product has been well received and was recently featured @ Bluetooth.com


Product Comparison

*The wireless scale can be power by the built-in rechargeable or four AAA batteries.


Realizing NutriCrystal's full potential

After receiving many feedback from our current customers and potential partners in the nutrition industry, we have realized that NutriCrystal has much greater potentials than just tracking daily nutrient intake.


Building the NutriPlus Fitness Platform

We are now working with professionals from Nutrition, Sports and Medicine to create a mobile app and an online software platform to deliver nutrition solutions for:

  • Sports Athletes who wants to fine tune their performance
  • People battling against diabetes and weight related issues
  • Infant nutrition intake monitoring
  • and more....

Via the platform, members will be able to:

  • view all premium health related contents
  • analyze how their life is impacted by their nutrition intake
  • interact with a registered nutrition specialist via online chat or video conference to get support.

External Connectivity

For people who currently use FitBit, Withings Weight Scale or Nutrition tracking software, such as MyFitnessPal, you will be able to import and export your data between NutriPlus and other fitness platforms.


We need your help

To build the beta version of this comprehensive software, we need to hire two full time software engineers and one Graphical UI Designer for the next 12 months. And we are looking for help from you to:

  • raise $25,000 to pay for a portion of our development cost
  • be our testers for six months and give us your valuable feedback


Your Reward

Your financial pledge to our project will be immediately rewarded with fully working NutriCrystal Bluetooth Smart Ready Food Scales (at 8.5~25%+ discount) that already works with  our basic mobile apps, such as Nutrient Facts Table Builder, Daily Nutrient Intake Analyzer.. In addition, you will receive a free membership (per each NutriCrystal purchase) to the NutriPlus Fitness Platform to achieve better health via better nutrition management.


Other ways to support us

If you are unable to contribute to our project financially, please do still support us by:

  • follow us on Facebook by becoming our Fan at www.facebook.com/NutriCrystal
  • follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/nutriscale
  • forward this campaign to people who you think may be interested in NutriPlus Fitness
  • or any other ways you think can help us (email us at info@reflexwireless.com)


The Impact

With your help and our engineering knowledge, we believe that we can create a health management solution based on the existing nutrition knowledge around the world to help people lead a better and healthier life by eating fabulous food everyday.


About US

Our company was formed by a group of engineering students from the University of British Columbia in 2010. After winning several school competitions, we decided to form a company in June 2011. The video below was recorded when Mayor Bloomberg of NYC announced us as the winning team in April 2011. Our goal was to create affordable healthcare solutions for the people around the world. And we are very thankful that we have been able to turn our dreams little by little to reality.


Thank You^!^

story:
What do we have at the moment:

A design Icon brought to you by the family that gave you the Sydney Opera House.  This new Radio has just launched with its basic model in Europe. Jeppe Utzon has designed this perfect radio, which surprises in every aspect.

With it’s special engineered loudspeaker can you easily fill a normal living room, with crystal clear and loud music.

The DAB+ technology is developed with one of the leading providers of such modules.

Everything for the basic model is done and already shipping.

 

Why are we asking for your help:

Help us to further develop our ROBIO radio so it can wireless stream music and be controlled by any tablet, androidphone or iPhone.

We want to make ROBIO 2.0 with built-in Bluetooth to be able to stream music from any smartphone, laptop or PC and at the same time are we are making an application for all operating systems, to convert your phone into ROBIO’s remote control.

Great Perks are given for funding.

Zeniq supports good causes:

Part of the profits from our new products will be donated to the RED CROSS.

 

What is the funding used for:

Funding is used for the following development:

-       Tooling amendments to improve sound quality by making the product heavier              and accommodating new electronics.

-       Application design and development

-       Bluetooth chip development and integration of the current Robio software.

-       Test samples

-       Pilot runs

-       Small Mass Production to overcome quality problems.

 

Why will this be a success:

DAB+ is an emergent market, but nobody is supporting it with high quality sound at affordable prices made by famous designers. Most radios on the market are overprices and under featured. We want to make consumers happy and feel that they really got their money worth.  

 

We appreciate all the help we can get:

If you can’t support financial is the viral story of our new brand highly appreciated.

 

Where is DAB+ available:

DAB is a digital broadcasting of radio and currently available in.

 

More than 20 countries are currently providing DAB broadcasts and the number is growing year by year. Countries include: Belgium, China, Czech Republic, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Germany, Indonesia, UK, Australia, Spain, Italy, Portugal, South Korea, Hong Kong, Malta, Malaysia, The Netherlands, Switzerland, Poland.

Many more countries are testing and trialing this broadcasting type.

For more information about our current radio visit: www.zeniq.com

Thank you for all your support.
story_txt:
What do we have at the moment:
A design Icon brought to you by the family that gave you the Sydney Opera House.  This new Radio has just launched with its basic model in Europe. Jeppe Utzon has designed this perfect radio, which surprises in every aspect.
With it’s special engineered loudspeaker can you easily fill a normal living room, with crystal clear and loud music.
The DAB+ technology is developed with one of the leading providers of such modules.
Everything for the basic model is done and already shipping.

story:
- Compatible Models: iPad / iPhone / Smartphone / Android / iOS tablet PC
- Features:
- This product is a new design wireless Bluetooth controller and supports different Android/ OS / PC and other games
- It can be used when connected with the Bluetooth mobile phone without any drivers
-Built-in lithium battery, after charging can be sustainable long-term use, safe and stable
- The phone can be placed in the telescope holder, convenient for playing games
- Bluetooth 3.0 wireless transmission can be 6~8 meters wide range of control from the operation
- User-friendly software designed to enter the power saving mode with no connection state
- Compatible with iPod / iPhone / iPad as well as the vast majority of android tablet PCs
- Game Support Description:
- Note: The compatibility problem exists on the part of the game of the Android 4.0 system; It is recommended to use the stable version of the system
- Supports the vast majority of the simulator as well as racing and tower defense type of game under the android system. (Such as FC simulator, GBA simulator, arcade emulator, SFC simulator, N64 emulator, Shadowgun, Sonic CD, Cordy, SoulCraft, Zenonia4, 9 Innings 2013, the Riptide GP, Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, the Airbag Frank 3D PlantsVs; Zombies, GunsNGlory etc.)
Supports the vast majority of the game with a virtual keyboard under iOS system. ( Such as Gunman Clive, Helium Boy, League of Evil League of Evil 2, Muffin Knight Free Stardash, Temple the Run, etc.)
- Packing List:
- 1 x Controller
- 1 x USB cable (80cm)
- 1 x Chinese & English user manual


Some More Pictures of IPEGA

story:
**Update!**

 

Snag List has been released on the App Store!

http://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/snag-list/id541382995?mt=8

Thank you so much for your support. Although we didn't raise the money for the voice recognition, we hope this is something that we can add in future updates!

 

What

Snag List is an iPhone app (and eventually an Android app) to help you quickly & easily create lists of problems or defects you find.  Whether you're working on a construction site or looking around your new home, Snag List will help you record an organised list of 'snags' by allowing you to capture a photo of the problem, speak or type a description and even generate a beautiful PDF document showing each item, ready to be emailed straight from your iPhone.

Features:

  • Built in voice recognition enables you to speak the snag description instead of typing it, making it even faster to record Snags.

  • Capture and save a photo of the Snag using the built in camera.

  • Automatically generate a professional looking 'Snag List' in PDF format, ready to be emailed.

  • Over 20 Languages supported: British, American, Australian, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Polish and Japanese and many more.

  • We've worked with industry professionals to ensure Snag List is easy to use, fast and reliable.

Who would use Snag List?

  • People in the Construction Industry
  • Real Estate
  • Housing
  • Project Managers
  • Students

 

Who are we?

The duo behind Snag List are James Crowson, an iPhone developer and Scott Eggleton, a project manager working in the Construction Industry.

 Scott is used to assessing buildings for damages, problems and defects and currently the best (and quickest) way to do it is to take a photo using a digital camera or smart phone, and write down a description of the snag on a pad of paper. This is an enormously time consuming process, sometimes taking weeks to assess a single building. This is only half the job as the next step is to create a report of the problems using a word processor.

Scott had the idea of creating an app that allows you to photo a problem, record a description and save it in a list from which a report could be generated, all on your phone. And so the idea for Snag List was born...

We've designed Snag List alongside people working in the industry and so far have received a huge amount of positive feedback. Some of the responses have been:

"When you think about the productivity value this app has, it is unbelievable. The amount of hours it takes to snag a building would be significantly reduced using this app!"

"When you consider how much time and effort Snag List saves, the cost of it far outweighs anything else"

 

How is the money going to be used?

We use voice recognition in Snag List, which means you can speak the description of the snag into the microphone and it will convert it to text, making it even faster to record snags. 

The license for the voice recognition comes at a price, $3,500. All of the design and development of Snag List has been completed and we're ready to launch the app into the AppStore, however first we need to pay a license fee to use the Voice Recognition engine.

The $3,500 covers the entire cost of this license. Any extra money donated would be used to make the app even better, adding features that we would have added at a later date. 

 

Screenshots

 

 

How you can help

The app is ready to be released to the AppStore and with your donation we can pay for the licensing cost for us to use the speech recognition engine. 

If you think Snag List could save you time and money, please take the time to donate to this project and be apart of Snag List's launch. Thank you.

story:
Click here if you're from the UK  /   Clique aqui para ler em português!

Imagine if you didn't have a voice in decisions that are critical to your daily life, such as what school to attend or send your children to, what hospital to go to when feeling sick, or what transportation to take to work everyday. Imagine if, from night to day, you lost your voice. How would you feel? 

Millions of people worldwide feel like that. This is because, for these people, public services are the only available resource for education, health and transportation, but their demands for such services or their assessments of the quality of the services provided is never assessed by their representatives. The reason is that representatives lack the tools to do that in a timely and cost-effective manner. The consequence is a failure of representation, and this not only affects the daily lives of those millions of citizens; it also affects the quality of democracy worldwide. 


WHAT WE DO

To break that vicious cycle, MGov has been using 'old' technology to give a new voice to people. Taking advantage of the worldwide usage of mobile phones, we use analog technology — text messaging (SMS) and voice calls — to implement a two-way communication channel with respondents, gathering data and sending out information for public policy evaluation, monitoring and civic engagement. Even though cell phones are everywhere, internet and data plans are not: in the developing world, the lion's share of active lines are prepaid. This is why one cannot rely on smartphone apps when it comes to public policy and social impact.

We allow people to express their demands for and assessment of public services directly, without intermediaries. We provide a low-cost way to rigorously evaluate the impact and effectiveness of alternative policies and for monitoring pilot initiatives with agility. This allows for the fine-tuning of policies – in order to closely match the needs of those who they benefit –, and for large-scale civic engagement and empowerment initiatives. 

NOW, WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

With the right funding, we believe that we can scale up our operations, allowing us to have a bigger impact. To achieve this, we want to build up our team so that we can further develop our products and services. This means we must keep investing in our platform, not only to raise the quality of the services we provide in Brazil, but so that we can also provide those services worldwide. Most importantly, we want to keep experimenting, in order to cater to progressively more challenging settings while keeping our solutions cost-effective.

With this campaign we want to fund 3 innovative initiatives which haven't been tried out before, divided into 3 goals:

(1) Raising USD 15,000: we can provide a mobile-based survey at a Brazilian slum (favela) about the quality of local public services, identifying the priorities for policy action.

Why? The only slum-level representative survey we have in Brazil, the official census, asks only about coverage of basic services, not about their quality. And that information is key to improve representation;

(2) Raising USD 60,000: additional mobile tool to allow participants in demonstrations or riots to disseminate their views on social media even on the absence of internet.

Why? During the Arab spring it was often the case that Government shut down internet to prevent rioters from exposing violence against them, and we want to try out tools that would allow them to do so by integrating SMS to Facebook and Twitter.

(3) Raising USD 120,000: additional mobile-based survey at a major Brazilian capital about the quality of local public services representative at the neighborhood level.

Why? The neighborhood is the first contact of each citizen with their city, and democracy cannot work if citizens don't have a voice in what goes on in their neighborhood. In a city like São Paulo, one would need 125,000 interviews to survey citizens with the standard confidence level and margin of error, what is too expensive using traditional data collection methodologies. We can do better with cell phones.

WHAT YOU GET

Your donations at Indiegogo and votes at The Venture will positively impact millions of people worldwide. Moreover, you will help us giving voice to those who feel speechless everyday:

- If you donate above 5 dollars, you will give voice to at least one citizen in the globe, and we will include you in one of our mobile-based surveys to listen to your voice too!

- If you donate above certain amounts, you can also vote for the slum and capital city where you want us to try out these novel solutions!  

- If you help us getting our campaign off the ground, you can get one of our Early Bird Specials and wear the Spreading the Word of Democracy t-shirt!

WHO WE ARE

We all grew up in São Paulo, Brazil, one of the countries where basic opportunities are most unequally distributed. Brazil just completed 30 years of democracy. Even though institutional stability has been achieved, high-quality public services have not. We still lack even the basic tools to actually identify citizens' demands and their assessment of the policies in place. 

MGov was created by us based on the premise that those tools could be made available through an instrument that was already in place. Even in deprived communities, most households have at least one cell phone. Having said that, many of the active lines are still prepaid. We needed to be mobile-based, but we could not rely on smartphone apps if we wanted to reach everyone. So we focused on analog solutions – SMS and automated voice calls – for policy evaluation, monitoring and civic engagement.  To date, our solutions have positively impacted the lives of over 1,600,000 Brazilians by providing vital inputs to the design of higher-quality policies and social impact initiatives. Our projects encompass education, health, financial solutions for the poor, urban mobility and participatory budgeting – a project that we are working on with the city of Boston.

We live in the terabyte era: we choose everything, all the time. However, when it comes to representation, we are still living in the bit-democracy; every four years, we are invited to provide a binary contribution: do you want that guy, or that other guy? Our dream is that the solutions we provide might be at least part of what is needed to break that vicious cycle and take our democracy to the terabyte era.

Please help us spreading the word of democracy, giving people a new voice.

Thank you!

Marcos, Rafael and Guilherme (Please click here to access our full Bio).

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you cannot donate, you can still help us in three ways:

- Vote for MGov in The Venture!

- Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

- Use Indiegogo share tools!


Português 

 A MGov está orgulhosamente representando o Brasil no The Venture, uma competição de startups de impacto social envolvendo 16 países diferentes. Agora precisamos do seu apoio.

Imagine se você não tivesse voz em decisões que são críticas para a sua vida, como que escola frequentar ou mandar os seus filhos, em que hospital buscar atendimento quando preciso, ou que transporte usar para chegar ao trabalho todos os dias. Imagine se, do dia para a noite, você perdesse sua voz. Como você se sentiria?

Milhões de pessoas no mundo todo se sentem desse jeito. Isso porque, para essas pessoas, os serviços públicos são o único recurso disponível para educação, saúde e transporte, mas as suas demandas por esses serviços e a sua avaliação da qualidade dos serviços oferecidos nunca é levada em conta pelos seus representantes. A razão é que os representantes não possuem as ferramentas para fazer isso na frequência adequada e de maneira custo-efetiva. A consequência é uma representação falha, a isso não afeta apenas a vida diária desses milhões de cidadão; isso também afeta a qualidade da democracia no mundo todo.

O QUE FAZEMOS

Para quebrar esse ciclo vicioso, a MGov tem usado tecnologia ‘antiga’ para dar uma nova voz às pessoas. Tirando proveito do uso global do telefone celular, nós usamos tecnologia analógica — mensagens de texto (SMS) e chamadas automáticas de voz — para implementar um canal de comunicação de duas vias com os respondentes, coletando dados e enviando informação para avaliação de políticas píublicas, monitoramento e mobilização. Apesar de o telefone celular estar em todo lugar, a internet e os planos de dados não estão: no mundo em desenvolvimento, a grande maioria das linhas ativas ainda é pré-paga (76,5% no Brasil). Por essa razão, não é possível utilizar apps de smartphones quando se trata de políticas públicas e impacto social.

Nós permitimos que as poessoas expressem suas demandas e avaliações dos serviços públicos diretamente, sem intermediários, oferecendo soluções de baixo custo para avaliar de forma rigorosa o impacto e a efetividade de políticas alternativas, e para monitorar iniciativas piloto com agilidade. Isso permite ajustar a sintonia fina das políticas — para que possam representar com precisão as necessidades daqueles a quem elas se destinam —, bem como iniciativas de mobilização e empoderamento em larga escala.

AGORA, PRECISAMOS DA SUA AJUDA!

Com os recursos necessários, queremos escalar nossas operações para ter um impacto ainda maior. Para isso, precisamos aumentar o nosso time para que possamos desenvolver mais produtos e serviços. Isso significa que precisamos seguir investindo na nossa plataforma, não apenas para aumentar a qualidade dos serviços que oferecemos no Brasil, mas também para que possamos oferecer esses serviços em qualquer lugar do mundo. Mais importante, queremos continuar experimentando, de modo a oferer soluções para contextos cada vez mais desafiadores enquanto mantemos nossas soluções custo-efetivas.

Com essa campanha, queremos custear 3 iniciativas inovadoras, divididas em 3 metas:

(1) Arrecadando USD 15,000: vamos desenvolver uma metodologia mobile para pesquisar a qualidade dos serviços públicos em um favela brasileira, identificando as prioridades para políticas públicas.

Por que? A única pesquisa representativa para favelas no Brasil, o censo oficial, pergunta apenas sobre cobertura de serviços básicos, não sobre a qualidade desses serviços. E essa informação é chave para avançar na questão da representação.

(2) Arrecadando USD 60,000: + vamos desenvolver uma ferramenta adicional para permitir a participantes de protestos e manifestações expressar suas visões nas mídias sociais mesmo na ausência de internet.

Por que? Durante a Primavera Árabe, em diversos casos o governo derrubou a internet para impedir que os manifestantes expusessem a violência contra eles.  Queremos pilotar ferramentas que permitiriam que a população possa fazer isso integrando SMS ao Facebook e Twitter.

(3) Arrecadando USD 120,000: + vamos desenvolver uma ferramenta mobile adicional para pesquisas a qualidade dos serviços públicos locais em uma grande capital brasileira, representativa ao nível do bairro.

Por que? O bairro é o primeiro contato de cada cidadão com a sua cidade, e a democracia não pode fiuncionar se os cidadãos não tem voz sobre o que acontece na sua vizinhança. Em uma cidade como São Paulo, seriam necessárias 125 mil entrevistas para entrevistar os cidadãos com os níveis usuais de confiança e margem erro, o que é caro demais utilizando as metodologias tradicionais de coleta de dados. Nós podemos fazer melhor com o telefone celular!

O QUE VOCÊ GANHA

Suas doações na Indiegogo e seus votos no The Venture vão impactar positivamente milhões de pessoas no mundo todo. Além disso, você vai nos ajudar a dar voz àqueles que se sentem sem voz todos os dias:

– Se você doar 5 dólares, você dará voz a pelo menos um cidadão no mundo, e nós vamos incluir você em uma das nossas pesquisas mobile para escutar a sua voz também!

– Se você doar acima de certos valores, você também poderá votar para a favela e a capital brasileira em que você gostaria que nós pilotássemos essas soluções inovadoras!

– Se você nos ajudar nesse início de campanha, você pode ganhar uma das nossas recompensas especiais e usar a camiseta Spreading the Word of Democracy!


QUEM SOMOS NÓS

Todos nós crescemos em São Paulo, no Brasil, um dos países com as oportunidades básicas mais desigualmente distribuídas. O Brasil recém completou 30 anos de democracia. Se alcançamos estabilidade institucional, o mesmo não é verdade no que diz respeito a serviços públicos de qualidade. Ainda faltam para nós as ferramentas básicas para identificar as demandas dos cidadãos e a sua avaliação das políticas oferecidas.

Criamos a MGov baseados na premissa de que essas ferramentas poderiam ser disponibilizadas através de um instrumento que já existia. Mesmo em comunidades vulneráveis, a maioria dos domicílios tem ao menos um telefone celular. No entanto, a maioria das linhas ativas ainda é pré-paga. Nós precisávamos ser baseados em mobile, mas não fazia sentido pensar em um app para smartphone quando era preciso alcançar todo mundo. Por essa razão escolhemos uma solução analógica – SMS e chamadas automáticas de voz – para avaliação de poíticas, monitoramento e mobilização. Até hoje, nossas soluções impactarm positivamente a vidade de mais de 1.600.000 brasileiros, oferecendo elementos fundamentais para o desenho de políticas públicas e ações de impacto social de melhor qualidade. Nossos projetos englobam educação, saúde, soluções financeiras para a base da pirâmide, mobilidade urbana e orçamento participativo.

Nós vivemos na era do terabyte: escolhemos tudo, o tempo todo. Mas quando se trata de representação, ainda vivemos na democracia do bit; a cada quatro anos, somos convidados a contribuir com uma decisão binária: você quer esse cara, ou aquele outro? O nosso sonho é que as soluções que nós oferecemos possam ser ao menos parte do que é necessário para quebrar esse ciclo vicioso e tirar a levar a nossa democracia também à era do terabyte.

Por favor, nos ajude a espalhar a voz da democracia, dando uma nova voz às pessoas!


Obrigado!

Marcos, Rafael e Guilherme (Clique aqui para ver nossa trajetória)

OUTRAS MANEIRAS DE AJUDAR

Se você não puder doar, ainda tem três maneiras de nos ajudar:

– Vote na MGov no The Venture!

– Compartilhe e faça barulho sobre a nossa campanha!

– Use as ferramentas de compartilhamento da Indiegogo!
