tools to do that in a timely and cost-effective manner. The consequence is a
failure of representation, and this not only affects the daily lives of those
millions of citizens; it also affects the quality of democracy
worldwide. 
WHAT WE DO
To break that vicious cycle, MGov has been using 'old' technology
to give a new voice to people. Taking advantage of the worldwide usage of
mobile phones, we use analog technology — text messaging (SMS) and voice calls
— to implement a two-way communication channel with respondents, gathering data
and sending out information for public policy evaluation, monitoring and civic
engagement. Even though cell phones are everywhere, internet and data plans are
not: in the developing world, the lion's share of active lines are prepaid.
This is why one cannot rely on smartphone apps when it comes to public policy
and social impact.
We allow people to express their demands for and assessment of public
services directly, without intermediaries. We provide a low-cost way to
rigorously evaluate the impact and effectiveness of alternative policies and
for monitoring pilot initiatives with agility. This allows for the fine-tuning of
policies – in order to closely match the needs of those who they benefit –, and for large-scale
civic engagement and empowerment initiatives. NOW, WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!
With the right funding, we believe that we can scale up our operations,
allowing us to have a bigger impact. To achieve this, we want to build up our
team so that we can further develop our products and services. This means we
must keep investing in our platform, not only to raise the quality of the
services we provide in Brazil, but so that we can also provide those services
worldwide. Most importantly, we want to keep experimenting, in order to cater
to progressively more challenging settings while keeping our solutions
cost-effective.
With this campaign we want to fund 3 innovative initiatives which
haven't been tried out before, divided into 3 goals:
(1) Raising USD 15,000:
we can provide a mobile-based survey at a Brazilian slum (favela) about
the quality of local public services, identifying the priorities for policy
action.
Why? The only slum-level representative survey we have in
Brazil, the official census, asks only about coverage of basic services, not
about their quality. And that information is key to improve representation;
(2) Raising USD 60,000:
additional mobile tool to allow participants in demonstrations or riots to
disseminate their views on social media even on the absence of internet.
Why? During the Arab spring it was often the case that
Government shut down internet to prevent rioters from exposing violence against
them, and we want to try out tools that would allow them to do so by integrating
SMS to Facebook and Twitter.
(3) Raising USD 120,000:
additional mobile-based survey at a major Brazilian capital about the quality
of local public services representative at the neighborhood level.
Why? The neighborhood is the first contact of each citizen
with their city, and democracy cannot work if citizens don't have a voice in
what goes on in their neighborhood. In a city like São Paulo, one would need
125,000 interviews to survey citizens with the standard confidence level and
margin of error, what is too expensive using traditional data collection methodologies.
We can do better with cell phones.WHAT YOU GET

Your donations at Indiegogo and
votes at The Venture will positively impact millions of people worldwide.
Moreover, you will help us giving voice to those who feel speechless
everyday:
- If you donate above
5 dollars, you will give voice to at least one citizen in the
globe, and we will include you in one of our mobile-based surveys to listen to
your voice too!
- If you donate above certain amounts,
you can also vote for the slum and capital city where you want us
to try out these novel solutions!  - If you help us getting our campaign off the ground, you can get one of our Early Bird Specials and wear the Spreading the Word of Democracy t-shirt!WHO WE ARE
We all grew up in São Paulo, Brazil, one of the countries where basic
opportunities are most unequally distributed. Brazil just completed 30 years of
democracy. Even though institutional stability has been achieved, high-quality
public services have not. We still lack even the basic tools to actually identify
citizens' demands and their assessment of the policies in place. 
MGov was created by us based on the premise that those tools could be
made available through an instrument that was already in place. Even in deprived communities, most households have at least one cell phone. Having said that, many
of the active lines are still prepaid. We needed to be mobile-based, but we
could not rely on smartphone apps if we wanted to reach everyone. So we focused
on analog solutions – SMS and automated voice calls – for policy evaluation,
monitoring and civic engagement.  To date, our solutions have positively impacted the lives of over 1,600,000 Brazilians by providing vital inputs to the design of higher-quality policies and social impact initiatives. Our projects encompass education, health, financial solutions for the poor, urban mobility and participatory budgeting – a project that we are working on with the city of Boston.
We live in the terabyte era: we choose everything, all the time.
However, when it comes to representation, we are still living in the
bit-democracy; every four years, we are invited to provide a binary
contribution: do you want that guy, or that other guy? Our dream is that the
solutions we provide might be at least part of what is needed to break that
vicious cycle and take our democracy to the terabyte era.
Please help us spreading the word of democracy,
giving people a new voice.Thank you!Marcos, Rafael and Guilherme (Please click here to access our full Bio).

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPIf you cannot donate, you can still help us in three ways:
- Vote for MGov in The Venture!
- Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
- Use Indiegogo share tools!
Português  A MGov está orgulhosamente representando o Brasil no The Venture, uma competição de startups de impacto social envolvendo 16 países diferentes. Agora precisamos do seu apoio.
Imagine se você não tivesse voz em decisões que são críticas para a sua vida, como que escola frequentar ou mandar os seus filhos, em que hospital buscar atendimento quando preciso, ou que transporte usar para chegar ao trabalho todos os dias. Imagine se, do dia para a noite, você perdesse sua voz. Como você se sentiria?
Milhões de pessoas no mundo todo se sentem desse jeito. Isso porque, para essas pessoas, os serviços públicos são o único recurso disponível para educação, saúde e transporte, mas as suas demandas por esses serviços e a sua avaliação da qualidade dos serviços oferecidos nunca é levada em conta pelos seus representantes. A razão é que os representantes não possuem as ferramentas para fazer isso na frequência adequada e de maneira custo-efetiva. A consequência é uma representação falha, a isso não afeta apenas a vida diária desses milhões de cidadão; isso também afeta a qualidade da democracia no mundo todo.
O QUE FAZEMOS
Para quebrar esse ciclo vicioso, a MGov tem usado tecnologia ‘antiga’ para dar uma nova voz às pessoas. Tirando proveito do uso global do telefone celular, nós usamos tecnologia analógica — mensagens de texto (SMS) e chamadas automáticas de voz — para implementar um canal de comunicação de duas vias com os respondentes, coletando dados e enviando informação para avaliação de políticas píublicas, monitoramento e mobilização. Apesar de o telefone celular estar em todo lugar, a internet e os planos de dados não estão: no mundo em desenvolvimento, a grande maioria das linhas ativas ainda é pré-paga (76,5% no Brasil). Por essa razão, não é possível utilizar apps de smartphones quando se trata de políticas públicas e impacto social.
Nós permitimos que as poessoas expressem suas demandas e avaliações dos serviços públicos diretamente, sem intermediários, oferecendo soluções de baixo custo para avaliar de forma rigorosa o impacto e a efetividade de políticas alternativas, e para monitorar iniciativas piloto com agilidade. Isso permite ajustar a sintonia fina das políticas — para que possam representar com precisão as necessidades daqueles a quem elas se destinam —, bem como iniciativas de mobilização e empoderamento em larga escala.
AGORA, PRECISAMOS DA SUA AJUDA!
Com os recursos necessários, queremos escalar nossas operações para ter um impacto ainda maior. Para isso, precisamos aumentar o nosso time para que possamos desenvolver mais produtos e serviços. Isso significa que precisamos seguir investindo na nossa plataforma, não apenas para aumentar a qualidade dos serviços que oferecemos no Brasil, mas também para que possamos oferecer esses serviços em qualquer lugar do mundo. Mais importante, queremos continuar experimentando, de modo a oferer soluções para contextos cada vez mais desafiadores enquanto mantemos nossas soluções custo-efetivas.
Com essa campanha, queremos custear 3 iniciativas inovadoras, divididas em 3 metas:
(1) Arrecadando USD 15,000: vamos desenvolver uma metodologia mobile para pesquisar a qualidade dos serviços públicos em um favela brasileira, identificando as prioridades para políticas públicas.
Por que? A única pesquisa representativa para favelas no Brasil, o censo oficial, pergunta apenas sobre cobertura de serviços básicos, não sobre a qualidade desses serviços. E essa informação é chave para avançar na questão da representação.
(2) Arrecadando USD 60,000: + vamos desenvolver uma ferramenta adicional para permitir a participantes de protestos e manifestações expressar suas visões nas mídias sociais mesmo na ausência de internet.
Por que? Durante a Primavera Árabe, em diversos casos o governo derrubou a internet para impedir que os manifestantes expusessem a violência contra eles.  Queremos pilotar ferramentas que permitiriam que a população possa fazer isso integrando SMS ao Facebook e Twitter.
(3) Arrecadando USD 120,000: + vamos desenvolver uma ferramenta mobile adicional para pesquisas a qualidade dos serviços públicos locais em uma grande capital brasileira, representativa ao nível do bairro.
Por que? O bairro é o primeiro contato de cada cidadão com a sua cidade, e a democracia não pode fiuncionar se os cidadãos não tem voz sobre o que acontece na sua vizinhança. Em uma cidade como São Paulo, seriam necessárias 125 mil entrevistas para entrevistar os cidadãos com os níveis usuais de confiança e margem erro, o que é caro demais utilizando as metodologias tradicionais de coleta de dados. Nós podemos fazer melhor com o telefone celular!



O QUE VOCÊ GANHA
Suas doações na Indiegogo e seus votos no The Venture vão impactar positivamente milhões de pessoas no mundo todo. Além disso, você vai nos ajudar a dar voz àqueles que se sentem sem voz todos os dias:
– Se você doar 5 dólares, você dará voz a pelo menos um cidadão no mundo, e nós vamos incluir você em uma das nossas pesquisas mobile para escutar a sua voz também!
– Se você doar acima de certos valores, você também poderá votar para a favela e a capital brasileira em que você gostaria que nós pilotássemos essas soluções inovadoras!
– Se você nos ajudar nesse início de campanha, você pode ganhar uma das nossas recompensas especiais e usar a camiseta Spreading the Word of Democracy!

QUEM SOMOS NÓS
Todos nós crescemos em São Paulo, no Brasil, um dos países com as oportunidades básicas mais desigualmente distribuídas. O Brasil recém completou 30 anos de democracia. Se alcançamos estabilidade institucional, o mesmo não é verdade no que diz respeito a serviços públicos de qualidade. Ainda faltam para nós as ferramentas básicas para identificar as demandas dos cidadãos e a sua avaliação das políticas oferecidas.
Criamos a MGov baseados na premissa de que essas ferramentas poderiam ser disponibilizadas através de um instrumento que já existia. Mesmo em comunidades vulneráveis, a maioria dos domicílios tem ao menos um telefone celular. No entanto, a maioria das linhas ativas ainda é pré-paga. Nós precisávamos ser baseados em mobile, mas não fazia sentido pensar em um app para smartphone quando era preciso alcançar todo mundo. Por essa razão escolhemos uma solução analógica – SMS e chamadas automáticas de voz – para avaliação de poíticas, monitoramento e mobilização. Até hoje, nossas soluções impactarm positivamente a vidade de mais de 1.600.000 brasileiros, oferecendo elementos fundamentais para o desenho de políticas públicas e ações de impacto social de melhor qualidade. Nossos projetos englobam educação, saúde, soluções financeiras para a base da pirâmide, mobilidade urbana e orçamento participativo.
Nós vivemos na era do terabyte: escolhemos tudo, o tempo todo. Mas quando se trata de representação, ainda vivemos na democracia do bit; a cada quatro anos, somos convidados a contribuir com uma decisão binária: você quer esse cara, ou aquele outro? O nosso sonho é que as soluções que nós oferecemos possam ser ao menos parte do que é necessário para quebrar esse ciclo vicioso e tirar a levar a nossa democracia também à era do terabyte.
Por favor, nos ajude a espalhar a voz da democracia, dando uma nova voz às pessoas!

Obrigado!
Marcos, Rafael e Guilherme (Clique aqui para ver nossa trajetória)
OUTRAS MANEIRAS DE AJUDAR
Se você não puder doar, ainda tem três maneiras de nos ajudar:
– Vote na MGov no The Venture!
– Compartilhe e faça barulho sobre a nossa campanha!
– Use as ferramentas de compartilhamento da Indiegogo!

story:
SAY HELLO TO THE FLUX!

The Flux is the World’s Fastest Charging External Battery with 

100% charge in just 15 minutes.

 

Simply connect the Flux onto the Flux Power Dock and:

- In just 15 minutes, it is fully charged to 2,600mAh.

- In just 9 minutes there is enough power in the Flux 
to charge and iPhone 5s to 100%.

- If you are in a rush a quick 4 minute charge will give you enough power for half an iPhone 5s charge! 

AMAZING!

 

 

Inspired by electric vehicle supercharging technology, the Flux prides itself on its ability to keep you on-the-go throughout the day by creating a portable power outlet in your pocket, without having to compromise!

 

Imagine you are in a rush and you are running out of phone battery… Are you able to wait for 3 or 4 hours until your battery is fully charged?

Is it worth the risk spending all day without even being able to use your smartphone? Missing out on important calls, notifications or work emails?

What if there were a product which knows you are in a rush and how many problems you have to think about every day?

A product which, even if you forget to recharge it or you just don’t have long time, could be fully charged in the time it takes to have a shower?

It would be awesome, right?

This product already exists and its name is the  Flux.

 

 

 

IS THIS YOU?

 

 

Finding and waiting for a small amount charge at a wall outlet is a constant struggle, whether in an office, pub, airport, café or even at home.

 

 

We identified and understood the necessity to create a product that differentiates because it innovates. 

When you are waiting on an important email, phone call, or SMS message, or using your phone for navigation, you do not wish to go without your device being at hand through fear of missing out (charging via a mains outlet, for example): the Flux is built with this in consideration.

Time is Priceless. How Much is Yours Worth?

 

 

 

AS FEATURED IN:

 

“External chargers are handy, but remembering to charge them up can be a pain. Indie project Flux seeks to solve that by making a battery that can charge in just 15 minutes”

- Andrew Williams, TechRadar

                                   

“You can easily take it along with you on your daily travels since it’s light and portable and fits in your pocket. Just whip it out whenever you need to charge your phone and you’re good to go! And thanks to its durable construction, it can take a beating when tossed into your bag or in your desk at work.”

- Kristie Bertucci, Gadget Review

 

 

HOW TO USE IT

 

 

 

 

THE FLUX

 

 

The Flux does not rely on gimmicks or unfounded claims, charging to full capacity in just 15 minutes effectively replacing mains-charging, meaning that you never miss a thing.

At only 95g (3.35oz), the stylish cylindrical design ensures maximum durability and reliability for users, whilst its weight and footprint are small enough to carry in your hand, purse, or pocket.

Moreover, in comparison to conventional Lithium-Polymer, the life-expectancy for the Flux is three times longer! With conventional use (charged once per day), the Flux will take at least 1,500 days before charge degradation sets in; this is in comparison to the 500 - 800 days average of most mobile phones on the market today.

 

FEATURES

 

The Flux can be used to charge over 90% of current handset models available today; also, effectively, extending the life of older models who's batteries now fail to last an entire day, this is achieved through the USB port of the top of the Flux.

 

 

 

 

 

15 minute charge-time for 2,600mAh:

Providing a power supply for supported devices throughout the day.

True freedom of movement: 

Liberating you from time-consuming, tethered charging.

Universal connection: 

Supplied with both Micro USB and  Apple Lightning cables for peace-of-mind.

Long life-span with over 1,500 charge cycles: 

Lasting up to three-times longer than commonly used Li-Po rechargeable batteries.

Environmentally Friendly: 

Utilising components & elemental compounds which are environmentally conscious, the Flux is more recyclable than conventional cells.

Safety Concious: 

The combination of novel battery chemistry, high quality components & extensive rigorous testing, guarantees safety and product longevity.

The Flux excels in both style and substance: designed to be light, stylish, ultra-portable, & highly durable. A brilliantly dependable source of power, you can always rely on the Flux to keep you on-the-go: charging in just 15 minutes via the Power Dock.

 

 

UNIVERSAL CONNECTIVITY.

The  Flux is not limited to charging just mobile phones; with the USB port on the  Flux you are able to use the Flux to charge an abundance of items, including: wireless headsets, e-readers, wireless video game controllers, tablets (not necessarily to a full charge), electronic cigarettes, MP3 players, smartwatches, fitbands and Google Glass! 

You are also able to charge a majority of Apple iPads and iPods. With such a universal integration with existing mobile technologies and devices, the Flux is effective at mimicking a mains power outlet, despite its humble origins as an external power source.

 

OUR TECHNOLOGY.

 

 

With Lithium Polymer cells the compromise that phone manufacturers have accepted is that in order to get the maximum energy in the smallest weight and size in a cell they have to compromise with cycle life (charge and discharge), charge time and decreasing safety tolerances (temperature range, voltage tolerance). 

Our Business was founded to develop a product line utilising the opposite end of the battery power/energy spectrum, focusing on fast charging characteristics of Lithium-ion developed for supercharging electric vehicles rather than energy density; the result is a cell that lasts 3x longer than normal lithium-ion cells and allowing the ability to rapid charge to 100% in under 15 minutes; bringing the ultimate convenience to the user.

The design focus has been around the charger technology and how to transfer that power safely and conveniently whilst keeping the size down to a minimum. This is where we have focused its engineering efforts to date.

 

 

 

HAVE WE DEVELOPED A NEW BATTERY?

Bringing a new battery chemistry to market in full production is one of the single most expensive things a business can do in industry, this is only beaten by the production of super capacitors. There is a significant technological leap between test in a lab and full scale production and on average takes 10 years to bring a new chemistry to market.

What our business has accomplished is to utilise new and advanced battery chemistry tested for supercharging electric vehicles and miniaturised the technology into a much smaller footprint, to allow a safe and compact transfer of high current power to the Flux, this is the key to our intellectual property.

 

 

 

DEVELOPMENT SO FAR.

We have also been redesigning the charging dock to be as slim as possible with a 30% lower profile and slightly smaller diameter. 

As things get smaller they become significantly harder to design without introducing significant bi products (such as Radio Frequency noise). 

 

Most of the work undertaken has been in the board layout and reduction in size to fit the new slimmer dock design shown in the campaign, some internal changes have also happened with the planned removal of the fan to keep moving parts in the design to zero, this has been extremely difficult due to the amount of heat the charger generates and we are very pleased that we have achieved it :-)

 

The picture below doesn’t show too much but we have been working hard, we promise! Shrinking each component and reducing the height is challenging as limitations on current technology and price have to be taken into account.

 

 

 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP.

 

We have spent months designing, testing & reformulating the Flux and its prototypes or order to deliver the most innovative, durable external power source whilst maintaining a reasonable price-point. 

As a result of our R&D, the Flux and its Power Dock are now ready for final testing, certification & full production, and we are in need of support from tech-savvy early adopters, who wish to remain at the bleeding-edge of convenience technology.

 

 

Indiegogo is essentially a direct retail channel which allows direct communication to consumers, giving them a more detailed and personal view of a company’s progress from inception, design, development, and manufacture.

 

SPECIFICATIONS.

Dimensions: 

90mm x 30mm x 30mm (3.54″ x 1.18″ x 1.18″)

Weight: 

95 grams (3.35oz)

External Battery Input via Charge Dock: 

5v @10A

External Battery Output: 

5V / 1A (via micro USB or Apple Lightning connector

Status Indicator: 

Four individual LEDs, each signifying 25% of a full charge of 2,600mAh

Superior Smart-Safety Technology: 

Protection circuitry providing safety to the end-user,
despite our high current outputs

Innovative Cell Technology: 

2,600 mAh high power, low resistance, automotive grade cells

Built-To-Last: 

Durable, rugged casing; resilient input ports; automotive grade components

Certifications: 

CE, RoHS, FCC, WEEE

 

 

LIST OF PERKS.

 

 

 

STRETCH GOALS.

We have successfully surpassed our initial target of $30,000 because of your support!

Check out our stretch goals and spread the word to social media to unlock more.

 

 

 

 

MEET THE TEAM

Management

Leigh - CEO

 

Marketing Team

Michele - Online Content Executive - Michele focuses his talents on the content for the website, blog and social media.

Matthew - Media and Communications Associate - Coming from a production background, Matthew brings this experience in the media industry to the marketing team.

Avanti -  Media and PR Associate - Specializing in social media and client communications.

 

Research & Development Team

 

Opus- Lead Electrical Engineer - Opus designed the latest prototypes for the  Power Dock.

 

Mina -  Lead Battery Specialist - Mina's expertise in battery structures and chemistry make her imperative .

 

Omar - Electrical and Electronics Engineer - A specialist in power electronics, Omar brings a considerable wealth of experience.

Rifat - Electrical and Electronics Engineer -  Specialist in Computer Aided Design (CAD) and circuitry implementation.

 

 
 

 

IN THE KNOW.

We like to remain as visible, yet transparent as possible with potential, and existing, customer. So, if you have any questions or enquiries, please contact us via email.

Alternatively, please support/contact us via one of our social media channels.

Any form of contact will be responded to as soon as possible.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES.

 

There are always possible bumps in the road with any new product development. Maintaining the integrity of the design and high standards of quality in the materials and craftsmanship is important to us, as is being open to our backers about the schedule so our customers get their Flux as soon as possible.  

 

We've worked hard to minimize risks by first designing, creating, testing, using and improving several working prototypes in-house so that any design flaws, however minor, could be identified and solved well ahead of time.

Next we've carefully selected and vetted our overseas manufacturing resources to ensure reliability, quality and scheduling is monitored and maintained throughout the process. Instead of having one factory make our product, we will source to factories that excel for each unique part and then bring everything together to assembly.  

Finally, before the first unit ships, we'll personally perform final quality inspections so every Flux meets our high standards of quality and performance. 

All that said, there's always the possibility for unforeseen delays due to circumstances beyond our control. Inclement weather can affect shipping times. Ports can become backed up with surplus cargo. 

But no matter what, we promise to keep you informed with frequent updates on the progress of our project. So check back often to see how everything is going, and thank you again for all your support!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS.

Why was 15 minutes chosen as the time to charge to 100%?

15 minutes was chosen  as it provides a blend of the fastest charging battery, the smallest formfactor and the best price for you as the consumer. The problem with faster charging systems is the dramatic increase in required power and associated cost. 

At 15 minutes we utilise a 10 amp charge current, however a 1 minute charge requires a 120 amp charge! The same as an industrial welder!

 

What would happen to your business model if a revolutionary battery emerged tomorrow?

If a new battery chemistry made it into full production tomorrow, the current industry estimate is that the next jump in battery technology will not reach consumers for another 3 years and this is only to double the current energy densities. Even if this new technology invalidated our technology (which is highly unlikely) there will still be more existing phones in operation than there are people on the planet, creating a sizable market. 

 

 

Can I use my Flux on older model phones?

Yes. The Flux can be used to charge over 90% of current handset models available today; also, effectively, extending the life of older models who's batteries now fail to last an entire day, this is achieved through the USB port of the top of the Flux.

 

How can I support the campaign?

Your mere support is appreciated, whilst also demonstrating that our endeavour is worthwhile. However, should you wish to pledge financial backing to our cause, please return to the top of the page where you can gain more information about our packages. If you cannot pledge financial backing but wish to help our campaign by helping us through word-of-mouth, please do so by sharing us to acquaintances, friends & family members who may find our products useful and may wish to pledge support.

Also, please like/follow us on our various social media accounts.

When will I receive the product ?

With a successful launch on Indiegogo, the estimated delivery date to backers is 2016.

How will I keep up-to-date with the Flux?

In order to keep up to date, follow us on Twitter, like us on Facebook, and register for the mailing-list on our website

Are there any special packages?

Yes, in order to be inclusive of every potential customer, we will be supplying packages to solo individuals, couples, and families, whilst also making corporate packages available.

How much would shipping cost?

Shipping will vary in cost depending on the perk you select and this has to be added on as an "Additional Gift", before you donate. Shipping is already calculated and is highlighted in the perk details. If you've forgotten, don’t panic, as the shipping can be paid later.

Would this damage my phone over long term use?

Not at all. Your phone will behave as though you are connected to a mains power outlet via a conventional charger, and will not affect your existing warranty. 

Will the battery survive drops, falls and scuffs?

Combining high impact-tolerant plastics, resilient structural design and safer battery cell chemistry, means that the Flux is incredibly resilient to a mobile lifestyle.

Can I use my Flux on older model phones?

Yes. The Flux can be used to charge over 90% of current handset models available today; also, effectively, extending the life of older models who's batteries now fail to last an entire day.

How do I ensure that the battery charges within fifteen minutes?

 In order to bring the best out of your new Flux battery, you will need to purchase the Power Dock; which, then, ensures your Flux will take no longer than 15 minutes to charge.

Should you only take ownership of the Flux, it will take two hours to gain a full charge via a mains outlet - still quicker than our direct competitors.

Can I use my Flux to charge my tablet?

Yes. The Flux is universally inclusive of any technology which uses a USB, or Apple Lightning, connector in order to recharge.

However, depending on the model of your tablet, you may be required to charge your Flux twice; alternatively, purchasing two Flux and a Power Dock will usually ensure that your tablet is able to charge to 100%.

Am I able to charge my other devices?

Yes. The Flux is able to charge other devices with the included Micro USB/Apple Lightning cable. Our micro-USB and Apple Lightning connection enables you to charge e-readers, Bluetooth headsets,portable radios,digital cameras and game controllers.

If I do not purchase a Power Dock, can I still get a fast charge?

The Flux can be charged via a mains outlet, or USB port (computer, games console, etcetera.); however, a full charge will take an average of two hours - depending on source. 

To get the best from your Flux, we advise you purchase the Power Dock as it enables you true mobility and freedom from anchored charging: meticulously designed battery chemistry, high quality components, & superior electrical engineering for the dock, are required in order to handle such high Amp loads safely.
story_txt:
SAY HELLO TO THE FLUX!

The Flux is the World’s Fastest Charging External Battery with 
100% charge in just 15 minutes.
 Simply connect the Flux onto the Flux Power Dock and:
- In just 15 minutes, it is fully charged to 2,600mAh.
- In just 9 minutes there is enough power in the Flux to charge and iPhone 5s to 100%.
- If you are in a rush a quick 4 minute charge will give you enough power for half an iPhone 5s charge! 
AMAZING!
 
 Inspired by electric vehicle supercharging technology, the Flux prides itself on its ability to keep you on-the-go throughout the day by creating a portable power outlet in your pocket, without having to compromise!
 

Imagine you are in a rush and you are running out of phone battery… Are you able to wait for 3 or 4 hours until your battery is fully charged?
Is it worth the risk spending all day without even being able to use your smartphone? Missing out on important calls, notifications or work emails?
What if there were a product which knows you are in a rush and how many problems you have to think about every day?
A product which, even if you forget to recharge it or you just don’t have long time, could be fully charged in the time it takes to have a shower?
It would be awesome, right?
This product already exists and its name is the  Flux.
 

 


 
IS THIS YOU?
 
 
Finding and waiting for a small amount charge at a wall outlet is a constant struggle, whether in an office, pub, airport, café or even at home.
 
 

We identified and understood the necessity to create a product that differentiates because it innovates. 
When you are waiting on an important email, phone call, or SMS message, or using your phone for navigation, you do not wish to go without your device being at hand through fear of missing out (charging via a mains outlet, for example): the Flux is built with this in consideration.
Time is Priceless. How Much is Yours Worth?  
 

AS FEATURED IN:
 



“External chargers are handy, but remembering to charge them up can be a pain. Indie project Flux seeks to solve that by making a battery that can charge in just 15 minutes”
- Andrew Williams, TechRadar
                                   
“You can easily take it along with you on your daily travels since it’s light and portable and fits in your pocket. Just whip it out whenever you need to charge your phone and you’re good to go! And thanks to its durable construction, it can take a beating when tossed into your bag or in your desk at work.”
- Kristie Bertucci, Gadget Review
 

 
HOW TO USE IT


 
 

 
 

THE FLUX 


 
The Flux does not rely on gimmicks or unfounded claims, charging to full capacity in just 15 minutes effectively replacing mains-charging, meaning that you never miss a thing.
At only 95g (3.35oz), the stylish cylindrical design ensures maximum durability and reliability for users, whilst its weight and footprint are small enough to carry in your hand, purse, or pocket.
Moreover, in comparison to conventional Lithium-Polymer, the life-expectancy for the Flux is three times longer! With conventional use (charged once per day), the Flux will take at least 1,500 days before charge degradation sets in; this is in comparison to the 500 - 800 days average of most mobile phones on the market today.
 
FEATURES The Flux can be used to charge over 90% of current handset models available today; also, effectively, extending the life of older models who's batteries now fail to last an entire day, this is achieved through the USB port of the top of the Flux.
 
 

 
 

 
15 minute charge-time for 2,600mAh:
Providing a power supply for supported devices throughout the day.
True freedom of movement: 
Liberating you from time-consuming, tethered charging.
Universal connection: 
Supplied with both Micro USB and  Apple Lightning cables for peace-of-mind.
Long life-span with over 1,500 charge cycles: 
Lasting up to three-times longer than commonly used Li-Po rechargeable batteries.
Environmentally Friendly: 
Utilising components & elemental compounds which are environmentally conscious, the Flux is more recyclable than conventional cells.
Safety Concious: 
The combination of novel battery chemistry, high quality components & extensive rigorous testing, guarantees safety and product longevity.
The Flux excels in both style and substance: designed to be light, stylish, ultra-portable, & highly durable. A brilliantly dependable source of power, you can always rely on the Flux to keep you on-the-go: charging in just 15 minutes via the Power Dock.
 

 
UNIVERSAL CONNECTIVITY.

The  Flux is not limited to charging just mobile phones; with the USB port on the  Flux you are able to use the Flux to charge an abundance of items, including: wireless headsets, e-readers, wireless video game controllers, tablets (not necessarily to a full charge), electronic cigarettes, MP3 players, smartwatches, fitbands and Google Glass! 
You are also able to charge a majority of Apple iPads and iPods. With such a universal integration with existing mobile technologies and devices, the Flux is effective at mimicking a mains power outlet, despite its humble origins as an external power source.
 
OUR TECHNOLOGY.
 
 
With Lithium Polymer cells the compromise that phone manufacturers have accepted is that in order to get the maximum energy in the smallest weight and size in a cell they have to compromise with cycle life (charge and discharge), charge time and decreasing safety tolerances (temperature range, voltage tolerance). 
Our Business was founded to develop a product line utilising the opposite end of the battery power/energy spectrum, focusing on fast charging characteristics of Lithium-ion developed for supercharging electric vehicles rather than energy density; the result is a cell that lasts 3x longer than normal lithium-ion cells and allowing the ability to rapid charge to 100% in under 15 minutes; bringing the ultimate convenience to the user.
The design focus has been around the charger technology and how to transfer that power safely and conveniently whilst keeping the size down to a minimum. This is where we have focused its engineering efforts to date.
 
 

 HAVE WE DEVELOPED A NEW BATTERY?
Bringing a new battery chemistry to market in full production is one of the single most expensive things a business can do in industry, this is only beaten by the production of super capacitors. There is a significant technological leap between test in a lab and full scale production and on average takes 10 years to bring a new chemistry to market.
What our business has accomplished is to utilise new and advanced battery chemistry tested for supercharging electric vehicles and miniaturised the technology into a much smaller footprint, to allow a safe and compact transfer of high current power to the Flux, this is the key to our intellectual property.

 
 
 

DEVELOPMENT SO FAR.

We have also been redesigning the charging dock to be as slim as possible with a 30% lower profile and slightly smaller diameter. 
As things get smaller they become significantly harder to design without introducing significant bi products (such as Radio Frequency noise). 


 
Most of the work undertaken has been in the board layout and reduction in size to fit the new slimmer dock design shown in the campaign, some internal changes have also happened with the planned removal of the fan to keep moving parts in the design to zero, this has been extremely difficult due to the amount of heat the charger generates and we are very pleased that we have achieved it :-)
 
The picture below doesn’t show too much but we have been working hard, we promise! Shrinking each component and reducing the height is challenging as limitations on current technology and price have to be taken into account.
 


 
 
 
WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP.
 
We have spent months designing, testing & reformulating the Flux and its prototypes or order to deliver the most innovative, durable external power source whilst maintaining a reasonable price-point. 
As a result of our R&D, the Flux and its Power Dock are now ready for final testing, certification & full production, and we are in need of support from tech-savvy early adopters, who wish to remain at the bleeding-edge of convenience technology.
 
 Indiegogo is essentially a direct retail channel which allows direct communication to consumers, giving them a more detailed and personal view of a company’s progress from inception, design, development, and manufacture.
 
SPECIFICATIONS.
Dimensions: 

90mm x 30mm x 30mm (3.54″ x 1.18″ x 1.18″)
Weight: 
95 grams (3.35oz)
External Battery Input via Charge Dock: 
5v @10A
External Battery Output: 
5V / 1A (via micro USB or Apple Lightning connector
Status Indicator: 
Four individual LEDs, each signifying 25% of a full charge of 2,600mAh
Superior Smart-Safety Technology: 
Protection circuitry providing safety to the end-user,despite our high current outputs
Innovative Cell Technology: 
2,600 mAh high power, low resistance, automotive grade cells
Built-To-Last: 
Durable, rugged casing; resilient input ports; automotive grade components
Certifications: 
CE, RoHS, FCC, WEEE
 
 




LIST OF PERKS.

 

 
 
STRETCH GOALS.

We have successfully surpassed our initial target of $30,000 because of your support!
Check out our stretch goals and spread the word to social media to unlock more.





 
 
 
 

MEET THE TEAM



Management
Leigh - CEO

 
Marketing Team

Michele - Online Content Executive - Michele focuses his talents on the content for the website, blog and social media.


Matthew - Media and Communications Associate - Coming from a production background, Matthew brings this experience in the media industry to the marketing team.

Avanti -  Media and PR Associate - Specializing in social media and client communications.

 
Research & Development Team Opus- Lead Electrical Engineer - Opus designed the latest prototypes for the  Power Dock.
 

Mina -  Lead Battery Specialist - Mina's expertise in battery structures and chemistry make her imperative .
 

Omar - Electrical and Electronics Engineer - A specialist in power electronics, Omar brings a considerable wealth of experience.

Rifat - Electrical and Electronics Engineer -  Specialist in Computer Aided Design (CAD) and circuitry implementation.
 

   
IN THE KNOW.
We like to remain as visible, yet transparent as possible with potential, and existing, customer. So, if you have any questions or enquiries, please contact us via email.
Alternatively, please support/contact us via one of our social media channels.
Any form of contact will be responded to as soon as possible.
 
RISKS & CHALLENGES.

 
There are always possible bumps in the road with any new product development. Maintaining the integrity of the design and high standards of quality in the materials and craftsmanship is important to us, as is being open to our backers about the schedule so our customers get their Flux as soon as possible.  

 We've worked hard to minimize risks by first designing, creating, testing, using and improving several working prototypes in-house so that any design flaws, however minor, could be identified and solved well ahead of time.
Next we've carefully selected and vetted our overseas manufacturing resources to ensure reliability, quality and scheduling is monitored and maintained throughout the process. Instead of having one factory make our product, we will source to factories that excel for each unique part and then bring everything together to assembly.  
Finally, before the first unit ships, we'll personally perform final quality inspections so every Flux meets our high standards of quality and performance. 
All that said, there's always the possibility for unforeseen delays due to circumstances beyond our control. Inclement weather can affect shipping times. Ports can become backed up with surplus cargo. 
But no matter what, we promise to keep you informed with frequent updates on the progress of our project. So check back often to see how everything is going, and thank you again for all your support!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS.

Why was 15 minutes chosen as the time to charge to 100%?

15 minutes was chosen  as it provides a blend of the fastest charging battery, the smallest formfactor and the best price for you as the consumer. The problem with faster charging systems is the dramatic increase in required power and associated cost. 
At 15 minutes we utilise a 10 amp charge current, however a 1 minute charge requires a 120 amp charge! The same as an industrial welder!
 



What would happen to your business model if a revolutionary battery emerged tomorrow?

If a new battery chemistry made it into full production tomorrow, the current industry estimate is that the next jump in battery technology will not reach consumers for another 3 years and this is only to double the current energy densities. Even if this new technology invalidated our technology (which is highly unlikely) there will still be more existing phones in operation than there are people on the planet, creating a sizable market.   
Can I use my Flux on older model phones?
Yes. The Flux can be used to charge over 90% of current handset models available today; also, effectively, extending the life of older models who's batteries now fail to last an entire day, this is achieved through the USB port of the top of the Flux.
 

How can I support the campaign?
Your mere support is appreciated, whilst also demonstrating that our endeavour is worthwhile. However, should you wish to pledge financial backing to our cause, please return to the top of the page where you can gain more information about our packages. If you cannot pledge financial backing but wish to help our campaign by helping us through word-of-mouth, please do so by sharing us to acquaintances, friends & family members who may find our products useful and may wish to pledge support.
Also, please like/follow us on our various social media accounts.
When will I receive the product ?
With a successful launch on Indiegogo, the estimated delivery date to backers is 2016.
How will I keep up-to-date with the Flux?
In order to keep up to date, follow us on Twitter, like us on Facebook, and register for the mailing-list on our website
Are there any special packages?
Yes, in order to be inclusive of every potential customer, we will be supplying packages to solo individuals, couples, and families, whilst also making corporate packages available.
How much would shipping cost?
Shipping will vary in cost depending on the perk you select and this has to be added on as an "Additional Gift", before you donate. Shipping is already calculated and is highlighted in the perk details. If you've forgotten, don’t panic, as the shipping can be paid later.
Would this damage my phone over long term use?
Not at all. Your phone will behave as though you are connected to a mains power outlet via a conventional charger, and will not affect your existing warranty. 
Will the battery survive drops, falls and scuffs?
Combining high impact-tolerant plastics, resilient structural design and safer battery cell chemistry, means that the Flux is incredibly resilient to a mobile lifestyle.
Can I use my Flux on older model phones?
Yes. The Flux can be used to charge over 90% of current handset models available today; also, effectively, extending the life of older models who's batteries now fail to last an entire day.
How do I ensure that the battery charges within fifteen minutes?
 In order to bring the best out of your new Flux battery, you will need to purchase the Power Dock; which, then, ensures your Flux will take no longer than 15 minutes to charge.
Should you only take ownership of the Flux, it will take two hours to gain a full charge via a mains outlet - still quicker than our direct competitors.
Can I use my Flux to charge my tablet?
Yes. The Flux is universally inclusive of any technology which uses a USB, or Apple Lightning, connector in order to recharge.
However, depending on the model of your tablet, you may be required to charge your Flux twice; alternatively, purchasing two Flux and a Power Dock will usually ensure that your tablet is able to charge to 100%.
Am I able to charge my other devices?
Yes. The Flux is able to charge other devices with the included Micro USB/Apple Lightning cable. Our micro-USB and Apple Lightning connection enables you to charge e-readers, Bluetooth headsets,portable radios,digital cameras and game controllers.
If I do not purchase a Power Dock, can I still get a fast charge?
The Flux can be charged via a mains outlet, or USB port (computer, games console, etcetera.); however, a full charge will take an average of two hours - depending on source. 
To get the best from your Flux, we advise you purchase the Power Dock as it enables you true mobility and freedom from anchored charging: meticulously designed battery chemistry, high quality components, & superior electrical engineering for the dock, are required in order to handle such high Amp loads safely.

story:
Why OpusTel?

A smart phone solution for your Smartphone. OpusTel is an App for making phone calls on your Smartphone tap-proof, very cheap and with excellent sound quality. Click here for details. Informationen auf deutsch. Video auf deutsch.


       Encrypted conversation

       Low rates, OpusTel to OpusTel for free

       HD audio quality

       Top phone number to choose from

       Second phone number on your Smartphone

      Swiss solution under Swiss Data Protection Act




What will you get?


Product status: 

The inner circle uses the app for iOS and Android already. It's fully functional but only for a limited number of users. Buy a perk and be one of us. 

By buying a perk you will:

  • help progress human rights and strengthen privacy;
    be able to use the new app before non-perk buyers have the possibility to use OpusTel (perks are first-come, first-serve):
    And soon you will be able to make your phone calls:
  • secure
  • free or low-cost
  • in HD-quality

With OpusTel you will get an additional Swiss phone number, which you may use internationally. Your current mobile number will still work as usual.
You will be able to make calls to any phone number, and will be reachable from any phone number of the local and international phone networks. It is not a closed community.


What kind of perks will you get?

Most of the perks will allow you to make phone calls for a number of months or years free of monthly fees, and will give you credit to make conversations to non-OpusTel phone numbers.


What are the funds used for?

The funds will be used to buy and set up the servers and to automatize the registration and administration, in order to serve a large number of OpusTel users.


    Who is behind it?

    OpusTel is a service of the Swiss company Telephoenix AG. About ten people are working to make the service ready.

    Urs Loeliger, CEO, Partner

    Urs Loeliger has many years' experience in the field of information systems, data communication, and security. He worked for seven years at Hewlett Packard (hp). For 22 years his company Brainstorm AG has provided training for more than 3,000 engineers in the Internet business in Switzerland. For seven years Urs Loeliger has been the CEO of Telephoenix AG.

    "With OpusTel we are offering a tap-proof mobile phone solution with HD audio quality. In a time of mass-surveillance and spying it is necessary to be able to make phone calls securely and with one's privacy protected.”


    Bernhard Bucher, Partner

    Bernhard Bucher has many years' experience in the field of business software. He is the owner of Bucher Informatik AG, an ERP solution provider. Bernhard is the co-owner and partner of Telephoenix AG.

    "With OpusTel we are offering a very user-friendly App to make mobile phone calls -  free from OpusTel to OpusTel; and at a low rate to non-users. You will not have financial obligations: You can stop using OpusTel at any time, simply by not recharging your credit. But we are certain that you will love it!”
