The good news is you are not alone! Just mark the item as 'missing' on the App. This will silently and discreetly put the entire Bringrr community on the lookout for your tagged item. When anyone with a Bringrr gets within range of your lost item, you will get a notification of its location; securely and anonymously. Your location is never shared with anyone else. Maintaining your privacy is very important to us.Wow, That's A Lot Of Distance Covered! Tell Me More.
Bringrr charges any USB device
BringTags can be shared with the people in your life
BringTags last a year and never need to be charged
BringTags have an interchangeable battery
BringTags use Bluetooth LE so your smartphone won't suffer from battery loss
BringTags have a built-in accelerometer
You can log in the Bringrr App from anyone's smartphone to find your misplaced tagged items
The App saves the last GPS location of your tagged items so you can easily find them later
The App updates Bringrr so you get all the latest features
I'm A Developer. Is Bringrr Open Source?Yes, you will be able to integrate Bringrr and BringTags any way you see fit on any app you want to develop. You will be able to sign up as a developer on our website and get access to the Bringrr API. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.How Does Bringrr Work With Google Glass?Seamlessly. With Google Glass, all of Bringrr's features come alive in front of your eyes.If Bringrr notices that you’ve left something behind, Glass will tell you what forgot to bring.Assigning BringTags with Glass is easy. Just specify your item and the tag you want to use, and Glass takes a picture. 
If you misplace something, just ask Glass. You will be taken right to your item.


If a lost item you’ve marked as missing is found by the Bringrr community, Glass will guide you to the item's location.
If You Liked It, Then You Should've Put a BringTag On It!BringTags make the perfect addition to a thoughtful gift that is too valuable or sentimental to lose.What's The Story Behind Bringrr?We'd love to share it with you! It all started with our CEO's uncanny ability to forget his phone everywhere. And when we say everywhere, we mean everywhere; home, office, bar, park bench, you name it. For most of us, our smartphone is a crucial tool that we can't go without. So if you ever leave your phone behind, you're most likely not going to go about your day without it, you will drive back and get it. We wanted to solve this problem. When conceiving the idea of Bringrr, we wondered what kind of devices were already available that could prevent us from turning around mid-trip to get our phones. After searching for a product that could possibly do this, we found only devices that leashed the phone to you, which could result in a lot of false alarms. That’s not the problem we wanted to solve. We wanted a device that could be left in the car and practically forgotten until it was needed. So we thought of things that are always in your car, and the first device that came to mind was a car charger. Light bulbs went off in our heads! It’s stationary, everyone needs one and it’s out of the way. Why should your car charger just charge your phone and do nothing else, is the question we asked ourselves. With that in mind, we got to work. Shortly after, Bringrr was born.Aldo (CEO) looking pensive during one of our brainstorming sessions.We then went a step further and asked ourselves, what about remembering to bring everything else? During our first brainstorming session, the answer almost came instantaneously; bluetooth beacons! The name “BringTags” was conceived even faster. We wanted BringTags to easily attach to things so Bringrr could search for them in addition to our phones. Our team didn’t stop there. We wanted to add other features to the tags that made them usable outside of the car. The problem of forgetting goes hand in hand with misplacing your things. So making BringTags able to find your misplaced or lost items was just the natural evolution of the Bringrr system. Adding a speaker to BringTags so we could find our misplaced items by sound, on top of using the Bringrr App to find items by distance, was our way of creating a complete system. We were very excited to tackle the challenge of making the age-old problem of driving away without your things, a problem of the past. This motivated us to act quickly and begin the design process to make Bringrr and BringTags a reality. After months of planning and engineering, we had the first prototypes.Testing the original Bringrr prototype.Check out our Slideshare.How Was Bringrr Engineered?Very carefully. The basic engineering concept behind Bringrr is simple.Bringrr block diagram.We currently have a fully functioning prototype of Bringrr that works as shown. This was completely developed by our team from scratch, without using any off-the-shelf products. For the BringTags, we used the TI SensorTag development platform as a base to create the prototype. Since then, we have designed our own circuitry and developed the firmware, so BringTags communicate with Bringrr. The prototypes currently work with our early stage app. We have a functioning version of the Bringrr App for iOS that allows us to test our prototypes and make sure they work correctly. The Bringrr App(s) for Android and Google Glass are currently in the preliminary stages of development.Here is everything we have developed so far:Bringrr• Power circuit board developedBringTags• Bluetooth circuit board developedEnclosures• Original enclosure for Bringrr• Final enclosure for Bringrr & BringTagsHow Will My Contribution Help?The cost of manufacturing Bringrrs and BringTags becomes much less expensive when we meet volume order requirements for the components and devices. We have fully functional prototypes that we’ve carefully refined, and we’re nearly ready to begin manufacturing. This means all we need is to have a certain number of Bringrrs and BringTags spoken for before we can begin the process of manufacturing. Our manufacturing partner Poly-Products Industries is based in Hong Kong, and is able to produce all of our components in house. With over 30 years of experience manufacturing for Fortune 500 companies, they are proficient at producing high volume orders quickly, so they will be able to make as many units as we need.We can't wait to see where this amazing journey takes us.All thanks to you!- The Bringrr Team

story:
The Problem:

Piecing together ferrules, extracting the reel from its own case and attaching it, pulling line through guides, tying on a leader, attaching a fly and additional tackle... Given the choice, would you rather be (a) standing in the parking lot, building up your rod, or (b) in the river catching fish?

I've spent the past 6 months talking to enthusiasts, guides and shops to understand the limitations of existing rod cases. The goal was to understand the problems so that a total solution could be designed for enthusiasts to provide them more time and opportunities to fish.

Most people build up and break down their rods at the beginning and end of their sessions.  This time consuming activity cuts into valuable fishing time, making shorter fishing sessions impractical because of the time needed to set up and tear down. In other words, that 1 hour time slot after work is a non-starter.

Several commercial cases and a bevy of home-made solutions exist for those wishing to leave their rods assembled.  Although each of these methods allow you to transport multiple rods fully assembled, they also have drawbacks including damage to the finish on rods, broken tips, difficult installation, or wind noise.

A User-driven Solution:

Over-and-over, we heard enthusiasts tell us they want a fully-built rod case that protects the finish on the rod, won't break the rod tip, won't allow the hook to become caught on the case and holds 4 rods and reels.

So that's what we've built... a time-saving (more time fishing), functional, beautifully designed, easy to use case that is secure but comes off the roof in seconds (when used in conjunction with the patent pending SwitchBlade crossbars).

The prices we're offering for these pre-production contributions are half of what they will at retail.  This is a great deal and an opportunity to help bring this innovative, time-saving approach to the fly fishing community.

The Quickdraw Case has been designed in Solidworks, and prototyped with 3D printing and aluminum sheeting.  The final version will be made of extruded aluminum, which is rugged, light and strong. The custom shape is designed to be aerodynamic and match the aesthetics of modern vehicles. End caps will be made from injection molded nylon. It will also include a single action locking mechanism.

Time-line:

  • We anticipate 30 days to complete this campaign. 
  • Upon completion of the campaign, we'll take approximately 1 week to finish edits to our CAD design.
  • Construction of the custom extrusion die will take about 2 weeks...
  • Followed by 5 weeks to complete the extrusion for the initial product run.
  • Injection molds for the end caps will be completed in parallel with the extrusion die (see above).
  • We are allowing 60 days for fabrication and assembly of the rod cases.
  • We anticipate delivery in June, 2014.

How We'll Use the Money

The use of funds from this campaign will fund the design and fabrication of a custom extrusion die, injection molds and the cost of materials.

Why We Can Get This Done

We're the same people who created the SwitchBlade Roof Rack System, so we've done this before.  The SwitchBlade system is available on Backcountry.com and Amazon.com, coming this spring to REI.  Designing, prototyping and bringing products to market is what we do.  And, everything we make is built right here in Utah in the USA!

story:
WHY MOSQUITOES!?

Clingy, needy, always seem to find you despite your efforts to hide from them and they share your blood. What are we talking about? Yes, your family…and mosquitoes. The most useless, unattractive creatures of the animal kingdom now have a reason to exist.

It's summer, it's hot and in our creative agency we're constantly engaging battles against them. We were always nervous because of them, yelling and hunting them down with our shoes ( one of us bought a pair of Crocs to kill them! A PAIR OF CROCS...!!! Bleah ).

"Sometimes we won, but for the most part  we lost our battles against  mosquitoes"  - Alice


But no one won the war, only battles.

We were stressed a lot... UNTIL i created an agency-only app, to count bites, earn points and challenge other friends in the studio, based on the number and the position of the mosquito bites! Since then you wont hear "DAMN MOSQUITO! *CRASH* " but you can hear "OH YES, ANOTHER ONE! On the neck, 50 points!"
It was just a fun way to deal with them as a game... a mosquito gamification!
Since the huge success it had among us, we decided to go public with a free app!

"this wont let you win the war, humans... but yeah! It could be fun!" - Queen Mosquito 

Who we are?

We are a newborn, small, creative communication agency, in Rome ( in the pics, the two super serious Co-Founders, Andrea and Alice ).

Our name is Leven Lab | Innovation Studio.

We are all old gamers, we are art lovers and developers, we are tech enthusiasts, we seek innovation. In our career we created apps, websites, illustrations and games for public administration and private companies, until we decided to create our path, our identity, together. 
I wont lie, it's not easy living, it's hard, but we have energy and we LOVE what we do!

We don't have yet the money to develop something without a final client to sell it, that's why we are on IndieGogo :) And we really hope to fund this first small funny project, to make some people smile, to let them know about us and hopefully to have enough funds to start working hardcore on our projects.

"We exist, WE DO LOT OF THINGS!! Please, internet, WE EXIST!" - Andrew

What LevenLab needs?

We have all the know how and the hardware to make the studio run smoothly, what we still need are our own software licenses! We decided to start this campaign basically to fund the studio, but we wont ask to fund the studio as you can see. 
We are offering a fun project, which we hope can be a nice way to receive a kick to start the run!

We'll spend the money only to buy software licenses for this project, which we will also use for the next products we'll release!

Here are your goals for us, we need to go PRO!

Unity 3D Pro License: $1500
Unity 3D Pro IOS License: $1500
Unity 3D Pro Android License: $1500
Team License: $500


Here are our goals for you!



What are you funding?


As explained, you are not just funding this app. You're funding a dream, you are realizing the intellectual freedom of a creative group which has love and wills for this job, but in this global economic situation has problems to take off.


We already won an E-Content Award 2013 for the best digital content in Italy with an educational game we developed in team, we innovate the interior design system with an augmented reality app and web simulator which will release in September, we successfully released another educational game with a partner studio for the recycling italian company.
We are a strong team, we just decided to have our own identity so we created Leven Lab.

Now we want to step up, and let our creativity and our team force work for a bigger project, to bring innovation, anywhere, anyhow.
So, you're not just funding a project, you're funding the future, yes, THE FUTURE of a skilled creative team which only needs a small help to take off.



Risks? No risks. For real.

No, there's no risk. 
Every single cent of the campaign will be invested in the studio, and the studio has anyway the force to complete the delivery. If we wont reach the goal we have to delay the release as we'll have to wait to get the licenses, but our plan is focused on getting them as soon as possible anyway.


    No Money? Please share! :)

    Even if you can't spare 1$, but you want to support our work, you can do a lot of different things!

    Share! Sharing has no cost, and is as helpful as funding!
    Write! Do you have a blog? Or a magazine? Spread the word!
    Work! If you are from Italy and want to work with us, you can contact us by sending an email to studio@levenlab.com. We have coffee, music and projects!

    Follow us <3

If we wont reach the goal we have to delay the release as we'll have to wait to get the licenses, but our plan is focused on getting them as soon as possible anyway.

  
No Money? Please share! :)
Even if you can't spare 1$, but you want to support our work, you can do a lot of different things!Share! Sharing has no cost, and is as helpful as funding!Write! Do you have a blog? Or a magazine? Spread the word!Work! If you are from Italy and want to work with us, you can contact us by sending an email to studio@levenlab.com. We have coffee, music and projects!
Follow us <3

story:
Overview

USB3 devices become more and more common. Today, every new computer has at least one USB3 port, which can be used to connect External Hard Disk, Flash Disk, Web Camera and plenty of other devices.

However, in opposite to all previous USB devices, there is a  limit of maximum distance of 3 meters.

This should be enough for 90% of USB3 applications, but what if you want to see your movie from other room? Or once you want to connect outdoor CCTV camera? There are 10% more percent of applications that require just more than just 3 m.

Our device should be able to resolve this limitation.

How? We have designed active repeater device, which just multiply the range. Use one device and you get 6m, use 2 and you have 9 m.

With our prototypes, we have reached 11 m range already and the sky is the limit!

Our target at this stage is to start initial mass production. Since this is the only way to make the device really cheap and available to masses.

Target COGS for such product is 15$ or below for quantities of 1000 pcs.

For higher quantities the price will be much lower, but we need your help to get there!


How it Works?

Simple!

You need more than 3 m? Just plug in your standard USB3 cable, then plug in USB3 Range Extender and one more standard USB3 cable.     And you've got 6 m!

Need even more? Plug in one more USB3 Range Extender and one more standard USB3 cable. And you've got 9 m!

By the way, you can use 5 m cable between 2 USB3 Range Extenders. In this case you can easily have 11 m extension! 

Your USB3 device requires more power? No problem, we solved this issue to! Plug in standard USB3 power adapter with optional Micro USB connector and you have almost 5W of power for your device!

Too many words? One picture worth a thousand words! Here it is:


Schedule

We have already finished all the design tasks and manufactured few prototypes.

They perform just fantastic!

First batch of mass production is expected in 6 weeks! (12/25/13)

At this milestone we manufacture 500 pcs and verify our manufacturing capabilities.

The next batch is expected 4 weeks later (end of January 2014).

Support us, and you will receive your items not later than Feb 2014!

Progress Report

17/11/2013 Preliminary enclosure has been manufactured and assembled. Perfect fit!

story:
Short Summary

Proposed new library facility shown above!

  • Rural Bremond Public Library started its life in an old school building leased by (and remodeled by) The Friends of the Library from Bremond ISD in 1999. Inelegible for grant funding as a leased facility, we purchased a smaller building with the help of loans from two volunteers, and obtained non-profit status. Another round of remodeling followed before opening the current building in 2001.
  • Tremendous growth since then includes an increase in out-of-town cardholders (weekend residents), and demand for more library services for residents/patrons: faxing, copying, notary service, and especially DSL internet service. 
  • These needs run up against the loss of all state funding for libraries, and the loss of revenue from Bremond City sales tax. The city does donate free water and sewer services to the library, and funds the part-time librarian's salary. Bremond and Robertson County both do contribute to the library's general budget. Volunteers assist in every aspect of day-to-day operation of the library. However, supply no longer keeps up with demand.
  • The growth of the book collection is hampered by lack of space in the current building. No more room is available for children's programs at this point, and donations languish in storage. Requests for community meeting space are  refused weekly in our current circumstances.
  • The feasibilty study we need will clear the way for other donations and grantwriting opportunities for our new location by testifying to the soundness of the building and its suitabilty as a library. The new library will offer 5,000 square feet compared to 1000 square feet in the old library.
  • Plans for the new library include increased space to house the library collection, a seperate computer room for children and adults, a community meeting center, and a reading room with coffee service (similar to larger urban bookstores). Increased space will allow room for after-schoolers, and programs like Story Hour and the Summer Reading program to expand. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Bremond Public Library needs $12,000.00

    • Once the feasibility study has been funded, an appointment will be set for the inspection. Once the study is completed and we have the results, we can prioritize the areas needing repairs/ remodeling. As in the past, much volunteer support will be available. Fundraising through grants and other donations will be possible once we have the study in hand  for material, permits, and professional assistance where required. 

  • Perks:    
  • $25 donations will receive a good feeling in your heart, knowing library programs for children will resume and progress can be made to renovate the new building! Your name will also be placed on our Donor Roll at library and a Special Thank You will be sent to you.
  • In Addition to the Above Perk - Two Stories by Helene Burnett will be e-mailed for $50 donations. Folks have enjoyed Helene Burnett's columns on farm life since 2011. She battles spiders; "woodlums";  spoiled-rotten poultry, rabbits, and other creatures, while tracking down family members hiding from her latest plans for the HomePlace. You need a sense of humor when you're farming in your "Golden Years," she says.
    • You will be contacted for your email address.
  • Contributions of $100 will receive the Above Two Perks and Community Recognition in Local Newspaper and on Library's Website & Social Media Outlets.
  • The Perks for $1000.00 contributions are All of the Above Perks and Your Name Inscribed on a Lovely Plaque to be Displayed in the New Library Building!
  • If our goal is not reached, we will hold the funds in savings, and continue fundraising for the feasibility study. This study is critical to our progress!

    • The Impact

    We can't progress with our dream library without your help!

    • Your contribution will help us build a larger library facility to support our patrons and community well into the 21st century. Popular children's programs will be reinstated and expanded, and cooperation with Bremond ISD schools will be enriched by expanded access to technology.   Adult programs and meeting space would benefit our community as it undergoes the renewal of Main Street and the surrounding town.
    • Books from our collection currently in storage will be displayed for use by children, young adults and adults. Computer access will be improved in a seperate room. A welcoming, spacious environment will encourage even more use by the community.
    • In the past The Friends of the Library were unable to accept a Tocker grant awarded due to problems with the library facilities. Feasibility studies are not eligible for grant funding, but with the completed study available, funding could be raised through more grantwriting.
    • Our volunteers have already remodeled two buildings to house the library in the past as need for services increased, and had financed a loan for the purchase of the current building through personal sources. Friends of the Bremond Library are committed to creating an up-to-date library to expand the horizons of our rural community. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • If you're unable to donate at this time, help us by talking about our campaign and linking to it in your  social media sites, such as facebook, twitter, etc.
    • Use the Indie share tools to make sharing easy!

What We Need & What You Get


Bremond Public Library needs $12,000.00
Once the feasibility study has been funded, an appointment will be set for the inspection. Once the study is completed and we have the results, we can prioritize the areas needing repairs/ remodeling. As in the past, much volunteer support will be available. Fundraising through grants and other donations will be possible once we have the study in hand  for material, permits, and professional assistance where required. 


Perks:     
$25 donations will receive a good feeling in your heart, knowing library programs for children will resume and progress can be made to renovate the new building! Your name will also be placed on our Donor Roll at library and a Special Thank You will be sent to you.

In Addition to the Above Perk - Two Stories by Helene Burnett will be e-mailed for $50 donations. Folks have enjoyed Helene Burnett's columns on farm life since 2011. She battles spiders; "woodlums";  spoiled-rotten poultry, rabbits, and other creatures, while tracking down family members hiding from her latest plans for the HomePlace. You need a sense of humor when you're farming in your "Golden Years," she says.You will be contacted for your email address.
Contributions of $100 will receive the Above Two Perks and Community Recognition in Local Newspaper and on Library's Website & Social Media Outlets.
The Perks for $1000.00 contributions are All of the Above Perks and Your Name Inscribed on a Lovely Plaque to be Displayed in the New Library Building!
If our goal is not reached, we will hold the funds in savings, and continue fundraising for the feasibility study. This study is critical to our progress!


The Impact
We can't progress with our dream library without your help!

Your contribution will help us build a larger library facility to support our patrons and community well into the 21st century. Popular children's programs will be reinstated and expanded, and cooperation with Bremond ISD schools will be enriched by expanded access to technology.   Adult programs and meeting space would benefit our community as it undergoes the renewal of Main Street and the surrounding town.
Books from our collection currently in storage will be displayed for use by children, young adults and adults. Computer access will be improved in a seperate room. A welcoming, spacious environment will encourage even more use by the community.
In the past The Friends of the Library were unable to accept a Tocker grant awarded due to problems with the library facilities. Feasibility studies are not eligible for grant funding, but with the completed study available, funding could be raised through more grantwriting.
Our volunteers have already remodeled two buildings to house the library in the past as need for services increased, and had financed a loan for the purchase of the current building through personal sources. Friends of the Bremond Library are committed to creating an up-to-date library to expand the horizons of our rural community. 



Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to donate at this time, help us by talking about our campaign and linking to it in your  social media sites, such as facebook, twitter, etc.
Use the Indie share tools to make sharing easy!

story:
The AURUS Diamond Dual 10.1 by Allotropes Design - The world’s first, dual touch screen Android tablet/laptop for anyone!

Ever wanted a dual screen Android tablet or laptop? Well now's your chance. By pledging support for our project, you can have your very own AURUS Diamond dual 10.1.

The AURUS Diamond Dual 10.1 allows anyone to multitask with 2 x 10.1” touch screen displays so you can watch a movie and surf the internet, check your emails and play angry birds at the same time or whichever tasks you want to perform at the same time.

We have been developing the AURUS Diamond Dual 10.1 from scratch in partnership with our manufacturers for the past 12 months, and now we are ready to release it to you. We'll fulfill all the Indiegogo pledges first, so if you're excited to get one, supporting us now is the best route to take to make sure you get your hands on one first!

 

We Need You

Without your help we would need to sell through our existing supply channels. This means :

  • We will have to sell at considerably higher prices

 

  • Our product will enter the market at much later time

 

  • It will come with fewer features

 

  • We wont be able to supply to as many geographic regions

By backing us now, you will be ensuring our development team can complete our goals and help us to realise the full potential of this great product. 

 

 

Is there anything else like this?

No. This is the first of its kind to be entering production and will be the first on the market with your helpful contributions.

Need some dual screen Apps?

We are currently developing special dual screen apps starting with an artist app, DJ & Music app and will continue to make apps for our dual screen tablets as you request them.

Do I need a laptop if I have one of these?

Not at all, with our new technology you can use our device as a laptop or a tablet and our device comes with 2TB storage which is a lot more than any other tablet or laptop in this price range.

 

How do I get one?

Simply pre-order one right here! As soon as the Indiegogo campaign ends, we’ll begin full scale production. And in very little time, you’ll have your very own AURUS Diamond Dual 10.1 delivered to your door.

 

Taking it to a new level..

Not only is the AURUS the first dual screen tablet PC, but for the first time ever we are offering you a device that will have 2TB storage built in and a battery life of 24 hours.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We're really excited to be bringing such an important and useful tool to designers, artists and many other potential users all over the world. Using crowdfunding just makes sense for everyone involved and helps us determine demand for our product

In order to keep the cost down, we need to manufacture in volume. Your contribution helps us create the units at the lowest possible price. The future of the AURUS is in your hands.

If you like the idea, but don’t want a new tablet then just show your support by pledging any amount, share this link with a friend, or both!

 

Your contribution

We have put a lot of time, effort and funds into our project, but like many things in life, not everything can be completed by just a few. You and your contributions will enable us to reach our goals. You will be an important part of a world first, enabling us to complete production of the world's first true dual screen tablet / laptop!
 

 

Where will your funding go?

We have already invested heavily in the development of our product. Your funding is the crucial link in completing our project and will be used to realise our dream of the world's first dual screen tablet to reach the market.

 

Use of Funds

We already have the funds required to complete our final prototypes and final testing and preperation for production. We need your help for the next step to actually produce the tablet and to get it out onto the market.

 

I don’t have room on my desk for another device.

No problem. The AURUS is ultra thin and light weight and after you start to use it, you will not want to use anything else.

 

Easy to use.

With dual screen display, using the AURUS as a tablet or laptop could not be easier. Giving you the ability to have two apps open at the same time and full screen make everything more easy to use.

 

Whats the operating system?

At the moment we are using Android 4.2 (the latest version) which allows you to have multiple user login if more then one person uses the tablet and allows you to swipe movies, images, documents and more from your tablet direct to your television.

 

Memberships

What you get with your membership:

SILVER MEMBERSHIP:

Silver member card which will give you 10% discount when buying our tablet and any other future products of ours in stores.

The discount can be used as many times as you desire by simply showing the card in the store.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP:

Gold member card which will give you 20% discount when buying our tablet and any other future products of ours in stores.

The discount can be used as many times as you desire by simply showing the card in the store

PLATINUM MEMBERSHIP:

Platinum member card which will give you 30% discount when buying our tablet and any other future products of ours in stores.

The discount can be used as many times as you desire by simply showing the card in the store

 

 

Features at a glance:

Operating System: Android 4.2 jelly bean

CPU: A15

Memory: 8GB 

Storage: 2TB Flash / HDD

Connectivity: Bluetooth, WiFi, GPS, SIM Card, Micro USB (for phone docking)

Display: 2 x 10.1” LED Backlit screens with 10-finger multi touch

Resolution: Full HD (1920 x 1080)

Camera:

Rear – 8MP Auto-focus w/LED Flash, 1080p video recording 

Front- 8MP for video conferencing

Interface:

2-in-1 Audio Jack (Head Phone / Mic-in)
1 x Micro-D HDMI port 1 x Sim Card Slot
1 x MicroSD Card Slot
Dual microphone
2 x Micro USB (one on each side)
2 x USB 3.0 (not on tablet side)
2 x Stereo Speaker (one in tablet, 1 on other side)

Dual Battery: 1 x tablet side = 9 hours 1 x second side = 15 hours

GPS: Simple Link GPS CC4000 (WiFi + GPS) or similar

Sensor: G-Sensor, Light Sensor, Gyroscope, E-compass

 

What color’s are available?

We will produce the tablet in 9 colours if we can get to $100,000 in funding..

 

 

Where are we at?

We have completed the design of the tablet and had comfirmation from our factory that they are ready to start creating the fully working prototypes and preparing for manufacturing. Here is our current schedule:

 

Who we are.

Allotropes Design was formed in 2012 with its main focus on website design, grachic design and product design. Since the formation of Allotropes Design, we have been working on the dual screen tablet project, and the company has focussed exclusively on product design.

Allotropes Designs vision has now evolved to focusing on product design,  concept design, and in the creation of new technologies.

 

FAQ

Q: When do we get ours?

A: Our factory will be starting production in Aug so at this stage we plan to ship the first orders out to everyone in Aug

Q: How much storage does it have?

A: To start it will have 2TB built in Flash / HDD storage 

Q: How will you keep backers up to date?

A: We intend to be fully engaged with our backers as we move forward with the AURUS Diamond Dual 10.1, There will be frequent updates and progress reports. Once our Indiegogo campaign is over we’ll continue to share our progress as we prepare for production and beyond. We love sharing information and education, and we just think the entire process of building things is exciting! We’re happy to share as much as we can too.

Q: Will it work anywhere?

A: For International Backers: Of course! We’ll include adaptors and the plug we’ve chosen is a universal 120v/240v. We want to make sure everyone can use the AURUS Diamond Dual 10.1.

Q: How much is shipping?

A: Shipping is FREE. After the Indiegogo campaign closes, we’ll have our website set up so it will display the estimated arrival dates for each order.

 

 

 

What are the risks?

We see minimal risks as we have a proven design, and our chosen manufacturing partner has completed projects just like ours for major companies. Our designs are copyrighted already and we will also apply for patents for our design internationally.


However, with all technology there are always risks. In this case we believe we have identified all of the possibilities and are in a position where the only delay we foresee is a lack of funding to enable us to complete the project.

 

The Impact

Your contribution will allow us to launch this brand new product during the latter part of Aug 2013 and at the same time, will enable us to compete with the big name companies in the industry. Our final products will be produced by the same manufacturers that have produced for Toshiba and other big brands so quality will be of the highest standards available

 

Where do we ship?

For Indiegogo orders ONLY we will ship to over 220 countries world wide. Please ensure the address provide is the address you want us to ship to.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us considerably if you can forward this link to your network via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit or any other social media outlet.

We thank you so much for your support. Ask your family and friends to help, Post a link to this project on blog sites or social media sites etc.

 

I have more questions. Who do I ask?

email us at info@allotropesdesign.com

story:
What is BTHive?

BTHive is a torrent indexer and DHT search engine. It is a Free and Open Source Software software for the web. Users will be able to search for files, get magnet link, comment, rate and bookmark files.

Why are we making it?

File sharing and torrents – a light introduction:

 We all use torrents for sharing files. BitTorrent protocol is a popular protocol for sharing large amounts of data over Internet. It relies on peer-to-peer file sharing rather than a central server to download data. 40% of Internet data traffic is torrents. Usually we find the torrent/magnet link of a specific file that we needed from any torrent indexing websites or search engines. DHT search engine is one of the alternative method to find the files we need.

 

Community perspective of torrent indexing:

There are numerous torrent indexing websites where users can upload their torrents. Other users find these torrents, download files with them and (optionally) give feedback about the quality of files. So, there is an active community around sharing torrents files and magnet links. Like any community, it is an 'intelligent crowd'. They help to keep the quality of file sharing trustworthy. Also these indexers host rating and comments data along with file information.

Present Problem:

But Torrent indexers constantly face shutdown threats from anti-torrent 'alien' organizations. Yes, they are obviously not human! they don't understand how humanity works! Either these websites shutdown or run away from one host to another. There are several problems happening because of this. Huge data regarding torrents are lost overnight.

We have to stop running!

That is the reason we wanted to make BTHive. It is a combination of torrent indexer and DHT search engine.

How does it work?

BTHive is a web app. There is a DHT client in the back-end which work as a node in DHT network. So, it can receive incoming requests and log it. On the front-end, there will be a torrent indexing web site where users can search for torrent files like any other indexing websites out there. Users can also register to comment, rate, bookmark torrents.

BTHive is also a decentralized platform. Different BTHive installations - we call them "Hives". Its a concept similar to diaspora social networking software's "pods". Users can register into any hives. Different hives can add other hives in their network. These hives share their indexed data, rating, comments with each other. So when a user search for a specific file in a hive, she is also searching the 'hive network'. Since files have unique fingerprints, comments and ratings get identified with them. These comments and rating also get synchronized in a hive network.

If one hive is shut down, the content it made will be unaffected. This property of BTHive makes it impossible to destroy the network and keep the community intact!

So more BTHive installations = more powerful the network is!

Technology:

Front end is written in Ruby on Rails. DHT back-end will be in ruby itself. Although different DHT implementations are being tested currently. Contents are synced in the network using an implementation of salmon protocol.

BTHive Advantages

  • Free and Open Source

  • Decentralized

  • Search, rate, comment and bookmark torrents

  • Social features for users

  • Complete admin control of hives

  • hives can be themed

  • No more worrying about "Aliens"! ;)

Who are we?

We identify ourselves as "Ark Anons". We are a bunch of engineers who are passionate about open source and freedom of knowledge. We have been making web, mobile apps for past 10 years and part of so many open source initiatives. We want to fight for users' right for information sharing. BTHive is one of the first tools that are going to get into development from us! Also, we are planning mobile apps to search BTHive network.

Why do we need money?

BTHive is an ambitious project. It requires a high volume of work and time commitment. We want to raise the money to fund for four of us working full time for next 6 months.

Additional costs include:

  • server costs

  • transaction fees

  • Shipping costs

  • Taxes


Our Promise:

If you fund us, We will be delivering an early beta of BTHive in 3 months! And continuous releases on following weeks.

Perks:

Yes, we have some cool stuff for you! :)

Buttons and Stickers:

More designs are on the way!

 

 

Tshirts:

"Copying is an act of love" - One side


"Copy Share Love" - Two side

FAQ

Do you hate current indexing websites?

Not at all! We are not against current indexers or any of their ideas. BTHive is just a natural evolution of indexers. We understand that there is a drawback in the current centralized indexers, and we are trying to fix it.

Are you associated with any of current indexing websites?

No, we are not.

You said you are implementing a DHT back-end. Which DHT implementation you will be supporting?

We will be implementing Mainline DHT in our clients

 

Thanks

  • Impress.js
  • Akashic Records | Jamendo
  • Tango Icon Project

story:
Our Story

TNSP SportsNet is a video production company that specializes in web-based sports shows.  We were founded deep down in a basement in Atlanta, by 2 former sports radio professionals who were tired of the short-sighted vision of our employer.  After years of attempting to open our former employer's eyes to the upcoming rise of internet television, we decided to set out on our own and create original sports shows and release them on our website, TNSP SportsNet.


We launched our website in August of 2010 with 1 man and his camera and 2 men with a passion for all things sports.  When we launched, we had 3 original shows in production: The ReDonkulous, Knockout and The Round Table.  Since that time, our programs have been extremely well received, but now it is time to take it to the next level.



What We Need

We need to raise $3,500 for the next 4 months of production of our signature program, The ReDonkulous.  This money will go toward paying professional editors to polish up the graphics of our program and get it TV ready so that we can launch it on multiple internet TV platforms (GoogleTV, Boxie, TiVo, Roku, etc.)


If we do not reach our entire goal, we will put the money toward the production of as many shows as possible with the amount raised.


 

The Show: The ReDonkulous

TMZ meets PTI in an unscripted no-holds-barred sports throw down that is The ReDonkulous.


The ReDonkulous fills the void within sports fans everywhere for information on absurd sports events, topics, headlines and gossip that aren’t typically covered on SportsCenter.  It is a sports show unlike any other, that covers a week’s worth of ludicrous sports headlines and reports them in an entertaining, witty banter in 10 minutes or less.  The hosts cap their discussion of each topic with their patented Donk Slam, officially proclaiming said topic to be ReDonkulous.


Hosted by the witty and charismatic Khalil Thompson and the clever and energetic Shaka Hilton, The ReDonkulous will have you laughing until the sun goes down … or until the 10 minutes are up, whichever comes first.



Behind the Scenes

Khalil Thompson created and produced The ReDonkulous, Knockout and Divva On a Mission.  He is a former producer for the nationally syndicated 2 Live Stews radio show.  He also has multiple years of experience in sports marketing and advertising.  Khalil is a graduate of Xavier University.


Brandon Butler is the former Director of Digital Interactive for Atlanta's Sports Radio 790 The Zone.  He has multiple years of experience in web development and online sports marketing campaigns.  Brandon is a graduate of Georgia Southern University.


Shaka Hilton is an on-air personality for Atlanta's 680 The Fan.  He is also the co-host of The ReDonkulous and co-producer of Knockout.  Shaka is a graduate of Savannah State University.


Nicole Thompson is in-house legal counsel and director of The ReDonkulous.  She has 10 years of experience in sports and entertainment law and is a graduate of Duke University.  She also graduated from Duke University School of Law.



Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can make a monetary donation.  However, you can still help spread the word about TNSP SportsNet and the best damn sports show on the internet, The ReDonkulous.  You can find us on Facebook, Twitter (@TNSPSportsNet), Vimeo, Blip.tv and our website TNSPSportsNet.com.


Also, if you are in the Atlanta area and are interested in sports broadcasting or journalism, we are always looking for interns.  Please send inquiries to khalil@tnspsportsnet.com.

story:
About this project

This project started for mass production of Libercom152. As a part of Libercom152 project, we want to introduce the stylish retro gamepad design case and game catridge design battery. And, we hope you understand about Libercom152 product more with this project.

About Libercom152

  • In a world awash with constantly evolving technology, it can be difficult to know what gadgets are worth the investment. These days, smart phones have become the norm, but many of us also desire the added functionality and convenience of a tablet. However, because of its many duplicate functions and the burden of having to keep up to date with the latest hardware, many of us worry if it is worth the extra expense.
  • Libercom152 allows you to use all of the features of your smart phone on a fully interactive touchscreen tablet-sized display with a stylish retro design. Imagine that: All of the features of your smart phone – internet browsing, games, photos, videos, and document editing, to name but a few possibilities – all available on a tablet-sized screen, without having to splash out on an expensive tablet every few years.

Featured on

Libercom would like to give a massive thanks to Behance, Geeky Gadgets, Gizmodo.cz, TecMundo, PC Guia, Games Are Social, 3D.ru, 4PDA, Devicebox, PCnews, Odnako, Cailiao, internetua, Aboutdigital, Newsme, Newit, Mobilegame, Geekview and TecWorldK for featuring us!

We would also like to thank you all for your comments and feedback, both good and bad. :) We truly appreciate your feedback as we continue to develop the product.

Retro Gamepad Design Case

The idea came from retro gamepad and it has unity on design theme with an accompanied battery. Synthetic silicone used for main material so you can feel the softness when you touch it. As many of you already know, silicone is one of the very good materials for smart phone case. 

  • Sorry!  This smart phone case does not support magnetic function with Libercom 152 

Retro Game Cartridge Design Battery

Retro Game Cartridge Design Battery Using its USB port, you can also charge many other devices (speakers, lights, etc.) when you are outdoors or on the road. The capacity of this external battery is 10400mAh, and there's two USB power output (1.0A & 2.0A). Keep the party pumping with Libercom152's external battery!

iPhone Case & Battery from Libercom 152

iF Design Award Winner !

One of the winners of the iF DESIGN AWARD 2015 – Eco-friendly Napkin Sleeve

Libercom Team

Risks and challenges

We have already successfully created the product design and prototype. Throughout the process, we have learned a lot, and we are certain that we can move on to the mass production of Libercom152. However, the one thing holding us back is the cost of mass production. We hope you support us in our quest to make Libercom152 a reality.

With your investment, we aim to further increase the quality of the product and provide satisfactory rewards to all our Indiegogo backers.

Thank you for your interest in and support for Libercom152!

story:
Missed out on this campaign! 

You still can Pre-order here at http://www.red-o.com/index.html 

(before 1st March)

                

Thank You for all backer we have achieved $19K!  We are producing additional 30% with black color Athene. Please refer to last section on how to choose Athene color (before 21st Feb else will send default brown color).

* 12th January 2014, Our Production team has reach Shenzhen and visited our factory. They are happy with the progress in the factory.



 

Now is your chance to get in on the beginning of an amazing creation that will change the way you look at USB drives. This revolutionary product is a bracelet, a charger, and an 8GB flash drive. Never get caught without a charger, flash drive, or transfer cable again!

Our two different designs ensure both iPhone and Android users can enjoy our bracelet.

For Android users, the Micro USB connection model is perfect.

 

 iPhone 5/5S/5C users will enjoy our model designed specifically for the newest generation of iPhones, as well as the iPad 4.

Both bracelet options work just like any standard USB cable, so you can charge your phone, transfer files, and sync your device to your computer. Packed into the same stylish bracelet is an impressive 8GB of space for storing or transferring files.


"it perfect for business pros and people who are constantly on the go" - www.iphoneness.com

Now Feature in www.crowdfundfusion.com



Android/Windows/BlackBerry Smartphone
The Micro USB for the Android will charge your device and act as a cable to transport your data. This allows you to store data or transfer files from your phone to your laptop or sync your data. Since it fits every USB plug, this bracelet model will work with any device that has a Micro USB port.

Apple iOS
The USB for the iPhone is compatible with iOS and iPhone models 5/5S/5C, as well as the iPad 4. It will charge your smart phone or tablet and sync it with iTunes.

The Design
Compatible with all USB plugs, the bracelet is made from genuine leather and is affordable for anyone. You can pre order a bracelet for as many people as you would like, so no one has to be caught out without a charger again.

The award-winning designer bracelet is attractive, so you will want to wear it for both convenience and style. It adjusts from 18 to 22 cm,and it has an elegant look that is suitable for either sex. (10th Feb Updated: Now with 4th hole bracelet is adjustable from 16cm to 22cm)



The Bracelet Charge is a great gift people who seem to always lose their charging cables and thumb drives. Anyone who wants a stylish way to carry around important files or music would love this product. 


How to choose Athene Color
From now till 21st Feb 2014, you can chose the black color leather for your Athene bracelet Perk in our webpage. You can correct your shipping address or Perk in here too. If you do not submit request for any color change by 21st Feb, we will send default brown leather color.

1. Go to www.red-o.com/athene/Perk_add.php

2. Fill in your email same as use in Indiegogo contribution

3. Check if you wanted to change your address or perk

4. Select correct perk, wait for it description to appear.

5. Chose color according to the bracelet connector type

6. Save. That it!

Watch the step by step video instruction (We apologize for the faded color in the video cause by conversion software):-

For Shipping to country outside UK, combine Shipment are allow for same address. No additional shipping cost needed. Get Multiple Color Perks !


Campaign ended, Missed out on this campaign! 

You still can Pre-order here at http://www.red-o.com/index.html (before 1st March)

story:
Meet “Unpluggables” An Inspiring Invention That Makes Magic Happen Instead. 

·  Are your kids looking at their cell phones instead of interacting with the family? 

·  Do you attend business events where people use their smartphone instead of engaging in the meeting? 

·  Have you gone on a dinner date and wished your partner would “plug in” to your conversation?

                  

The Trend of Unplugging
is Happening Everywhere.  

While working as a Life Coach, our founder Jenifer Novak Landers noticed the challenges people are having when it comes to being present with themselves and with each other.  What started as a game with her young daughter called “Magic Happens” turned into product idea, now merging into the worldwide trend of unplugging from technology as a demonstration of self-care, life balance and making time with others more productive and meaningful. 

Jenifer created thoughtfully designed and well-constructed designer pockets to cover cell phones when people choose to be unplugged.  The product line also includes artful canvas signs to hang over television screens, beautifully appointed boxes to hold multiple phones or gadgets, along with the colorful pockets all available in a variety of sizes and designs.  “Unpluggables” are handmade from start to finish using top grade materials.  

                  

            
 

The “MAGIC HAPPENS” Story. 


I always like to focus on the positive.  I wanted to teach my daughter she had a CHOICE to play/create/imagine instead of staring at a screen for too long. I wanted a positive message rather than always saying things like “TURN IT OFF” or “NO TV”. I wanted to create an opportunity with her rather than tell her what NOT to
do. This is the beginning of our MAGIC HAPPENS PHILOSOPHY.  When we choose to unplug from the distraction of our screens, we are available for all the other possibilities around us.  I have speaking engagements and motivational presentations in the future for Unpluggables and the Magic Happens Lifestyle. 
(This is the original sign - it inspired everyone who heard about it or visited us.)

                               

I see my teenage daughter growing up in the popularity of cell phone usage. Kids need help unplugging and want balance.  And parents need help not being distracted from their kids.

       

Gumption for Business Unplugged 

In my professional life, I'm passionate about the power of listening and being present with my clients, prospects and meetings.  I always look for ways to help people choose to UNPLUG in meetings, classrooms, events and other gatherings. Unpluggables has HUGE potential for Corporate America! 
Join us and help with making meetings more productive. 

             

Hot Trend:  Unplugged Weddings

When I began developing ideas for products and ways to help people unplug and find their own “Magic Happens”, I immediately discovered the popular “Unplugged Weddings” trend.  I am excited about the wedding industry promoting the value of being fully present for the special occasions.  Wedding planners have access to signage, invitations and more to educate their guests about unplugging and respecting the photographer at the event.  

Unpluggables products will be designed to meet the growing demand of this niche. 

This empowering trend is expanding into other industries and will continue to grow in popularity.      

                                 

We are designing several "EVENT UNPLUGGABLES" that will have room for customized logos and names.  Get on board and make a statement with your branding. 

Just a few examples of other UNPLUGGED EVENTS:  Retirement Parties, Bar/Bat Mitzvah's, Retreats, Luncheons, Conventions, Association Meetings, Funerals, Church Groups, etc. A branded Unpluggable would make a fabulous gift for all in attendance! 

Unpluggables will be in demand long into our technology-based future.  

WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

People are empowered when they remember what matters most: Quality time together, relationships, being present, connecting, sharing precious moments, and more.  Unpluggables are the gift AND the present. 
Contribute to our campaign. We are including sets of beautifully designed POSTCARDS  to thank you for your donations. Six postcards in each set. 

                                          


               

Make some noise about the campaign - please share with your friends, your family, everyone you know.  

Just forward the link on this page. 

Or send them to our website:

www.Unpluggables.com

Post and share with your social media network, mailing lists and personal connections.  Contact us if you need any assistance.  We are happy to write notes, send personal messages, answer questions or chat. (while unplugged :)


Here is a summary of your choices; 


                                               

I would like to thank my amazing team for everything we have achieved to get here. We keep believing in the dream! 

Karl Palachuck for his expert business direction. Tari Gordon for her talents with Production and Operations and Marketing. Stella Landers for her video skills. Ruben Young for the website. Jo Daley for her total support, and my Sacramento Mastermind Group for all the genius, the vision, and the business savvy we need.

story:
My name is Matias Perez, I'm mostly known by my nickname: CepiPerez.

I'm individual developer, enthusiast and a positive person. You can find me on http://talk.maemo.org/ forums.

I'm creating applications you can always enjoy while using, applications with native user interfaces, fluid animations and clean code. Everybody can look at every stage of many of my projects. I also ported many games to the Maemo platform.

I'm a full-time developer. I like coding applications non-stop during all my free time, all day, all night. You will get more exciting applications and more updates for the current ones.

With the money, I can also buy the Jolla phone and Tablet to start on developing for Sailfish OS.

Below is a small list of my applications:

Whatsup
for Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=94081

Filebox
for Maemo http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=60159
for Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=76345

FlowPlayer
for Maemo: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=75130

story_txt: My name is Matias Perez, I'm mostly known by my nickname: CepiPerez.I'm individual developer, enthusiast and a positive person. You can find me on http://talk.maemo.org/ forums.I'm creating applications you can always enjoy while using, applications with native user interfaces, fluid animations and clean code. Everybody can look at every stage of many of my projects. I also ported many games to the Maemo platform.I'm a full-time developer. I like coding applications non-stop during all my free time, all day, all night. You will get more exciting applications and more updates for the current ones.With the money, I can also buy the Jolla phone and Tablet to start on developing for Sailfish OS.Below is a small list of my applications:Whatsup for Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=94081Fileboxfor Maemo http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=60159for Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=76345FlowPlayerfor Maemo: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=75130for Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=80901CallBlockerfor Harmattan http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=79861Last.fm Radiofor Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?p=1202387FileCasefor Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=88147CleverMeefor Harmattan: http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=90906

story:
The Idea 

Frontrow is our innovative concept for an iPhone and iPad application — though it's really more like a canvas. One big, blank canvas made of a hundred thousand brush strokes (or content-ready squares). It's a literal world of individual pictures and posts created by the users. It's designed to flow with new trends, thoughts and concepts just like a conversation. Only in the Frontrow conversation, you're talking to the world. And entirely through your iPhone or iPad! 

Our app is the perfect place to add your art, post a link to a cool event, or just meet others who share your creativity. With an in-app upload system, you can post a new photo to the Frontrow globe in only seconds. Then, take a ride on the social side with the built-in ratings system. Watch as others like, comment and change your posts in new and inventive ways. All of this—of course—for free.

By giving Frontrow a physical landscape, we want you to make a splash. We want our users to change the field, create exciting new concepts, and interact with each other in a way that goes beyond thumb-ups and virtual farming. Frontrow is about handing the real estate, and the reigns, to our users—just to see what they come up with.

Because of the social engine at the core of the Frontrow globe, the best projects are brought to the community instantly. This means you can easily stay on top of what's happening the orb over, and even add your own unique voice to the mix.

So what would you do with your Frontrow space?

Who We Are & What We Represent

We are Snodgrass & Jefferson (and friends) a group of graphic designers, web developers, and app makers based in Boulder, Colorado and Winnipeg, Manitoba.

Frontrow is the brain child of James Northcott and Jonathan Richards, the Canadians on the team. Somewhere along the line, they fell in line with Snod & Jeff to make their app idea a reality.

Together, we've got years of experience working with web and app development, which is why we're so excited to be creating Frontrow. Using the knowledge we possess, we hope to make a real difference in the way you use your iOS devices.The opportunity to create a free avenue for global creativity is a dream come true for us — now we're just asking for help across the finish line. Here's the road map:

Frontrow isn't just our chance to make a difference on the iPhone, though: Once developed, we plan to license out space within the app for a small fee. After each sale, half the proceeds will go immediately to five world-changing charities. So sure, we're excited to see what our users do with our app. But we're also excited to help those who need us the most.

The Rewards & Goodies

If you decide to help us turn our Frontrow dream into a reality (and we really hope that you will) we'd like to extend a few rewards as a token of our gratitude.

For instance, any donation beginning at the $1 level will receive a personalized letter of gratitude from Frontrow app creator, James Northcott. This is just our way of saying thanks to you—as an individual—for doing what you could.

If you're willing to chip in a few bucks more, for $5 we'll add your name to our "Special Sponsors" section on TheFrontrowApp.com. Again, this is just our small way of thanking you for your efforts to make Frontrow a reality.

At the $25 level we'll be giving away these gorgeous Frontrow car magnets: That way you can rep your contribution everywhere you go, and without adding any sticky goop to your car. 

If you'd like to contribute at the $50 level, we'll be sending you each reward up to this point. In other words, you'll get that letter from James, a spot on our website for your name, the car magnet from just a moment ago, and a beautiful Frontrow tee to wear about town.

Anything beyond the $50 mark, and we're prepared to give you much more than just shwag. We'll be giving you spaces within the app to create your masterpiece.

At $100 you'll get a free space at launch, while $400 earns you 4 whole squares of in-app real estate. Want a 2 by 3 rectangle of digital canvas for your imagination to run amok in? Donate $600 and your dream is a reality! 

Lastly, $1000 earns you our Forever Seal of gratitude, as well as 10 whole blocks within the app. That's more creative potential than one can (easily) shake a stick at—and it's all yours!

Expectations & Experience 

Obviously, building an app like Frontrow is no small feat. However, we're not here to shortchange you: With the money raised from your backing, we plan to make an app you can use, enjoy and love on a daily basis.

To do this right, we need to raise money for the programming, designing, testing and launching of the app. The sum we need is $30,000. This total ensures that Frontrow can be developed, produced and distributed with the utmost care and the highest craftsmanship. This is where you come in:

All of the money you use to back Frontrow goes directly to its development. We don't gain a thing from the app until it's on the App Store and in your hands, as it should be. Between all the members of our team, we're rocking more than four decades of Web and application development experience. All together, we're looking to make an incredible application. All we need is your help to cross the finish line.

story:
LEDs have become part of our world. Now Telelumen has put the power of their light into your hands.

The first wave of LEDs were often dazzling flashy colors.

The second wave of LEDs were low energy, low cost over time.

But now, Telelumen brings you the true value of LEDs… its about illumination.

Rich and dynamic light is at last yours.

Human beings are designed to live in variable daylight. But for a hundred years, light sources have been monotonous and unchanging.

Telelumen has been refining dynamic full color light replicators which are now in use in corporate laboratories and university research centers around the world. Until now, this technology has only been available to scientists and engineers.

Today, we announce a solution for you: Hugo.

The Telelumen Hugo App works with the Philips Hue Lighting system to produce dynamic meaningful illumination to help your productivity and mood.

Simply select a Telelumen lumenscript designed for your needs from productivity, to tranquility, sleep cycles or simply proper illumination of the room you are in. Let the Hugo system fill your room with the natural progression of sunlight during the day, or intimate candlelight in the evening.

We’ve developed this technology for researchers, but its important to us now to bring it to individuals like you.

With your help, you will not only be among the first to experience and control your own personal full spectrum lighting, you will also be developing a revolutionary platform, forever changing the way humanity lights up its world.

Please share the news. Telelumen Hugo is coming!

story:
What is Watch Back?

Watch Back is an outer casing with a full color LED touch screen I phone 5 battery in it. The touch screen has a double battery, So that the battery of the device will not be used up while the screen is operating. Moreover, This double battery powers Both the touch screen as well as the I phone itself.

Make the most out of your photographs and, if you run a company, advertise your logo, Facebook page, twitter or Anything that your company Customising Watch dealer to back as many times as you require. Watch back Enables you to upload videos in the outer case making your cell phone more the original and at the same time Protecting it.

 

Watch back enables you to display immediately any Picture, image, GIF from your album or from the internet as well as videos making your cell phone much more original and at the same time protecting it.
Enlarge or reduce your photographs and move them as you like thanks to the LED touch screen.

Charge the battery of your Iphone with Watch Back.

 

Technical specifications:

-Screen Size: 4.5" LED backlight full color.

-Dimensions: Weight: 88 grams (approximate).

                  Depth - 4.6mm

                  Height  - 137mm

-Case Color: Black,White,Blue,Red,Yellow and green.

-Battery: 1 cycle charge for iphone and another for screen.

 

Watch Back will be available in a several colours.

 

Who We Are

We have realized that people end up not using the outer casings of Mobile phones because they get tired of them sooner or later and because and/or, in most cases, they make the cell phone bigger than it is. In the end it is even difficult to pull it out of your pocket.
With watch back you will have an outer casing that will protect your Mobile in case you hit it or it falls down because it covers the parts that are more easily damaged in those cases: the edges.
Your Mobile phone will be always updated with a design that does not alter the image of your I Phone 5 offering you, at the same time, the innovative possibility to change it any time you want without having to pay more money to make it more attractive.

 

Use of Funds

By funding our project we want to overcome obstacles in manufacturing, enabling WatchBack part of the daily life of all of us. Through Indegogo ask your help for the realization of our dream and also share with you all.

 

Other ways to help us

Watch,like and share:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rq1k4ghwo0c

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Watch-Back/181614755328533

https://twitter.com/WatchBack1

 

API

 

If the campaign goes up to $135,000 will develop a API.

 

Ideas,questions?

send us inquiries on indegogo comments or at: info@watch-back.com

 

FAQS:

  • If I press by mistake the screen (for example when taking my cell phone out of my pocket), do I change the image of the outer casing?

-The outer casing has got a function to block the screen, which is similar to the     Android one (joining the four ends of the screen).

  • Will the screen get scratched if I leave the cell phone on a surface?

-Not because the outer casing is protruding slightly and the screen is sunk in the casing.

  • will it only be available for the Iphone5?

-At the beginning it will only be available for the Iphne5, if exceeded our expectations we will expand to other devices. (We will update this information).

  • How can I transfer videos to the watch back outer casing?

-By means of a Bluetooth.

  • If I run out of battery in the outer casing, will the watch back stop working?

-Not because the casing has two charging cycles, one for the screen and one for the I phone.

  • How do I switch the outer casing on/off?

-It has a movement sensor and on/off button.

  • Will it have connection for Applications?

-If the campaign goes up to $135,000 will develop a API.

 

----------------------------------------------- 

 

¿Que es Whach Back?

Watch Back es una carcasa con una pantalla de LED full color multitáctil que además incorpora una doble batería para iPhone 5.
La pantalla LED full color multitáctil está dotada de una doble batería que evita el consumo de energía del dispositivo. Esta doble batería sirve para alimentar tanto la pantalla de la carcasa, como para cargar el propio iPhone.
Sácale mayor partido a tus fotos y si , además tienes una empresa, te servirá para publicitar tu logo, página de Facebook, twitter o cualquier otra cosa que te represente personalizando la parte de atrás de tu dispositivo tantas veces como quieras o necesites. Con Watch Back podrás también poner vídeos en la carcasa para que tu móvil a la vez que va protegido sea más original y exclusivo.

Podrás plasmar cualquier foto/vídeo/Gif ya se de tu álbum o de Internet en la carcasa Watch Back de manera instantánea.
Ajusta (amplia foto o reduce foto) y muévela como quieras gracias a su pantalla táctil de LED a todo color.

 

Carga tu iPhone con Watch back.

 

Especificaciones:

 

-Pantall: 4.5" LED backlight full color.

-Dimensiones: Peso: 88 grams (approximate).

                   Espesor- 4.6mm

                   Altura  - 137mm

-Color carcasa: Negro, Blanco, Azul, Rojo, Amarillo y Verde.

-Bateria: 1 ciclo de carga para el Iphone y otro para la pantalla.

Watch Back estará disponible en varios colores.

 

Quienes somos

Nos hemos dado cuenta que la gente acaba dejando las carcasas para smartphones de lado ya que, a la larga, se cansaban de la estética que proporcionaban a su dispositivo y/o lo hacían tan voluminoso que incluso era molesto sacar el móvil del bolsillo.
Con watch back tendrás una carcasa que protege tu dispositivo ante golpes caídas, etc. ya que protege las partes que más daño sufren ante golpes, como son los bordes del dispositivo.
Con Watch Back tendrás siempre tu carcasa a la última con un diseño que no altera la bonita estética de tu iPhone 5, ofreciéndote así unas prestaciones que jamás has visto de una carcasa sin tener que gastar más dinero para hacerla atractiva cada vez que quieras.

 

Uso de los fondos

Mediante la financiación de nuestro proyecto queremos superar los obstáculos de fabricación, permitiendo a WatchBack formar parte de la vida cotidiana de todos nosotros. Por eso a través de Indegogo queremos pedir vuestra ayuda para la realización de nuestro sueño y también compartirlo con todos vosotros.

 

 Otras formas de ayudarnos

Compartiendo,comentando, dando "me gusta" 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rq1k4ghwo0c

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Watch-Back/181614755328533

https://twitter.com/WatchBack1

 

API

Si logramos $135,000 desarollaremos una API.

 

Ideas, Preguntas?

Mandanos cuaquier consulta a:  info@watch-back.com

 

FAQS:

  • Si pulso sin querer la pantalla (por ejemplo al sacar el móvil del bolsillo), modifico la imagen de la carcasa?

-La carcasa Watch Back dispone de un bloqueo similar al de Android ( uniendo las cuatro esquinas de la pantalla).

  • Si dejo el móvil sobre un a superficie se raya la pantalla de la carcasa ?

-No porque está hundida con respecto a la carcasa.

  • Estará disponible sólo para Iphone 5?

-En principio estará disponible para Iphone 5, si superamos nuestras espectativas lo ampliaremos a otros dispositivos. (Iremos actualizando esta información).

  • Cómo transfiero las imágenes/vídeo a la carcasa Watch Back?

-Por Bluetooth.

  • Si gasto la batería de la carcasa, la pantalla del Watch Back deja de funcionar ?

-No, ya que la carcasa dispone de dos ciclos de carga: una para la pantalla y otra para el Iphone.

  • Cómo enciendo y apago esta carcasa ?

-Dispone de un sensor de movimiento/acelerómetro . Además también dispone de un interruptor on/off.

  • Tendrá conexión para aplicaciones?

-Está en proceso una API que permitirá hacer aplicaciones con conexión a Whatch Back.
