-En principio estará disponible para Iphone 5, si superamos nuestras espectativas lo ampliaremos a otros dispositivos. (Iremos actualizando esta información).

Cómo transfiero las imágenes/vídeo a la carcasa Watch Back?
-Por Bluetooth.

Si gasto la batería de la carcasa, la pantalla del Watch Back deja de funcionar ?
-No, ya que la carcasa dispone de dos ciclos de carga: una para la pantalla y otra para el Iphone.

Cómo enciendo y apago esta carcasa ?
-Dispone de un sensor de movimiento/acelerómetro . Además también dispone de un interruptor on/off.

Tendrá conexión para aplicaciones?
-Está en proceso una API que permitirá hacer aplicaciones con conexión a Whatch Back.

story:
Why are we here?

You must have heard this in the news... a Vietnamese tourist, Mr Pham Van Thoai came to Singapore for a dream holiday with his girlfriend. In a move that must surely qualify him as a boyfriend-of-the-year candidate, he pays S$950 to buy an iphone 6 as a birthday gift for his girlfriend. As a factory worker making a salary of S$200 a month in vietnam, this makes his purchase equivalent to 5 months of his salary. So, when was the last time you spent half a year of your salary on your significant other?

Now most of us do some basic research online before dropping serious money on our gadgets and he must have done the same as he knew right away that S$950 was an unbelievable bargain. So the retailers make him sign some ridiculously worded invoice in english (a language he barely understands) and as he was leaving the store, they stopped him and forced him to pay an additional S$1500 for a bogus 1-year warranty before they would allow him to leave with what he believed he had purchased. 

The retailers (Mobile Air Pte Ltd) "generously" offer to refund S$600 but as this would mean that 2 whole months of salary would be stolen from him, he refuses. He then goes down on his knees and begs them to refund the rest of his money while the staff at the outlet laughed at him. 


So the police and consumer association of singapore were called in (this was their 14th incident since July 2014) and are only able to recoup S$400 for him. 

So he leaves the shop with his girlfriend S$550 poorer, with no iphone 6, in tears, sore knees and his dream holiday now shattered. 

This is NOT "ok", This is NOT right. We are *NOT* a nation of thieves and cheats. This kind of scam should NOT be allowed to continue here, much less prosper like it has. But while I, as an individual can do very little to change this, together as a community we can put pressure on the lawmakers that allows scams like these to thrive over the last few years. (The first 2 floors of Sim Lim Square are notorious for scams like these over the last 5 years or more)

In the meantime, I feel that Mr Pham was dealt a great injustice by the legal system and while we cannot undo those traumatic and humiliating scenes he has had to endure, we can try to make things right. Let's give the man an iphone 6!

And if we happen to raise a little more, I'd like to send him some small gifts of Singaporean hospitality such as Bak Kwa, Kaya jam and spice packs to try some of the dishes he missed out on. His entire holiday was destroyed by the actions of one errant retailer, and if he had to go through something this traumatic, he must have lost his appetite and missed out on all the best experiences in Singapore.

More Coverage of this story in the media:

http://www.straitstimes.com/news/singapore/more-singapore-stories/story/vietnamese-tourist-kneels-and-begs-refund-iphone-6-sim-l

http://mothership.sg/2014/11/coin-giving-sim-lim-shop-has-tourist-begging-on-his-knees-for-a-refund/

http://www.tnp.sg/news/man-weeps-plea-refund-sim-lim-square-shop

http://www.zaobao.com.sg/special/outline/story20141104-407814

UPDATE:

Thank you for all the support and well wishes. We have raised more than the required amount. With the extra money I would like to give Mr Pham and his girlfriend an all expenses paid holiday back to Singapore to enjoy the dream holiday that was stolen from them. There is also another incident at Sim Lim Square where an international student was scammed, I would also be diverting resources to help her. 

Thank you all for your kind contributions and for making this possible!

http://www.straitstimes.com/news/singapore/more-singapore-stories/story/sim-lim-shop-reduces-student-tears-charging-1000-warrant


Who am I and why am I doing this?

My name is Gabriel and I work in a small local tech startup. I am a Singaporean who is neither rich nor poor and I do not seek to profit directly or indirectly from the results of this campaign. I seek no recognition and have no political affiliations, goals nor ambitions. I also have no affiliations to the police, tourism board, CASE or any other government organization. In short, I am just an ordinary Singaporean, someone who has read the story and gives a damn, just like YOU! 


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise at least USD$1,000, but hopefully we would raise a bit more to cover express shipping and pay for a goodie bag to help alleviate their suffering. But if we do fall short, I will personally cover the rest.

This campaign will have FULL transparency including but not limited to:

  • Receipts and invoices
  • Photos and videos documenting our progress
  • Transparent accounting for all transactions made
In return for your kind contribution you will receive a massive Thank you email. And the knowledge that we witnessed a great injustice, banded together as a community and helped to make things right. 
All we ask from you is a small $1 contribution from the kindness of your heart to show that you care. 

The Cost

iphone 6, 128GB, Space-Grey (I'm not sure which color his girlfriend would like, Will try to ask) S$1,288.

http://store.apple.com/sg/buy-iphone/iphone6/4.7-inch-display-128gb-space-grey-unlocked


Local Goodies from Supermarket:
  • Bak Kwa (Sweet Meat/Jerky) $30?
  • Kaya Jam $20?
  • DIY Spice Packs, (Chilli Crabs, Bak Kut Teh etc) $50?
  • Do Suggest more items to include (Can't be too big or heavy though)
Fedex Priority Shipping S$83.06 (Estimated as I do not know which city yet)
https://www.fedex.com/ratefinder/standalone?method=getQuickQuote

Rough Cost Estimate S$1471.06 == USD$1176.57. 
UPDATE:
The extra funds will be used to pay for Mr Pham and his girlfriend's return to Singapore for the dream holiday that was stolen from them. Every expense will be documented and published. If you would like to sponsor their stay in Singapore at your hotel do let me know!

Risks & Challenges

I have contacted the Consumer Association of Singapore (CASE) and found out that Mr Pham Van Thoai has departed Singapore today (5th Nov 2014). I have been promised the contact information and address once they manage to verify his contact details as nobody wants these gifts sent to the wrong address.

In the event that there are errors in his contact information, we would need to seek the help of the public who may have friends or relatives living in Vietnam to help locate him.


Other Ways You Can Help

Share this on your blog, Facebook, Twitter and tell your friends about this! 

Show the world that even though our legal system is powerless to stop this, our community actually gives a damn and we're going to make this right!

story:
Not your Grandma's Table Lamp!

Hi, I am Russie Jones co-creator of Rely-A-Light, the emergency table lamp that functions as a regular table lamp until the power goes out. When the power goes out the emergency light in the body of the lamp instantly and automatically comes on with NO HUMAN INTERACTION! My husband, a former electrical contractor and myself, an Interior Designer developed Rely-A-Light during the worst  ice storm that the south had seen in 25 years that left us without power for 8 days. Being the caregiver for my parents made my family personally aware of the problems associated with daily care of a loved one. We were most concerned with the risk of fires and falls. Rely-A-Light eliminates the need for use of candles during a power outage and can reduce the risk of falls significantly.  We realized that Rely-A-Light is a product that EVERYONE can use.

In the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy we realized that while the need for immediate emergency light in a power outage is incredibly important, so is our need to communicate with others. In an emergency one simple phone call can put needless concerns to rest and ensure family and friends of your safety and well being. We have re-engineered the core of our product to enable you to charge your phone with, or without AC power.

To continue our mission in providing you with the safety and peace of mind that Rely-A-Light offers we need your help. With your pledge we will be able to manufacture our latest technology  which will provide a USB port in the base of our lamp that functions in AC and DC mode. Furthermore your help will enable us to ship at a much higher volume which will drive our price down, making Rely-A-Light affordable to everyone. We will continue to strive to make your home the safest it can be during a power outage.

Together we can help to reduce accidents and fatalities associated with power outages. We appreciate your help, whether you tell your friends and family about us, share our Indiegogo campaign on your Facebook and Twitter pages or pledge to our Indiegogo campaign, YOU are a valuable part of our Rely-a-Light team! Thank you for your help!
 
Technology:

Our LED for our newest lamps.

 

Our 12 to 16 hour battery

 
 
Our 24+ Hour Battery for our larger lamps

 Lamp Diagram




Relyalight Specifications:

  • Weight 12-14 lbs.
  • Lamp body material: Glass
  • Source/brightness: LED (light emitting diodes), 4 watts, 1200 lumens, warm white light
  • Battery Specs: Rechargeable sealed lead acid battery and ion/lithium battery (different batteries used in different styles)
  • Power source: 120V and 240V

 

Some of Our Rely-A-Lights:

Before Power Outage

 


During Power Outage

 



Before Power Outage
 

 


During Power Outage



Our Product Rewards:

Breast Cancer Awarness Ribbon Relyalight. USB & 24+ Hours of Emergency Light. Base Size: 20"H X 7.5"W

 

 

 


 Camouflage Relyalight. USB & 24+ Hours of Emergency Light. Base Size: 20"H X 7.5"W

 

 

 

 



Orignial Style White Milk Glass. USB & 24+ Hours of Emergency Light. Base Size: 20"H X 7.5"W

 

 

 


New Style Clear Glass. 12 to 16 hours emergency light with USB port. Base Size: 11"w X 19.5h

 

 

 

Short Mercury Glass. 12 to 16 hours emergency light with USB port. Base Size: 6.75"w X 17"h

 

 

 

 


 
Proudly supported by Hydrographics.
 
 



The name Rely-A-Light is trademarked and our technology is patent pending.

 
Risks and challenges

We have had several working, and terribly overworked, prototypes for four years. We've done our homework and are working closely with a twenty year veteran of lighting manufacturing to eliminate as many risks and potential problems as humanly possible. However, we are not without fault. We are already in production on phase one of our product and expect the next phase to run as smoothly as did phase one. In the event a problem does arise, we have a well rounded professional support team to work on all aspects of our product. We will always keep you informed, of both the good and the bad peaks and valleys along our journey together.

FAQ

1. What is the life of the battery?

Considering the average occurrence of power outages, the battery will last several years.

2. What if the battery needs to be replaced?

If the battery should fail beyond the warranty period, the lamp can be returned to our company and we will replace the battery for a nominal fee plus shipping costs. The consumer should NOT try to replace the battery. Battery replacement should only be done by qualified persons. Disassembling the lamp will void the warranty.

3. How long does the battery take to recharge?

From a full discharge or completely dead battery, which is 24 straight hours of emergency light use, it takes 48 hours to recharge the battery to full power. However, the average power outage lasts from 2 to 4 hours and the battery can be recharged in 2 hours for sufficient use.

4. Can I purchase different lamp shades?

Yes, we are continually expanding our product line to include different styles of shades and lamps to complement every décor.

5. Is there more than one style of lamp available?

Yes, our design team is working to expand our line of lamps so that we are an asset to every room in your home.

6. Does the top part of the lamp use a regular bulb?

Yes, you can use a regular incandescent bulb (the maximum wattage is in the description specific to each lamp style), a compact fluorescent bulb or a LED bulb in the top socket of the lamp.

7. Can I use Rely-a-light as a normal table lamp?

Yes, we are a normal table lamp until a power outage. Then, with no human interaction required the body of our lamp lights up and remains on until the power is restored up to 24 hours, giving you safe mobility until power is restored at which time the emergency function goes off, the battery recharges and the lamp again functions as a normal table lamp.

8. Can I turn the emergency light portion of my Rely-a-light off and on?

The lamp itself operates as any other table lamp; you may turn it off and on as often as you wish. The emergency function is designed to come on at the loss of power and remain on until power is restored up to 24 hours. Should you need or desire to turn off the emergency function (i.e. Moving the lamp from one location to another) there is a switch on the bottom of the base of the lamp for that purpose.

9. Is the Rely-a-light energy efficient?

The emergency light is energy efficient. The top portion of the lamp is energy efficient when a compact fluorescent bulb or a LED bulb is used.

10. What is the warranty on my Rely-a-light?

Your warranty card is included with your purchase of a Rely-a-light and explains in detail our warranty information.

11. How large a room will the lamp illuminate when in emergency mode?

The emergency light will light any room in an average home with enough light for safe mobility and sufficiently so that you can function in a relatively normal manner.

12. Is there any fire hazard from a Rely-a-light in emergency mode?

Rely-a-light in emergency mode is NOT a fire hazard. The US Fire and Safety Administration reports that 33% of fatal home fires are caused by candles used for light during power outages. This is one of the main reasons that we created this product. With correct use, our product is NOT a fire hazard and could prevent home accidents.

13. Is my Rely-a-light safe to leave on all the time?

Yes, the lamp itself simply functions as any other table lamp and is safe to leave on as long as you desire. However, the emergency function of the lamp is designed to be used in power outages only and it will run for 24 hours or until power is restored. The emergency mode of Rely-a-light is designed to keep the consumer from damaging the battery so it will turn itself off before damage occurs.

14. If I order a Rely-a-light, can I have it shipped to someone else?

Yes, you have the option in our order form to have separate billing and shipping addresses so that you can purchase a light as a gift and have it directly shipped to your loved one. We ship anywhere within the United States.

15. Will you ship outside of the United States?

It depends on the country that you wish to send it to. At this time the Rely-a-light operates only on 120 volts AC at 60 hertz. Many other countries operate on different voltage and hertz cycles that are not compatible with the United States system. If the country that you wish to send the lamp to is compatible with United States systems then we can ship to that country. We are expecting to offer internationally compatible products soon.

16. Is the emergency function of the Rely-a-light dependable?

Yes, we have extensively tested our product in real life situations for three years before bringing it to the public.

17. What is the proper care and maintenance for the lamp?

Treat it as any other table lamp, wipe clean with damp cloth, dust as normal, change bulb in top socket when it burns out and KEEP LAMP PLUGGED IN AT ALL TIMES so that it is ready to light your way when power is lost.

18. Can I unplug my Rely-a-light at night and use as a night light?

This is not recommended as the lamp is designed for use during power outages and use as a night light can and will reduce the life of your battery. It is important that you preserve the battery so that our lamp is there when you need it most!

19. Can I get replacement parts for this lamp?

We have shades available for order. However if the lamp needs servicing it should be returned to us. Beyond the warranty period we will repair or replace necessary parts for a fee plus shipping.

20. Can I ship this lamp back for repair once the warranty expires?

Yes, if the lamp needs servicing after the warranty expires we will repair or replace necessary parts for a fee plus shipping.

21. What will the turnaround time be for a lamp shipped back for repair?

Approximately two weeks.

22. Will I have online support if I have any problems with the lamp?

Yes, we have a troubleshooting area on our website that should answer any questions you might have. If you are unable to resolve your problem by using this resource, you may contact our technical department at keene_jones@relyalight.com.

23. Are there any special power requirements for the lamp?

No, it can be plugged into any normal 110 volt rece

We ship anywhere within the United States.15. Will you ship outside of the United States?It depends on the country that you wish to send it to. At this time the Rely-a-light operates only on 120 volts AC at 60 hertz. Many other countries operate on different voltage and hertz cycles that are not compatible with the United States system. If the country that you wish to send the lamp to is compatible with United States systems then we can ship to that country. We are expecting to offer internationally compatible products soon.16. Is the emergency function of the Rely-a-light dependable?Yes, we have extensively tested our product in real life situations for three years before bringing it to the public.17. What is the proper care and maintenance for the lamp?Treat it as any other table lamp, wipe clean with damp cloth, dust as normal, change bulb in top socket when it burns out and KEEP LAMP PLUGGED IN AT ALL TIMES so that it is ready to light your way when power is lost.18. Can I unplug my Rely-a-light at night and use as a night light?This is not recommended as the lamp is designed for use during power outages and use as a night light can and will reduce the life of your battery. It is important that you preserve the battery so that our lamp is there when you need it most!19. Can I get replacement parts for this lamp?We have shades available for order. However if the lamp needs servicing it should be returned to us. Beyond the warranty period we will repair or replace necessary parts for a fee plus shipping.20. Can I ship this lamp back for repair once the warranty expires?Yes, if the lamp needs servicing after the warranty expires we will repair or replace necessary parts for a fee plus shipping.21. What will the turnaround time be for a lamp shipped back for repair?Approximately two weeks.22. Will I have online support if I have any problems with the lamp?Yes, we have a troubleshooting area on our website that should answer any questions you might have. If you are unable to resolve your problem by using this resource, you may contact our technical department at keene_jones@relyalight.com.23. Are there any special power requirements for the lamp?No, it can be plugged into any normal 110 volt rece

story:
We have a new thread-

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/juicer-battery-the-best-smartphone-battery-ever--3/x/8096989

*The user with the most referrals will receive the War Ready package! *



Follow Our Twitter!  https://twitter.com/TheJuicerBatter


The official Facebook page!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thejuicerbattery/724587734266915


We are updating our Indiegogo daily! Videos to come and more information!

We are almost done with more videos! 


We are now uploading the files to our website, it should be ready shortly! 

http://www.thejuicerbattery.com


We have fixed our paypal and now taking contributions! 


Featured Q-A:

Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?

A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.





By using cunning edge technology being developed by our engineers, The Juicer , will be a one of a kind battery that is influenced from previous batteries, but with a reconstructed and innovative twist, which potentially could allow our battery to charge faster and last longer than anything available on the market. A special casing aluminum frame cover for the back of the phone is also being developed to make it more environmentally friendly, allowing it to be charged by any light source; all thanks to technology found on larger solar panels but on a micro scaled level. The Juicer will be a revolutionary battery that finally uses all of the technology available in today’s world. 


The Juicer Battery-


                                       

                                             

 

                                        


  • The Juicer is a small two person company influenced by the needs of our customer. We recognized how some people would carry chargers with them all the time. We also recognized how battery power is a huge consideration when buying a new cell phone. As a project for college, our lead German engineer, Vandal Schnizel, designed a micro prototype battery, which vastly exceeded his expectations. By modifying existing battery topologies to be more power efficient, he was able to record an astonishing power density that is 1900 times greater than other lithium ion batteries. Teaming up with me, Paul Bednard, lead business and marketing for The Juicer, we had a dream to use the technology Schnizel found on a macro scale to essentially create the worlds longest lasting cell phone battery. High on dreams but short on money, we came to indiegogo to help fund our revolutionary battery.  



FASTER CHARING and longer battery-


  • The world's highest capacity battery @ 13440mAh. More than 4 times than the original capacity & slimmer than other extended battery.  We estimate on heavy use, this battery can handle up to 40+ hours of internet browsing, 48 hours of HD movie watching, or 84 hours of 3g talk time. This can manage around 30 hours of screen-on time in a battery endurance run.    
  • We estimate that this battery charges around 20-40% faster than the original factory one. Testing is still not complete, and may change after time.
  • A fiber optic USB 3.1 cable is also included. This USB cable will become the standard in the future.

   

  About the battery -                   

     


  • The Juicer uses the most innovative, groundbreaking lithium-ion battery available. 

  • Our battery reinvents typical electrode structure from standard li-ion batteries by adding a three-dimensional anode and cathode, replacing the modern two-dimensional anode and cathode, by doing so it increases the surface area; therefore, resulting in more chemical reactions to take place in the same amount of space, theoretically causing more discharge speed and charging. 

  •  Along with other groundbreaking things we can’t discuss, this would make our battery the best out there allowing it to last an estimated 25-70 percent longer than your generic smart phone battery. 

FLEXIBILITY-


Flexibility was one of our main concerns, which is why we designed multiple batterys to be able to fit into today’s most popular smart phones. 

So far we only have tested it in the Samsung Galaxy; however, we are in the process of making batteries that are able to fit in other popular smart phones on the market. So far, we have only thought about adding the phones listed below, but could consider expanding more. 

  • LG Phones
  • HTC One
  • Samsung Galaxys 
  • Sony phones  

Faster Charging -


 A new laser fiber optic USB cable is also being included.   
Fiber Optic USB 3.1 Cable Specs-     

                                                                                                                                                                                           
  1. More Durable than standard cables. 
  2. More Bendable than standard cables.              
  3. Bi Direction and dual channel. 
  4. 50 percent thinner than standard cables
  5. 75 percent lighter than standard cables. 
  6. The Type-C 3.1 connector become the new standard of usb cables which will out-date full-sized USB and micro USB.
  7.  7.9 GBPS download Speeds. USB 2.0 supports 480 mbs/sec
  8. Current range 2A-5A. Voltage range 5- 15V. Devices which consume alot of energy will be able to receive more power.
------
With breaking new technologically, we are developing new and very fast chargers but we are facing major challenges on how to shrink it to fit in other smartphones. It is only a matter of time before we relase updated chargers!

  • This cable, which is still being developed, is the future of USB.

Charging in the sunlight!




Since we know how inconvenient it can be to have your phone die. A new solar panel case was designed to not only keep your phone secured, but to charge your phone from any light source. 


  • We separate ourselves from the competitors by using an aluminum frame instead of a cheap plastic frame.  Our solar panels have technology found in larger solar panels, but to a nano-scaled degree, which gives us an unlimited range of motion to charge your phone, compared to other solar panels cases that must be at a 90 degree angle to the sun.

  •  The best aspect of this technology is its spectrum range of light; enabling it to be charged in the shade. Testing is still being done to a larger scale; however, we estimate that it takes an hour to charge completely in the light, and it takes two hours when cloudy.  

     The battery comes with a solar panel charging case available in different            colors and styles to appeal to the consumer.        


Goals-

 








-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q)  What countries is this available for, and do i pay for shipping?


A) We will ship to all countries and offer free shipping with the slowest and lowest priority available.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


What phones will the battery be available for? 

Hopefully we will make it for all of the top end smart phones but so far we have plans for LG phones , HTC phones, Samsung Galaxys, and Sony phones.  

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How  long will it take for it to be manufactured?

A) Testing is still being done to ensure this product is safe under all weather conditions. Once it passes testing and enough money is raised, the Juicer begin manufacturing for a large. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How is your battery the fastest on the market?

 A) By changing what we know about how the battery works, our engineers reinvented the wheel, by creating a more efficient powerful battery by alternating its cathode and anode structures, and other secrets we can’t give out yet.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q)  How long does your battery last? 

 A) We estimate up to 50-75 percent increase to your phones battery power compared with the stock battery.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How long is the fiber optic USB cable?

A) The fiber optic cable is up to 3 meters long.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 Q)Will the fiber optic cable be compatible with usb 3.0 and 2.0? 

 A) Yes. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) Will the cable help it charge faster?  

A) Yes the cable will help the battery charge faster

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) How fast will the battery charge? 

A)  Due to emerging advances in electrical engineering, our battery charges up to 50 percent faster than standard batteries.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 Q) Will there be more color cases?

 A)  Yes, we offer the colors available above and expanding. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  Q) How does the solar panel case work?  

  A) Nanotechnology which is influenced on how larger solar panels worked, inspired our engineer to create the most effective solar charging case that is available on the market?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Q) 'Is the battery the same size as the original factory one?

A) Yes, The Juicer Battery keeps the same dimensions as the  Galaxy S5 battery.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

More FAQ Questions to Come!



Special Deal! 



Get the most referrals and we will offer you the War Ready for free! 



  •  The  ultimate goal is to provide the maximum amount of convenience for our customer. By adding another battery, you now could potentially have up to a week of power for your mobile device. Helpful for business men and women who constantly travel will now never have to worry about missing a call.

story:
Cellular Providers are Being Put on Notice

Cellular providers are continually telling us that they have the best plans for us. The plans are new and improved to give us just what we need… at an excessive cost. The latest smartphone has the most “amazing” new features… but they aren’t innovative at all. NEBI.MOBI is the most cost-effective, innovative service and smartphone to ever hit the market. Cell phone providers think they have a lock on the services, but NEBI.MOBI, with your help, is going to show them how it’s really done.

As Seen On

     

     

     


What Cellular Telephone Services Don’t Tell You—AKA The Deception

Telephone data is transformed from analog to digital content. All cell phone plans indicate a separation between talking minutes, number of text messages, and amount of data use. These are actually all the same service, provided the same way. By separating them and limiting amounts of each one for different packages, they deceive consumers into believing that different rates should apply to talk, text, and data. Why are we paying three different rates with different limitations for the same thing? All of these services are digitally provided. They should all be unlimited at one low price. This is a sales gimmick and it locks customers into two year contracts and fees for overages that are outrageous. 

No More Hype, Just Honesty and Innovation

We need to move away from the hype and misleading information of cellular providers and their famous two year contracts and three prices for the same service. Instead of depending on cellular network signals, at NEBI.MOBI we are using Wi-Fi based network signals and Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies to deliver superior service without the inflated price tag. These technologies are capable of supporting talk, text, and data – which is really all just data. This will bring smartphones to an entirely new level of capability and accessibility. That’s right, innovation in the mobile industry. This is a rare gem.

Can I use VOIP?

VOIP technology has become increasingly efficient. Our codecs secure encrypted connections and maintain lightning-fast data transfer speed. Smartphone designs, whether you consider ours or your current phone, have advanced to the point of being able to support VOIP apps reliably.

Is Wi-Fi Up to the Challenge?

Wi-Fi is not controlled by government agencies and does not incur huge government-related fees and taxes. Wi-Fi signals have increased in capability and availability to a point that makes it faster and easier to access from a growing number of sources every day. We believe that free public Wi-Fi access should be available in every city. Free public access should be provided by each city’s leaders as a show of understanding of the importance of communication and connection in today’s world. One of our goals with funding of NEBI.MOBI is to increase advocacy nationwide for free public Wi-Fi in entire cities. Until we fully succeed, you can supplement your Wi-Fi access points through data-only cellular plans for achieving a wider coverage area, and still enjoy substantial savings compared to your traditional smartphone bills. You deserve to be able to connect wherever you are, without having to search for a free hotspot or pay a cellular service for data usage.

Meet EVE 008—She’s Gorgeous and Highly Capable

EVE 008 is our remarkable touchscreen smartphone. It actually has a replaceable battery that will eliminate the need for bulky charging cases or a tangle of charging cords and panicked searches for places to charge your phone. Two phone lines can be combined on one device by using two SIM card services simultaneously, eliminating the need for a work and home cell phone, lightening the load in your purse or pocket. An SD slot allows for expansion and transfer of data without dealing with additional technology or apps. Data is saved even if the phone is injured. And EVE 008 doesn’t carry the price tag of smartphones with even half of her capability. That doesn’t even begin to describe what EVE 008 can do for you.

EVE 008’s specs:

  • Dual SIM Card (1 Standard, 1 Micro) 
  • Android 4.2.2 
  • Quad-core 1.3 GHz Processor 
  • RAM 1GB 
  • Internal Storage 4GB 
  • SD Card slot for 32GB storage expansion 
  • FM Radio 
  • A-GPS 
  • Bluetooth 4.0 
  • Wi-Fi and mobile AP 
  • IPS bright screen, 4.5 inch multi-touch 
  • Ultra-slim body, 0.346 inch thin 
  • Lithium swappable battery, 2000 mAh 
  • Software supported 8MP camera with LED flash light 
  • Software supported 2MP front facing camera 
  • Quad-band GSM (850/900/1800/1900 Mhz) for World-Wide compatibility 
  • 4G network data speeds (i.e. T-Mobile, AT&T, Metro PCS and more for US)
  • Special fast charger, USB cable, and noise canceling headphones are included

CHOICE: When is the Last Time You Were REALLY Given a Choice?

NEBI.MOBI services allow you to use EVE 008 or your own smartphone. You get to choose. This is real choice. No contracts attached. We refuse to impose limits like cell providers.

The Science and More

Cellular networks, Wi-Fi, VoIP, expanding network infrastructures, GSM, codecs, telecom providers… It can be overwhelming. We have done the research, studied the options, explored the field, experimented, and applied the science. We have designed and manufactured a value-oriented smartphone capable of operating via Wi-Fi or current mobile carriers. Our Android OS has been boosted for higher power efficiency. We have submitted for trademarks, secured FCC license approvals, negotiated service contracts, and coded and test our apps and service architecture. 

As we begin, we will need a lot of subscribers with current Wi-Fi optimized VOIP devices to help us drive down the wholesale minutes pricing from telecom servers. We want to make sure that we can support the greatest number of customers with optimal bandwidth for a positive user experience. 

Another use of funds will be the deployment of free public Wi-Fi coverage. We want to expand the availability to more places so that everyone, whether they use our service or not, has access to free public Wi-Fi. 

Reasons You May Not Have Considered that Might Make You Go Hmmm….

This device and network has more value than you may think. With our system:

  • Teens cannot text and drive as they move through active Wi-Fi zones
  • You can travel worldwide and avoid roaming charges once our Wi-Fi based phone service is live
  • You can resell your old expensive cell phone at near retail and use one that’s even better - Pocket the extra savings from the resale
  • The two SIM card strategy allows you to carry one phone for two lines
  • No contracts
  • No dragging around a separate charger with our quick-swap battery
  • You can let your young child play games on EVE 008, which you surely shouldn’t do with a $600-$800 smartphone
  • SD card slot for expansion and easy transfer of data – no technical assistance or fancy programs needed
  • Tons of Android Apps available for use with EVE 008
  • Skype and Wi-Fi chat applications allow communications with family and friends around the world
  • EVE 008 can serve as a low cost temporary or permanent replacement phone if your current smartphone is stolen or broken 
  • NEBI.MOBI can easily replace home phone service as a much lower cost option
  • Regardless from reaching to our funding goal, anyone who donates $175 will receive EVE 008 with our thanks - No tax, no shipping, no handling charges! What a great value!
  • As soon as we have the funding and are ready to activate NEBI.MOBI service, our backers will pay only $60/YEAR for the unlimited mobile phone service
  • EVE 008 is totally hot—have you seen her pics?

Innovation and the New Era of Smartphones Needs You

My wife and I believe in innovation. We believe in this project. We have invested time and money into establishing as much as we can and now we need help to get this project off the ground and let it fly. Your donation will be a part of a new era of smartphone services. The funds raised will be used to launch the platform, acquire users, and drive down the price of our devices and services. Higher volume equals lower costs to consumers. We need to pay for high-end telecom servers to ensure proper levels of bandwidth for the best experience for our customers. Funds will also help us deploy our plans for increased free Wi-Fi coverage. 

This is a REVOLUTION

Be a REBEL—Revolutionary Evolution Backer for Escape from Limitations. Escape from the constraints of the same old mobile delivery systems that have been around forever. They keep charging more because they think we are trapped. It’s time to show them that the Innovation Revolution has started and you are a part of it. How many times does an opportunity like this present itself? In this industry, not very often. In fact, almost never. Be a REBEL and join the revolution. It’s like the Boston Tea Party for the 21st century.

Can I Really Make a Difference and What’s in it for Me Besides Awesome REBEL status?

To be a part of NEBI.MOBI, you can do two things. First, you can spread the word. Tell people about us. Tell them what we are doing. Show them the EVE 008 specs and cool features. See how your friends and connections feel about freedom from cellular carriers and expensive plans and devices. Link to our campaign. Use your social media to help us educate people about our project. Tell them to be a REBEL! Encourage people to unchain themselves from the cellular carriers who hold them captive! They take your business for granted believing you have no alternative. BUT YOU DO. We need you to help us get this message out! Help the Revolution grow. Add to our REBELs!

Second, you can make a monetary contribution to help us finish up funding the project. We’ve done a lot on our own, but we still need some help. As for you, there are some really awesome perks and rewards for making donations. T-shirts, parties, free smartphones, starring in our advertising, and naming our next mobile device model are up for grabs along with other thank you gifts. In fact, the first 50 backers at the $149 level will receive an EVE 008 with our thanks! The best reward will be your freedom from cellular providers. Let’s face it, we’re all sick of their manipulations. 

If we cannot reach our goal on Indiegogo, it will be impossible for us to secure competitive pricing from potential vendors in a timely manner. If we can reach our goal, we will be able to pass along cost savings to our customers. We want to provide you with unlimited mobile service for $60 per year or less, and an affordable, efficient, optimized mobile device for the lowest possible cost to you without requiring any contracts.

This is the first REAL innovation in the mobile industry and you can be a part of it. Claim your status as a founder of the new wave. How cool is that?

Achievement of our goal will allow us to move to our Stretch Goals, including specialized EVE 008 cases and extra batteries. 


Yes, this is an ambitious target for us, but it is very possible to hit with your support. Reaching these levels of a volume reduces our manufacturing cost per device, and we would like pass such savings to you by including a beautiful, custom fit, see-through case for protecting your smartphone… 

Successfully funding this much means that we now reached to a production volume that makes economically feasible to manufacture our smartphones in additional colors without an extra cost to our backers. Now, you can select what color you would like for yourself…


Wow, this is like a dream number for us. This amount of a funding will also allow us to take advantage of some serious economies of scale. We will be able to send you an extra battery with each EVE 008 device, too… Thank you a million times… 

     

If I Buy an EVE 008, What’s Next?

EVE 008 has already met all of the regulatory approvals necessary for entering the manufacturing process. When our funding rises, we will reach a point of better economic feasibility for manufacturing volumes. At that point, we can focus our energy on pairing this amazing value device with its complementing mobile phone service. 

EVE 008 will arrive ready-to-use with any GSM mobile carrier service. We are continuing to work on NEBI.MOBI mobile phone service as the funding increases. When our backers support us in a way that allows a reasonable cost decrease for the provision of the service, it will be activated. At that time, we will alert you that the system is ready to add your $60 per year unlimited mobile service plan.

Who Are You, Anyway?

I am Nebi Cem Erdogan, and with my wife Eve, we are completely dedicated to this project. I have studied at Columbia University and MIT to explore economics, strategy, and innovation management. I have worked at several Fortune 500 companies. I am passionate about innovation and entrepreneurship. We are ready to take on whatever challenges come with our commitment to the NEBI.MOBI project. And we want you to be a part of it. We are so grateful for each and every contribution made. Your belief in the success of NEBI.MOBI and EVE 008 is a gift for which we are very thankful.

Please become a part of our plan to make smartphone services fairly priced and available to more people. Be a part of innovation. Be someone who creates change. Be a REBEL And let’s just teach those cellular providers a lesson or two while we’re at it.
story_txt:
Cellular Providers are Being Put on Notice

Cellular providers are continually telling us that they have the best plans for us. The plans are new and improved to give us just what we need… at an excessive cost. The latest smartphone has the most “amazing” new features… but they aren’t innovative at all. NEBI.MOBI is the most cost-effective, innovative service and smartphone to ever hit the market. Cell phone providers think they have a lock on the services, but NEBI.MOBI, with your help, is going to show them how it’s really done.
As Seen On



     


     

     

What Cellular Telephone Services Don’t Tell You—AKA The Deception
Telephone data is transformed from analog to digital content. All cell phone plans indicate a separation between talking minutes, number of text messages, and amount of data use. These are actually all the same service, provided the same way. By separating them and limiting amounts of each one for different packages, they deceive consumers into believing that different rates should apply to talk, text, and data. Why are we paying three different rates with different limitations for the same thing? All of these services are digitally provided. They should all be unlimited at one low price. This is a sales gimmick and it locks customers into two year contracts and fees for overages that are outrageous. 

No More Hype, Just Honesty and Innovation
We need to move away from the hype and misleading information of cellular providers and their famous two year contracts and three prices for the same service. Instead of depending on cellular network signals, at NEBI.MOBI we are using Wi-Fi based network signals and Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies to deliver superior service without the inflated price tag. These technologies are capable of supporting talk, text, and data – which is really all just data. This will bring smartphones to an entirely new level of capability and accessibility. That’s right, innovation in the mobile industry. This is a rare gem.



Can I use VOIP?
VOIP technology has become increasingly efficient. Our codecs secure encrypted connections and maintain lightning-fast data transfer speed. Smartphone designs, whether you consider ours or your current phone, have advanced to the point of being able to support VOIP apps reliably.
Is Wi-Fi Up to the Challenge?
Wi-Fi is not controlled by government agencies and does not incur huge government-related fees and taxes. Wi-Fi signals have increased in capability and availability to a point that makes it faster and easier to access from a growing number of sources every day. We believe that free public Wi-Fi access should be available in every city. Free public access should be provided by each city’s leaders as a show of understanding of the importance of communication and connection in today’s world. One of our goals with funding of NEBI.MOBI is to increase advocacy nationwide for free public Wi-Fi in entire cities. Until we fully succeed, you can supplement your Wi-Fi access points through data-only cellular plans for achieving a wider coverage area, and still enjoy substantial savings compared to your traditional smartphone bills. You deserve to be able to connect wherever you are, without having to search for a free hotspot or pay a cellular service for data usage.



Meet EVE 008—She’s Gorgeous and Highly Capable

EVE 008 is our remarkable touchscreen smartphone. It actually has a replaceable battery that will eliminate the need for bulky charging cases or a tangle of charging cords and panicked searches for places to charge your phone. Two phone lines can be combined on one device by using two SIM card services simultaneously, eliminating the need for a work and home cell phone, lightening the load in your purse or pocket. An SD slot allows for expansion and transfer of data without dealing with additional technology or apps. Data is saved even if the phone is injured. And EVE 008 doesn’t carry the price tag of smartphones with even half of her capability. That doesn’t even begin to describe what EVE 008 can do for you.
EVE 008’s specs:

Dual SIM Card (1 Standard, 1 Micro) 
Android 4.2.2 
Quad-core 1.3 GHz Processor 
RAM 1GB 
Internal Storage 4GB 
SD Card slot for 32GB storage expansion 
FM Radio 
A-GPS 
Bluetooth 4.0 
Wi-Fi and mobile AP 
IPS bright screen, 4.5 inch multi-touch 
Ultra-slim body, 0.346 inch thin 
Lithium swappable battery, 2000 mAh 
Software supported 8MP camera with LED flash light 
Software supported 2MP front facing camera 
Quad-band GSM (850/900/1800/1900 Mhz) for World-Wide compatibility 
4G network data speeds (i.e. T-Mobile, AT&T, Metro PCS and more for US)
Special fast charger, USB cable, and noise canceling headphones are included






CHOICE: When is the Last Time You Were REALLY Given a Choice?
NEBI.MOBI services allow you to use EVE 008 or your own smartphone. You get to choose. This is real choice. No contracts attached. We refuse to impose limits like cell providers.
The Science and More
Cellular networks, Wi-Fi, VoIP, expanding network infrastructures, GSM, codecs, telecom providers… It can be overwhelming. We have done the research, studied the options, explored the field, experimented, and applied the science. We have designed and manufactured a value-oriented smartphone capable of operating via Wi-Fi or current mobile carriers. Our Android OS has been boosted for higher power efficiency. We have submitted for trademarks, secured FCC license approvals, negotiated service contracts, and coded and test our apps and service architecture. 
As we begin, we will need a lot of subscribers with current Wi-Fi optimized VOIP devices to help us drive down the wholesale minutes pricing from telecom servers. We want to make sure that we can support the greatest number of customers with optimal bandwidth for a positive user experience. 
Another use of funds will be the deployment of free public Wi-Fi coverage. We want to expand the availability to more places so that everyone, whether they use our service or not, has access to free public Wi-Fi. 
Reasons You May Not Have Considered that Might Make You Go Hmmm….
This device and network has more value than you may think. With our system:

Teens cannot text and drive as they move through active Wi-Fi zones
You can travel worldwide and avoid roaming charges once our Wi-Fi based phone service is live
You can resell your old expensive cell phone at near retail and use one that’s even better - Pocket the extra savings from the resale
The two SIM card strategy allows you to carry one phone for two lines
No contracts
No dragging around a separate charger with our quick-swap battery
You can let your young child play games on EVE 008, which you surely shouldn’t do with a $600-$800 smartphone
SD card slot for expansion and easy transfer of data – no technical assistance or fancy programs needed
Tons of Android Apps available for use with EVE 008
Skype and Wi-Fi chat applications allow communications with family and friends around the world
EVE 008 can serve as a low cost temporary or permanent replacement phone if your current smartphone is stolen or broken 
NEBI.MOBI can easily replace home phone service as a much lower cost option
Regardless from reaching to our funding goal, anyone who donates $175 will receive EVE 008 with our thanks - No tax, no shipping, no handling charges! What a great value!
As soon as we have the funding and are ready to activate NEBI.MOBI service, our backers will pay only $60/YEAR for the unlimited mobile phone service
EVE 008 is totally hot—have you seen her pics?

Innovation and the New Era of Smartphones Needs You
My wife and I believe in innovation. We believe in this project. We have invested time and money into establishing as much as we can and now we need help to get this project off the ground and let it fly. Your donation will be a part of a new era of smartphone services. The funds raised will be used to launch the platform, acquire users, and drive down the price of our devices and services. Higher volume equals lower costs to consumers. We need to pay for high-end telecom servers to ensure proper levels of bandwidth for the best experience for our customers. Funds will also help us deploy our plans for increased free Wi-Fi coverage. 
This is a REVOLUTION
Be a REBEL—Revolutionary Evolution Backer for Escape from Limitations. Escape from the constraints of the same old mobile delivery systems that have been around forever. They keep charging more because they think we are trapped. It’s time to show them that the Innovation Revolution has started and you are a part of it. How many times does an opportunity like this present itself? In this industry, not very often. In fact, almost never. Be a REBEL and join the revolution. It’s like the Boston Tea Party for the 21st century.
Can I Really Make a Difference and What’s in it for Me Besides Awesome REBEL status?
To be a part of NEBI.MOBI, you can do two things. First, you can spread the word. Tell people about us. Tell them what we are doing. Show them the EVE 008 specs and cool features. See how your friends and connections feel about freedom from cellular carriers and expensive plans and devices. Link to our campaign. Use your social media to help us educate people about our project. Tell them to be a REBEL! Encourage people to unchain themselves from the cellular carriers who hold them captive! They take your business for granted believing you have no alternative. BUT YOU DO. We need you to help us get this message out! Help the Revolution grow. Add to our REBELs!
Second, you can make a monetary contribution to help us finish up funding the project. We’ve done a lot on our own, but we still need some help. As for you, there are some really awesome perks and rewards for making donations. T-shirts, parties, free smartphones, starring in our advertising, and naming our next mobile device model are up for grabs along with other thank you gifts. In fact, the first 50 backers at the $149 level will receive an EVE 008 with our thanks! The best reward will be your freedom from cellular providers. Let’s face it, we’re all sick of their manipulations. 
If we cannot reach our goal on Indiegogo, it will be impossible for us to secure competitive pricing from potential vendors in a timely manner. If we can reach our goal, we will be able to pass along cost savings to our customers. We want to provide you with unlimited mobile service for $60 per year or less, and an affordable, efficient, optimized mobile device for the lowest possible cost to you without requiring any contracts.
This is the first REAL innovation in the mobile industry and you can be a part of it. Claim your status as a founder of the new wave. How cool is that?
Achievement of our goal will allow us to move to our Stretch Goals, including specialized EVE 008 cases and extra batteries. 

Yes, this is an ambitious target for us, but it is very possible to hit with your support. Reaching these levels of a volume reduces our manufacturing cost per device, and we would like pass such savings to you by including a beautiful, custom fit, see-through case for protecting your smartphone… 



Successfully funding this much means that we now reached to a production volume that makes economically feasible to manufacture our smartphones in additional colors without an extra cost to our backers. Now, you can select what color you would like for yourself…



Wow, this is like a dream number for us. This amount of a funding will also allow us to take advantage of some serious economies of scale. We will be able to send you an extra battery with each EVE 008 device, too… Thank you a million times… 





     











If I Buy an EVE 008, What’s Next?
EVE 008 has already met all of the regulatory approvals necessary for entering the manufacturing process. When our funding rises, we will reach a point of better economic feasibility for manufacturing volumes. At that point, we can focus our energy on pairing this amazing value device with its complementing mobile phone service. 
EVE 008 will arrive ready-to-use with any GSM mobile carrier service. We are continuing to work on NEBI.MOBI mobile phone service as the funding increases. When our backers support us in a way that allows a reasonable cost decrease for the provision of the service, it will be activated. At that time, we will alert you that the system is ready to add your $60 per year unlimited mobile service plan.



Who Are You, Anyway?

I am Nebi Cem Erdogan, and with my wife Eve, we are completely dedicated to this project. I have studied at Columbia University and MIT to explore economics, strategy, and innovation management. I have worked at several Fortune 500 companies. I am passionate about innovation and entrepreneurship. We are ready to take on whatever challenges come with our commitment to the NEBI.MOBI project. And we want you to be a part of it. We are so grateful for each and every contribution made. Your belief in the success of NEBI.MOBI and EVE 008 is a gift for which we are very thankful.
Please become a part of our plan to make smartphone services fairly priced and available to more people. Be a part of innovation. Be someone who creates change. Be a REBEL And let’s just teach those cellular providers a lesson or two while we’re at it.

story: My name is Logan Greenwood and I am a 13 year old American who loves gaming and technology. I am a PC gamer (mainly). I also enjoy video editing in my spare time and am involved in robotics after school. This year has been a huge year for me personally as I have gotten baptized, achieved a Black Belt in Tae Kwon Do, and now have established a new goal. I have decided  to build my own PC gaming rig that I can be proud of and can learn from for future reference for a possible career. This is where you come in. I need your help to fund this project. I hope to reach an amount of $1,000 U.S dollars. I would greatly appreciate any amount of money that you choose to donate to my campaign. If you are unable to donate you can possibly spread the word to people who can appreciate building their own gaming system. My plan is to video the entire build and acknowledge each individual who donated to help achieve this next milestone in my life.

story:
Featured on


Preorder your Smartstones at http://smartstones.co/shop


Smartstones® Touch™ is a nonverbal communication device, a palm-sized stone controlled through simple touch and motion gestures. You can send messages, reminders, and location based alerts to people in your private network using our :connect app. Our gesture to speech app, :prose, lets you speak phrases aloud through simple swipes, taps, and shakes.

A truly enchanting experience, the physical Smartstones serve as a human interface device,  actuating messages from existing and future smartphone and tablet apps as unique vibration+light+sound patterns. You can configure your gestures and messages using our app - and can send them, from either the stone or the app, to your family or friends, or anyone who you need to communicate with. You can also direct your messages to others via SMS, push notifications, or pre-recorded voice messages, using the free :connect and :prose apps.  

SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT -->>

Children. Coordinate pickups, check in quickly and easily, and find peace of mind.

Caregiving. Know when they wander away, or if they need something urgent.

Friendship. Create your own private messaging codes, and keep each other safe.

Security. Mobilize quickly and discreetly with color and vibration patterns.

Healthcare. Reduce anxiety and increase compliance and safety.

Travel. Give more independence while remaining "in touch" as a group


We demo'd Smartstones LIVE on Fox News. 

This shows off how you could use Smartstones as an alternative to all the costly personal emergency response systems, as well as gps tracking devices. We designed an app called :connect, that shows how you can keep your family completely in step, present and aware of each other.

Leather Cuff: Our tanned saddle leather cuff easily snaps onto your wrist, transforming your Smartstones Touch into a hands-free wrist communicator. Designed by Amy DiGregorio, an award-winning designer based in Santa Barbara, CA. All work is hand crafted, and selected from the finest materials. *stone sold separately.

Gold or Silver Pendant: Choose between silver or gold-plated pendant with elegant leather necklace. You can also attach the pendant to your favorite necklace, if you prefer. It's a perfect way to keep loved ones close to your heart, and the Smartstones Touch can be popped in and out for easy wireless charging. *stone sold separately.

Qi Wireless Inductive Charger & Travel Case: We believe in making sustainable choices so we are opting out of fancy packaging and have designed a special Inductive Charging base and cover that serves as both the packaging AND the product. You will receive one charger for each stone you order. E.g. A "BFF" 2 pack will come with two charging cases.

Calling all artisans - We invite you to create your own smart wearables: We want to invite jewelry and wearable designers to find creative applications for Smartstones Touch. We have some standardized elements you can use to integrate Smartstones into your own wearable designs.


____________________________________________________________________
BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR HANDS ON OUR BLUETOOTH VERSION. 
SIMPLY SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT TO BACK OUR PROJECT NOW!!

IF YOU WANT OUR CELLULAR VERSION, JOIN OUR WAIT LIST.

____________________________________________________________________


Smartstones are designed for accessibility. We have worked with the blind, autistic, elderly, parents, spouses, academic researchers, PhD's and scientists.

We take communication for granted, until it is taken away. 

Smartstones Touch has no screen, uses flexible multi-sensory outputs, and has an intuitive interface that is adaptable and easy to learn. With your help, lets put a Smartstones Touch in the hands of more than one million families next year, and help them find their words, connect and thrive.

When one out of 68 children are born with some form of autism, 285 million people are visually impaired, and 360 million people have disabling hearing loss, accessibility becomes imperative in truly break-through technology. These massive communities of people with communication challenges are underserved by mainstream technology, and specialized technology often costs ridiculous and arbitrary sums.

Tri-Counties Regional Center supports over 12,000 individuals with developmental disabilities including Autism, Epilepsy, Cerebral Palsy and Intellectual Challenges. There are 21 regional centers supporting over 300,000 Californians with disabilities to live life with more vitality and connectedness to our community.

Support Smartstones by funding our campaign today. We will help them by making Smartstones and our services available to their entire community.




____________________________________________________________________
BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR HANDS ON OUR BLUETOOTH VERSION. 
SIMPLY SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT TO BACK OUR PROJECT NOW!!

IF YOU WANT OUR CELLULAR VERSION, JOIN OUR WAIT LIST.

____________________________________________________________________



Smartstones :prose app*: "Find your voice" - Express yourself with simple swipes, taps, shapes and motion gestures. It speaks almost 40 languages. Great for anyone – kids, friends, adults, seniors. Immediately available to backers after this campaign ends as a standalone iOS app, that will also work with Smartstones Touch when we ship. *Patent pending

Projected Capacitive Touch*: Using Projected Capacitive Touch (PCT), the same technology used in smartphone touch screens, the top surface of Smartstones Touch can detect touches such as swipes, taps, and holds before your hand touches the stone, and it will even work through clothing. *Patent pending

Accelerometer & Gyroscope: The Touch includes a 6-axis accelerometer and gyroscope to sense motion. Currently, we’re working on developing complex gesture recognition software, so we can begin compiling a library of gestures to use with Smartstones Touch.

Wireless Inductive Charging: Smartstones Touch is a rechargeable, completely sealed unit that uses Qi-compliant inductive charging circuitry, so you never have to plug it in. Simply lay the stone to sleep in its cradle and it immediately begins charging and lets you know when its refreshed. 

Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE):  The IndieGoGo Edition of Smartstones Touch, in "Chalk" white, uses Bluetooth 4.0 and works with any internet-connected Bluetooth 4.0 compatible device. We are currently developing apps on a number of platforms, including smartphones (iOS and Android), tablets and laptops.

Open API: We will open the Smartstones platform for developers to create apps for a variety of uses. Smartstones Touch can be easily integrated with other internet-connected devices and services, including SMS and voice delivery.

Gestures for sending messages*: We’ve decided to start simple with a handful of easy to remember and easy to use touch and motion gestures. Smartstones will continue to provide free updates as we expand our library of touch and motion gestures. *Patent pending

Hapticon™ Patterns*: Working in cooperation with world renowned researchers, usability experts, academics and visually impaired users, we have arrived at a standard set of Hapticon patterns, composed of vibration, light, and sound. Feel free to use the default combinations or configure your own. *Patent pending

Group Push Reminders and Alerts*: Instantly create and push reminder alerts to one or more stones in your network. Perfect for reminding grandpa to take his heart medication, or coordinating activities for the kids. We recommend co-creating reminders with the people who will receive them, so they can help decide what color and vibration pattern to use, making them more memorable. *Patent pending

Cloud Messaging Platform*: Our sophisticated cloud messaging infrastructure supports messaging, network configuration, and data storage with scalability, advanced security and high reliability. *Patent pending

Material: We are developing a custom case material that feels like natural stone. Our Materials engineer worked at Apple for 11 years and was responsible for many of their patented material innovations.

Shape: Smartstones Touch was designed to fit comfortably in your hand, like a smooth river stone, with every dimension unique so you can use it with your eyes closed.

Size & Weight:  10mm x 40mm x 60mm or ½” x 1 ¾” x 2 ½”; fits comfortably into the small coin pocket of your favorite jeans. Only 10 grams.

Waterproof:  Completely sealed unit.



____________________________________________________________________
BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR HANDS ON OUR BLUETOOTH VERSION. 
SIMPLY SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT TO BACK OUR PROJECT NOW!!

IF YOU WANT OUR CELLULAR VERSION, JOIN OUR WAIT LIST.

____________________________________________________________________

      

Smartstones was previewed on The Daily Show with Jon Stewart.

"Smartstones are awe inducing. A lovely way of humanizing technology. I love it." 
    - Jon Stewart, Host of The Daily Show

"Smartstones is the quintessential example of “high tech meets high touch.”
     - Katy Fike, PhD Gerontologist; Co-Founder, Aging2.0; Generator Ventures

"As a mom and a family caregiver, I can’t wait for this one to go to market.*" 
     - Amie Clark, Co-founder of The Senior List and The Senior Resource Network.

“This is groundbreaking." 
     - Lori La Bey, #1 Alzheimer’s influencer, host of Alzheimer’s Speaks

“Smartstones Touch is an uncomplicated approach to letting loved ones reach out to each other.” 
     - John Wider, Board of Directors, AARP Andrus Insurance Fund



Q. How do I use Smartstones Touch?
A. Once you’ve opened the app and configured your stones, you simply select a gesture and assign a "message" to it. 

Q.  How do I read a message coming to me on a Touch?
A.  You can choose to receive your messages as in app push notifications, text messages, or if you have your own Smartstones Touch (e.g. 2pack), the message will present as a combination of vibration, colored lights, and sound. You can identify different messages through the tone or pattern of the vibration, color or pattern of the LED lights, or presence of sound. For example, an “urgent”message triggers bright flashing red lights, a powerful, constant vibration, and a loud sound. In contrast, “I’m okay” triggers a soft pulsating green light, and two short bursts of vibration. Think about these as easily recognizable patterns.

Q.  How does Smartstones Touch connect to the internet?
A.  The first edition of Smartstones Touch uses a Bluetooth Low Energy connection, depending on a paired smartphone or tablet with .

Q.  How do I charge the Touch?
A.  Simply place Smartstones Touch in its charging case, and it will charge automatically via a wireless inductive Qi charger.

Q.  How many messages can I send?
A.  The number of possibilities for light and vibration patterns is enormous, with thousands of possible messages you can send. To start, you’ll get 12 preset messages that you can configure, quickly unlocking more messages and creating your own custom combinations.

We've assembled an amazing team with global consumer electronics, medical and communications experience. We've worked at Apple, Philips, Nike, Microsoft, Frog Design, Smart Design, OXO, Disney and Nokia. We have the capability to execute.


Andreas Forsland | Founder & CEO, Prior to starting Smartstones, Andreas was Senior Director, Brand Experience at Citrix, helping to grow the "GoTo" SaaS collaboration portfolio to become #2 SaaS business worldwide. He was also a Global Design Leader at Philips working on innovative programs with corporate, healthcare, consumer electronics and lighting businesses in Europe, USA and Brasil. He started his career working with several world-class design firms partnering with Porsche, Trek bikes, ING, United Nations and Coca-Cola. He is passionate about improving quality of life via disarmingly simple, ambient products and making a huge social impact.


Leonard Zerman | Co-Founder & CTO, Leonard has more than 30 years professional programming, hardware development and entrepreneurial business experience. Accomplishments include authoring PicBasic Pro Compiler for embedded electronics, developing medical devices and consumer electronic devices, custom end-to-end automation solutions as an Intuit QuickBooks Professional Developer.  Leonard’s early career was with many of the early leading PC industry software companies, including Ashton-Tate, Nantucket, and Quarterdeck.  In recent years, his passion is in cloud based computing, Bluetooth Low Energy and iBeacon technology.


Andrew Duncan | Software Engineer, Andrew was born in London and grew up in Australia and Minnesota. He studied EE at the Caltech, math at UC Santa Cruz, and computer science at UC Santa Barbara. His research has focused on musical electronics, music theory and programming languages. He has worked at Philips Media writing software for digital video, Cerwin-Vega! designing loudspeakers, E-mu Systems writing software for electronic keyboards, at the MAMA Foundation recording and producing jazz CDs, and at Citrix writing network and system software. In addition he has taught physics, chemistry, math, and computer science at the high school, city college, and university levels. Andrew is the author of Objective-C. Pocket Reference. 


Cameron Dexter | Software Engineer, Cameron is an electro-mechanical design engineer with experience in mechanical design/drafting, electronic assembly, programming, robotics, machining/fabrication, and real-world experience in project management, product development, and deployment.


Lucas Cohen | Community Manager, Lucas is a copywriter, marketer, and designer, and a UCSB student, majoring in Communication. He has experience in UI design, UX design, marketing, advertising, and branding. Lucas was part of the original founding team behind Smartstones, and manages our website, blog, and social media accounts.


Zachary Zerman | Design Engineer, Zachary is a design engineer, part of the original founding team behind Smartstones, and a Dos Pueblos High School student junior, who hopes to be majoring in nano-technology engineering. He has experience in 3D CAD design, 3D printing and electronic prototyping. 


Max Burton | Consulting Industrial Designer, Max Burton, the founder of Matter, is a product and interaction designer with over 2 decades of experience. From housewares to digitally enabled products, he is inspired by participating in the creation of the future that melds technology, art, and humanity. Prior to forming Matter, Max worked as the Global Executive Creative Director for product design at frog, the Creative Director of Nike’s Tech Lab, and the VP of Design at Smart in New York. His work has been exhibited at the MoMa in New York, the Design museum in London and the Chicago Athenaeum. 


David Rose | Advisor, Currently CEO at Ditto Labs and researcher at MIT Media Lab's Tangible Media Group. David wrote the book, "Enchanted Objects"; Founded and sold Vitality, a wireless health company that makes the award-winning GlowCap, the first Internet-connected medication packaging, and was co-founder and CEO of Ambient Devices where he created glanceable technology: embedding Internet information in everyday objects like light bulbs and umbrellas to make the physical objects an interface to digital information. David founded Viant’s Innovation Center, an advanced technology group for Fortune 500s including Sony, GM, Schwab, Sprint and Kinkos. He helped build Viant to over 900 people, $140M and a successful IPO.


Mary Anne Masterson | Advisor, Mary Anne Masterson focuses on the intersection of marketing strategy, design innovation and new product development at Mix & Stir. She was previously the Director of Brand Innovation and a Strategy Director at Frog Design, a global innovation leader. She also spent several years at Microsoft, where she led marketing strategy, new product development, and user experience initiatives for the Xbox Experience Group, the Windows Consumer Product Group, and Corporate Marketing & Strategy. She has worked with global leaders, privately held companies, entertainment organizations and early stage start-ups.

story_txt:
Featured on




Preorder your Smartstones at http://smartstones.co/shop


Smartstones® Touch™ is a nonverbal communication device, a palm-sized stone controlled through simple touch and motion gestures. You can send messages, reminders, and location based alerts to people in your private network using our :connect app. Our gesture to speech app, :prose, lets you speak phrases aloud through simple swipes, taps, and shakes.



A truly enchanting experience, the physical Smartstones serve as a human interface device,  actuating messages from existing and future smartphone and tablet apps as unique vibration+light+sound patterns. You can configure your gestures and messages using our app - and can send them, from either the stone or the app, to your family or friends, or anyone who you need to communicate with. You can also direct your messages to others via SMS, push notifications, or pre-recorded voice messages, using the free :connect and :prose apps.  


SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT -->>
____________________________________________________________________
BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR HANDS ON OUR BLUETOOTH VERSION. SIMPLY SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT TO BACK OUR PROJECT NOW!!
IF YOU WANT OUR CELLULAR VERSION, JOIN OUR WAIT LIST.

Children. Coordinate pickups, check in quickly and easily, and find peace of mind.
Caregiving. Know when they wander away, or if they need something urgent.
Friendship. Create your own private messaging codes, and keep each other safe.
Security. Mobilize quickly and discreetly with color and vibration patterns.
Healthcare. Reduce anxiety and increase compliance and safety.
Travel. Give more independence while remaining "in touch" as a group


 We demo'd Smartstones LIVE on Fox News. This shows off how you could use Smartstones as an alternative to all the costly personal emergency response systems, as well as gps tracking devices. We designed an app called :connect, that shows how you can keep your family completely in step, present and aware of each other.

Leather Cuff: Our tanned saddle leather cuff easily snaps onto your wrist, transforming your Smartstones Touch into a hands-free wrist communicator. Designed by Amy DiGregorio, an award-winning designer based in Santa Barbara, CA. All work is hand crafted, and selected from the finest materials. *stone sold separately.
Gold or Silver Pendant: Choose between silver or gold-plated pendant with elegant leather necklace. You can also attach the pendant to your favorite necklace, if you prefer. It's a perfect way to keep loved ones close to your heart, and the Smartstones Touch can be popped in and out for easy wireless charging. *stone sold separately.
Qi Wireless Inductive Charger & Travel Case: We believe in making sustainable choices so we are opting out of fancy packaging and have designed a special Inductive Charging base and cover that serves as both the packaging AND the product. You will receive one charger for each stone you order. E.g. A "BFF" 2 pack will come with two charging cases.
Calling all artisans - We invite you to create your own smart wearables: We want to invite jewelry and wearable designers to find creative applications for Smartstones Touch. We have some standardized elements you can use to integrate Smartstones into your own wearable designs.
