Smartstones are designed for accessibility. We have worked with the blind, autistic, elderly, parents, spouses, academic researchers, PhD's and scientists.


We take communication for granted, until it is taken away. 
Smartstones Touch has no screen, uses flexible multi-sensory outputs, and has an intuitive interface that is adaptable and easy to learn. With your help, lets put a Smartstones Touch in the hands of more than one million families next year, and help them find their words, connect and thrive.
When one out of 68 children are born with some form of autism, 285 million people are visually impaired, and 360 million people have disabling hearing loss, accessibility becomes imperative in truly break-through technology. These massive communities of people with communication challenges are underserved by mainstream technology, and specialized technology often costs ridiculous and arbitrary sums.
Tri-Counties Regional Center supports over 12,000 individuals with developmental disabilities including Autism, Epilepsy, Cerebral Palsy and Intellectual Challenges. There are 21 regional centers supporting over 300,000 Californians with disabilities to live life with more vitality and connectedness to our community.
Support Smartstones by funding our campaign today. We will help them by making Smartstones and our services available to their entire community.








____________________________________________________________________BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR HANDS ON OUR BLUETOOTH VERSION. SIMPLY SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT TO BACK OUR PROJECT NOW!!
IF YOU WANT OUR CELLULAR VERSION, JOIN OUR WAIT LIST.
____________________________________________________________________








Smartstones :prose app*: "Find your voice" - Express yourself with simple swipes, taps, shapes and motion gestures. It speaks almost 40 languages. Great for anyone – kids, friends, adults, seniors. Immediately available to backers after this campaign ends as a standalone iOS app, that will also work with Smartstones Touch when we ship. *Patent pending
Projected Capacitive Touch*: Using Projected Capacitive Touch (PCT), the same technology used in smartphone touch screens, the top surface of Smartstones Touch can detect touches such as swipes, taps, and holds before your hand touches the stone, and it will even work through clothing. *Patent pending




Accelerometer & Gyroscope: The Touch includes a 6-axis accelerometer and gyroscope to sense motion. Currently, we’re working on developing complex gesture recognition software, so we can begin compiling a library of gestures to use with Smartstones Touch.




Wireless Inductive Charging: Smartstones Touch is a rechargeable, completely sealed unit that uses Qi-compliant inductive charging circuitry, so you never have to plug it in. Simply lay the stone to sleep in its cradle and it immediately begins charging and lets you know when its refreshed. 




Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE):  The IndieGoGo Edition of Smartstones Touch, in "Chalk" white, uses Bluetooth 4.0 and works with any internet-connected Bluetooth 4.0 compatible device. We are currently developing apps on a number of platforms, including smartphones (iOS and Android), tablets and laptops.




Open API: We will open the Smartstones platform for developers to create apps for a variety of uses. Smartstones Touch can be easily integrated with other internet-connected devices and services, including SMS and voice delivery.








Gestures for sending messages*: We’ve decided to start simple with a handful of easy to remember and easy to use touch and motion gestures. Smartstones will continue to provide free updates as we expand our library of touch and motion gestures. *Patent pending





Hapticon™ Patterns*: Working in cooperation with world renowned researchers, usability experts, academics and visually impaired users, we have arrived at a standard set of Hapticon patterns, composed of vibration, light, and sound. Feel free to use the default combinations or configure your own. *Patent pending




Group Push Reminders and Alerts*: Instantly create and push reminder alerts to one or more stones in your network. Perfect for reminding grandpa to take his heart medication, or coordinating activities for the kids. We recommend co-creating reminders with the people who will receive them, so they can help decide what color and vibration pattern to use, making them more memorable. *Patent pending




Cloud Messaging Platform*: Our sophisticated cloud messaging infrastructure supports messaging, network configuration, and data storage with scalability, advanced security and high reliability. *Patent pending

Material: We are developing a custom case material that feels like natural stone. Our Materials engineer worked at Apple for 11 years and was responsible for many of their patented material innovations.
Shape: Smartstones Touch was designed to fit comfortably in your hand, like a smooth river stone, with every dimension unique so you can use it with your eyes closed.
Size & Weight:  10mm x 40mm x 60mm or ½” x 1 ¾” x 2 ½”; fits comfortably into the small coin pocket of your favorite jeans. Only 10 grams.




Waterproof:  Completely sealed unit.










____________________________________________________________________BE THE FIRST TO GET YOUR HANDS ON OUR BLUETOOTH VERSION. SIMPLY SELECT A PERK ON THE RIGHT TO BACK OUR PROJECT NOW!!
IF YOU WANT OUR CELLULAR VERSION, JOIN OUR WAIT LIST.
____________________________________________________________________      





Smartstones was previewed on The Daily Show with Jon Stewart.
"Smartstones are awe inducing. A lovely way of humanizing technology. I love it."     - Jon Stewart, Host of The Daily Show


"Smartstones is the quintessential example of “high tech meets high touch.”     - Katy Fike, PhD Gerontologist; Co-Founder, Aging2.0; Generator Ventures
"As a mom and a family caregiver, I can’t wait for this one to go to market.*"      - Amie Clark, Co-founder of The Senior List and The Senior Resource Network.
“This is groundbreaking."      - Lori La Bey, #1 Alzheimer’s influencer, host of Alzheimer’s Speaks
“Smartstones Touch is an uncomplicated approach to letting loved ones reach out to each other.”      - John Wider, Board of Directors, AARP Andrus Insurance Fund










Q. How do I use Smartstones Touch?A. Once you’ve opened the app and configured your stones, you simply select a gesture and assign a "message" to it. 
Q.  How do I read a message coming to me on a Touch?A.  You can choose to receive your messages as in app push notifications, text messages, or if you have your own Smartstones Touch (e.g. 2pack), the message will present as a combination of
vibration, colored lights, and sound. You can identify different
messages through the tone or pattern of the vibration, color or pattern of the
LED lights, or presence of sound. For example, an “urgent”message triggers bright flashing red
lights, a powerful, constant vibration, and a loud sound. In contrast, “I’m okay” triggers a soft pulsating green
light, and two short bursts of vibration. Think about these as easily recognizable patterns.
Q.  How does Smartstones
Touch connect to the internet?A.  The first edition of Smartstones Touch uses a
Bluetooth Low Energy connection, depending on a paired smartphone or tablet with .
Q.  How do I charge the
Touch?A.  Simply place Smartstones Touch
in its charging case, and it will charge automatically via a wireless inductive Qi charger.
Q.  How many messages can I send?A.  The number of possibilities for light and
vibration patterns is enormous, with thousands of possible messages you can
send. To start, you’ll get 12 preset messages that you can configure, quickly unlocking more messages and
creating your own custom combinations.

We've assembled an amazing team with global consumer electronics, medical and communications experience. We've worked at Apple, Philips, Nike, Microsoft, Frog Design, Smart Design, OXO, Disney and Nokia. We have the capability to execute.

Andreas Forsland | Founder & CEO, Prior to starting Smartstones, Andreas was Senior Director, Brand Experience at Citrix, helping to grow the "GoTo" SaaS collaboration portfolio to become #2 SaaS business worldwide. He was also a Global Design Leader at Philips working on innovative programs with corporate, healthcare, consumer electronics and lighting businesses in Europe, USA and Brasil. He started his career working with several world-class design firms partnering with Porsche, Trek bikes, ING, United Nations and Coca-Cola. He is passionate about improving quality of life via disarmingly simple, ambient products and making a huge social impact.

Leonard Zerman | Co-Founder & CTO, Leonard has more than 30 years professional programming, hardware development and entrepreneurial business experience. Accomplishments include authoring PicBasic Pro Compiler for embedded electronics, developing medical devices and consumer electronic devices, custom end-to-end automation solutions as an Intuit QuickBooks Professional Developer.  Leonard’s early career was with many of the early leading PC industry software companies, including Ashton-Tate, Nantucket, and Quarterdeck.  In recent years, his passion is in cloud based computing, Bluetooth Low Energy and iBeacon technology.

Andrew Duncan | Software Engineer, Andrew was born in London
and grew up in Australia and Minnesota. He studied EE at the Caltech, math at
UC Santa Cruz, and computer science at UC Santa Barbara. His research has
focused on musical electronics, music
theory and programming languages. He has worked at Philips Media writing
software for digital video, Cerwin-Vega! designing loudspeakers, E-mu Systems
writing software for electronic keyboards, at the MAMA Foundation recording and
producing jazz CDs, and at Citrix writing network and system software. In
addition he has taught physics, chemistry, math, and computer science at the
high school, city college, and university levels. Andrew is the author of Objective-C. Pocket Reference. 



Cameron Dexter | Software Engineer, Cameron
is an electro-mechanical design engineer with experience in mechanical
design/drafting, electronic assembly, programming, robotics,
machining/fabrication, and real-world experience in project management, product
development, and deployment.


Lucas Cohen | Community Manager, Lucas
is a copywriter, marketer, and designer, and a UCSB student, majoring in
Communication. He has experience in UI design, UX design, marketing,
advertising, and branding. Lucas was part of the original founding team behind Smartstones, and manages our website,
blog, and social media accounts.

Zachary Zerman | Design Engineer, Zachary is a design engineer, part of the original founding team behind Smartstones, and a Dos Pueblos High School student junior, who hopes to be majoring in nano-technology engineering. He has experience in 3D CAD design, 3D printing and electronic prototyping. 


Max Burton | Consulting Industrial Designer, Max Burton, the founder of Matter, is a product and interaction designer with over 2 decades of experience. From housewares to digitally enabled products, he is inspired by participating in the creation of the future that melds technology, art, and humanity. Prior to forming Matter, Max worked as the Global Executive Creative Director for product design at frog, the Creative Director of Nike’s Tech Lab, and the VP of Design at Smart in New York. His work has been exhibited at the MoMa in New York, the Design museum in London and the Chicago Athenaeum. 

David Rose | Advisor, Currently CEO at Ditto Labs and researcher at MIT Media Lab's Tangible Media Group. David wrote the book, "Enchanted Objects"; Founded and sold Vitality, a wireless health company that makes the award-winning GlowCap, the first Internet-connected medication packaging, and was co-founder and CEO of Ambient Devices where he created glanceable technology: embedding Internet information in everyday objects like light bulbs and umbrellas to make the physical objects an interface to digital information. David founded Viant’s Innovation Center, an advanced technology group for Fortune 500s including Sony, GM, Schwab, Sprint and Kinkos. He helped build Viant to over 900 people, $140M and a successful IPO.


Mary Anne Masterson | Advisor, Mary Anne Masterson focuses on the intersection of marketing strategy, design innovation and new product development at Mix & Stir. She was previously the Director of Brand Innovation and a Strategy Director at Frog Design, a global innovation leader. She also spent several years at Microsoft, where she led marketing strategy, new product development, and user experience initiatives for the Xbox Experience Group, the Windows Consumer Product Group, and Corporate Marketing & Strategy. She has worked with global leaders, privately held companies, entertainment organizations and early stage start-ups.

story:
This is Snap, an LED floodlight with an HD Camera

Snap is an LED floodlight with a wireless HD camera built inside. Simply twist Snap into an exterior fixture, download the app, and have peace of mind anytime of day or night. 

How Snap works


Snap connects securely to your Wi-Fi network.  The mobile app allows you to set motion-detection zones, receive activity notifications, set lighting schedules, and much more.  

While you're at work, playing in the park or away on an adventure, Snap gives you the peace of mind to go forth and do. 

In the Media

CES 2015: Sengled Snap puts a camera in an LED bulb - Cnet

Oh Hey, Here's a Lightbulb That Doubles As a Home Security System - Yahoo! Tech

These Are the Most Ingenious Gadgets From CES 2015 - TIME

Why Smart Bulbs are Quietly Becoming the Most Exciting Thing in Tech - PC Mag

Key Features

App Controlled

With the Snap iOS/Android app, you can install bulbs, adjust settings, set motion zones and lighting schedules, and customize your sharing preferences. 

Motion Detection

Set up to 3 motion zones per bulb.  Get eyes on all of your blind corners, entryways, and basement windows.    

Weatherproof

Snap is built to withstand the elements.  The bulb is IP54 rated, meaning it is both waterproof and dustproof... so feel free to take it down for a quick wash anytime.  

Automatic Night Vision

Two large infrared LEDs turn on automatically as soon as the ambient light dims around the bulb.    

Ultra-Wide Angle, Full HD Quality & Digital Zoom

140 degrees of HD streaming and recording with 4x digital zoom. 

Optional Cloud Storage


Snap at a glance

Tech Specs

  • Camera: 1080p HD (140 degrees diagonal)
  • Wi-Fi: 2.4GHz/5GHz Compatible (2x2 MIMO)
  • Dimensions: 5.7 inch (H) x 4.7 inch (Dia.)
  • Weight: 20 oz. / 575g
  • Power: 100~240V AC, 50/60Hz
  • Operating Temp: -20° C ~ +40° C
  • Socket Type: E26
  • One-year limited warranty 

Lighting Facts

  • Lumens (max): 810
  • Color Temp: 3000K
  • Power (max): 14watts
  • Bulb Type: PAR-38
  • LED Lifetime (hours): 25,000
  • Annual Energy Cost (est.): $1.69

Why Indiegogo? Why We Need YOU!

Your contributions are essential to help us put the final touches on our server and mobile application. When finished at the end of September, our server architecture will be ready to scale automatically as Snap bulbs come online.  The iOS and Android mobile apps will have a stable and robust set of features presented in an intuitive user interface. 

Timeline

The Team

Alex Ruan 
General Manager
 

Ben Thacker 
Sr. Product Marketing Manager

Robin Foreman 
VP of Marketing & Business Development

Wei Yang. 
Product Manager
 

Megan Johnson 
Marketing Communications Manager

Dave Maren
Director of Marketing
 

FAQs

Q: I don't live in the US or Canada, can I still order a Snap?
A: While our hardware (the bulb) may twist into your light socket, our only active servers will be located in North America until next year. This Indiegogo campaign is intended for US & Canadian contributors only. 
Q: When will I receive my Snap?
A: You will receive your order in late October or early November depending on your delivery address 
Q: Is there a free trial for the cloud storage plans?
A: All Indiegogo contributors will receive a 1 month free trial for the 7 day storage option (ie. the last 7 days of footage will be stored for a one month period).
Q: What happens after the month of free cloud storage and motion-detection?
A: You have 3 options as a Sengled Snap customer after the free trial.  1. Using the free service which includes all features besides motion-detection and cloud storage. 2. A 7-day rolling storage plan with motion-detection and all key features 3. A 30-day rolling storage plan with motion-detection and all key features. 
Q: Why is motion-detection not offered in the continuous free service plan?
A: After the free trial, motion-detection will only be offered with the 7 day or 30 day storage plans. The free service will allow you to view video/audio 24/7, use night vision, light scheduling, two way audio communication, and more.  The reason why motion-detection is not included in the free service is because it’s a very advanced algorithm running on our server, constantly checking for changes in your motion zones.  While this is impressive and all, it’s also expensive and increases our costs per bulb, therefore it is included in our paid services. 
Q: How does Snap connect to the internet?
A: Snap has dual band Wi-Fi on-board. That means it can connect to your 2.4Ghz or 5Ghz Wi-Fi networks.
Q: Can I install Snap inside?
A: Whether you're checking in on your pets during the work day or on your restless newborn at mid-night, Snap excels at monitoring indoors. Install Snap wherever you need it most. 
Q: Can I share my Snap video/audio feed with other people?
A: At the moment, Snap is limited to Public Sharing (live streaming).  Our team is working hard on Private Sharing and will roll it out as soon as it is stable and secure.
Q: How many bulbs can I have at my house OR How many bulbs I can connect to my account?
A: You are not limited to the number of bulbs you can have on your account.  However, the number of bulbs that can be connected to you Wi-Fi network depends on your upload speed.  Adding too many bulbs may consume your upload bandwidth and prevent Snap and other important online services from operating effectively.  Contact support@sengled.com regarding if you have questions regarding your specific situation. 
Q: Do I have to have a cloud account? Or can I use the camera to stream footage through my own cloud service or even safe to a hard drive or SD card? 
A: This product has been designed with simplicity and convenience in mind. The reason that we require a cloud account is not strictly for video input/output.  The cloud allows you to use two way audio communication, set lighting schedules algorithms, control brightness, and more from a streamlined user interface.

story:
It’s simple.

We really need your help to get across the finish line and create the Internet Users Against Cancer phone app. 

We’ve put so much work and sweat into the movement called “Internet Users Against Cancer” with the focus of mobilizing hundreds of millions of internet users. We’re only 45k away from making the vision a powerful reality.

 

 

The quest to help cancer patients by growing donor numbers and funneling billions of dollars into cancer research and charities is so close! To do it, we need our phone app. IUAC is just a pass through facilitating the method of (mandatory) transferring donations from the users of our system into cancer and charity/research org of their choice. They Choose..... Not Us.

 

             

 

 

 

That's where you come in!

                                                        This Is Why We Fight

 

                                   

 

Help us do this great work. Donate to this great cause that turns internet typographical errors into money for cancer research and cancer charities. www.InternetUsersAgainstCancer.com

 

 "Internet Users Against Cancer, via The Typo Bounty Movement, allows internet users to donate money continuously without dipping into their personal bank accounts. This provides a tremendously huge opportunity to fund the cancer fight."

Whether you are an individual seeking to help cancer patients, a small business that just wants a tremendous advertising opportunity while helping cancer patients or large company seeking a great PR opportunity while helping cancer patients, you can do it here. Share in our success.

Help Make History!

Donate now!

story:
What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $75,000 to pay all costs required to release SlashPixels Beta. Rest assured that every penny goes toward making SlashPixels a reality. 

As a thank you, you will get exclusive limited edition custom t-shirts and hoodies designed for our IndieGoGo campaign. The garments will come in three different colors. We are partnering with Amplifier, an official IndieGoGo partner, which means that your apparel will have quality design and print, and available for fast worldwide shipping. 

We have another special perk: a 24/7 access to desktop preview of SlashPixels Founder. You’ll have live access to how we work—prototype, design, and communicate—and everything else that happens on Founder computer.





Who is the SlashPixels Team?



The Impact

We are a small, brand new company. We cannot make it without your support. Every donation matters, as this campaign determines whether or not we can continue our project. 

We have no other sources of funding. With your help, we can make SlashPixels a reality and the universe a much happier place.


Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. We will work hard to make sure that everything is top notch, functional, and user friendly. We recognize that the coding process might have hiccups, but we’ll make sure that SlashPixels launches on time, won’t compromise quality, and addresses feedback from designers. We’ll keep you in the loop of our creative process so there won’t be any surprises.


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us raise awareness by sharing campaign with your friends on social media. Also, we need your help with teaching AI to understand images. Please register on http://slashpixels.com to receive instructions on how you can become AI’s personal tutor.


Follow SlashPixels:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slashpixels/

Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/+SlashPixels_image_search/about

Twitter: https://twitter.com/slashpixels

VK: https://new.vk.com/public119693515

Dribbble: https://dribbble.com/bourdine

story:
Here Are The Facts:

Phones and tablets keep getting thinner and harder to hold with each new generation. I don't get it either. Tabulate snaps on to your phone and tablet, instantly making it much more comfortable to use and versatile enough to mount almost anywhere. 

ELIMINATE SLIPS AND CRAMPS ON THE GO OR ON THE COUCH

Tabulate is the perfect companion for freely using and carrying your device in any environment or activity.  Let's Revolutionize phone and tablet ergonomics and make life just a little bit better. Work smarter, read easier, play harder.


KEEP WHAT YOU NEED ON HAND

Tabulate is extremely convenient in  any situation. It has a place for your stylus, headphones, commute tickets, USB drives and much more. 

MOUNT YOUR PHONE AND TABLET ANYWHERE

Attachments enable you to quickly mount your device on the wall, in your car, on your bike and many places we haven’t even thought of yet. At this point, you're probably thinking of a few ways you will use Tabulate that we haven't thought of. It's really amazing once it's in your hands.

CHOSE YOUR COLOUR AND DESIGN

Customize body colour and strap design from 30 different choices. 2 Body colours (Black or White) and 15 different strap colours and designs. 

3D PRINT ONE YOURSELF

Download our files and 3D Print Tabulate yourself. Create your own attachments and make your own modifications. This is open source hardware for your devices.

Enjoy your digital experiences seamlessly. No fiddling no fidgeting. The small differences it makes go a long long way. Improve productivity, prevent carpal tunnel, cramped fingers and stressed wrists. 

Tabulate is for the commuters and travelers, for offices and warehouses, for the movers and the recliners, for outdoor and indoor gamers. This is a shock absorbent and extremely durable product that has no moving parts and uses no magnets. 


Check out the Product Review at TechAeris HERE.

View the Press Kit Here.

Email: team@mytabulate.com 

Back Securely. Money back Guarantee. Comment, email or call us if you have any queries. We will get back to you within 6 hours.


We Need Your Support

Tabulate is a simple idea, but we believe it can impact the mobile world in a BIG way. We’re a new start up so that’s why we need your help. All it takes right now is your contribution on IndieGoGo.

Please help us spread the word via the share buttons above and get an ATTACHMENT FOR FREE for your contribution with the following steps:

1) Send us the Screen Cap Image or the Shared Link to: team@mytabulate.com

2) Include your IndieGoGo User Name with the Subject "I have shared"


What You Get


Don't forget to check out the amazing work by the Fello Eyewear team HERE.

story:
CleanShield is infused with EPA registered antimicrobial ionic-silver technology.

The Story

Imagine if all phone and tablets we use every day—were protected from the growth of bacteria, fungus, mold and other microbes that can build up and cause unclean surfaces and limit the functional life of your screen protector. Now imagine cleaner, stronger and longer lasting screen protection. That, in a nutshell, is the idea behind CleanShield!

Perfect Fit Technologies is a 2011 start-up company focused on creative solutions for common tech problems. We've spent the last two years dreaming, testing and working with scientists and engineers to develop a proprietary USA based coating infused with EPA registered Antimicrobial Ionic-Silver Technology. CleanShield provides a cleaner surface while protecting your device from scratches and unwanted mishaps.

We want indiegogo to be the place that CleanShield launches from; giving indiegogoers a chance to be apart of launching this revolutionary product into a reality!

The first 25 people to back our project (Perk 2) will receive an Early Bird Special CleanShield Screen Protector of your choice for only $7!

The Features

  • EPA Registered Ionic-Silver Antimicrobial
  • Made in the USA
  • High Optical Clarity
  • Fingerprint Resistant
  • Scratch Protection
  • High Touch Sensitivity
  • Smooth Application
  • Full silicone adhesive coating that won't leave any sticky residue when removed. 

The Quality

The precision pre-cut CleanShield applies directly to your device, providing the best clarity and scratch protection you will find. CleanShield is cut specifically to cover maximum amount of the device surface to keep it free from bacteria.

The Reason

Your cell phone contains over 25,000 Bacteria per square inch! Studies have shown that the average smart phone is a breeding ground for bacteria, fungus, mold and other damaging microbes. In fact, the average cell phone is up to 16 times dirtier than a public toilet seat. The use of disinfectant wipes and sprays can actually damage the surface of your touch screen device and must be constantly reapplied to even be effective.

How it works

CleanShield is a high optical clarity made in the USA screen protector infused with an EPA registered antimicrobial ionic-silver technology that provides continuous 24/7 protection against the growth of bacteria, fungus, mold and other damaging microbes. 

Silver-silver ions are small enough to be transparent. They are also mobile enough to flood the surface of the film. Air moisture activates the release of silver ions from their cage, which, in turn deters bacterial growth on the surface of the film.


How to Install

How to install CleanShield on your device

Whats included

  • 1 Premium CleanShield Screen Protector
  • 1 Alcohol Cleaning Swab
  • 1 Suede Care Cloth
  • 1 Smoothing Card

The Perks

  • Free Shipping anywhere in the USA 
  • Add $8 for international shipping

iPhone 5/5S/5C CleanShield Screen Protector

iPhone 4/4s CleanShield Screen Protector

Galaxy SIV (S4) CleanShield Screen Protector

What a CleanShield screen protector will look like.

CleanShield iPhone 5/5S/5C Production Quality Sample

News & Press

Tech & Design Bloggers feel free to contact us at info@perfectfittech.com for exclusive information and interviews.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out! Like, Tweet, Plus & Stay Updated:
Facebook | Twitter | Google+ | CleanShield.com

Due to time-consuming prototype Beta (without LED indicator) only with iOS & USB Micro Tips as you can see from the video we are using Micro female adapter to connect to the USB power supply. Further improvement by implementing Beta circuitry to Alpha will make MACNETO to almost perfect.

story:
What is AddNat?

AddNat is a simple to use webservice/app that lets you get back the control over your data in the internet. Also we provide web security for everyone, while making many online based tasks easier.


What does AddNat do?

AddNat is an online based service that allows you many things

e.g:

  • our Picture protection service, that allows you to remove pictures from the web, once and for all, even if other places copied it.
  • manage your contact data, by letting it manage itself – just relax you don't have to do anything
  • never set up a new TV again let Addnat do the work
As a company owner:

  • forget the trouble of updating account info and or personal info if someone moves
  • manage licensing of software automatically via AddNat, so you can relax and focus on more important things


How does all this work?

Contact info:

Everyone just updates his own info if needed. It autocratically synchronizes with your address book. Nothing to do for you.

If you don't want somebody to have your some of your info. Simply Withdraw the access it will delete itself out in his account.



Picture service:

You simply convert your picture to our new ".addnat" format. Then post it on you webpage.You can remove it afterwards or set a time limit for a period in wich the picture should be visible. 

After removing the visibility, or after the time you set expires the picture will automatically be replaced by a small placeholder. Everywhere. Even on other pages that copied your picture to their page.


Everything else:

The concept mentioned above applies to everything. AddNat is simple because it is always the same:
You don't want somebody to acces your data or use your device? withdraw the access.
Everyone just updates his own data, all their contacts will be updated automatically.


How can I start now?

Simply download the Android-App or visit www.addnat.com to use our webservice. Register for free and start getting your data back under your control.

Or get the Android App on Google Play:  


Why AddNat?

AddNat is simple to use because it is always the same. Allow acces to data or Withdraw it.
Why go complicated when it could be easy while still being secure?




Do we sell your data?

No!

We are located in Germany and use German servers, to ensure the highest level of security. The data is protected so well that even we are not able to see it, or make your pictures visible again. Even if we wanted to.
We can promise you that we won't use your data or sell it out, not to other companies nor to spies. ;)
We have to keep this promise as we can't even access your data.


Why do we need funding?

We want to expand. We want to make many more things possible to protect your data and make your life easier. Every Day.

We want to secure Cars, TVs and many more things. Thievery will be gone.
We want to make the user interface more friendly, to make it possible to get the most and best security for everyone even for less techier persons.
We need the money to create an app for Apple devices, for our redesign, and to get company owners to include AddNat security into their products like cars, and TVs.
Also if the money allows it we would like to work on more translations and improve the existing one.

What you get:

Your money makes it possible to give you many more features we have already started developing.
Also you will get a more pleasing and even easier user interface.
For just 5€ you will get a pro membership for 1 year.
For 25€ you will get a pro membership for 5 years
For 50€ you will get a Pro account for 10 years
For 100€ you will get a pro membership for 21 years
For 500€ you will get a lifetime pro membership
Pro accounts allow you to use even more features than we explained in this campaign.

See the following page for more info: click here


Risks and challenges


The challenge

The challenge is to include create an interface that always is the same, on every platform. So that everyone is familiar with it. And that everyone knows how to use it.


Risks

There are basically none.
If we archive our goal or not you will get your perk, as our platform is already done for the most.
Whatever amount of money we make we will create this things. It will take us much more time however. Time in which your data will be unsecured....


Other ways to help

Spread the word!
Tell other people about this campaign and how awesome it can be.
Share the link on your favorite social media or by whatever you like.


Thank you for your time and interest!


Contact us:
thorsten.schrimpf@addnat.com
www.addnat.com
AddNat GmbH

story:
DESIGN CONCEPT

Many cases reported that driver has higher risk of car accidents is due to talking with mobile phone. The aim of making this product is to reduce the risk of car accident for talking with mobile phone. In the past few months, we have carefully conducted the survey and research with our R&D team to design a Bluetooth® headset which will tell us how easy and safe that driver could talk with their mobile phone, and now we need your support to improve everyone’s safety and achieve our goal. 

TRAFFIC SAFETY — We just need 3 simple steps for using Bluetooth®headset.

  1. Easy to pick up.
  2. Easy to answer the phone.
  3. Easy to put Bluetooth headset back for charging.

TWO SETS POWER OUTPUT — The car charger could support the headset and the mobile phone charging in the same time.

  • One power for FreeFairy® Bluetooth ®Headset.
  • One USB power output (2.1A) for your mobile device.

MULTIPOINT CONNECTION — Connect two mobile devices

  • Bluetooth® headset could connect to two mobile phones.
  • Or one mobile phone and tablet.

CHARGING ON THE WAY

  • The Bluetooth® headset will always be charged, even any activity after driving.
  • µEnergy® Bluetooth® 4.0 Low Energy Platform.

ENJOY YOUR MUSIC LIFE — It is not only a phone headset but also earphone for listening music. 

  • Talking on the phone with single earphone.
  • Listen to music with a pair of headset for enjoying stereo effect.
  • CSR Bluetooth® 4.0 solution (Single-chip solution for portable stereo Bluetooth® speakers / speakerphones).
  • Delivers a quality stereo Bluetooth® audio experience.
  • Stereo Line-in.

THOUGHTFUL AND ATTRACTIVE DESIGN — The best outfit and accessory. Your neck will feel comfortable and free to wear it.

  • When you remove them, the two earphones will attract together on your neck to prevent the loss and avoid the annoying about twine.


KEY FEATURE & ACCESSORIES

  • Built in Microphone and Controlling button for Music, Volume, Play/Pause and incoming Calls.
  • Quality assurance - Bluetooth®4.0 headset is built in world's leading CSR chipset.
  • Built-in voice prompts.
  • Bluetooth® module and controlling buttons are built in the right earphone.
  • Micro USB Cable (tangle-free flat cable) with left earphone.
  • Supplied hybrid silicone earbuds, (S, M, L), improve maximize overall sound quality and comfort.
  • Car charger (CE, UL, RoHS) certified.
  • Prototype Weight: Single earphone 7g, Pair of headset 12g.

OUR GUARANTEE

  • Jetway persists in the production of PCB related products with passion towards IT industry over 25 years. We know how to stand on our own legs in the changing times of the IT technology. Every business units can cooperate with each other under the beliefs of "create, quality, and service" for one ad single purpose of how to achieve the achievements we build for our dear customers. With the enthusiasm of IT products research and development, Jetway delivers the extraordinary computing technology into our daily lives based on concepts of human immersion. We are the "Jetway" of IT industry and we are the "Jetway" to the future we hope to grow with our partners continuously and we would like to bring mutual beneficial effects to each other.  


  • Bluetooth®4.0 headset is a fairly mature technology product and we have successfully completed the Bluetooth® audio production. With your support we will be able to development this product.


  • 1 year Warranty except user destruction.



What We Need & What You Get


ROADMAP TO DELIVERY


ABOUT US

Design Leader: Meg Hung

Electronic Design: Sean Feng

Modeling Design: Joe Lin

Manufacturer: Jetway Information CO., LTD.

www.jetway.com.tw

Supplied hybrid silicone earbuds, (S, M, L), improve maximize overall
sound quality and comfort.


Car charger (CE, UL, RoHS) certified.

Prototype Weight: Single earphone 7g, Pair of headset 12g.



OUR GUARANTEE




Jetway persists in the production of PCB related products with passion towards IT industry over 25 years. We know how to stand on our own legs in the changing times of the IT technology. Every business units can cooperate with each other under the beliefs of "create, quality, and service" for one ad single purpose of how to achieve the achievements we build for our dear customers. With the enthusiasm of IT products research and development, Jetway delivers the extraordinary computing technology into our daily lives based on concepts of human immersion. We are the "Jetway" of IT industry and we are the "Jetway" to the future we hope to grow with our partners continuously and we would like to bring mutual beneficial effects to each other.  



Bluetooth®4.0 headset is a fairly mature technology product and we have successfully completed the Bluetooth® audio production. With your support we will be able to development this product.



1 year Warranty except user destruction.










What We Need & What You Get


ROADMAP TO DELIVERY


ABOUT US

story:
Lockey needs an update

Lockey is a popular keyboard lock for the Apple Mac. It works by locking the internal (or external) keyboard to prevent it from being used accidentally.

When OSX Lion came around I rewrote the app to support the locking of both external (bluetooth) and internal keyboards. This provided very popular.

Now that OSX Mavericks has been launched, the more recent (advanced) versions of Lockey are not compatible with the new OS and the older (more basic) versions are super buggy.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need to spend the best part of a week rewriting the code to support OS Mavericks and patch some bugs reported since the last update
  • I estimate this will cost (in development time) $300 - $400. All funds received via this funding drive will be used for this development.
  • Any raised funds remaining, will be used to promote the Lockey App to a wider audience
In return for your kind donation, you will get a copy of the new Lockey App. Additional perks are available.

story:
Who We Are

Make Them Work For You Ltd. is head-quartered in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada and we are an Alberta Registered (Incorporation Number 5116595546) Non Profit organization with a very ambitious project to aggregate various information services into a convenient and easy to use Web 2.0 platform. Our stated objectives are "To promote openess and transparency in all levels of government. To provide citizens easy access to government information that would be beneficial to their lives and/or their voting decisions. To enable citizens to easily interact with their representatives and the government as a whole." 

To learn more visit our website: http://makethemworkforyou.com

We have spent the last 10 months developing the largest single database of information on Canadian politicians (over 600 and growing!) we aggregate information such as voting records, campaign finances and expenses as well as recent news and social media updates. We decided to take a "bottom-up" approach and focus on levels of government that most political apps/websites ignore so we started with some of the largest Canadian cities and provinces.

We currently track politicians from the following areas:

Federal: 120 of 308 politician (to be completed July 31, 2012)
Provincial: Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, Northwest Terriories, Nunavut, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Saskatchewan, Yukon
Municipal: Calgary, Edmonton, Hamilton, Ottawa, Toronto, Vancouver, Winnipeg

 

And now we want to take our project to the next level!

What Are We Building?

We feel that people should have easy access to their politicians and to their government. We have features in mind that would combine the best of many political apps in the marketplace and leverage our extensive knowledge on Canadian politicians to provide interaction and features not seen in other apps. We will be offering both a paid ($0.99) and an ad-supported free version of the app.

Our app will be able to:

  • look up representatives at all 3 levels of government based on postal code or current GPS or aGPS location 
  • contact their representative through email, twitter, facebook, linkedin, or telephone
  • use our pre-formatted templates when contacting their representative
  • access all of the information on our website for any politician in our database
  • subscribe to a politician and receive updates when something new is added (includes google news updates and social media digests)
  • integration with our site calendars which contain political events for each area and level of government
  • display the news feed for selected level of government based on location
  • search our site and related government sites based on current location and level of government
  • report problems like pot holes, graffiti, etc using camera and GPS and send to the correct contact (only available where the municipal govt has a compatible service)

What Do We Need?

We already have a basic API in place that can provide the data for the app, as well as user registration and profiles to save userdata. We are raising funds to help with the development and testing of the following:

design of the app interface (Designer and Developer Hired! 07/06/2012)

coding additional site features to support the app (if needed)

coding of the app itself

marketing and promotion of the app

Need More Info?

Feel free to check out our site and learn all about our team by visiting the link below:

About Us

Get a full listing of all our expenses on the web site portion of the project to date by visiting:

Our Finances

story:
Created with the home based user in mind, the iBox Nano is the worlds smallest, most affordable 3D Resin Printer.

3D printing will never be the same

We didn't set out to improve 3D printing, we set out to remove the barriers; to get 3D printers in the hands of everyone. That's why we have developed the worlds smallest, most affordable and easiest to use 3D Resin Printer. Most 3D printers are expensive, large, noisy and complicated. We created the iBox Nano with the home based user in mind. We are now ready to share this technology with you.


The Nano is the start of the home based 3D printing and replicating age

We have been hard at work, and with your help, we’re ready to take the iBox Nano into full-fledged production. By supporting this effort, you’ll be the first to get your hands on an amazing 3D printer AND help usher in a new era of home based 3D printing - an era in which your creative output is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines.

3D printing for everyone

We have gone to extraordinary lengths to design a user friendly 3D printing experience: 

  • The iBox Nano is designed to produce high resolution prints with the touch of a button 
  • There is no software to install so you can spend less time setting up prints and more time printing 
  • A robust ecosystem of open source and free software for 3D modeling and editing 
  • WiFi enabled so you can print untethered
  • Battery powered option for on-the-go printing (optional purchase).

The iBox Nano is:

  • The worlds smallest Resin printer 
  • The worlds most affordable Resin printer 
  • The worlds only battery powered (option) Resin printer 
  • The worlds first production LCD based UV Resin printer 
  • The worlds quietest 3D printer 
  • The worlds lightest 3D printer 


Browser based 3D Printing 

Smartphone and tablet control: Most 3D printers only support 1-2 operating systems and have to be tethered to your computer. With the iBox Nano, you can print from any browser; from your iPhone, your iPad, any Android device, Windows PC or Mac. You can print without installing any software. If it has a browser you can print to the iBox Nano.


WiFi enabled 3D Printing 

The iBox Nano works over WiFi, so you can print without being tethered to your printer.

3D Resin Printing has evolved

Many of the Resin printers on the market use DLP technology to create and control the UV light used to cure the resin. Using a DLP projector introduces a few issues such as low bulb life and cooling fan noise. DLP projector bulbs will need to be replaced at their service interval, generally at 2000-8000 hours of use. Even before they fail they will suffer a noticeable loss in output power causing reduced print quality, or no print at all. These bulbs can cost hundreds of dollars, and all of them will need to be replaced. 

Our design is unique, we use UV LEDs rated at 50,000+ hours, which is equivalent to 17 years, running 8 hours a day.

Excessive noise can affect the quality of your day, because 3D printers can take several hours or longer to complete taller builds, it’s important that the device makes as little noise pollution as possible. DLP projectors and Laser based SLA resin printers require cooling fans to be running 100% of the time. The DLPs use them to cool the bulbs to extend their life, and the Laser systems use them to cool the galvanometer drivers to extend their life. Our printer uses very little power and generates almost no heat, thus not requiring a cooling fan and its associated noise.

Most consumers buy a large 3D printer and statistically only print small items. The reasons behind this are material cost, print time, and the nature of the items that are typically 3D printed. So why pay 2-3 thousand dollars for a large printer that will consume  space when a small  printer that can be placed almost anywhere will print everything you want?

Large build plates on resin printers can also be a disadvantage. Unlike FDM (filament) printers the resin in the build tray is inadvertently exposed to UV radiation from sources such as indoor lighting. Over time, the resin in the vat degrades, which leads to failed prints. Resin is a consumable, so if you will be printing small things, your resin printer should suit your needs. The iBox Nano meets all your small print design needs.

iBox Printers has reset the bar

Most 3D printers are general tools designed to try and meet a broad spectrum of needs, and in doing so, they don't meet any one need precisely. 

The iBox Nano is designed for the home user who wants to print small to average sized 3D objects with good resolution without having a large noisy printer intruding on their workspace. The goals were to be small, quiet, inexpensive, and portable. We have achieved all of this for one specific target audience; you.

3D Printing with Mobility; made possible with the iBox Nano

The iBox Nano is the worlds first truly portable 3D Resin Printer. Weighing only 3 pounds, it is small enough and light enough to just slide in your backpack, making it truly portable. Almost all 3D printers have several wires; a USB cable to connect to your computer and a power cable. The iBox Nano is WiFi enabled so you will never be tethered to your computer. It is also the worlds first battery powered 3D Resin Printer. The battery option* lasts approximately 10 hours.

The battery option, coupled with the Nano’s silent and completely wireless operation allows you to truly be mobile. You will be printing on the go at Starbucks, in the library, at a friends house, or at any location you desire. 

We have silenced 3D Printing 

3D Printers of all technologies have cooling fans and stepper motors. Both generate noise pollution. FDM printers use four stepper motors and generate a tremendous amount of random and distracting sounds. Projector and Laser 3D printers have one to two stepper motors and have high volume cooling fans which are inherently noisy.

The lowest energy consumption of any 3D printer

Whether you opt for our optional battery pack, power the iBox Nano from your notebook pc, or the included wall dongle, you will be happy to hear we have the worlds lowest power 3D printer. Consuming an order of magnitude less power than the next best printer. We offer optional 10 hour and 20 hour battery packs. These are external packs that connect via USB to your Nano. You will be able to purchase them in our online store.

Advanced Materials

The iBox Nano is constructed of precision laser cut extruded acrylic. Also known as Poly(methyl methacrylate) (PMMA). It is 17 times stronger than glass and at only half the weight provides a beautiful yet durable structure where neither function nor form are compromised.


Beta Unit 3D Prints


Tall Print Example

We printed two of these extrusions side by side at once on the Nano. They measure 15x15x60mm 


Early Alpha Unit Test Prints



Credit for Models

1.Stanford Bunny by phooky is licensed under theCreative Commons - Attribution - Non-Commercial license.

2.Rook by seechless is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution license.

3.Iron Man Helmet (one piece) by scottyboy1129 is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution - Share Alike license.

4.aluminum beam 20mm x20mm x 120mm bylancedesignlab is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution license.

5.5mm Calibration Cube Steps by MCroucher is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution - Share Alike license.

6.Sphere, Heart, and Cube by pmoews is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution license.

7.Eiffel Tower by B9Creations is licensed under theAttribution - Non-Commercial - Share Alike

8.Ironman Faceplate Ring by Vivenda is licensed under the Attribution - Non-Commercial - No Derivatives license.

9.Bird in Cage Pendant by katharos is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution - Share Alike license.

10.Banjo Dinosaur Head by ToScH is licensed under the Attribution - Non-Commercial - Share Alikelicense.

11.linkBracelet (or Ring when scaled!) by MakeALotis licensed under the BSD License license.


FAQ
Shipping

Domestic Continental USA 
$25 USD. This amount is collected after the Kickstarter campaign closes and addresses are collected and verified as current.

Domestic USA : Alaska and Hawaii 
$25 USD. This amount is collected after the Kickstarter campaign closes and addresses are collected and verified as current.

International: 
$50-60 as indicated in the pledge. This amount is collected at pledge time.

PLEASE NOTE: For some countries it will be difficult if not impossible to ship the 95mL starter sized resin to you from the USA. For those affected we will be including the value of the resin ~$15 USD in either: 
1. A $15 Discount toward additional iBox merchandise; i.e. extra resin tray, build plate, battery pack, etc. 
OR 
2. A refund of the $15 value.

Customs, Duties, and Taxes (CDT) are not included, so be aware that you may have to pay taxes if you are in a country that charges VAT (Value Added Tax).




“We will make a best effort to provide the perk with on time delivery but delivery is not guaranteed on the specific pledge ship date.”

story:
WHAT IS CMEBEME?

Cmebeme, unlike some popular social networking websites, will provide safe and fun social networking for tweens ages 11-14 with content monitoring and notification for parents. 

Cmebeme is the answer to an increasing demand for a safe online platform for tweens to share unique life experiences without the hassle of being bullied. 

Cmebeme’s goal is to provide this safe, responsible online haven while offering typical messaging, chat, group, photo, video features and more. Cmebeme may later extend its user base to other age groups.

While we will provide similar experiences to the most popular social network sites, Cmebeme will differ greatly by offering a variety of incentives for self-promotion and growing user communities.  Incentives will be given in the form of CMePoints, or virtual money, to be used to purchase items from popular retailers in the CMe Store.  Cmebeme will also provide a safe and fun expire fence where you'll know a user is interacting responsibly. 

 

CMEBEME OFFERINGS

·      Safe, bully-free social network experience for tweens

·      Content monitoring and notification of misuse for parents

·      Common Messaging, Chat, Groups, Photo, and Video interaction

·      Cash-like rewards for self-promotion and growing user communities


 

THE IDEA BEHIND CMEBEME

Cmebeme was conceived by a middle school administrator in the Baltimore area out of frustration of the misuse of social networking.  He serves as an eyewitness to the negative impact social network can have on tweens and how a majority of tweens was abusing a technology that is meant to connect people and to share ideas.  

Cmebeme will encourage youth to communicate with each other responsibly and begin to shift the various forms of cyber-bullying, unwarranted communication, and predatory users to more productive and accountable talk and actions.

The idea of Cmebeme grew as an alternative for tweens who wished to demonstrate a high level of social and digital responsibility while enjoying the common features often provided in more mainstream social network platforms.  The belief in helping as many people as possible to become productive and responsible citizens, therefore, contributing to a better world is the motivation and drive behind cmebeme.  Cmebeme will remain relentless in changing the mindset of today’s youth toward more positive dialogue and engagement while essentially rewarding their just actions for doing so. 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR CONTRIBUTION

Your contribution will allow us to finalize the last stages of the development of the cmebeme website.  We have received an initial investment to develop the website and to become COPPA Compliant.  Countless hours and personal monies have been exhausted into developing 90% of a finished website.  NOW, we need your help!  

The targeted goal of $10,000 will pay for the following:  

•  Developer Expenses to complete the registration process / coding / beta support.  The registration and verification process is the final stage in being able to beta launch.  It requires an additional 40 hours of programming as well as continued support during beta. 60%+ of the funding will go to the developer. 

•  COPPA Compliance Certification to ensure all tween users are properly identified and protected.  This will be done through a stringent process by PRIVO, a worldwide leader in COPPA compliance.  15% of the funding will help us to become COPPA Certified.

•  Marketing is needed to spread the word of Cmebeme.  We will market Cmebeme locally as well as in several states throughout the United States.  Beta users will be at a great advantage as the site becomes more popular.  15% of the funding will help us market cmebeme to the masses. 

• Mobile App.  Cmebeme current site is WAP or mobile ready but additional funding will allow us to develop a dedicate mobile app for today's smartphones.  We will begin with apps on iOS and Android devices.  10% of the funding will help us begin to develop dedicated mobile apps for easy access of our users. 

 

The Backup Plan…

If we don’t reach our anticipated goal of $10,000, contributed monies will go towards developer expenses in order to finalize the most vital aspect of the site at this point --- the registration process.  This will allow us to beta launch and raise the awareness of Cmebeme through our beta users of 400 tweens.  PRIVO may be willing to confirm us as COPPA compliant if we demonstrate progress towards a final product.  In terms of marketing, we’ll utilize the various social media platforms as a means of spreading the word of Cmebeme.

   

THE IMPACT

At Cmebeme, we want to provide a fun, safe and responsible social network experience for tweens while rewarding them for sharing with their friends and family.  Why is it that the user never benefits financially from promoting various social media platforms?  We are keeping the user in mind as we grow cmebeme.  Users will be able to offset many costs to parents associated with buying popular items simply by doing what they are already doing on other social network sites but now must do it responsibly on Cmebeme. Virtual dollars, or CMePoints, will be rewarded based on the growth of a user’s community and their ability to reach targeted benchmarks. 

Ultimately, your funding will help curve the rising problems of inappropriate communication among today’s youth.  Cmebeme will do it’s very best to eliminate the negativity witnessed daily on many social networking platforms and on the web.

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

While we greatly appreciate your contribution, we also ask that you help as follows: 

•  Get the word out about cmebeme via your social network platforms.  The more people hear about this, the better our chances are of a quick launch to begin positively impacting lives.

•  Use the Indiegogo share tools!  These are easy and will connect potential donors directly to our project. 

•  Help Your Tween strategize on how they can reach the masses in their schools, religious organizations, camps, etc. in order to quickly grow their CMe Family.
story_txt:
WHAT IS CMEBEME?

Cmebeme, unlike some popular social networking websites, will provide safe and fun social networking for tweens ages 11-14 with content monitoring and notification for parents. 
Cmebeme is the answer to an increasing demand for a safe online platform for tweens to share unique life experiences without the hassle of being bullied. Cmebeme’s goal is to provide this safe, responsible online haven while offering typical messaging, chat, group, photo, video features and more. Cmebeme may later extend its user base to other age groups.
While we will provide similar experiences to the most popular social network sites, Cmebeme will differ
greatly by offering a variety of incentives
for self-promotion and growing user communities.  Incentives will
be given in the form of CMePoints, or virtual money, to be used to purchase items from popular
retailers in the CMe Store.  Cmebeme will also provide a safe and fun expire fence where you'll know a user is interacting responsibly. 

 
CMEBEME OFFERINGS
·      Safe, bully-free social network experience for tweens
·      Content monitoring and notification of misuse for parents
·      Common Messaging, Chat, Groups, Photo, and Video interaction
·      Cash-like rewards for self-promotion and growing user communities
 
THE IDEA BEHIND CMEBEME

Cmebeme was conceived by a middle school
administrator in the Baltimore area out of frustration of the misuse of social
networking.  He serves as an eyewitness to the negative impact social network can have on tweens and how a
majority of tweens was abusing a technology that is meant to connect people and
to share ideas.  
Cmebeme will encourage youth to communicate with each other responsibly
and begin to shift the various forms of cyber-bullying, unwarranted
communication, and predatory users to more productive and accountable talk and
actions.
The idea of Cmebeme grew as an
alternative for tweens who wished to demonstrate a high level of social and
digital responsibility while enjoying the common features often provided in
more mainstream social network platforms.  The
belief in helping as many people as possible to become productive and
responsible citizens, therefore, contributing to a better world is the
motivation and drive behind cmebeme.  Cmebeme will remain relentless in changing the mindset of today’s youth
toward more positive dialogue and engagement while essentially rewarding their
just actions for doing so. 

 
WHY WE NEED YOUR CONTRIBUTION

Your contribution will allow us to
finalize the last stages of the development of the cmebeme website.  We
have received an initial investment to develop the website and to become COPPA
Compliant.  Countless hours and personal
monies have been exhausted into developing 90% of a finished website.  NOW, we need your help!  
The targeted goal of $10,000 will
pay for the following:  
•  Developer
Expenses to complete
the registration process / coding / beta support.  The registration and verification process is
the final stage in being able to beta launch. 
It requires an additional 40 hours of programming as well as continued
support during beta. 60%+ of the funding will go to the developer.  
•  COPPA
Compliance Certification to
ensure all tween users are properly identified and protected.  This will
be done through a stringent process by PRIVO, a worldwide leader in COPPA
compliance.  15% of the funding will help us to become COPPA Certified. 
•  Marketing
is needed to spread the word of Cmebeme.  We will market Cmebeme locally
as well as in several states throughout the United States.  Beta users will be at a great advantage as
the site becomes more popular.  15% of
the funding will help us market cmebeme to the masses. • Mobile App.  Cmebeme current site is WAP or mobile ready but additional funding will allow us to develop a dedicate mobile app for today's smartphones.  We will begin with apps on iOS and Android devices.  10% of the funding will help us begin to develop dedicated mobile apps for easy access of our users. 

 
The Backup Plan…

If we don’t
reach our anticipated goal of $10,000, contributed monies will go towards
developer expenses in order to finalize the most vital aspect of the site at
this point --- the registration process. 
This will allow us to beta launch and raise the awareness of Cmebeme
through our beta users of 400 tweens. 
PRIVO may be willing to confirm us as COPPA compliant if we demonstrate
progress towards a final product.  In
terms of marketing, we’ll utilize the various social media platforms as a means
of spreading the word of Cmebeme.

   
THE IMPACT

At Cmebeme, we want to provide a fun, safe and responsible social network
experience for tweens while rewarding them for sharing with their friends
and family.  Why is it that the user never benefits financially from
promoting various social media platforms? 
We are keeping the user in mind as we grow cmebeme.  Users
will be able to offset many costs to parents associated with buying popular
items simply by doing what they are already doing on other social network sites
but now must do it responsibly on Cmebeme. Virtual dollars, or CMePoints,
will be rewarded based on the growth of a user’s community and their ability to
reach targeted benchmarks.  
Ultimately, your funding will help curve the rising problems of
inappropriate communication among today’s youth.  Cmebeme will do it’s
very best to eliminate the negativity witnessed daily on many social networking
platforms and on the web.

 
OTHER WAYS TO HELP
While we greatly appreciate your contribution, we also ask that you help as follows: 
•  Get the word out about cmebeme via your social network platforms.  The more people hear about this, the better our chances are of a quick launch to begin positively impacting lives.
•  Use the Indiegogo share tools!  These are easy and will connect potential donors directly to our project. 
•  Help Your Tween strategize on how they can reach the masses in their schools, religious organizations, camps, etc. in order to quickly grow their CMe Family.

story:
Jakit: The Story of a Revolution 

Hi Guys,

Thank you for looking at my project, I have been working on JAKIT for over two and a half years, but I believe the time, money and headaches have been worth it. Starting from an idea floating around in my head, to scribbled designs on bits of paper, to selling everything that wasn't nailed down to fund it, I now have a fully functioning fully tested and re-tested working sample which is all ready to go into mass production! 

So far the Jakit project has been self funded, and through a passionate commitment, I am proud to have brought the project this far, but now your help is needed to introduce Jakit to the world...

OK, What is it?

The JAKIT it's a phone case with a big difference, and currently there is nothing on the market like the Jakit, and definitely nothing with the ability to switch OFF or ON your earphones! (hold that thought)...

Tucked safely inside of the Jakit case are retractable earphones, and they are attached to your phone 24/7. (still holding that thought)...

Once the Jakit is attached to your iPhone or Galaxy it need never be removed; why is that?

Well, even though the Jack is permanently connected (jacked) into your phone, the Jakit has a little switch which turns the Jack connection between the Jakit and your phone ON or OFF. (now do you see why I asked you to hold that thought)...

This switch gives you the option to use your phone normally as if the Jakit was not attached to your phone.

Any time you need your earphones, all you need to do, is switch the earphones on, extend the earphones from within the Jakit case, and you can go hands free, make calls, listen to music, play games or watch a movie.... and never again will you have to worry about leaving home with out your earphones.

So, now you have no more worries about leaving home without your earphones, or untangling a birds nest of wires to use them. Also eliminating broken earphones at the bottom of your bag or purse, they can now live safely attached to your phone 24/7, and when you need them they will always be there! So in essence as long as your phone is with you, so are your earphones.

No more Spaghetti (unless its with meatballs and garlic bread)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kdZ5ps2qNms

 

The earphones have been specially designed and made for the Jakit product, by a company who love their earphones, and they have made sure that the sound quality is awesome, a little too awesome, if you can stand them to be at full volume (not recommended!), they still sound perfect... 

We have also attached a digital microphone for making calls, so your voice sounds crystal clear to whoever you are calling.  

Jakit's, a work of art .....

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7eOFhFZCPBk

 

The concept in mind when designing the Jakit, was to produce a high quality case for your phone, along with permanently attached retractable earphones, available to use whenever you may require them, but most importantly was to not interfere with the normal functionality of your phone, therefore Jakit only enhances the user experience.

So, not only can you switch OFF and ON your earphones, but this unique switch means that you can also use the loud speaker function on your phone, for conference calls or to share music (with no need to remove your Jakit), but also if your car is blue tooth enabled, the Jakit will not interfere with the car and phone connecting when entering your car (still without removing your Jakit).

 

Jakit up close and personal.........

OK to summarise what a Jakit can do:

1) It is a case that can be permanently attached to your phone (The Jakit can be taken on or off in seconds and will not damage your smartphone at all)

2) The earphones are safely wound up inside the Jakit case, and are therefore available to use 24/7.

3) As long as the Jakit is attached to your phone, the jack is permanently Jacked/connected into your phone, but the switch on the Jakit turns the earphones OFF or ON as you need them (patented design).

4) Because the Jakit can stay permanently attached to your phone, The Jakit has an ON/OFF switch so that you can switch your phone ON or OFF without removing the JAKIT.

5) The Jakit also has a switch on the side of the outer rim/casing, which by clicking it, will allow you to PLAY, PAUSE, FORWARD and REWIND your music, very easily.

6) When you are ready to store the earphones back inside the Jakit Case, simply connect the ear buds together (they are magnetic and have specially designed grooves so they join together very easily). Pull the cable straight, hold down the retract button on the side of the Jakit, and the cable/earphones will automatically rewind back inside the case.

7) When extracting the earphones, simply hold the ear buds between your finger and thumb and pull them out from inside the Jakit case, until they are extended to your desired length, fully extended they are over a metre in length, (no need to push any buttons when the earphones are being extracted, it is only automated when rewinding the earphones).  

Face to face with Jakit..........

The Jakit is currently designed to fit the iPhone 4/4s. Still, the Jakit has been designed in such a way that we can fit the inner workings into different Jakit phone cases, which we are currently in the process of completing the designs for. Even so, with over 200 million iPhone 4/4s out in the world, and Apple still manufacturing the iPhone 4s for the foreseeable future, we are confident that our first Jakit will have plenty of potential customers for some time yet.

 

Access to all your phone's buttons and switches

Easy charging access, and clear openings to allow you to use your phones loud speakers clearly.... so you need never remove your Jakit.

 

With your help, we hope to have a Jakit for the iPhone 5 and Galaxy S3 by March/April 2013, and in doing so, the aim is to evolve these two new Jakits to offer even more gadgets hidden inside the Jakit case. For example, we want to include battery packs to maximise your smartphone's usage time. In addition, we are trialling electric motors, solar panels amongst other things, all to enhance the Jakit users experience.

To keep you posted on future developments, keep an eye on www.jakit.co or www.jakitstore.com. Also follows us on Facebook.

 

The Jakit product has been designed from scratch, all the parts have been designed and made especially for this product, and in doing so we have used only the highest quality materials, which has given the Jakit its strength and durability...  

My hope is with the forward thinking indiegogo community behind us, we can not only take the Jakit 4/4s into mass production before Christmas, but also expand the range of products through investment in the new design ideas, finance the required tooling (the moulds to make all the bits that make up a Jakit) for the iPhone 5 and Galaxy S3, but also the iPad, iPad mini and Samsung Tab amongst others currently being designed, with patents pending, and bring some of those new products to the market in the first quarter of 2013.               

 

Why number 8 on the earphones

Because it's my lucky number..... 

Jakit goes silent at the movies

 

The Jakit product itself has been adventurous in its design, and because of this we now have a product which has some completely revolutionary aspects, which have never been on the market before, with the main one being able to switch on & off the permanently attached earphones.

I personally have learnt an incredible amount over the last two and a half years, and I would like to take what I have learned, and with your help, take the Jakit project forward, not only into mass production of the iPhone 4/4s, but also introduce the iPhone 5 & Galaxy S3 projects, which I would love to bring to market in the very near future, but I do need your help to enable me to do that.

The Jakit project todate, has been funded through private funds only, no banks, no Business Angels, and from those funds we have the first Jakit product.

If the indiegogo community get behind project Jakit over the next 28 days, then below are realistic Time Lines...

Deposits have been placed to have the tooling (moulds to make the bits that make a Jakit) made, we still owe 50% of the tooling charges, but they are finished and therefore ready to start production.

Hopefully if the indiegogo community gets behind the Jakit product during the next few weeks, and Jakit achieves its funding goal, we would be looking at late December early January 2013 for the first Jakit 4/4s units to start arriving to our fellow belivers, as a thank you for helping..

If full funding was achieved then my hope is to have the Galaxy S3 and iPhone 5 Jakit units, ready for mass production by April 2013.

The iPad mini's and Samsung tablets we would hope to bring out by the middle of 2013.

Please forward the Jakit project to friends, family, work colleagues and anybody else you believe would help me achieve my goal of introducing Jakit to the world...

Thank you for reading and sharing in my journey so far. I'm now looking forward, hopefully with your help, to start the next exciting chapter of the Jakit story! 

I hope you will support us, and let's hope one day soon, you can say, I helped bring Jakit to the world!!!

story:
Introducing Smart Wall Calendar:

Ever wondered if you Wall calendar can communicate with you? Well now it is possible!!!

The idea of this invention is to incorporate Picture Frame and calendar together with all other important things that we all use daily and can have access to easily. This will be the World's 1st Smart Wall Calendar.

This Smart Wall Calendar will be WI-FI and Bluetooth enabled.  The Smart Calendar is Multi-Touch touchscreen, It will Sync with Smart phone(s) through Mobile App. The Smart Wall Calendar is also voice controlled through speech recognition and can send information to cell phones via internet in form of text message and to assigned email(s)....Keeping your vital information on the go.

 

 

  

 

The Smart Wall Calendar will come with Special Smart Remote Control that you can use to add/delete/edit information such as Special events, birthdays, reminders, contact information, appointments etc. with a click of a button. 

 

The Smart Remote Control has a lot of functions and some of the features are:

  • Zoom-In, Zoom-Out buttons. Click and magnify the screen if you are at a distance.
  • Slide up to access keyboard. 
  • Dimmers if you want to control brightness
  • Just interested in todays DATE, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, ETC... click on specific buttons and there it is!!! 
  • And the list goes on......

 

 

HERE IS WHY THE POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS....

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute,  that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Dont forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • And remember your input is always appreciated...

 

 

We will  incorporate the latest technology where messages can be sent to end users via WIFI from your smart wall calendar.

Imagine meeting reminders sent to employees Phones and Emails using the Smart Wall Calendar but the information was entered through smart phone or WEB based calendar. ( it will have its admin mode so nothing to worry as to how to control the end-user interaction)

 

 

Will be perfectly hanged anywhere in the house. Portable when you want it to be and you just set the mood of the calendar according to your personal decor. 

 

 

This will change how we use Wall Calendars

Why not keep your vital information on the go! Smart phones have changed how we use our phones...Correct? What about Calendars? Everyone use it, Everyone needs it, from kids to older folks at home, not everyone has smartphones and knows how to use a computer. This innovation will change all that.

 

 

Regular paper calendars are a mess and have limited space to write on; You are only viewing the current year and the same old boring picture(s) over and over)....But Smart Wall Calendar will change all that. You can personalize, customize and Revolutionize your wall calendar.

 

 

Easy to hang on the wall, its portable when you need it.....

 

 

 

  • Incorporate picture frames and calendars IN-ONE ..Customize the way you want it
  • Vital information on the go (text message and email alerts)
  • Printer enabled (connect to LAN printer)
  • Weather forecast (current)
  • World clock
  • Hard drive memory storage
  • Camera enabled
  • Touch screen
  • FM Radio, MP4 player(play music in the background)
  • Notepad
  • and many more..............

 

 

In a research study conducted by Zanation, we discovered that 95% of the individuals who took the survey stated the following: 

  • They respond to a text message quicker then a phone call (So we will use the technology where one can use the Smart Wall Calendar and send a quick message to the person in contact list, such as "get milk when you come home")
  • A substantial amount of space to write appointments, dates and reminders, and keep it clean and unclustered
  • They rather have their appointments, meetings and reminders hidden
  • Prefers entering recurring reminders once then repeat all the time
  • Easy access to weather forecast
  • WIFI and Bluetooth enabled (sync mobile phone)
  • Can print appointment, or anything on the notepad
  • Would love to have a Calendar that plays music, we incorporated FM station with memory to store music
  • Prefers to have a calendar with option to personalize pictures (No need for Picture frames anymore)

 

When you contribute

Funds are needed to finalize the prototype and develop software. We are currently working on 2 sizes as mentioned below:

Smaller version

13" - 10"...1/2" thickness

Bigger version

17" - 11"...1/2" thickness

 

 

Join the Circle, Become a Believer.

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

Your contribution is dearly appreciated. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. If the goal is reached, it wont be long when the world's 1st Smart Wall Calendar comes to Life. 

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT EVERY STEP OF THE WAY.....
