Will be perfectly hanged anywhere in the house. Portable when you want it to be and you just set the mood of the calendar according to your personal decor. 
 

 
This will change how we use Wall Calendars
Why not keep your vital information on the go! Smart phones have changed how we use our phones...Correct? What about Calendars? Everyone use it, Everyone needs it, from kids to older folks at home, not everyone has smartphones and knows how to use a computer. This innovation will change all that.
 

 

Regular paper calendars are a mess and have limited space to write on; You are only viewing the current year and the same old boring picture(s) over and over)....But Smart Wall Calendar will change all that. You can personalize, customize and Revolutionize your wall calendar.

 
 
Easy to hang on the wall, its portable when you need it.....
 

 

 

Incorporate picture frames and calendars IN-ONE ..Customize the way you want it
Vital information on the go (text message and email alerts)
Printer enabled (connect to LAN printer)
Weather forecast (current)
World clock
Hard drive memory storage
Camera enabled
Touch screen
FM Radio, MP4 player(play music in the background)
Notepad
and many more..............

 

 
In a research study conducted by Zanation, we discovered that 95% of the individuals who took the survey stated the following: 

They respond to a text message quicker then a phone call (So we will use the technology where one can use the Smart Wall Calendar and send a quick message to the person in contact list, such as "get milk when you come home")
A substantial amount of space to write appointments, dates and reminders, and keep it clean and unclustered
They rather have their appointments, meetings and reminders hidden
Prefers entering recurring reminders once then repeat all the time
Easy access to weather forecast
WIFI and Bluetooth enabled (sync mobile phone)
Can print appointment, or anything on the notepad
Would love to have a Calendar that plays music, we incorporated FM station with memory to store music
Prefers to have a calendar with option to personalize pictures (No need for Picture frames anymore)


 
When you contribute
Funds are needed to finalize the prototype and develop software. We are currently working on 2 sizes as mentioned below:
Smaller version
13" - 10"...1/2" thickness
Bigger version
17" - 11"...1/2" thickness
 

 
Join the Circle, Become a Believer.
 
 
 


 
 

  
 
Your contribution is dearly appreciated. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. If the goal is reached, it wont be long when the world's 1st Smart Wall Calendar comes to Life. 
 
WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT EVERY STEP OF THE WAY.....

story:
So what's this all about?

We are currently working with DAGNet Solutions, Inc to develop an app for smart phones that will help to put an end to this worldwide trend of accidents resulting from using cell phones while operating a car. We chose to develop this idea as an app since all of the major cell phone companies are phasing out non-smart phones, so eventually anyone using a mobile phone will be able to use this app. Most states have some kind of law in place regarding the use of cell phones while driving (click here to see). These laws are a great start but they do not prevent anyone from actually using a device behind the wheel. The enforcement of these laws will increase as the accidents continue. Not only is texting behind the wheel dangerous but it will become more and more costly to those that get caught as law enforcement increases.

Several studies have been done to prove the dangers of even talking on a hands free device while driving. The overall message of these studies is that we cannot pay full attention to the road while using these devices. Sending or receiving a text is the most dangerous of them all because it combines the three types of driving distractions , visual, manual and cognitive. Texting behind the wheel takes a driver's eyes from the road for an average of 4.6 seconds. At 55 miles per hour the distance you would be driving blind would be the entire length of a football field. Anything that will take your brain power away from the road is the root of the problem and that includes conversations on hand held or hands free devices not just texting.

We all need to make the personal choice to stop texting while driving and this app will help with that. Your automatic response sent to the texter will let them know that you did receive their message and it will be addressed when it is safe to do so. We can not solve this problem with laws alone. It is up to each and every one of us to develop new habits that will bring our full attention to the road ahead.

Here is the concept of the app.

 This app will automatically put your phone into the proper mode to match that states laws that you are driving in. When this app is installed onto your phone it will automatically respond to an incoming text or voice message if you are driving in a car that is traveling over 20 miles per hour. The prerecorded message will say something to the effect of "your message is important to me, however I am currently driving and I am unable to respond to you at this time. As soon as it is safe to do so I will return your call" or a text would read " I got your text, however I am driving right now. When it is safe to do so I will respond to you." This app will be able to sense when your phone is moving over 20 miles per hour and automatically kick into this mode. An option to activate the app without moving will also be available. The app will always be active for texting over the 20 miles an hour. We feel that besides the fact that it is banned in 43 states, texting is the most dangerous distraction. Statistically not making or receiving calls/texts while driving is the same as removing a drunk driver off of the road. You have the same "attention" to driving while drunk as you do texting or talking on the phone.

After the call or text has been responded to, the app will alert you of the event with a tone. If the text is urgent, that will be indicated so that you know you need to pull over as soon as possible to respond.

-   I can not wait to have this on my phone! Right now I ignore the messages sent but I want the person to know that I am on the road and will call as soon as possible. I like the alert that a text is urgent so I know to pull over somewhere to respond as soon as possible. Also, when I am at work or any time that I do not want to be disturbed,  I will activate this app and set the appropriate message . I only want to respond to urgent messages while working so this would help to screen my text messages. When my son is old enough to drive I will have this on his phone as well. It is scary to think that some of our youth are using their phones while learning to drive!

How will your contribution help?

We want to be able to bring this to the market as soon as possible. The funds from this campaign will go towards both the before and after market expenses. So far DAGNet Solutions, Inc has taken us to this stage at no cost. The foundation is set for the app but there is more developing to do. There are other features of our app that will set it apart from other similar apps. After we file a provisional utility patent we can share some of these unique features with our campaign contributors.  Marketing costs to spread the word through social media as well as future debugging and maintenance costs are also monetary needs that we have. We understand the commitment needed to provide user support now and into the future.

Perks!

We would like to have input from our contributors. Part of the perks will be ideas that you as a contributor can offer such as the name of the app, design of the icon and possible additional functions for our app. Before we go public with this app we will need your help to test it in real world applications. When you contribute $10 or more we will give you a link to download the app for free in return for your input. We will also mention your name as a contributor to the project on our blog at textracted

story:
World's Toughest Ballistic-Fiber-Made USB-C Cable

 

Cables are commonly used in daily life, and what's the worst experience you'd ever had? Right, it's when you want to charge your phone/laptop, it's broken. Most cables are  easily broken, and you have to buy new cables again and again and again. 

HALOBAND is here to solve this problem. Also, it supports 100W fast charging, 4K display and so on.

 

 

FAST CHARGING

 

The cable supports power delivery up to 100 Watts, providing fast charging for your MacBook Pro. You can charge your MacBook Pro (15'') to 50% in only 35 minutes! 

 

 

 

 

Here we are having a charging test with a MacBook Pro(15'')

 

4K DISPLAY

 

The cable also support 4K display, which the Apple's cable doesn't. With this cable, you can project your favorite project on a screen and share it with others! 

 

 

 

Cables from Apple don't support 4K display.

 

SUPER SPEED

 

This USB-C Super Cable can transfer data up to 10Gbps, which is 20X faster than USB 2.0. You can transfer an entire HD movie in 30 seconds or  transfer a year's worth of music in 10 minutes.

 

SUPER STRONG & SPECIAL DESIGN

 

This is a real Super Cable made of 2000D bullet-proof fabric fiber, twice as much as former generation. You pull a car with it, literally. 

You can pull a car with Super Cable to prove that this cable is strong enough.

 

Anti-Bending Design

The cable works reliably after 5,000 multi-directional flexes at the USB-C connectors.
 

 

Non-slip Design

The non-slip design make it very easy to plug and unplug the cable.

 

Strong Joint

The joint is made by the deep-draw extrusion method without seams.

An ultra-rugged Type-C Super Cable is two times thicker than the Apple original charging cable.

 

TECHNICAL PARAMETER

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

DESIGN CONCEPTS & WHY INDIEGOGO

 

The cables is one of the most commonly used products in our daily life, but is usually of simple and poor quality. We hope to create some products that are more exciting.

We made our first designs focused on the appearance. We require the joints be very smooth and also be durable. After some brainstorming, we were able to come up with the design we wanted.

Next, we added the design elements of carbon fiber in order to recreate the texture and color of carbon fiber.

 

Finally, we strengthened the internal design. In addition to adding the E-Marker chip to make it more powerful, we will undoubtedly use the bulletproof fabric fiber up to 2000D. After many instances of mold-opening, we finally got what we wanted. 

We are proud of it. We chose Indiegogo for two reasons, one is to verify our ideas, and the other is to promote the mass production of products to get better quality and cost.

If you are interested in our products, or would like to bring our products to your market, please feel free to contact us.

 

TIMELINE

 

 

ABOUT US

 

Our product vision: simple, durable, worry-free. We seek the strongest and best materials to develop products with ergonomic designs.

Our team is based in San Francisco, Shenzhen, China and Osaka, Japan. Craftsmanship is what we pursue. We have excellent product development engineers, and we have a mature production and manufacturing supply chain to ensure that our products are of high quality from design to output. Our first generation Super Cable have received a great response since they were put into the market. Now we are developing a new generation products, which we believe will bring surprises to our users.

 

Risks and challenges

 

As a hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. Due to supply chain issues and other reasons, the final manufacturing schedule may be delayed.

However, we will be as transparent as possible to keep you informed and work to resolve any issues that may arise. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

story:
Gallevent™, The best event website. EVER.

Gallevent is the fastest, easiest, and funnest way to discover events happening around you. As soon as you land on Gallevent.com, you get a collection of events around your current location that are happening that day. You can even filter events by category or search for events by location, keywords, and date.

Categories of events are organized by colors and icons, making it easy for you to find the type of events you are interested in with just one glance. Events are collected from all over the web and delivered to you in one place, in a visually organized, map based presentation.

Gallevent’s goal is to help you quickly discover things to do, so you can get to the fun faster.

To bring you an even better event discovery experience, we’d like to develop a system to allow you to post your own events directly to Gallevent, and allow you to RSVP for events through the site. We’d also like to allow more people to access the website. These things cost money. We are reaching out to the world for people who are as excited about discovering the things that happen around them as we are, and can donate to help us make our dream of building the best event website ever come true.

Your contribution will lead to further development of a better event website for everyone! Also, as a contributor, you’ll receive an account before the rest of the world gets their hands on one. Check out the perks for our Indigogo campaign to see what other awesome things you'll get as a contributor.

Meet the team

Jessica and Andrew built Gallevent because, not too long ago, trying to figure out what sort of things were happening around you was a bit of a pain in the a**. You had to visit several different event listing websites—with each site focused on a single event type or location—and open Google maps to lookup the location of every single event you were interested in. Jessica got tired of doing this. She wanted to spend less time finding events and more time attending them. She came up with an easier way to collect and display event data and pitched her idea to her good friend Andrew. Andrew thought the idea was awesome and the rest is history.

Jessica works on Gallevent’s branding, graphic design, and front-end web development.

Andrew handles server infrastructure, back-end development, and front-end development.

Jessica and Andrew meet up in a San Francisco coffee shop every week to work on Gallevent.

What we’re looking for

We’re reaching out to the Indiegogo community to raise money to move Gallevent to cloud hosting which will allow us to give more users access to the site.

Breakdown of costs:

Hosting: $275 per month x 18 months = $4,950
Cloud backup: $5 per month x 18 months = $90
Total hosting cost for 18 months: $5,040

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the idea of discovering all the fun stuff going on around you, but can’t donate at this time, you can show your support by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Tweet it, Facebook it, Pin it on Pinterest, Google + it, or shout it from your rooftop! Every little post helps and we are truly appreciative of it.

You can also high five us on Highlight or cheer us on online (or in person, if you are in San Francisco) for moral support. It would put a smile on our faces :)

story:
The World's most advanced glass screen protector for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+

NO aluminium edges. NO plastic edges.

CINDER is is PURE glass from curved edge to curved edge.
Using the strongest Premium Tempered glass available.

It is by far the most complex glass composite ever made for a screen protector.

It's Glass. It's Tough.
It's Seamless. It Curves.

Save up to 60% now.

CINDER comes in black and white.
CINDER also fits the new iPhone 6s series.


We recieve many really good questions during our campaign.
Some of the questions are about the difference between CINDER and competitors trying to accomplish a curved edge solution.

This is why we decided to do a comparison chart.

CINDER is without a doubt the Next Gen of tempered glass screen protection for the iPhone 6 series.





 'Cinder 0.2 mm Curved Gorilla Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 6:
Thin, Curved and Beautiful!'
'Install was an absolute pleasure: fast, easy, and no pesky bubbles.'

Video review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u2hWLLUQ4gI--


'The curved edges too are extremely smooth and very nice to the touch. Combined with the thinness, it makes pressing the home button very pleasurable and it certainly feels like there is truly nothing on the screen.'





'After a few days usage you didnt feel CINDER was there, it felt like a natural second skin'
'The installation was simple and easy'




The iPhone 6 has a unique design with curved sides. Even the glass front has curved edges, designed to follow the curved design.

No existing tempered glass screen protector matches this design.
They are all flat from egde to edge and leaves you with gaps and hard edges!




Today's technology is only able to produce flat screen protectors, as a result the edges from today's screen protectors leave you with a big gap around your iPhone screen.

Your fingers and hands can easily catch on the floating edges. This is inconvenient and the protector can easily slip off again.




CINDER matches the design of the iPhone 6 Glass like no other Screen Protector without comprising its design and functionality in any way.




Using CINDER enhances the user experience in many ways while preserving the design and functionality of the iPhone 6:

- Using the best Premium tempered glass available

- The unique new oleophobic coating used on CINDER enhances the touch feeling - leaves a smooth buttery surface

- Real Curved Glass Edges follows the exact shape of the iPhone glass edges

- 0.20mm thickness provides an almost invisible protector without adding noticable weight

- CINDER enhances the sharpness of the iPhone 6 screen


CINDER squeezes 12 layers of protection, including a Premium tempered Glass, into only 0.20 mm, making it both impact and scratch resistant, and very very light.



CINDER will help you avoid expensive repairs (a replacement screen costs a minimum of $250).

It will also prolong the life of your phone and help it keep its value. Second hand phones are given ratings now from A to C. With less wear and tear or marks CINDER will help you keep your phone in the best condition.  

CINDER can pay for itself by doing its job... protecting your iPhone 6.

CINDER is easy to install and anyone can do it.


Maximum reusability.
Our unique adhesive makes it possible to remove and apply CINDER again and again without affecting your iPhone or CINDER in any way.

You dont need to get it right the first time. Just try again.

You can even reuse CINDER in the future if needed.




Working cases;
Apple leather case
Apple Silicone case
Ringke Fusion
Rhinoshield Crash Guard
Thule Atmos X3
Urban Armor Gear
Incipio NGP - updated May 4th
Speck CandyShell Grip - updated May 4th
ZooGue Social Pro - updated May 6th
Magpul Field Case - updated May 11th
Powersupport Air Jacket - updated May 14th

Cases not working;
Spigen Tough Armor Cover Case
Spigen Air Skin(very close, and some might be able to do it) - updated May 6th
Incipio dual pro(very close, and some might be able to do it) - updated May 8th


In test soon;
Spigen Aircushion 6+ Case Bumper New Ultra Hybrid Series Crystal Clear
LifeProof nud case
Shumuri Slim case




After several iterations, many tests and more than a year in the making CINDER is now ready for the public.


We look forward to bringing CINDER to market and appreciate all your help and support. You are probably wondering about now why we chose to call our cutting edge iPhone protector CINDER. Well like the fairy tale, CINDER is the only glass that fits... (and once this fact is realised she becomes an overnight success...)

All we want, is for you and your iPhone 6 to live happily ever after... and CINDER can help make that happen.

We wish to raise $25,000 to begin full scale production.
This covers manufacturing, packaging, and all preparations for retail.



Important notice.
Winner conditions are based on the amount of contributions achieved.

We expect to begin shipping 4-6 weeks after this campaign ends.
This means latest mid July.

CINDER will ship Worldwide.

UPDATE May 17th.
We have made new Perks which includes Shipping fees.

If you purchased before May 17th and forgot or somehow couldnt add the shipping at checkout please use the Perk named 'SHIPPING FEE - 1 CINDER'.

You can find a Perk named 'Shipping - 1 CINDER'.


To make CINDER a reality we had to be very careful selecting the perfect production facility. With such a complex product we need to control all the elements.


To achieve an exact fit on the iPhone 6, ultra precision techniques and machinery are needed.

CINDER is all about the perfect fitting and to achieve this we had to use the newest technology and the best possible manufacturing techniques. To give you an idea, imagine a normal screen protector as an average family car and CINDER as a Formula One car. That's the kind of leap we're talking about.

Our team of designers is based in Denmark, specializing in creating unmatched aesthetic appeal and functional value for the end user. Our research and development team, located in California USA, enables us to identify needs and develop solutions proactively, keeping us ahead of the competition.

Our products are manufactured on an ISO-9001-certified factory with 8 years of experience in the field, 'using the best engineering and facilities available in glass production and working under the strictest standards for quality control.'

Cupert Technology, the name derived from its place of origin Cupertino, was founded in 2015.

Cupert Technology is set to launch a complete range of cutting-edge mobile accessories that deliver unparalleled luxury and convenience for the users.


When will you ship CINDER?
4-6 weeks after the campaign ends.
This means latest mid July.

How do I know if I get the correct CINDER?
A few days after the campaign ends we sent out a survey asking for your specific choices.

I forgot to buy shipping. What shall I do?
No problem. You can always buy the shipping Perk.
When campaign ends we will go through all contributions, and send out information to backers who couldnt find the correct way to add shipping costs.

Other screen protectors say they have smooth edges, isn't that the same?

NO. Today's flat solutions use terms like 'smooth edges', 'rounded edges' and to some extend 'curved edges' which only means the hard flat edges have been polished, they are NOT physically curved like CINDER.


I have seen some other brands with curved edges?
Our competitors have tried to solve the problem by adding aluminium, porcelain or even plastic to the edges, leaving you with a bad user experience and the iPhone's design is compromised.

Is CINDER for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus, and both colors?
YES
When the campaign is finished we will send out a survey to find out which model(s) you prefer.


How long will CINDER last?

Applied correctly and treated well CINDER could outlast your phone and as it is washable, you can actually swap it to a new phone if your handset malfunctions for any reason.

Will CINDER stop my case from fitting?

A good question, but no we have tried CINDER with a number of cases and it still fits in nearly all of them.

Is CINDER reusable?
YES
You can remove and install CINDER many times. And even reuse it on another iPhone.

Will CINDER fit the new iPhone 6s series?

YES


Do you ship Worldwide?

YES


How much is shipping costs?
1 CINDER is $5.
All shipping prices are listed in the perk information.

Please remember to add this to your purchase.

The World's most advanced glass screen protector for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+NO aluminium edges. NO plastic edges.CINDER is is PURE glass from curved edge to curved edge.Using the strongest Premium Tempered glass available.It is by far the most complex glass composite ever made for a screen protector.It's Glass. It's Tough.It's Seamless. It Curves.Save up to 60% now.
 CINDER comes in black and white.CINDER also fits the new iPhone 6s series.We recieve many really good questions during our campaign.Some of the questions are about the difference between CINDER and competitors trying to accomplish a curved edge solution.This is why we decided to do a comparison chart.CINDER is without a doubt the Next Gen of tempered glass screen protection for the iPhone 6 series.



'Cinder 0.2 mm Curved Gorilla Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 6:Thin, Curved and Beautiful!'
'Install was an absolute pleasure: fast, easy, and no pesky bubbles.'Video review:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u2hWLLUQ4gI--



'The curved edges too are extremely smooth and very nice to the touch. 
Combined with the thinness, it makes pressing the home button very 
pleasurable and it certainly feels like there is truly nothing on the 
screen.'








'After a few days usage you didnt feel CINDER was there, it felt like a natural second skin' 'The installation was simple and easy'
The iPhone 6 has a unique design with curved sides. Even the glass front
has curved edges, designed to follow the curved design.
No existing tempered glass screen protector matches this design.They are all flat from egde to edge and leaves you with gaps and hard edges! 




Today's
technology is only able to produce flat screen protectors, as a result the
edges from today's screen protectors leave you with a big gap around your iPhone screen.
Your fingers and hands can easily catch on the floating edges. This is inconvenient and the protector can easily slip off again.





CINDER matches the design of the iPhone 6 Glass like no other Screen 
Protector without comprising its design and functionality in any way.








Using CINDER enhances the user experience in many ways while preserving the design and functionality of the iPhone 6:- Using the best Premium tempered glass available- The unique new oleophobic coating used on CINDER enhances the touch feeling - leaves a smooth buttery surface- Real Curved Glass Edges follows the exact shape of the iPhone glass edges- 0.20mm thickness provides an almost invisible protector without adding noticable weight- CINDER enhances the sharpness of the iPhone 6 screenCINDER squeezes 12 layers of protection, including a Premium tempered 
Glass, into only 0.20 mm, making it both impact and scratch resistant, 
and very very light.

CINDER will help you avoid expensive repairs (a replacement screen costs a minimum of $250). It will also prolong the life of your phone and help it keep its value. Second hand phones are given ratings now from A to C. With less wear and tear or marks CINDER will help you keep your phone in the best condition.  CINDER can pay for itself by doing its job... protecting your iPhone 6.


CINDER is easy to install and anyone can do it.
Maximum reusability.Our
 unique adhesive makes it possible to remove and apply CINDER again and 
again without affecting your iPhone or CINDER in any way.You dont need to get it right the first time. Just try again.You can even reuse CINDER in the future if needed.








Working cases;Apple leather caseApple Silicone caseRingke FusionRhinoshield Crash GuardThule Atmos X3Urban Armor GearIncipio NGP - updated May 4thSpeck CandyShell Grip - updated May 4thZooGue Social Pro - updated May 6thMagpul Field Case - updated May 11thPowersupport Air Jacket - updated May 14thCases not working;Spigen Tough Armor Cover CaseSpigen Air Skin(very close, and some might be able to do it) - updated May 6thIncipio dual pro(very close, and some might be able to do it) - updated May 8th

In test soon;Spigen Aircushion 6+ Case Bumper New Ultra Hybrid Series Crystal ClearLifeProof nud caseShumuri Slim caseAfter several iterations, many tests and more than a year in the making CINDER is now ready for the public. 




We look forward to bringing CINDER to market and
appreciate all your help and support. You are probably wondering about now why we
chose to call our cutting edge iPhone protector CINDER. Well like the fairy
tale, CINDER is the only glass that fits... (and once this fact is realised she becomes an overnight success...) 

All
we want, is for you and your iPhone 6 to live happily ever after... and CINDER
can help make that happen.

We wish to raise $25,000 to begin full scale production.
This covers manufacturing, packaging, and all preparations for retail.










Important notice.Winner conditions are based on the amount of contributions achieved.We expect to begin shipping 4-6 weeks after this campaign ends.This means latest mid July.CINDER will ship Worldwide.UPDATE May 17th.We have made new Perks which includes Shipping fees.If you purchased before May 17th and forgot or somehow couldnt add the shipping at checkout please use the Perk named 'SHIPPING FEE - 1 CINDER'.You can find a Perk named 'Shipping - 1 CINDER'.

To make CINDER a reality we had to be very careful selecting
the perfect production facility. With such a complex product we need to control
all the elements.
To achieve an exact fit on the iPhone 6, ultra precision techniques and
machinery are needed.CINDER is all about the perfect fitting and to achieve this we had to use the
newest technology and the best possible manufacturing techniques. To give you
an idea, imagine a normal screen protector as an average family car and CINDER
as a Formula One car. That's the kind of leap we're talking about.

story:
Hello Indiegogo!

The CableKit™ is officially a GO, having been funded successfully on Kickstarter with the support of 922 amazing backers. In case you missed it, we wanted to bring our campaign to Indiegogo while our production tooling is being made so you can get in on the first production run at discounted pricing. The Indiegogo community has been an essential part of building our small business and we thank you for checking out our campaign.

 

 

What is the  CableKit™?

CableKit™  is an ultra-portable case for your USB or iPhone charging and data cable, equipped with an adapter of your choice to charge your other devices or a friend’s phone. Its patent pending design includes a handy SIM card removal tool and even has a small storage compartment to hold up to 2 micro or nano SIM cards, or micro SD cards (not included). 

 

Ultra Portable, Uniquely Versatile.

CableKit™ is small enough to keep comfortably on your keychain and is also designed with a pocket clip so it stores securely in your pockets or bags—perfect for travel or everyday carry. It’s so easy to carry, you don’t even have to think about it. It’s always with you. 

 

 

Charge or Sync Your Devices on the go.

Connect your devices to your computer to sync files or use any USB power source such as a power bank, car USB port or wall adapter to charge them on the go. 

 

 

Swap SIM Cards or Store an Extra SD card.

That little silver thing isn't a fancy toothpick. (Though it could be.) It's a SIM card eject tool that tucks away securely in your CableKit so you'll never misplace it. The Kit even has a hidden compartment that stores up to 2 micro or nano SIM cards making it the perfect travel companion. 

 

 

About the Cable

The CableKit comes with either a USB A to micro USB-B or USB A to Lightning cable that provides both data and charging functions. It has a unibody TPE over-mold construction so you don’t have to worry about tears at the cable/connector interface. It’s designed to be durable, yet flexible enough to accommodate different charging positions without harming your device. 

 

 

Is it “Fast Charging”?

The cable is fast charge compatible. The actual speed of charging is determined by your device and power source. The cable has both data and charging wires so your device can request the optimal current draw and uses 24AWG wires for charging to provide a faster charge than standard after-market cables that use 28AWG charge wires. 

Mr. Science Fun Fact! - The charge speed of a cable is related to the current which is limited by the electrical resistance of the cable assembly. Thicker wires of shorter length means less resistance in the wires. Think of water flowing through a short, wide pipe vs. a long narrow pipe. Which flows faster? The same is true for electrical current. 

 

Configure CableKit to meet your needs. 

Your CableKit can be configured to suit the devices you use most. Simply choose the right combination of cable and adapter to fit your needs. You will be able to pick your cable and adapter after the campaign ends when we send out the surveys.

Standard Cable - Like it or not, micro-b connectors are on most small electronic devices today. The micro-b cable forms the foundation of the standard charging configuration. Simply choose the adapter you use most to charge your phone and other devices. 

Lightning Cable - Do you love your iPhone and all things Apple? Choose the lightning cable and then pick a micro-B or USB-C adapter for your other devices.

 

 

 

Rewards AKA Pledge Levels.

For supporting our campaign you get... CableKits. The only question you have to decide on at this point is "how many?" Simply choose the pledge level that best matches the number of CableKits you want. 

If you want to get a different number of CableKits than listed in the pledge levels, just pledge for the level below what you want and increase your pledge by the per unit amount noted in the reward level description. For example, if you want 6 CableKits pledge $66 (plus shipping) at the 4-pack reward level ($11 x 6). 

A few things to note:

1. You will pick your cable and adapter options after the campaign when we send out the survey. 

2. If you get multiple CableKits they don't have to all be the same so you can have different combinations of cables and adapters for the different kits. 

3. If you do add a few extra CableKits above your reward level, please be aware that you will need to pay the appropriate shipping for your location so be sure it's included in your pledge amount. 

Finally, you may have noticed the Tech Team pledge level includes an optional logo or message printed on the case of your CableKit. We think these would make great corporate gifts for your team or customers. See the image below for reference. The printing will be in one color in the area shown. 

 

 

What About Add-ons?

We’ve got you covered. Add-ons are super simple for this campaign. 

After the campaign, you will have a chance to add on any Lever Gear product at 20% off retail price when you complete your survey. This is our way of saying thank you for believing in us. Here’s how it works: We use a service called BackerKit to fulfill pledges. When we are ready to fulfill orders, we will send you a link to a survey where you can select your cable and adapter options, verify your shipping address, and (optionally) add more funds to shop for Lever Gear products at the special 20% off discount. Please note, all rewards will ship together when we fulfill the CableKits. 

 

Schedule

January - June - Design, Prototyping and Testing.

June 18 - Production Tooling Turned On.

June 20 - Kickstarter Campaign followed by Indiegogo In-demand

August - First articles, Testing, Certification, Adjustments if needed.

September - Production Run and Assembly

October - Kickstarter and Indiegogo fulfillment

November - All Kickstarter and Indiegogo orders shipped.

 

Lessons Learned and a Plan for Success

This is our third Crowdfunding project and perhaps the 20th product our founder and design engineer, Mike Scully, has helped bring to market. In manufacturing, particularly when you’re pushing the limits of design, things can (and likely will) go wrong, cost more, and take longer than expected. 

This lesson was reinforced during our last campaign where we introduced two complicated products simultaneously—the BitVault and BitLight. We decided to launch both products together because they shared some common components and we thought our backers would like seeing both options side by side. In hindsight, launching two products of this complexity proved to be beyond the resources of our small company. 

For those unfamiliar with our last campaign, we successfully brought the BitVault to market, and it was well received by our backers. The BitLight, however, proved to be a moving target in terms of technology and cost making the product non-viable. 

In the end, we made the difficult decision to cancel BitLight production and refund our BitLight backers. We have also pledged to give all BitLight backers a complimentary CableKit. We want our backers to be confident that—even if we can’t deliver on our original plans—we will do everything we can to be transparent and to make it right. 

Lessons

  • Stick with simpler products until we have the resources to take on bigger challenges. 
  • Make sure all of the major technical, regulatory, and cost questions are answered before launching a campaign.
  • Understand how changes in the market can potentially affect our product.  
  • Be very conservative with the timeline. Then add in a buffer. Strive to under promise and over deliver.

 

Our launch for the CableKit addresses all of the lessons we learned from our prior projects. We’re not inventing some brand new technology here. We’re making a cable using tried and true methods with high quality components. Our innovation is configuring those components in a smart, useful, and novel way. Our manufacturing partner in China is first and foremost a cable company with a second core competency in injection molding small parts. In other words, this product is right in their wheelhouse. 

 

Our Cable Manufacturing Facility - Testing Room

We’ve spent the past six months iterating on the design, prototyping, and testing our concepts. We’ve covered the gamut on design ideas and feel we’ve struck the right balance of portability, usability, cost, and design. We’ve worked closely with our manufacturer to minimize any technical design challenges and ensure a high likelihood of production success. And, we also have a thorough understanding of the remaining development and parts costs.

 

Testing an early prototype.

We have been playing with the prototypes for weeks, and after showing them to friends for feedback, we've gotten an overwhelmingly positive response. We feel confident that this will be a great product. We're so confident in fact that we have even taken the step to begin production tooling now. This means tooling should be completed shortly after the campaign ends, which is great for our timeline. Our Indiegogo campaign will give us the funds to wrap up any legal issues and place our first production order. As always, our Indiegogo backers are the key to our success and we thank you for your support.

story:
Com4tzone is a new way of viewing personal and home security. 

    Com4tzone combines new and known features in home automation plus                      personal and HOME security in one single easy-to-use App. 

    Now you need only one App on your Smartphone to manage the settings and              level of security and comfort both when your are Out and when you are HOME 

    The App is a key part of the user interface that can help family and friends to              monitor your location if your are alone and uncomfortable, automate your                    household appliances and control your alarms and sensors. 


           


    The App also lets you preset the weekly rhythm of your home.       

    A calendar is used for selecting a schedule for a soft illumination early in the                morning and a slight increase when your family is busy getting ready for                        school and work. 

    The heat is lowered during daytime when your house is empty and                                   increased again in the afternoon before the first person gets home. 

    You can also select individual lamps and appliances to be switched on so                      the house is ready for your family after a day’s work, and the light can be                      turned off automatically when you go to bed.



    You no longer need an expensive alarm central. 

    All you have to do is to add trusted neighbors, friends and family as your                        helpers. They will be notified by a siren and alarm message on their                                  Smartphone when something is wrong and the lights in the house will start                  flashing. 

    You can easily see the location of your car and follow your children, your                        spouse or your friends on Google map if they ask for it.

    In every window of the free Com4tzone App there's on the top right an info                  icon. Here you can read about the functions of the window you are looking at.                                                                                                                                                   It's easy

    Feel comfortable while at Home or when you are Out. 

    Com4tzone brings a new dimension to your safety. 

    Ask those you trust to follow you or be ready to receive an                                                    alarm message in case you feel uncomfortable or unsecure.

    It is free to use for you, your friends and family.  

    Save money on your electricity, water or heating bills. 

    Turn the lights on/off with your smartphone or according to the Com4tzone                calendar. 

    Monitor your water usage or regulate the temperature in every room/zone. 

    Watch live video in HD quality of your property, no matter where you are in the            world.

Smart devices for your comfort and security

    IT’S SIMPLY CLEVER! When you want to turn on your lights, you just press                the desired button in the Com4tzone App. 

    A signal is sent to our server and on to a small control box which is connected            to your router. 

    This control box sends a wireless signal to the relay which is connected to the            lamp. The lamp turns on within half a second. 

    One huge advantage is that you don’t need to replace any of the household                  switches.

                            

    

                     We have carefully selected our suppliers of hardware parts                                                               to interact with our Com4tzone system/App

                               Below you can see our hardware launch                                                     The campaign perks will be actual hardware that interacts with                                                                   the Com4tzone App    

Live Video System

                         

     Watch LIVE HD Video of your home or what you wish to see, no matter where             you are in the world.

    You can invite friends and neighbors to watch your LIVE Video on their                          Smartphone by passing on the codes to them. 

    You can watch recordings on your Com4tzone User homepage. 

    The camera connects easily to your router, just scan a code in your                                  Com4tzone App and enter a user name and password, which you decide                        yourself, and press   CREATE.

Smoke Sensor

   

    It is the smallest fire alarm in the world and very elegant in design. 

    When the alarm goes, you can hear a loud siren directly from the Smoke                        sensor. 

    All lights in your house will turn on while your appliances switch off                                  automatically.

    It sends an alarm message to you and your helpers’ Smartphone with a loud                siren and message if there is smoke or fire. 


                                                                     

Flood Sensor

                                                                                              

    It is the smallest Flood sensor in the world and very elegant in design.

    When the alarm sounds, the lights in the house will  turn on, and all your                        appliances will switch off automatically. 

    When the alarm goes, you can hear a loud siren directly from the Flood                          sensor. 

    It sends alarm message to you and your helpers’ smartphone with a loud siren            and an alarm message if there is water on the floor. 

                                                                  

Multi Sensor

    This extremely small Multi sensor will let you know how many people entered              or left your house or a given room.

    It will automatically turn on/off the lights as people enter/leave the room.

    Monitors the temperature of a room within a preset comfort interval.                              At too high a temperature from direct sunlight, the curtains will roll down                      automatically   

    If you do not come home before dark, the light will turn on and off as if you                    were at home. If you visit the bathroom at night a dim light will be turned on.

                              Dimensions: 44 mm in diameter


Adaptor for Wall Switch  



    This smal Wall plug is an intelligent wall adapter with an on/off button. It fits                 into an existing outlet and checks the power consumption. 

    You can enter a budget on your Com4tzone user homepage which sends an                 alarm message to your Com4tzone App, when or if the budget is exceeded. 

    The Wall plug fits all appliances, white goods, television sets, floor lamps, etc.              When you activate the alarm on the Com4tzone App and leave your home, the            Wall plug will turn off to save standby power while you are away.

    The adapter interacts with Com4tzone’s calendar feature which allows you to             switch your lights on/off automatically.

           On your Com4tzone App you can decide manual or automatic control


                     

                                                                  

Relay for Lamp Socket


                                       

    This Relay must be installed by a qualified electrician, either in the electrical                 cabinet or into a power source and is therefore invisible.                                                       On your Com4tzone User homepage you can activate a set of favorite ligths,               e.g. 4 lamps in the same room/zone which turn on/off at the same time.

    The Relay interacts with Com4tzone’s calendar feature which allows you to                  switch your lights on/off automatically.                                                                                        You will still have the option to turn the lights on/off and dim on the wall                        switch. 

    For each room/zone you can enter a budget for the power consumption on                  your Com4tzone User homepage which sends an alarm message to your                      Com4tzone App, if the budget is exceeded. 

    If you do not come home before dark, the Relay is connected to the light                        source which will turn on/off as if you were at home.

          On your Com4tzone App you can decide manual or automatic control.

            If the alarm is activated, you and your helpers will receive an alarm message               on your/their Smartphone, and all the lights connected to the Relay will start               flashing until you turn them off.  

                                                   That’s Clever

GPS Tracking Alarm

               

              Dimension: 65 x 65 mm.

    If you lock your security device on your Com4tzone App and your car gets                    stolen, the GPS tracker will send an alarm message with a loud siren to you                  and your helpers’ smartphone.  

    When the car is not in motion for more than 4 minutes, the GPS tracker will                  send the position of the car and you and your helpers can see precisely on the            map where the car is located. 

    The tracker has a battery life of 2-4 years and is supplied with a SIM card.

    You can use the tracker for all vehicles, machinery, furniture etc.

                                              There are no limits                                      

                               

                             

        Try the App now – it´s free.

    Experience how easy it is to use. At the moment the app is available in Danish             and English, Com4tzone will of course be translatet into several laguages                     along the way, as our system/App is introduced to other countries.                                                                                    

    All the SOS functions of the App are FREE to use, as well as parts of the GPS                functions. The remaining functions are available in their DEMO version for you            to explore. Making them active requires the purchase of the respective                          Com4tzone hardware devices, such as Wall plugs and Relay.

    In every window of the free Com4tzone App there's on the top right an info                  icon. Here you can read about the functions of the window you are looking at.  

                                                     It's easy  

    If you wish to make your home to become intelligent and safe, just place an                  order from the first production batch at half price, by a donation through                      Indiegogo. 


    Why Com4tzone need your support?

                We have turned to Indiegogo to present our idea to you and the awesome                     community of tech-savvy home owners and caring parents, neighbors etc.                   around the world. 

                  We would like your feedback to our service and products. With your                                 support we will be able to market Com4tzone much faster. 

                  We have expertise in design, coding and we have partnered with                                       manufacturers that are experienced in security, electronics and home                           automation. 

                  Be a part of Com4tzone and make this happen.

 Send us your comments and feedback to feedback@com4tzone.com

Delivery time  

We estimate a delivery time of 6-8 weeks after the completion of this funding campaign. We will send an e-mail before processing your delivery. See Q&A below.


Q&A

Will Com4tzone work on Iphone and android smartphones?

Yes, it is compatible with both iOS and Android. Make sure that your operating system is updated.

This year it will be ready for all smartphone operating systems.

Will Com4tzone work with multiple phones?

Yes, you can use as many phones as you like – given the Com4tzone App is installed.

Does Com4tzone require a subscription?

No. Com4tzone does not require a subscription. 

What's the warranty?

We offer a 4 year limited warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

How much is shipping?

Shipping within EU is 20 Euro.                                                                                 International shipping is 50 USD. Local import taxes may apply.

Can I change my perk?

Unfortunately, not during the campaign. But before we send you your gear, we'll send you an e-mail where you can change perk and purchase add-ons if you choose

story:
CarGo Power is a Massive Power supply for your iPhone, tablet and smartphone. Literally transport your  mobile power supply (in a car, perhaps?) wherever you go. Geared for boosted recharge speeds, CarGo Power lets you forget about power supply for ALL your mobile devices.

CarGo Power: The Fastest Car Charger In the World!
Sure, sure - you've seen one,you've seen them all - but you've never seen the CarGo Power Car Charger Power-Bank. Check out the graphic to see where it's at:

Within 5 minutes flat, you have enough Power to recharge your iPhone with CarGo Power. 
More than that, you can recharge 6 iPhones with an hour charge of CarGo Power. No good a Power Bank if you need half a day to recharge the recharger...

                               

                                         (Pre-order Now Available on MONZGEAR)

 CarGo Power recharges your mobile devices super fast! The fastest Car Charger and Battery in the World. The Ultimate Power Cargo for All your mobile devices: iPhones, iPads, Mac's, Smartphones, Tablets, Phablets, Notebooks & Laptops.


We've reverse-engineered QC so that it works both ways. we didn't think that  the superfast  charging of your empty iPhone was good enough for you, so we decided you can also recharge your Camera,  portable Bluetooth speakers, wireless Headsets and printers.  
3 months into the development Welson, Mr. Chief Engineer said: "Nah, we want people to be able to recharge CarGo Power ANYWHERE!" 
So he took everything apart and popped in a Car Cigarette Lighter Charger and a USB charge port so you can draw power from any USB cable power source!

Packed with features any decent Super Charged Design should have and it does: CarGo Power runs on Smart tech.
  • "Durable Design" so if you drop it you won't cry
  • "Cool Casing" so you don't get burnt with Lightning Speed Recharges
  • "Super Smart Dial" measures and counts the CarGo Power source
  • "Smart Light" fluorescent blue glow-in-the-dark trim for power failures
Prototype
We've already got a prototype up and running. Now we need the funding for the tooling and the first production run. Based in Shenzhen we're in the unique position of being able to supply High-quality products at extremely competitive prices.

                             



We've developed CarGo Power to Enhance your Life.
CarGo Power is the world's fastest, truly portable & super efficient power bank. 
Production Schedule & Timeline
We've moved into 6th gear here at the Monzgear Shop. The Timeline below will give you a clue as to how quickly we're gonna roll once the campaign ends successfully:

       


Monzgear are a subsidized development group of Mobile Action LTD, an OEM provider for over 10 years with activity all over the globe. 

Grade A Electronics components and WiFi Alliance Certified Devices all use technologies developed by Monzgear. 

Based in Hong Kong with direct access to the biggest Electronic Brand Manufacturers in the World, Monzgear are in the Unique position of providing the Highest Quality electronics products and accessories at the best rates.


What so special about CarGo Power?

Cargo Power holds enough power to  recharge 6 iPhones on the go. It's the perfect travel companion: a car adaptor allows you to fast charge in your car when travelling. There is also a USB and Wall Socket Charge points for truly versatile Pwoer on the go.

Where can I use CarGo Power?

At Home, In the Car, Outdoors.

Features?

CarGo Power should not be missing from your car. It is an ultra portable car charger with fast charging circuit designed to fully charge your smartphone before your arriving at your destination. It has 4 USB ports, for iPhone 6/6+, Samsung and QC 2.0, so you can charge up to 4 devices at the same time. The build in battery pack is truly a Power Cargo - fully portable power source -  wherever you go.

Speed?

Lightning is almost as fast...

How long will CarGo Power last?

CarGo Power is  a 12000mAh power Battery with dedicated fast reacharge technology. Fully Recharge and empty over 2000 times.

Where Can I find out more?

story_txt:
CarGo Power is a Massive Power supply for your iPhone, tablet and smartphone. Literally transport your  mobile power supply (in a car, perhaps?) wherever you go. Geared for boosted recharge speeds, CarGo Power lets you forget about power supply for ALL your mobile devices.

CarGo Power: The Fastest Car Charger In the World!
Sure, sure - you've seen one,you've seen them all - but you've never seen the CarGo Power Car Charger Power-Bank. Check out the graphic to see where it's at:

Within 5 minutes flat, you have enough Power to recharge your iPhone with CarGo Power. 
More than that, you can recharge 6 iPhones with an hour charge of CarGo Power. No good a Power Bank if you need half a day to recharge the recharger...
                                                                        (Pre-order Now Available on MONZGEAR)








 CarGo Power recharges your mobile devices super fast! The fastest Car Charger and Battery in the World. The Ultimate Power Cargo for All your mobile devices: iPhones, iPads, Mac's, Smartphones, Tablets, Phablets, Notebooks & Laptops.



We've reverse-engineered QC so that it works both ways. we didn't think that  the superfast  charging of your empty iPhone was good enough for you, so we decided you can also recharge your Camera,  portable Bluetooth speakers, wireless Headsets and printers.  
3 months into the development Welson, Mr. Chief Engineer said: "Nah, we want people to be able to recharge CarGo Power ANYWHERE!" 
So he took everything apart and popped in a Car Cigarette Lighter Charger and a USB charge port so you can draw power from any USB cable power source!





Packed with features any decent Super Charged Design should have and it does: CarGo Power runs on Smart tech.




"Durable Design" so if you drop it you won't cry

"Cool Casing" so you don't get burnt with Lightning Speed Recharges
"Super Smart Dial" measures and counts the CarGo Power source
"Smart Light" fluorescent blue glow-in-the-dark trim for power failures

Prototype
We've already got a prototype up and running. Now we need the funding for the tooling and the first production run. Based in Shenzhen we're in the unique position of being able to supply High-quality products at extremely competitive prices.


                             









We've developed CarGo Power to Enhance your Life.
CarGo Power is the world's fastest, truly portable & super efficient power bank. 
Production Schedule & Timeline
We've moved into 6th gear here at the Monzgear Shop. The Timeline below will give you a clue as to how quickly we're gonna roll once the campaign ends successfully:



       



Monzgear are a subsidized development group of Mobile Action LTD, an OEM provider for over 10 years with activity all over the globe. 
Grade A Electronics components and WiFi Alliance Certified Devices all use technologies developed by Monzgear. 
Based in Hong Kong with direct access to the biggest Electronic Brand Manufacturers in the World, Monzgear are in the Unique position of providing the Highest Quality electronics products and accessories at the best rates.







What so special about CarGo Power?
Cargo Power holds enough power to  recharge 6 iPhones on the go. It's the perfect travel companion: a car adaptor allows you to fast charge in your car when travelling. There is also a USB and Wall Socket Charge points for truly versatile Pwoer on the go.



Where can I use CarGo Power?
At Home, In the Car, Outdoors.
Features?
CarGo Power should not be missing from your car. It is an ultra portable car charger with fast charging circuit designed to fully charge your smartphone before your arriving at your destination. It has 4 USB ports, for iPhone 6/6+, Samsung and QC 2.0, so you can charge up to 4 devices at the same time. The build in battery pack is truly a Power Cargo - fully portable power source -  wherever you go.
Speed?
Lightning is almost as fast...


How long will CarGo Power last?

CarGo Power is  a 12000mAh power Battery with dedicated fast reacharge technology. Fully Recharge and empty over 2000 times.

story:
Click Here To Visit Our New Website

***This is an extension of the original CommBadge campaign that raised over $30K, which you can view here.***

                        

Press Coverage

Mashable: "a two-in-one device that's both a communicator and badge...has arrived three centuries early."

CNET: "The idea here is to make hands-free phone options more readily accessible."

The Discovery Channel: See CommBadge on the Discovery Channel's Daily Planet show

Gizmag: "CommBadge Bluetooth wearable smartphone speaker invokes Star Trek"

Ubergizmo: "CommBadge will allow you to communicate with your phone without needing to pull out your device."

Pocketnow: "...like the Pebble Smart Watch, it’s just too cool not to be given a fighting chance." Podcast is here (skip to 0:25:45)

Scientific American: "Lo and behold, someone has done just that!...I’m talking about a hands-free control for the voice interface Siri."

Android Authority: "Star Trek style communicators could be a reality with CommBadge"

Lockergnome: "CommBadge Brings Star Trek Communicators to Life"

Wearable Technologies: "Gadget of the Month"                                      

What Is CommBadge™?

CommBadge is a patent pending wearable Bluetooth speakerphone for iPhone and Android that attaches securely to your clothing. It uses the latest noise canceling chipset to minimize background noise. By combining proprietary directional and personalized speaker technology, CommBadge brings you crystal-clear handsfree communication. It's simple to use, yet amazingly convenient!

You'll have full access to Siri and Google Now voice command functions seamlessly. Also, you can customize CommBadge with the FREE companion app for iPhone and Android.*

Easy and Convenient to Use

Simply by speaking and listening through your CommBadge, while leaving your phone in a pocket, purse or backpack, you can:

  • Place and answer calls ears-free
  • Send and receive text messages (“text-to-speech” through CommBadge)
  • Use your phone's native voice commands, such as Siri, Google Now, or S Voice to set calendar events and reminders, get sports news, and search for information
  • Receive an alert from the Wireless Tether feature that you left your smartphone behind
  • Be notified of incoming calls, texts, calendar and social media events with customizable vibration, sound, and LED's
  • And more, all handsfree!

The Background

Technology has finally caught up with the science fiction that was first imagined by Gene Roddenberry in Star Trek The Next Generation and it was called combadge. Finally, there is a real CommBadge, it's a miniature speakerphone with big sound. It utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0) to pair with your iPhone or Android smartphone. CommBadge measures only 1.5" (39 mm) in diameter.

Can Everyone Around Me Hear My Conversation?

The answer is no! One of the most important features of CommBadge, albeit the most time-consuming aspect of it's engineering, is the technology behind the speaker enclosure or "cabinet". Speaker cabinet design is a complex mixture of art and science.

In order to get crystal clear sound to the user, the enclosure is designed to prevent sound waves generated by the rearward-facing surface of the diaphragm of an open driver interacting with sound waves generated at the front of the driver. SORRY, what this all means is that we designed CommBadge so that the clean sound waves reach the users ears, but the sound waves that travel beyond a meter or so from the user are virtually scrambled. Therefore, someone near you can tell you are on a call, and not directly speaking to them, but they cannot discern the other end of your conversation. Thus, preventing that public Bluetooth headset syndrome of "are you talking to me?" in the supermarket line.

Who cares anyway? Technology can sometimes seem quirky until it becomes ubiquitous. Nevertheless we solved this, with one quick tap you can transfer the call back to your smartphone.

Why Not Just Wear a Bluetooth Headset Instead?

I don’t know about you but I personally hate wearing a Bluetooth headset. I’ve tried tons of them, and they are all uncomfortable or annoying to me. However, holding your phone while busy at work or doing household chores is a pain. For many situations using a speakerphone is a better solution, and the only way to truly multitask. For example, cooking, walking the two dogs, home projects, and the list goes on.

So I started thinking. Why can’t I just wear a speakerphone? I did some online research and I couldn’t find anything! Then, about a year ago I started prototyping and experimenting with placement and functionality. The more I tested it in various environments, some being very noisy, the more I was blown away. Why hasn’t anyone done this I thought? So I formed a team of five to build a real CommBadge.

With today’s noise canceling technology wearing a speakerphone totally makes sense. It’s super convenient and really great with Siri too. Put your iPhone away, and you can still access Siri from a distance of up to 30 meters!

Furthermore, most people are required to wear an identification badge while at work. A lot of people use badge reels for their access convenience. That’s how the CommBadge came to life, combining an ID badge reel and a tiny speakerphone. It’s always with you, and great for lunch breaks, etc. After work, simply remove your ID badge and it becomes your personal assistant.

The uses are truly limitless; and you’ll be hands-free in your car if your car is not Bluetooth equipped. Once you start using it you’ll never go back to a Bluetooth headset. Science Fiction has now become a reality!

CommBadge's Wireless Tether Feature

                           

What We Need and What You Get!

The CommBadge demoed in the above video is an actual working pre-production model. CommBadge is beyond the prototype stage. After dozens of CAD redesigns, and over a dozen 3D printed prototypes we have finally nailed the design. We are ready for production! With your support, we can bring a real CommBadge to the world three centuries early!

While we have finalized the design for production, your contribution will move it from a functional pre-production model, to a finished commercial product. The CommBadge will require a number of manufacturing processes like final PCB design verification and then fabrication, as well as injection molding and stamping, all of which are very costly initially, which is why we're here on Indiegogo. Once the project ends, we will begin production testing shortly thereafter. We will be posting regular updates and contributors will be able to get an inside look at our progress. CommBadge can be worn in many ways. Also, it was engineered to replace your daily corporate ID badge reel with a badge reel plus micro-sized speakerphone that's a wearable designer device.

For our Indiegogo launch we will be offering it in three configurations. The first package will include one low profile CommBadge Classic (no ID badge holder) that you can wear for personal use. The second package will include one low profile CommBadge that you can wear and display your corporate ID badge in a thin and light configuration. The third package is the CommBadge+, the "+" adds a built-in retractable ID badge reel. Wear it just like you do your current corporate ID badge reel; either on your collar, shirt pocket, or hanging on a lanyard. After fulfillment, other accessories are in the works.

Perks For Your Contribution

                                   

CommBadge Classic - Galactic Black

                

CommBadge - Galactic Black

                 

CommBadge+ Cosmic White

Latest Campaign Update

Exciting News! We are ready to open the APIs and provide a software development kit (SDK) to developers. This will add a whole new dimension of awesome applications, and in the near future, new but backward-compatible functionality. For example, a developer could design an app that provides voice annunciated caller ID, to verbally announce the names of incoming callers. The possibilities are truly limitless!

Don't forget to spread the word with friends and family in the "Share This Campaign" section above!

Frequently Asked Questions

  • FAQ: What is CommBadge? CommBadge is a next generation Bluetooth wireless speakerphone that is wearable. CommBadge is not a traditional Bluetooth headset!!! CommBadge attaches to your clothing quickly and securely. Additionally, CommBadge combines the ID badge reel you may currently be required to wear by your employer with a handsfree speakerphone.
  • FAQ: Can I use Siri? Yes, Siri works better with CommBadge! Access Siri handsfree around the house while your iPhone is in it's charger!
  • What about iOS 6 and iPhone 5? No problem, CommBadge was designed to work seamlessly with IOS 6. ALL iPhone's with IOS 4.0 and later will work with CommBadge.
  • FAQ: How do I wear CommBadge? CommBadge is a 39 mm diameter module that is less than 14 mm thick (before speaker dome)! It will come complete with everything you need for handsfree communication with your smartphone. The Indiegogo launch will include either the CommBadge Classic, CommBadge, or the CommBadge+ with ID Badge Reel (only adds 5 mm to the thickness), and all include a micro-USB charging cable.
  • FAQ: Can I run and jog with CommBadge? Yes, the clip has a secondary locking mechanism that will more than support the weight of the CommBadge without slipping or detaching.
  • FAQ: How do I wear CommBadge with my corporate ID Badge? The same way!!! It will clip to your shirt pocket, collar, or lanyard just like your old ID badge reel.
  • FAQ: How much weight does it add to my ID badge reel? CommBadge's components add less than two grams, so the weight difference is negligible
  • FAQ: What if I don't need an ID badge holder or reel? Great, just purchase the CommBadge Classic, it's a sleek minimalist design that's 5 mm thinner than the badge reel model.
  • FAQ: Can the "gray" securing clasp be removed? Yes, if you want to use velcro, magnets, etc., just unscrew and remove the clasp with a small phillips screwdriver.
  • FAQ: What is Bluetooth Smart? Bluetooth Smart also known as 4.0, enables devices to be continuously connected but with extremely low battery drain. CommBadge will last about a full day on a single charge with average use. Stand-by time is even longer.
  • FAQ: How do I charge it? Use the included micro-USB cable to connect to USB or a power supply
  • FAQ: How do I pair it to my iPhone or Android smartphone? Just like any late model Bluetooth headset. It takes less than a minute. You only have to do this once.
  • FAQ: What if I forget to take my smartphone with me while I’m wearing my CommBadge? CommBadge will alert you when you get a predetermined distance from your smartphone. You can adjust the range, warning tone, and vibration settings in the FREE to download iPhone and Android app.*
  • FAQ: Will my iPhone or Android phone detect if I forget to take my CommBadge with me? Yes, the CommBadge app works with iPhone and Android Notifications and will alert you when you get beyond the predetermined distance away from the CommBadge.*
  • FAQ: Where do I find the app? You can download it for free from the App Store or Google Play directly on your phone (coming soon).

*Requires iOS 4.0 or greater or Android 2.2 or greater.
